We kept smelling something funny and couldn’t figure out what it was, as the smell got worse we realized it was an electrical burning smell and quickly turned the machine off.I am trying to contact someone about replacing this fryer and the only information provided is a web link that no longer works and a phone number where you sit on hold forever.  I am disappointed in the product and the service, I wish I had paid more attention to the people that said this particular fryer broke very quickly.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 20, 2020
CommentsContent: This air fryer has already exceeded expectations.  Logistics first.  So easy to clean.  Fryer is very quiet you can barely tell it is on.  Controls are so easy to use.  I like that you can set specific temperatures.  It is not too big to fit on the counter and light enough to move around if needed.  The basket holds a ton of food.  Other reviews talked about steam and puddles around machine.  Non existent.  Most steam I had come out was a little when cooking chicken and I think I added too much vegetable oil spray.  No condensation on counters anywhere.  I used the recipe book to make mozzarella sticks, chicken and the chocolate soufflé so far.  Loved them all.  I highly recommend this air fryer.  Can’t wait to perfect some recipes and try new ones.

CommentsTitle: Plastic or Chemical Smell When Using The Cosori Air Fryer
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 27, 2020
CommentsContent: There’s a bad plastic or chemical odor when using the Cosori air fryer. We had to run it outside over 8 times to try and get the smell out. Most of the smell went away after several runs but it still had a hint of the same odor. Not only did it smell bad, it made some foods taste exactly like that odor. The air fryer was not as quiet as I expected. Also, the bin appears to be cheaply made.Note: We got the Cosori air fryer/toaster oven and it’s amazing!!! No smell, cooks amazing food, and super quiet!! I highly recommend getting the air fryer/toaster oven instead!

CommentsTitle: Easy to Operate & Reasonably Priced Cosori Air Fryer~ 5.8 Qt
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 26, 2019
CommentsContent: Today we received our Cosori Premium 5.8 Qt Air Fryer.  This is our first air fryer, and after doing extensive research on the internet and reading reviews for six plus months, we decided to purchase the Cosori air fryer.  Ordered the extra assessories that they offered, and prepared a hot dog for my husband for lunch using the skewers/& rack.  He thought it was tasty, but commented there wasn’t a lot of difference than in microwaving it.  Then i cooked up some French fries and they were crisp and perfect!  The clean up thus far seems to be easy, and the operation and directions, simple and easy to understand.  The unit seems sturdy and well made!  There is a great cookbook that is included with your purchase and looks like we will enjoy trying out different recipes.  There is only one DISAPPOINTMENT for me, and that is, when cooking the French fries there is suppose to be a “shake reminder”, this function did not work.  Other than that, we are thrilled with our Cosori Air Fryer, and would definitely recommend this to anyone who is looking for an incredible air fryer!  It’s a great addition to any kitchen and one that we will use often!

CommentsTitle: This is by far my fav kitchen item!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 29, 2020
CommentsContent: I literally use this thing for everything from making brownies to making meats. I even reheat things in it and it comes out crispy and juicy! I don’t want to use my microwave (I never really liked them) or my conventional oven now that the weather is warmer. It’s large enough to cook for my family of five in it and it doesn’t take up too much space it get really hot when using it. There was a weird smell when i first turned it on but i just preheated it and washed it again (after it cooled) and it was gone. I put foil in it when I’m feeling lazy so there no cleanup but i think it works best it u don’t use anything other than a little oil because the air needs to get around the food and with the holes blocked at the bottom it can only make one side crispy at a time. That’s fine with me when I don’t feel like cleaning up.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 30, 2019
CommentsContent: My husband did some online research before we bought an air fryer.  This one is the one he settled on, so we ordered it.  It worked perfectly for a couple of weeks, then the digital display went completely berserk.  I contacted Cosori directly through their customer service.  I have to say I was very pleasantly surprised.  They asked me to supply them with a few numbers off our fryer, and a picture of what the display looked like.  That was it.  I had a new one so quickly I couldn't believe it.  This one has never had a hiccup.  I cooks bacon better than anything I've ever used.  Frozen onion rings, corn dogs for the grandkids - I love it!  Cleanup is so easy.  The grease basin and the food tray come apart and they are both dishwasher safe.  However, they are so easy to wash that I seldom put them in the dishwasher.  One of the things I like best about it is that the frying tray is square.  Many of the air fryers I looked at had odd shaped trays.  I am not a fan of kitchen gadgets.  I don't like appliances lined up on my counter.  This is an exception.  I use it every day, so it IS on my counter all the time.  It's quite attractive, so I don't mind.  If you are in the market for an air fryer please consider Cosori.  I'm very happy with mine.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 21, 2020
CommentsContent: I like everything about this air fryer except that my fries have an off taste, that I can't quite describe (slight chemical maybe). I have cleaned everything according to instructions several times, and still the strange taste persists. This is my second purchase of a Cosori that I've made based on the many great reviews. I noticed that another customer had a similar issue, so it is not just my opinion. I think it might be a defective lot, but I still like it, and hope other customers do not have this issue, because it performs well otherwise. I might try notifying the manufacturer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 2, 2019
CommentsContent: I just got this today, it appears to be very well made. I registered it online to get the extra 1 year warranty, it was easy to complete the information.  I have used several air-fryers and I love the way they cook.  My concern is the basket, all the others I have had the coating comes off after just a very few uses, I am hoping this will not happen with this one.  I will update my review after I have used the unit.  With a warranty I am sure there will be no problems with the unit.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2021
CommentsContent: This is a great air fryer to use, had it for over a year and mostly use it for salmon/fries/chicken related products. Can definitely be used for a variety of different things, though cooking time will vary a lot. I wouldn't really recommend anything battered to be cooked in it since it takes a very long time to crisp up and doesn't taste as good as a deep fried (which is expected but was still worth a shot). Once you find your preferred timing, the rest is simple with only 1 flip in between during the half way mark. My only complaint is that cleaning the basket by hand (great if you use a dishwasher though)!The reason I give this a high rating is the customer support. My basket ended up breaking the handle and making it useless and I didn't sign up for the extended warranty as it was a gift to my mom and didn't see it. After contacting customer support, they were happily willing to send another replacement basket free of charge despite being out of warranty. I very much appreciate a company willing to work with the customer and stand by their products, hence why I highly recommend Cosori as a brand, whether you get this one or a newer version!

CommentsTitle: Does a great job but a definite fire hazard
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 7, 2021
CommentsContent: I love this fryer.  It's easy to clean and easy to use.  It gets the job done.  My issue is a safety concern.  Every time we used the fryer, we would smell a strong plastic smell.  We assumed this was from just "breaking the product in."  Then, one day, I decided to move the fryer to a different location in my kitchen.  The fryer had been in front of the window blinds in my kitchen.  The blinds melted from the heat being released from the rear of the fryer!  I had never head this issue with the previous fryer I had in the same location.  I looked at the manual and it only mentions to avoid sticking your hands near the ventilation area.  I would there should be a warning in bold letters to not place the fryer in front of any materials that could melt or burn.  I'm assuming everyone is placing the fryer on a countertop in front of a wall of some kind.  Depending on the finish on that wall, this could be a huge fire hazard.Anyway, we moved the fryer to an area where we have a tile backsplash only.  I'm sad my blinds on my new house are ruined.The product itself is great as long as you are mindful of what building materials are behind the fryer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 23, 2019
CommentsContent: I really really want to like this fryer. I just got it 2 days ago and was so excited to try it. I've already tried to make kale chips (twice), bread, broccoli, french fries, and sweet potato fries. I hate to report that everything came out burned completely black. I tried the preset and then followed the recipe book and then tried just doing it on my own with half the temp setting and still everything is burned black. I haven't seen any other reviews about the food burning so I may have just gotten a bad fryer. I will be returning to Amazon.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 16, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   We use it almost everyday. It’s easy to use, easy to clean, gives me fantastic fries, crunchy deep fried pork, and beautiful browned chicken.UPDATE:My Cosori Airfryer suddenly stopped working after two months of use.After initially using is quite often, we slowed down to a once a week usage after a week or two as the novelty of deep fried food died down.  While using it to prepare lunch the other day, it suddenly stopped working.Now it refuses to turn on unless the basket is held.  I am very clean with my appliances and am a careful user, most of my machines and appliances work like new despite being a decade old - even the ones that people complain about not lasting long- our household usually manages to keep them running well. So this particular appliance, being only two months old and breaking down in such a short span of time is unacceptable.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 5, 2020
CommentsContent: Strong melting plastic oder when cooking, left food tasting & smelling of plastic. Very loud fan. Returning for refund.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 17, 2019
CommentsContent: It's a Mothers day gift so I have no Idea how it works.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 14, 2021
CommentsContent: These are the next best thing since a kuerig.  So convenient so fast so easy to clean.  Forget the microwave for leftovers use this to reheat,  The food tastes way better doesn't get rubberized or mushy.  Biggest thing to watch for is drying something out like bread, its easy to dry breads out.  Fix your stale chips in this it can be done.  Leftover french fries are now a thing, before I tossed them or gave them to the dogs.  Quesadilla, grilled cheese, steak, fish, bacon, bagels, all sorts of leftovers.  For reheating and cooking I would recommend this over a microwave any day.  A microwave can heat water better and faster, that's IT!  By By hotpocket sleeves if you use this, takes a little longer but you get an actual crispy hot pocket.  Play with the heat and times, the presets are just a general guide and won't work for everyones preferences,  or quantities.  Haven't burned anything yet either the way this heats it takes a bit to burn something.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 26, 2020
CommentsContent: I decided to give this air fryer a try due to its very high ratings on Amazon and c|net labelling it as the 'best overall air fryer'.  I recall being conflicted on choosing the dial-driven manual vs. touch button electronic version of this device due to quality concerns but opted to go with the touch one for preset convenience.  I should have listened to my gut.The first device came and only 4 of the 18 buttons worked.  I looked up videos of other people operating the device and immediately knew mine was broken when I saw how easily others pushed each button and had the machine respond.  Thinking I just had some bad luck I contacted Amazon and they sent me a replacement the next day.  I didn't even unpack the next one completely before turning it on and trying the touch screen buttons to see if it worked as expected.  This time 6 of the 18 buttons worked so I boxed it up and requested a refund.One broken device is understandable as manufacturing issues occur sometimes, but two back to back makes me think this company doesn't have very good quality control standards.  If you want to order this machine I would learn from my mistakes and go for the manual version, but personally I will be looking at a different company altogether for my air fryer.  I feel you will be rolling the dice to see if you get a good product or a broken one with this company.Very disappointing...

CommentsTitle: I returned it and now I miss it!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 12, 2020
CommentsContent: I have heard the hype about Air Fryers and had a delicious piece of salmon that was prepared in this brand and model, at a friend's house. I immediately ordered this Air Fryer. One of the buttons on the touch panel didn't operate correctly from the beginning and it was taking about double the amount of time both from recipe times and the pre-sets.I returned this after a couple of days of using it- pretty sure I was done with the Air Fryer. But, alas... it makes cooking much easier and it doesn't heat up the entire oven, kitchen, house! Clean up is a sinch, food turns out pretty good.I ordered another brand- 3 times the cost(!!). I look forward to seeing if it provides better results.

CommentsTitle: UPDATE - AMAZING unexpected customer Service!!  Would give more stars if I could! 5+++++
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 16, 2020
CommentsContent: Update-Cosori Customer Service is amazing!  They go above and beyond any other customer service I have ever seen!  Their awesome rep Shirley reached out to me personally and is taking care of me.  As I stated before - this product is amazing and it was a shame that the coating was coming off of my unit.Most companies would just shrug and go on with their day - but to have a rep reach out to me personally AND offer a replacement that I was not expecting??No question - My family and I will stick with Cosori for all kitchen gadgets and products going forward!  Having a company that truly cares about their customers, stands by their products, AND want to make sure everything is right????  This is a blessingWe love this Fryer, and your company,- Cosori / Shirley Thank you .Original post:Great fryer for the most part - Would rate 5 stars BUT the coating on the fryer recently started to come off and we clean ours exactly how the company instructs you to do.It’s a shame because we love this fryer but have not had it long.  Why would the Teflon coating flake off soo easily on the fryer bins :/We have only had it for roughly 3 months and I fear it won’t last which is upsetting because as I’ve stated we really love this fryer.Cosori- Maybe I got a model that wasn’t coated properly?  :/

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 30, 2020
CommentsContent: Holy crap I finally stopped buying delivery food because of this! Its so easy and you just have to make sure to rinse it out between uses and it stays pretty clean. I eat fresh French fries almost every day. And tuna melts?!? I've never had tuna so melty! Fried pickles? Crisp and tasty, biscuits? Just toss em in, flaky and gold without waiting forever for an entire oven to turn on. Im in love. My boyfriend was very upset when I took it back home with me.

CommentsTitle: Very good product; excellent customer service.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 18, 2019
CommentsContent: When I finally decided to take the plunge, previous reviews convinced me that Cosori was a very good choice. I have since made some very good meals, including eggplant, potato wedges and falafel (I’m vegan, and oil-free cooking is perfect). The only issue I have had is that it was difficult to remove the basket from the fryer when the cooking was done. After contacting Customer Service, 24 hours later I was told a replacement basket was on its way to me. Amazing service; not too many other companies have such immediate response time. Did I mention you get a 2-year warranty?

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 30, 2020
CommentsContent: This a very nice product. I’m very happy. But reasonably, a heads up, you need to take care of it too. The touchpad is sensitive to grime. You have to wipe it clean for it to detect touch. The wifi works well, but a hassle when you unplug the unit; need to activate the wifi and reconnect the device to the app every time. If you run into trouble, customer service is there. Just give them time under the present circumstances; believe me, I have tested them too. Overall it is very good. Just don't ask for whats its not.

CommentsTitle: Great for single folks in an apartment
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 27, 2019
CommentsContent: Love this beyond belief so far since I bought it two weeks ago! Perfect “grilled” cheese was my first experiment and I was instantly sold. Made two marinaded chicken quarters (best cost efficient chicken cut) that we’re perfectly cooked with crispy skin. Frozen waffle fries that I tossed in a little EVOO and my mix of spices, came out of the air fryer and I felt like a pro- joked about how I should sell my fries because of how PERFECT they came out!!  Highly recommend. First air fryer experience and I loved it. Single guy who lives in an apartment- thought it would be a huge device and kill my limited counter space- it fits nicely and it’s so light and portable I just move it around easily if I need the room. Perfect.

CommentsTitle: Highly recommend this air fryer but did have problems with basket
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 2, 2020
CommentsContent: This air fryer is easy to use and has become a daily fixture in our kitchen. It has held up well to daily use with the exception of one thing. The original inner basket that came with it gave me problems. The screws kept backing out of the handle making for a dangerous situation anytime I lifted/moved it. I was constantly tightening the screws. At one point the basket got knocked off the counter and the clips that hold the inner basket into the outer basket broke off so I had to replace it anyway. The new inner basket has given me no trouble whatsoever so I'm not sure if the one I originally had was defective or what. Despite all that, I recommend this air fryer! It has a large basket that holds a lot of food at one time. I'm able to cook for my family of 4 in it. It is so much easier than heating up my oven and my family prefers the taste of the food from the air fryer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 30, 2020
CommentsContent: First I have to say Cosori's customer service is amazing!! I bought this air fryer in July and the buttons were very difficult to push. Then a couple weeks ago the door stopped closing. I loved it, I just couldn't deal with the button issue and once the drawer stopped closing, I definitely needed a new one. But I was past the return/exchange window with Amazon. So I emailed them about the issues 10 days ago, not realizing they are based in CA. When I found out, I figured it'd be a while before I heard back because of the wildfires. I was wrong!! They responded in 2 hours!! And within 2 days had a new air fryer in the mail to me!! I got my new one a couple days ago and it works great!! I love it and am so excited to get back to cooking in it!! Buy this fryer!!! It's fantastic and the company is phenomenal!!!

CommentsTitle: Never worked manually- then it just died
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 24, 2021
CommentsContent: We were really happy with the product & only until recently did we realize we should have been able to use it manually. The control panel never worked & we were only able to use the wifi app- which was great until we upgraded our wifi & couldn't reconnect it.We've been in contact with Cosori & hope to replace the product. We're pretty sure it's a short in the control panel that was always there.Why would we want another you ask?It cooked perfectly & was easy to clean. I have a Breville Smart Oven that I love but the air fryer option is so messy, it's not worth using. The other air fryers look too cumbersome.This product was big enough for a family of 4 & small enough to easily store.The wifi app is nice- especially with working from home. The recipes they give are also phenomenal.I can only imagine getting one that keeps working!!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 15, 2020
CommentsContent: As octagenarians, my husband and I are getting a little decrepit.  We like to cook but don't want to have to stand over the stove all the time.  This little oven is the best thing since sliced bread!  We have had it for a week and have used it all but one day.  It works exactly as the book says it will.  We had salmon in it and it was just like pan fried.  Ham great.  Chicken breast great.  Doing pork chops tonight and have no fear  that they might not taste great.  Baked potatoes in July?  No problem and they were better than oven baked!We have found that if you read the instructions completely the oven works great.  Let's face it, this is a small convection oven.  It is not an oil deep fryer.  Before you get it read the questions and answers.  We learned a lot of valuable tips, the best being not to put it in the dishwasher!  Warm water and dish soap are all you need.  Always preheat, Cosori tells you that for a reason and your results will be better.Those little aluminium cake and loaf pans you buy in the market work great in this.We have a lot of good cooking ahead of us and this little appliance will sure make it easier!

CommentsTitle: INSANELY amazing customer support.  Go out of their way to help you
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 27, 2019
CommentsContent: Before anything else, i bought this product about a year ago and have been using it happily since. It works amazingly and cooks food perfectly with the pre-set settings. Fully frozen chicken breasts get cooked in no time and i have an easy and healthy dinner.Now then, Onto the customer support experience! I had to deal with them twice so far. First happened on day one, i had a rare issue of the product being defective. I unpacked it and cleaned it as directed, plugged it in, and it turned on, then 5-10 minutes later, it would just power down for no reason and not come back on. Using their book i figured out it was over-heating for some unknown reason as if i let it cool down for a half hour or so, it would turn on and go back to  working seemingly like normal then after another 5 minutes of trying to pre-heat, would shut off again. I was upset and decided to try calling the Cosori customer support rather than going through amazon. The people at their support center worked with me for a few minutes trying to diagnose the problem and came to the conclusion, it was defective. They immediately offered me a replacement and sent it out, 2 day shipping, completely free of charge as they should. The key here is they didn't try to accuse me of breaking the thing, or anything else. They did everything they could to help then when they couldn't they offered to make it right. The new one arrived and has been working flawlessly  until today. During regular cleaning a screw fell out of the basket. When i tried to see where the screw was supposed to go, a nut fell out of the handle as well. I'm assuming the screw went into the obvious hole in the basket, and locked into that nut which was buried somewhere inside the handle. The issue here is there's no easy way to put this nut back into place. I couldn't take the handle apart past a certain point, and the nut had to be inserted inside the handle somewhere for the screw to then attach. I called Cosori support again and explained my issue hoping they could just walk me through putting the thing back together as i figured they must know a way. After hearing what i said they didn't even bother trying to fix it, just apologized for the the basket breaking and offered to send me a replacement basket.  I was stunned and agreed. I received an email from them , provided my order details, and my replacement basket will be on the way soon.  These people bend over backwards to help you and stand by their product and its so rare to find a company willing to do that. This product alone worked great, but whats really selling me on their brand is their customer support. I can safely buy their stuff and know its going to work right, and if it doesn't they are going to work with you and do everything they can to make it right.  Cannot recommend them enough and will continue to buy Cosori products in the future.

CommentsTitle: Quit Working But Was Promptly Replaced
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 21, 2019
CommentsContent: I used the Cosori air fryer approximately 6 times when it just stopped working completely.  I have contacted support so will report back.  Very disappointed at this point though.  Would have given it 5 stars if it hadn't broken down.Okay...editing this review because Cosori is sending me a new air fryer.  They requested a short video showing issue and proof of purchase which was easy.  Customer support contacted me within 2 days and acted on return within 1 day.  Stay tuned.I received the new air fryer in 4 days and it's working great.  Customer service contacted me to see if everything was working okay and I was satisfied.  I give their customer service 5 stars.  I love this fryer and am trusting it was just a fluke that the first one broke down.

CommentsTitle: Gotta have this in the Kitchen !
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 9, 2019
CommentsContent: Never own one of these airfryers so had no reference point to compare. Took a chance and glad I bought the 5.8 size one. The bigger size made sense because I'd rather have more room than less in case I need to cook a bigger meal.Wow impressed with the quality and how even the food cooks through. Super duper convenient to cook many different dishes.After owning this for several days I decided to review and had to admit I've been using it practically eeveryday. It's so easy to clean too. I decided to give this review 5 STARS ! and would highly recommend.The only little downside, it's a little different to open. My wife and I kind of got used to it so it's not a deal breaker.Hope this review helps, .....ok gotta go to the airfryer for my food. :-)

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 30, 2018
CommentsContent: This works better than advertised. Thank You.Respectfully, Charles E. Duvall DAVPERM/SP4 US Army Viet Nam 1966-1967 120th. Transportation Co. Red Ball Express

CommentsTitle: Decent Air Fryer if not a little on the cheap side
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 11, 2019
CommentsContent: We had a smaller Ninja Fryer we loved. Built like a tank and easy to use and clean. We saw this unit as we needed somersetting a  little bigger and with all the good reviews ordered it. The unit feels a little cheap, maybe it is the fingerprint proof plastic coating. The controls are not as granular around timing as the Ninja. The cooking baskets also come across cheap and rough making cleaning by hand difficult. The coatings on the basket as not as non-stick as the Ninja. In the end it gets the job done, but I don't see this as a long term ownership as we will likely look at other alternatives in a  few months.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 13, 2021
CommentsContent: This is hands down my new best friend in the kitchen. As someone who cooks pretty much every meal this is a life savor. Just throw your ingredients in & bam great tasting food. I’ve made duck breast, burgers, fries, bacon, orange chicken. I’ve used this everyday since I got it. Everything comes out perfectly done, healthy, & flavorful. Easy to use, easy to clean, & awesome recipe book. I would recommend to use this far away from the wall as this puppy throws some heat out the back. Also she’s a bit loud & sounds like a rocket is about to take off from your counter. Other than that this thing is a beast & gets the job done

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 8, 2019
CommentsContent: I have had this machine for about 2 weeks now and I love it.  It revitalizes left overs,  giving a crispiness that cannot be achieved in the microwave and you do not have to heat your entire oven to warm a few things.  The 5 min pre-heat is an excellent feature which I could not find on many competitor models.  Last night my 16 year old son cooked tomato, provolone, and basil stuffed chicken breasts... they were tender and juicy in a way I have never gotten from cooking in the oven and they took a fraction of the time to cook. The large basket size allows for easy cooking for my family of 4 with room to spare.  I am still learning the settings, but I am more comfortable with it after every use.  I could see this replacing not only my deep frier but my oven for many meals! It has a smaller footprint than my current 1/2 gallon deep frier and I think it will get a coveted counter top storage place as I can see us using it so much that it would be pointless to keep putting away.  Very happy with this purchase!

CommentsTitle: One of the best additions to my kitchen.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2021
CommentsContent: My husband has been asking me to buy an airfryer for years. Thought it was just "another gadget". Received one for Christmas - surprise!!! (guess who from - no judgement - received some beautiful jewelry, cologne and clothes and more as well LOL) Love it so much - I threw out my huge (hard to clean) toaster oven to make room for this (can make toast in if - if you want. Fried chicken comes out beautiful, crispy and juicy. Bacon - perfect. Everything comes out great. I usually google what food I want to cook in an air fryer and get times & temps. No guessing.Bought the white one - very, very nice looking on countertop, very, very easy to clean. Just love it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 28, 2019
CommentsContent: Well the 2 meals we were able to cook turned out great. Unfortunately the unit now will not stay on for an entire cook cycle. It’s as if it heats up and has an auto shutoff then will not power on again until it has cooled off. It’s basically worthless at this point. And to top things off the customer support link on Amazon to the manufacturer sends to a webpage that no longer exists. Won’t buy this brand again.

CommentsTitle: Smells like burnt plastic first couple usages
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 4, 2020
CommentsContent: I had to return it after first use! The instructions do warn that there is a burnt smell of plastic the first few usages (prodect is lined with a teflon type of coating like most cooking materials)But they do not warn you that it is so pungent and horrible that the entire house reeks of plastic burning. Makes you wonder if it is healthy for our food to be touching the plastic coated lining.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 27, 2020
CommentsContent: The reviews by others is correct. This is the easiest and best air fryer. First made spicy party chicken wings. Which turned out great. I need to learn the other setting because the french fries where a little to crispy and hard. (my fault....ha ha) Franks and sausages came out perfect as if they were grill on a BBO grill. Next week I will try to make crispy fried chicken. Anyway this air fryer will eliminate my other gagets....*******UPDATE*****, I've had the fryer for 4 weeks now, and it is better then my other devices. The cooking time on some food items, vary a lot. The recipe book photo are very professional so don't have that expectation, yours will look that "GOOD" ..... ok.... Be prepare for trial and error for cooking times on some items. Finally the disappointing issue.....the basket with the vents at the bottom and sides are very hard to clean, especially the side vents. I don't use any abrasive material to clean it and I don't have a dishwasher. Hand washing with dish soap, even letting it sit in hot water over night, does not help to clean the side vents. Because of the difficult time to clean the inner basket, I need to lower the rating. It is a good fryer and probably better then most fryers, but the effort to clean it is a challenge.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 2, 2020
CommentsContent: I've been cooking up a storm with this thing. Fries, fried chicken, heating up pizza slices, salmon... this thing is so great. It cooks food very evenly. Salmon skin comes out super crispy, which is the best way to eat them IMO! Easy to clean, can hand wash or stick the buckets in the dish washer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 25, 2021
CommentsContent: I was looking to replace my previous air-fryer (which I really loved) because it began smoking and acting up. I did a LOT of research and I kept coming back to the COSORI, which already had some really good reviews. I almost bought the brand I previously had (sorry, brand escapes me at the moment) because I really did like it...but I am SO glad I went with this one. I like the square shape instead of the oval one from before....it cooks great...and cleans up so easily. I HIGHLY recommend this brand and model. And if you are new to air-frying, you are going to fall in love with this. And do not for a moment think it is just an air "fryer". You can use this to reheat everything from meats to sandwiches. And whenever I get Chinese take out, with egg rolls, etc., I place the egg rolls in this for 2-3 minutes and it heats and crisps them up incredibly well --- just like getting them fresh at the restaurant. I obviously I could go on and on...so, what are you waiting for? Order it now!!

CommentsTitle: Worked Great The half dozen times I used it
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 24, 2019
CommentsContent: It worked reaaly Great The healf dozens times I used it I bought this because my Dad had Heart Problems but he died before I could even give it to him. So I honestly forgot about it then I had a heart attack and am having to watch whatI eat. I remembered I had this so I opened it up and it worked wonderfully for about 6 uses now it will not stay on as the connection from the bsket to the unit will not stay put keeps disconnecting and turning the power off completely. Its is very frustrating.I have to give it one star because i had it for a couple years but never put it to use and then when I need it to work Itdoesnt for long

CommentsTitle: Handle breaks off, digital buttons are no very responsive; but it is a great air fryer
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 3, 2020
CommentsContent: So I love using the AirFryer, it is my favorite cooking appliance now...  but that makes it worse that the handle snapped off of the basket.  This must be a common design flaw because even though it is in warranty there are no replacement baskets available from the manufacturer and even Amazon only has used baskets for sale.As for the Airfryer, it cooks well and cleans up very easily.Digital touch screen is annoying, I can see why the manual knobs option has come back.  The buttons have a delay between touching it and changing the settings so something as easy as changing the temp and time is bothersome (you have to go through temp to get to time).The App on the phone works well, and is good for alerting you if you are running the fryer and leave the room.  The App also has good recipes and is easier to use than the digital display to set temp and time.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 1, 2019
CommentsContent: First one worked fine unless it ran for more than 10 minutes, then it made a clanging sound. Contacted Cosori & sent them a video of it running. Within four days I had a brand new one delivered to me & it runs perfectly! I love roasted veggies & steak is perfect in 6-7 min. Cooks pork chops in 10 min that are so moist & tender!  Reheats leftovers in only a couple minutes & they aren’t soggy like from the microwave. I’m still learning it, but am having so much fun! I don’t care for the presets, it’s easier for me to program what I want, but overall it’s a fantastic machine & Cosori cust service was great.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 14, 2020
CommentsContent: I cook 90% in my Cosori air fryer...10% stove, oven, & microwave.  Love this thing & wish I’d  known about it a long time ago!!  Can preheat it, then throw my son’s French toast sticks in for 2 mins on a busy morning....boom!! Bfast.  Pizza reheats like a dream.  Dumplings, burgers, & bacon all crisp up super nice & of course the restaurant leftovers, including fries taste like they were made fresh again.  It sounds cliche, but this machine is life-changing for our family.  Made some amazing bacon-wrapped tomato & asparagus.  Getting ready to try spring rolls soon.  The only oil I ever used, was a bit drizzled on the fresh russet fries & that was mostly for a bit of seasoning/flavor.  The ‘Shake’/ flip food feature that beeps part-way through cooking is genius & helps it all get really crispy.  Can’t wait to start using my baking accessories for it.  The racks are so darn handy to keep food from sticking to foil I lined in my fryer basket.  So worth another appliance taking up counter space....,can’t live w/out it now!!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 13, 2020
CommentsContent: I love the air fryer itself, but after about 3 months of medium use, the controls on the machine stopped working. Thank god for the app and/or echo that allows me to control it or else I would have to throw it out. Regardless, it is a pain to have to control this device using my smart phone instead of just pressing the buttons,

CommentsTitle: Touch buttons have issues, and bad plastic smell.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 20, 2020
CommentsContent: I've used this Air Fryer the past week, and right from the start it had issues. The Time/Temp touch button doesn't seem to work well. Have to press it like 8 times, and you use it alot to set the cooking temp and time. Also, there is a strong plastic smell after the first cooking. A week later and the unit continues to produce a burned plastic smell that stays in the house for hours. As far as cooking, we done a variety of food, including steak, and I've noticed that most foods don't get done well inside and isn't nice and hot, even though it's done on the outside. I don't have this issue when using the oven range or outside grill. For the price, I would expect better cooking results, the touch pad to work for all buttons, and not a burning plastic smell. What's interesting is that other reviews have said the same issues with the touch pad and plastic smell. So I'm returning this and may look to try another brand.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 1, 2021
CommentsContent: Oh my goodness, I am astounded by how awesome this thing is! The first recipe I tried with this air fryer is one of my favorites but is also one of the most temperamental. I love fried tomatoes but as anybody knows, unless they are green, then the tomatoes often fall apart in the cooking process. I am entirely impressed with how well this device performed. The tomatoes came out absolutely perfect with a golden crust and not overcooked in the middle. I also decided to throw in some fresh basil to see what happens, and it came out as a wonderful crispy topping. I highly recommend this air fryer because it has outperformed my expectations.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 9, 2020
CommentsContent: I got this for my son for Christmas. He's 13. He loved it. He likes to cook and bake. It's a nice treat when he makes recipes from the booklet that came with it. The whole family enjoys eating the food he makes with it. It is easy to set up, operate and clean. He uses the parchment liners, so clean up is very quick. I didn't get the accessories that are universal and I don't think I will. They look like added kitchen clutter that would be used once and be annoying to clean. We have a tiny kitchen and have very limited space for kitchen stuff...like 3 or 4 cabinets that aren't huge for all of our kitchen cooking/baking/food storage items, so if you have a small kitchen you really gotta love this appliance, because it does take up space and create heat. We just plug it in and put it on the glass stove top usually, so the heat is in an area that is already made for it. We haven't tried it out on the counter yet, so be aware that if you put it on the counter, the hot air comes out the back. After he wipes it down and dries it, he just tucks it away in the cabinet when he's done with it.  As far as noise goes, it does generate noise but it isn't any louder than when we use the kitchen exhaust venthood. We have had it in use weekly since Christmas, so time will tell how long lasting it is. Look forward to trying new recipes with it.

CommentsTitle: Do not ignore reviews about handle/tray
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 15, 2020
CommentsContent: Right from the first day I loved the cooking ability of this cooker however I didn't like the handle and plastic clamp.  We've used the fryer about 8 time.  TODAY, would have been #9 but I started the machine and was talking to my kids when the tray AUTO ejected from the machine.  I was standing near so I instinctively reached for the tray in mid-air.  It seared my left index finger so bad by the time I turned my hand over I had 2nd degree burns.  The inside tray crashed on the floor sending our last batch of chicken nuggets (kids lunch) onto the floor.  Not only did it ruin our lunch it burnt my hand so bad I am typing this with one hand.  Needless to say this device has flaws that need fixed.  Wasted $120.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 14, 2021
CommentsContent: ***Update from 6 months later: STILL using this air fryer every day! It’s so durable, but even so i take very good care of it to keep it that way. I hand wash the basket after every use and only put in the dishwasher once a month to keep the stainless coating intact. I also bought parchment filters that work great on baked goods especially. So happy with my purchase!***I love this air fryer so much! I use it every single day. I make egg bites or French toast sticks for breakfast, chicken nuggets and fries for lunch, and lamb meatballs or pizza for dinner. It makes dessert too! Easy quick chocolate chip cookies.I had an Instantpot brand air fryer before this and was disappointed how the top rack burned the food and the bottom rack didn’t cook at all. This Cosori air fryer has never caused me this issue. It’s truly a wonderful appliance.

CommentsTitle: Will help prevent heart disease! Should have bought an air fryer ages ago - IF I KNEW!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 20, 2020
CommentsContent: Bought this as a birthday gift for the wifey. Second day, she cooked baby back pork ribs. She messed it up a bit by running it twice, the second time overcooked it a bit. But - I got to clean the two pans.And man! The amount of fat and grease was just obscene! This machine removes all of that artery-clogging gunk and leaves it in the pans - TRY IT YOURSELF! Leave the pans in cold air.I cannot recommend this cooking device any higher than this. I don't ever recommend online. But I will make an exception. I will only eat meats cooked by this machine hence forth.

CommentsTitle: Fast cooking for many items great tasting food
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 5, 2020
CommentsContent: Got this for my husband. He loves it. In fact he can’t stop talking about what he wants to make.  He uses it 4 or 5 times a week to cook dinner or breakfast. He says it is very easy to clean. He likes it because he doesn’t have stovetop splatters to clean up like when he uses a frying pan. I like it because he uses less oil when he cooks. I also love that he likes using it so much.It does take getting use to and it’s easy to over cook items if you aren’t careful but after some use you will learn how to judge time on cooking. We found timing charts and used them to learn how long to cook items.Best asparagus we’ve ever had.

CommentsTitle: Do not buy Cosori. Worst experience
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 31, 2020
CommentsContent: I originally had a philips air fryer for years. I wanted something bigger so I came across Cosori on Amazon. The smart feature sounded so nice so I bought it. The first one I received, the touchscreen did not work at all. It worked only on my iphone.So i returned itSo i placed another order but They sent me a totally different model. I returned it again.So i ordered it again telling myself this has to be the last time. Touchscreen works but now it won’t connect to my iphone. The wifi signal kept turning on and off!!!!!!!!The food comes out delicious but I am totally annoyed by the fact that their product is partially broken every time I got a replacement.BUY SOMETHING ELSE. The smart feature sounds nice but it does not work anyway!!!!Not worth your time to try and return !!!

CommentsTitle: Wonderful addition to make Kitchen Counter. I use it for most meals.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 11, 2021
CommentsContent: I enjoy the recipe book.  I have cooked steak, fish, chicken wings, hard boiled eggs, french fries, tater tots....This has not disappointed us.  We love the food without all of the grease.There are lots of recipes on the internet.Cleaning is fairly easy.  We put it in the dish washer.  The sides can be a little difficult to clean by hand.

CommentsTitle: Works great, easy to use and clean.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 1, 2020
CommentsContent: So far, I am really loving my new Cosori.  It cooks well and quickly and the clean up is a cinch when you put tin foil in the bottom drawer.  I've made chicken wings, steak and fish and all came out  well.  I like my steaks medium so I cooked it a bit longer, but the  flavors, moistness, etc. have been great.  I was afraid it would be just another clunky appliance taking up valuable countertop real estate in my small kitchen, but it is proving itself to be worthy of the space.  I'm beginning to wonder if I will ever need to wash a cooking dish  or use my oven/stovetop again!

CommentsTitle: Best of both worlds ... price and quality.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 7, 2019
CommentsContent: This is my 4th airfryer.  My first was the GoWISE GW22621 4th gen which would be my 2nd favorite but it didn't fit as much in the basket because it was round and the teflon came off pretty quickly - gave it to my son.  Then I decided to go big and get the GoWISE USA 3.7-Quart 7-in-1 GW22621 - it was BIG and EXPENSIVE but it filled my house up with smoke and fat globules when I cooked bacon and I had to open the doors and windows.  The timer also didn't work correctly.  I returned it and got the Cosori because of the reviews and price.  I have had it for about 2 months now and I couldn't be happier.  it has a nice sized square basket that you can place more food in with more surface area to crisp it.  I have cooked lots of items in it and am very happy with the results.  Steaks are phenomenal ... well so is the hamburgers and chicken with a great mallard affect but still moist in the middle.  Bacon is amazing and cleanup is a breeze.  I enjoy the fries and have even made an impressive and delicious calzone with a ww 2 ingredient dough that was the best I have eaten anywhere.  Enjoy this air fryer immensely!  The last air fryer I got was the ninja which also is pressure cooker etc.  I do enjoy this as well but cooking surface is much smaller and so prefer the corsori over the ninja if all you are looking at is the air fryer - get a instant pot with it and you'll be happy and have all the latest kitchen gadgets that makes preparing meals easy and flavorful.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 4, 2020
CommentsContent: After unboxing and cleaning the buttons weren't responding to my button presses. After less than a minute on hold a very helpful customer support person listened to my story and asked for a short video showing what I was doing, along with proof of purchase so she could process a replacement order. She was very professional and nice about it.Eventually I figured out that using my thumb pad instead of a regular index finger tap made the buttons work properly and since then the air fryer has worked flawlessly.

CommentsTitle: This air fryer makes the tastiest food!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2021
CommentsContent: Edit - Update: The seller is sending me a replacement interior basket for my fryer! Good job guys, thank you!!I love this air fryer BUT 17 months after purchasing it, the handle melted and broke. Waiting to hear if they'll replace it.Bacon tastes the best when done in this fryer (vs. pan or oven). It makes the most gorgeous, roast chicken I've ever seen. Burgers are outstanding, honestly who needs a grill (I'd love to have one but this air fryer makes up for it). Steaks come out great as well. I've made a lot of fries with it lol, and the other day I made chicken nuggets for the first time.Pizza! I haven't perfected making pizza but it's outstanding for heating up pizza. It tastes better than it does when it first comes from the pizza shop.The food always comes out yummy!

CommentsTitle: Food smells and tastes like plastic
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 5, 2019
CommentsContent: Ok I don't know what to do I open my new cosori air fryer yesterday,washed it. The food cane out looking delicious,fast but when it was time to eat the food tastes like plastic 😱 how do i get rid of that smell i dont want to return it but if the smell continues i cant keep it.

CommentsTitle: This has been a godsend! No more smokey kitchen.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 1, 2020
CommentsContent: Absolutely love this appliance.  Country fried steak and fried green tomatoes are healthier!  Bacon, yum!  Potato skins, awesome!  I usually cook my filet mignon by browning on the stovetop and finishing in the oven...which smokes up the house and sets off smoke detectors.  No more of that!  My filets are PERFECT in this air fryer.  Rare takes 5-6 minutes tops.  The perfect compliment to this is this olive oil sprayer which looks nice on the counter with my stainless appliances.  Misto Brushed Aluminum Oil Sprayer - https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00004SPZV?ref=ppx_pop_mob_ap_share

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2021
CommentsContent: After reading many great reviews, I decided the Cosori Air Fryer Max XL was the air fryer for me. I love the square basket that gives you room for air frying lots of food at one time. The coated surfaces are very easy to clean. I read all the instructions before starting including running the fryer first to get rid of any “new” smell it might put out. I have had no problem with any bad smell at all from the newness of the machine. I am a newbie at this, so I learned quickly that I need to pause during cooking to check food or shake it since I way over cooked my first chicken strips!  I have cooked roasted potatoes, breaded okra, chicken and even a meatloaf, which was really delicious. I look forward to using it daily to cut time in the kitchen and make healthier meals.

CommentsTitle: Cosori Air Fryer is my new way to make healthy and quick meals
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 4, 2020
CommentsContent: I wanted an air fryer for a long time but couldn't decide if I would really use it or was it just going to be a novelty. After reading up on them and speaking friends who have them, I decided that it was time for me to experience the joy of an air fryer. I did my research and read alot of reviews for all different fryers but I decided that the Cosori Air Fryer.  Unfortunately I had ordered the wi-fi one and was having  difficulty getting it to work ( a problem that I believe has been taken care of on all the new ones)  I called the greatest customer support team and told them my problem. They apologized and quickly sent me a brand new one. I have never had service that quick. Cosori has a year warrentee which becomes  a two year if registered within two weeks.  Others only had 90 warrentee. I use my air fryer at least 6 times a week. It makes great baked potatoes, fish, chicken, vegetables, frozen foods and amazing bacon. It is very simple to clean and use. I would highly recommend the Cosori Air Fryer. The delivery was timely and packed very well.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2021
CommentsContent: This air fryer is awesome! Size of the basket is great...I can fit 4 decent size pork chops. Besides the size of the basket the other thing I love is that it cooks evenly and the flavor of the food  is perfect. It’s a no brained to use the functions. I use it every single day for cooking meat, making desserts and cooking veggies. I rarely use the stove now...oh and I’m eating in a few minutes of putting in the food. Cleaning is a  breeze! If you’re looking for an excellent air fryer...I highly recommend this one.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 23, 2020
CommentsContent: My brother in law has this model and cooked something for us.  I thought it was great, so I purchased one for myself.  I got to use it ONE time and had to return it.  The basket wouldn't latch rendering it useless.I boxed it up, sent it back and they were going to send me a replacement.  When I looked at it today I found that the air frier was $20 cheaper.  They refused to credit me $20 so I had them cancel the replacement and refund my money.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 13, 2020
CommentsContent: Just received it I saw the amazon driver toss the box but good thing it does have styrofoam on the inside so it was protected as far as I can see. It looks really nice and it’s not as heavy. I did have trouble pressing the buttons I had to press it many times to change the settings. Maybe I was doing it wrong. It was kind of annoying. But I made fries and they came out pretty great. Will be using more hopefully it does last. I did put warranty hopefully if anything goes wrong the COSORI team will be able to help me.*UPDATE*Months later I was able to replace my airfryer because I was still having trouble with the buttons. They were lagging a lot. The COSORI team were very helpful. I just received it and tested it out. The buttons are perfectly responsive.  Thanks so much. 5 starts for COSORI

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 31, 2019
CommentsContent: We’ve had our air fryer less than a month and I’m using it almost every night to cook our dinner. I wasn’t familiar with using an air fryer, but the booklet that came with the fryer was easy to follow. I bought the larger size (5.8 qt), even though there are just two of us. My reasoning was that we sometimes cook additional food in order to have leftovers and, secondly, because I wanted to be able to cook enough to feed our daughter as well when she comes over.The first meal I cooked was thick lamb chops. I marinated them a bit and easily fit all four in the fryer. I followed the cooking time in the recipe book and they were absolutely perfect! Browned on all sides, exactly the right temperature, tender, and delicious. Next, vegetables. I usually roast them in the oven and get them super crispy and browned. I was skeptical the fryer would be able to replicate this, but I was wrong- Brussels sprouts, asparagus, broccoli, squash- all perfect. Another outstanding meal was boneless chicken breast- dredge in a little panko and flour, egg wash, and into the fryer (no oil needs, but did spray the breasts with Pam). They were incredibly moist and wonderful. Also did chicken wings- another winner! Salmon, halibut- no problem.Cleanup is very easy- we do not put ours in the dishwasher. The basket and tray are very easy to wash out. I use the recipe book that comes with the fryer as well as a couple of others I ordered online. I supplement with an internet search when I don’t see what I want in one of the books. Of the books I have, I think the book that came with the fryer is pretty good. I highly recommend this air fryer.

CommentsTitle: Do not buy Christmas gifts more than 30 days early on Amazon.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 14, 2020
CommentsContent: The reason I am only given this one star is because I wanted to alert everybody if they are buying this for a Christmas gift. Or if you are buying any other gift from Amazon  early due to the pandemic thing twice. You only have 30 days to return it to Amazon. Otherwise you have to deal with the manufacturer. I just went through this with another product and now I am screwed. I now have a product that doesn’t work and I’m stuck with it. I bought this air fryer plus one of those hydroponic gardens which were going to be for gifts because of the early sale. However, unless you plan on opening them and using them out and trying them before Christmas and gift giving them, the person you were giving them to will be stuck with dealing with the manufacturer of the product and good luck with that. Word of warning do not buy anything 30 days longer than you intend to give it. The gifts I bought just now became mine.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 23, 2019
CommentsContent: I wasn't sure which air fryer I wanted to purchase when I decided to purchase one. I had seen a couple of videos of people reviewing Cosori products and they gave them great reviews, so, I decided on the Cosori. I bought on the Prime Membership, two day sale and got it at a great price! I was impressed as soon as I opened the box. A very nice cookbook with plenty of recipes. I purchased a cook book, but the one that came with the fryer was more impressive to me. Then a deal to receive an extra year warranty! The fryer was so easy to use and to clean. We made chicken legs in it twice and the taste is great, crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside! Delicious! I always stated that I would not ever buy an air fryer because I have so many kitchen gadgets and appliances. I am so glad I changed my mind and purchased this one. Thanks, Cosori, for a great product!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 14, 2019
CommentsContent: Wife was a bit skeptical about air frying. Coconut shrimp was excellent. Halibut, chicken thighs & sweet potato fries also turned out well. Really appreciate how easily the nonstick basket cleans up. Perfect for two retired folks.

CommentsTitle: Waste of Money - works for 2 months and stops working
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 8, 2019
CommentsContent: I bought this product in September 2019 and as of November 2019 it’s stopped working.  It started randomly shutting off and officially today I can’t eat my dinner because it’s not working.  2 months and I cannot return it, cannot contact the seller and out $100.  Don’t waste your money.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 16, 2020
CommentsContent: All I can say is this Air Fryer is GREAT. I had a previous air fryer that I returned because it was too complicated and did not work right for me. Amazon's rating system is wonderful. After I returned the first air fryer, I started looking again and this time I paid close attention to the ratings. This product has over 32,000 ratings. Something to be said about the product. Thank you Amazon. The best feature on this fryer is the size of the fryer, Smaller, but most importantly is the size of the fryer basket, where all the work is done. The basket is great.  The other day, I cooked three huge breaded chicken thighs with room for another if needed. Yesterday I cooked 11 Bacon wrapped shrimp in the basket (recipe is in the cookbook that came with the fryer). All I can say is two things. Thank you Corsori and Amazon.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 16, 2020
CommentsContent: We’ve had this air fryer for a couple of months and are very pleased with it. Large size and preheat feature are great. Only negative is that the nonstick coating chipped after the first few uses. We are always careful to use utensils designed for a nonstick surface, and to hand wash it with nonstick safe sponges. We hand wash it after every use. We would give it five stars if we didn’t have this issue with the nonstick coating.

CommentsTitle: Easy to use, and helps me to become a more creative cook, in my kitchen!!
CommentsAuthor: Lil Miss Ann Onymous (I always research & ruminate prior to a purchase!!)
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 2, 2019
CommentsContent: So far----so very, very good!  It felt as if I'd waited for generations to purchase an air fryer, thus I took the purchase of one very seriously! I'm so proud that I took my time in researching brands, and prices---this Cosori has added a new dimension to my kitchen cooking!!  Actually I've only begun to explore and dig in to actually reading and deciding on some of the recipes feature in it's accompanying cookbook.....but am having a blast simply cooking basics in it!  I'm definitely on a learning curve---I started out very basic by simply cooking up some seasoned frozen hamburger patties, and they turned out excellent--nom, nom!  I definitely signed up for the extended warranty, but I feel that i may not need to use it---no issues at this point, with my Cosori. It is easy enough to clean, but I did go ahead and purchase some parchment paper mats for its pan, as a way of protecting the pan, because I want to keep my air fryer in tip-top shape.  I do follow all the instructions concerning it, and make sure that it's has room around it for it to "breathe" and not become overheated.  All in all, I really don't know why I waited as long as I did to finally treat myself to an air fryer.  The experience with it being a Cosori----has been an uber pleasant one, so much to the point that I am looking into some of their other appliances, too.

CommentsTitle: After 1 Year Basket is Stuck in Bowl
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 21, 2020
CommentsContent: I liked using this air fryer.  It's easy to use and easy to clean.  After 6 months a screw fell out of the basket.  I found a replacement screw and tightened the old ones and the new one and all was well.  Today the basket that fits in the fryer tray is stuck.  The mechanism that releases the basket from the fryer tray broke.  I can't find any way to take it apart to see if I can fix it.  So, I guess this is really just a rental.  You pay about $100 per year to use it, then you throw it away and but a new one.  :(

CommentsTitle: So glad I got on the Air Fryer Train!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 6, 2020
CommentsContent: Looking for a way to enjoy all the foods I love in a healthier way, I had been curious about the air fryer for a long time. I first ordered a smaller one and sent it back, there was just no way, unless your single to make all the great recipes and food. So glad we ordered a large one. I was worried that I was just buying into another kitchen appliance that would not get used as much as it should and take up space. I use my air fryer several times a week!! More than almost all my appliances! I have not had one thing I haven’t loved! It enhances the flavor of everything. There is nothing better than homemade French fries, and they come out just as good as when I use to deep fry them in Oil. All frozen food items are better. The uncooked tortillas from Costco, egg rolls, wings, I could go on and on. And I’m not even following new recipes, I’m just making the foods I’ve always made, better!Cons are it’s large, and it smells, not that the smell is bad, it just smells like an oven. I just didn’t expect such a strong smell coming from a smaller appliance.Great buy, fan for life.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 24, 2019
CommentsContent: Awesome machine to cook your cravings in a healthier way. My wife is pregnant and she is keeping her weight on track with this machine. It has perfectly cooked our chicken, empanadas and sausages. Very happy with the product and would recommend.***SPANISH***Excelente máquina para cocinar tus antojos de una forma saludable. Mi esposa está embarazada y esta máquina le ha permitido mantener su peso. La máquina ha cocinado nuestras empanadas, pollo y salchichas a la perfección. Totalmente recomendado.

CommentsTitle: It is like an Easy bake for adults
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 15, 2019
CommentsContent: There is not one thing I dislike about this Air Fryer. The size is perfect and it is actually much faster than other air fryers. Take a bit of time o get used to it. BUT, once you do You will love this brand.plus I have lost weight since the only oil I use is out of a spray bottle.It is awesome. Fun to cook again.

CommentsTitle: Best investment I've made in 2021 so far!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 17, 2021
CommentsContent: First of all I did so much research to buy the right air fryer because I wanted an easy to clean, non-stick, hassle free air fryer. The only difficult part was taking all the plastic out and separating the trays. It doesn't explain how to exactly put the trays back together, or which tray gets screwed to the handle. Yes, you need to remove screws in order to get a layer of plastic out from underneath the tray, and to screw the tray to the main handle. Everything else was extremely easy. Cooking is simple. Comes with a recipe booklet. Comes with easy to read instructions. As long as you keep it clean, its great!VERY IMPORTANT (well in my opinion), is to do the test run as it states in the manual. Great investment!!#1 air fryer bestseller on Amazon!  Definitely worth the bucks!

CommentsTitle: A well-designed and very helpful appliance.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 12, 2021
CommentsContent: The design of this unit is very thoughtful and pleasing. I particularly like: 1. The angled, and intuitive to use control panel; and 2. The essentially square shape of the basket(s), which makes it possible to cook fairly large items.  My only slightly negative comment relates to the "operating manual".  As a person who previously did very little cooking, it would have been helpful to me if the manual included more information/guidance re recommended temperatures and cooking times. For example, what temperature and cooking time is appropriate for a small ham, a salmon filet, a fish filet, etc.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 11, 2020
CommentsContent: Size: It's not to big or small. You can use amazons virtual feature to see if it fits where you want to put it. The basket is a great size! I was able to fit 13 chicken legs in with comfort and cooked perfectly.Cleaning: Cleaning the outside is as simple as taking a clean sponge or clorox wipes or whatever you use and wiping down real quick. Cleaning the internal cubby where the basket goes is easy as well. Quick wipe and all clean. Recommend using cleaning wipe. Omg the basket is dish washer safe! But if you don't have dishwasher, use rubber sponge or non abrasive sponge to clean it up ( so you don't scratch it). Takes about 5 min to clean, super easy.Cooking: you don't need egg- flour wash, if you want good fried food. If you do, it just comes out even better! I made pork chops and bacon; soooo good! As you see, super crispy and omg so juicy. When cooking in it, it keeps the meat juicy all the way through but nice crispness.Ease of use: super easy, instructions and recipe book are huge help!  There are so many recipes to try. Unfortunately,  you may have to screw in the screw tight once or twice because it comes loose. The wifi one is amazing ! I can preheat my food or start it all from my app. So nice when I'm trying to.vlean ir study and don't want to burn food or over cook it. Lol great for weightloss! 20lbs down! Overall, I would by again and recommend!

CommentsTitle: Newest Addition to my list of favorite loud things!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 26, 2020
CommentsContent: Newest Addition to my list of favorite loud things!• Harley Davidson – Loud pipes save lives!• Fast Cars – None of that frooo frooo electric jive. We’re talking dino-sauce drinking sexy horsepower!• The super majestic North American Bald Eagle – 8ft wingspan of pure ‘MERICA coming for you• ROCKK AND ROLLLL – if it’s too loud, you’re too old• Guns, Guns, and more guns – Come and Take ‘em• My childhood dog – yeah, it was a poodle. Shut up – he’d bite your arse if you looked at him wrong• Al freaking Pacino – He’s not yelling, you’re just not listening quietly enough• The Cosori Max XL 5.8qt air fryer of the future – food never tasted so damn loud or delicious!A few weeks ago, the spouse and I (me and the spouse??) were out practicing some delicious social distanced dining. The food was great, cost a lot, and I instantly lost a belt loop. While suffering the inevitable food coma, I looked at the wife and said, “there’s got to be a better way to eat well and not turn the Covid-19 into the Covid-46.” After a few minutes on the Google researching better ways of preparing food, we landed on air fryers. Next step, off to Amazon to see how quickly and easily I can fill a need that I didn’t know I had. A few options down, I landed on the Cosori Max XL – PRIME eligible & a “best seller,” SOLD.Early the next week, I pulled the biggest box out of the daily pile of AMZ packages. The Cosori had landed. After a few more PowerPoint decks, a spreadsheet, and the accompanying conference calls, I heard a very strange (and loud) noise coming from the kitchen. Intrigued, I politely yelled, “WHAT THE HELL IS THAT NOISE?” A miffed voice replied, “the new air fryer.” Weird, but whatever. Closed the door, finished the day, and waddled out to test the results…The first meal that came out of the air fryer was a delicious meal of marinated chicken breasts, “fried” mushrooms, and some green beans. Skeptical as I was, it was time to eat. Let me just say, it was love at first bite. Despite the ruckus, this thing turns out delicious food, and it does it at light speed. Within the first week, we’ve used it to cook chicken, mushrooms, green beans, bacon, sweet potato fries, and cheese sticks. Thus far, it’s batting ~.900 with the only outlier being some lame arse pre-fab cheese sticks from “TGI Fridays” – my fault for buying them in the first place….FRAT version – the Cosori XL …. Quickly turns out delicious meals in a fraction of the time, calories and fat content. Better still, it’s ridiculously easy to clean. Yes, it’s a bit loud. However, once you fall in love with it, that noise transforms from annoyance to a preview of a great meal. Highly recommended – get some.

CommentsTitle: Easy to use but cleaning is an issue
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 16, 2020
CommentsContent: This air fryer is easy to use and makes great-tasting fried food but there are some flaws. In order to thoroughly clean the basket, you need to unscrew three screws (they help hold the draining tray and basket together). None of the reviews mentioned that and I was extremely disappointed to find out about this when I received the product. Also, beware that when you initially use the air fryer, it will release a plastic smell (which is apparently normal?). The plastic smell will disappear after a few usages but just so you are aware before you purchase the product!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2021
CommentsContent: This is a really great appliance. We’ve had other air fryers in the past, but moved to this one due to its size. This unit is able to cook evenly and thoroughly. We opted for the WiFi version which, in my opinion seems a bit useless. We’ve used it a few times, but at the time of purchase, it was the cheaper option for some reason. Fast forward to 3 months later. We accidentally dropped the basket, and the lower basket assembly broke. We contacted the company to purchase a replacement basket, and they shipped one to us at no charge. Really great customer service. Without a doubt, would recommend this appliance.

CommentsTitle: Where Has This Been All My Life
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 13, 2019
CommentsContent: This is the best counter appliance I’ve ever bought and I’ve bought more than I care to admit. The ONLY negative is that it’s a big black box on our kitchen counter and so the attractive feature is a little less than ideal but that said, it’s super lightweight and easy to move to the pantry shelves when company comes over.Apparently this model is larger than most which is great and cleaning couldn’t be easier. You just pull out the non-stick basket and either pop in the dishwasher or clean with a quick rinse. Takes less time than it would to clean a roasting pan. So far I’ve baked chicken breasts (with skin, without skin, breaded, non-breaded), toasted bread, roasted baby carrots and green beans and brussel sprouts, sausages, baked potatoes, and made regular and sweet potato fries. All of it has turned out perfectly. The chicken moist, the french fries crispy on the outside and fluffy on the inside, the veggies all with a nice dark brown roast like we prefer. Even the chicken breast without skin or oil turned out moist and tender. Since getting our air fryer I haven’t used our oven and have only used the warming feature on the microwave to hold the cooked meat while cooking the vegetables. My only regret is that I didn’t buy an air fryer a long time ago

CommentsTitle: Great addition to the instant pot!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 6, 2020
CommentsContent: I actually won an Instant Pot in a drawing. My husband and I both love it. When I was chatting with a colleague the other day, she mentioned that she loves her Air Fryer because she could vary her cooking from the steam cooking to the dry cooking that the Air Fryer has. I purchased Cosori on a Monday and it was at my door Wed morning. We made Coconut Shrimp on the first night. Loved it! Be sure that you wash the baskets prior to using for the first time. I made the mistake of not doing that and when I was preheating, the smell was awful. We stopped midstream and washed them both and it seemed to make a difference. Other than that...I'm looking forward to more cooking!

CommentsTitle: Get this - you’ll like it and use it.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 5, 2020
CommentsContent: I didn’t feel like I had a real “need” for an air fryer but I will say it makes things much easier. I’ve only fried chicken cutlets, breaded vegs and frozen snack foods in it but it works really well. Just check the timings of things- the chicken icon must be for pieces of chicken so time wise it’s much less for cutlets. I haven’t needed to use the remote option cause why would I? I’m in the kitchen preparing the rest of the meal while I use it. But if you’re in the fence - get it. You’ll thank me later.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2020
CommentsContent: I seriously love this air fryer! The first air fryer I had was an egg-shaped design which was nice but I honestly prefer the Cosori.I really like the easy to operate buttons corresponding with specific Foods. One of the other things I really like is that you can easily adjust the temperature or the duration of cooking time which is a really good idea while you're learning to cook different things. I have found that it's a good idea to watch what you're cooking until you have mastered how long each food item takes.If you are not sure which one to get, get this one!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 24, 2020
CommentsContent: I love my Cosori air fryer 5.8 Qt. machine.  I have used it nearly daily for bagels, chicken breasts, garlic bread, toast, roasted vegetables, salmon filets, and more.  The booklet is helpful.  I bought a rolling stand ( sold on Amazon) to set it on in the corner of my counter. It fits on perfectly and I can roll it out while cooking for good circulation and its farther from wall.  Then I roll it back under the counters when finished with meal/cleaning.  Easy to clean the inner basket.  I do it by hand with hot soapy water on dishcloth and rinse and dry with dishtowel , wipe the front to keep it free from greasy marks.  I love the setting , controls are a touchscreen.  No issues with it at this point.  There is and air fryer Facebook site that I check in regularly and they have recipes and tips,  So glad I got this one and this sized one.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 16, 2020
CommentsContent: I quite like this air fryer. I had a smaller dial-style model before. While I don't really use the bells and whistles on this one too much it has two major advantages over my old one. First, it has a greater capacity than the smaller one. Second- the lift-out basket is a game changer! Easy to clean. However, there are airflow holes in the plastic front of the basket where food crumbs can get trapped. That's my only complaint.[Amendment] After nearly two months of use, some glaring flaws have come to light with this fryer. First problem is this thing beeps so loud you'll wake your neighbors. Scares the pants off my poor dog. But the biggest issue is that the basket will NEVER be clean. Photo is after 15 minutes of hand-scrubbing. The angle of the side vents prevents scrubbers/sponges/rags from reaching spots. Enjoy cooking in a basket covered in rancid stuck-on grease!

CommentsTitle: Pressure control bad doesn't last long.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 10, 2020
CommentsContent: I loved this product and it was easy to clean.  Being single it is perfect for having a quick tasty meal, even from frozen.  However after having it for only 6 months the pressure sensitive control pad to change time and temperature cooking has went out.
