CommentsContent: I purchased this air fryer at the end of March. It recieved excellent reviews so I had high hopes for it. I think the manufacturing of the production batch for my unit was substandard, it's the only reasonable explanation for these issues. After a few uses, the touch screen buttons became unresponsive, requiring me to press the desired function up to 8 times before it would register. Next, a screw fell out of the fryer basket, there was no way to rescrew it in manually. The other 2 screws needed to be tightened using a phillps head screwdriver after every use. Now the prongs that hold the basket closed no longer engage to keep the basket securely in place. When the fryer works (with way too much tinkering) the food is great. I really wanted to love this fryer but it is a safety hazard. The fryer is not usable. I am requesting a replacement.

CommentsTitle: So fast and food is cooked perfectly!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 11, 2019
CommentsContent: I have only used this a handful of times since purchasing it, but I’m definitely impressed. It cuts down on cook time by half. If you read and follow the directions you shouldn’t have any problems at all. It’s very user friendly and the baskets inside are super easy to clean. I love the size - the first time I used it I fit 9 perch fillets in it and they cooked with no problem. Also works great for just a small meal for two. The chicken quarters I made last night would have taken over an hour in my oven. They were done in 25 mins In the air fryer and I even forgot to preheat it! I can’t wait to try a small roaster! Also, the recipe book that comes with it has a nice variety of recipes, some vegetarian, desserts, appetizers, etc.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 29, 2020
CommentsContent: The best kitchen gadget I've ever purchased, EVER!! I love cooking, and I love frying chicken, fries, tempura vegetables, even fried Hispanic sweets, but I do have to eat healthier, and this replaced my old, aged frier.You can cook almost anything in this, I've cooked frozen chicken breasts and wings in this, and it leaves them juicy and crispy in 20-30 minutes! I even cook bacon in this and it leaves it just as crunchy and the oil drains into the bottom tray, so there's little clean up! I've even made carne asada in this! Grill cheese sandwiches, grilled veggies, and even chocolate cake come out incredibly great out of this! I even baked cookies in this!I love it, love it, love it!! 10/10!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 28, 2020
CommentsContent: I watched a YouTube video by ProHomeCooks and it was a fun video where this home chef cooked a variety of stuff and they all turned out great.  But I bought the AirFryer and couldn't get the basket to come out.  So I contacted them.  This company has the best support I've ever encountered.  For weeks they supported me while I struggled to make the product work.  And it works great thanks to their support.  Sticky basket... it now works.  But more than that, they immediately contacted me every time I wrote an email with a question.  When was the last time this happened to you.  I tend to write some scathing reviews because companies don't care once we buy the product, this company does.

CommentsTitle: Good Air fryer bad control button configuration
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 4, 2021
CommentsContent: This is my third air fryer.  All three have had their pro's and con's.  This one seems to cook very well.  The basket is shallow with maybe a little larger surface area than the others.  There is no need for a deep basket with these air fryers.  There is one problem with this model IMO.  The start/pause button is right next to the power on/off button.  On several occasions I have pushed the basket in - set the temp, set the time and then pushed power on/off by accident.  So this ends up being something like 10 button pushed all for not.  This is extremely frustrating.  The power on/off button should be located on the upper left or right of the panel, not right in the middle.  Poor design.  Otherwise the unit works very well.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 15, 2020
CommentsContent: I love this air fryer! Bought it on sale on cyber monday. It's large (larger than I had anticipated, although I understand the measurements are printed right there for all to see) so not for people with tiny kitchens unless you are ok getting it in and out of a storage cabinet. Easy to use, big basket, and gets the job done! The only thing I don't love is the digital interface, it's not as helpful as it could be (for example, you use the +/- buttons to adjust temperature and time, but you don't know which one is getting adjusted until you see the numbers change). Produces great quality food and it's VERY easy to clean.

CommentsTitle: You need a lot of counter space for this thing.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 3, 2019
CommentsContent: This product is not what I expected. Let me start ny saying this thing is HUGE. It takes up way too much counter space. It feel cheap and flimsy. The basket has a latch and then a button you have to press to separate the two pieces and it gets jammed. Overall, I was not pleased with this product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 7, 2019
CommentsContent: I was so excited to get this but then once it came, realized this isn’t something a large family can use. I have a family of 5 and unless I want to feed my family in shifts then we cannot ever use this. Great for 2 people though.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 22, 2019
CommentsContent: I used my previous air fryer out.  This one is so pretty on my counter, works great, and cleans up easily.  Only suggestion is for new buyer, put it outside after opening and washing, then run it at 400 degrees for about 15 minutes. Burns any of the chemical smell off.  Bring inside and enjoy.  It makes the best veggies!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 1, 2020
CommentsContent: I read a lot of the recent reviews about defective units. I was pretty worried about it but my unit turned up fine! It’s been fun learning new recipes to try out on the air fryer. I’ve been bored cooking everyday during this pandemic and this has made the process more exciting :) the air fryer came with a recipe book and it works as expected! I would recommend this to anyone looking for an air fryer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 17, 2020
CommentsContent: Great product and cooks everything perfectly and as described. I do have one small gripe though.. If you’re not using this with your phone, the ease of use is not the best. The buttons are not the easiest to press and there is a small learning curve. Also, only one person can be connected at a time?! When my girlfriend cooked last, and I try to use it with my phone, it will automatically hook up to the last person to use it. So you have to reset the WiFi by holding the WiFi button for a few seconds and reconnect with a new person. Annoying! If you only plan on having one person use it, and you like smart products than this thing is fantastic. Also, they provide some great recipes in the app as well. Lastly, it’s just a pretty appliance. I like the way it looks, guaranteed.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 25, 2020
CommentsContent: Easy to use, easy to clean, easy to love. My first day I made honey-sriracha wings, sweet potato fries, and coconut shrimp with a sweet chili sauce (hey, it was hockey night so we needed finger foods!). Tonight I made crispy, delicious and nutritious Brussels sprouts that my family loved. It’s easy to use, easy to clean, has tons of helpful presets, and looks beautiful in my kitchen. My existing kitchen appliances welcomed Cosori with open arms!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 11, 2019
CommentsContent: Amazing product!  I've been thinking about getting an air fryer for awhile. I spent a few hours researching and ultimately decided on the 5.8 cosori, based on the positive reviews, features & reasonable cost. I used it to make chicken legs tonight. They cooked perfectly in 20 min and were delicious. Cleanup was <5 min.  This was my first time using an air fryer & it couldn't be easier! I will use this often!! No more concern that it will be one more appliance that gets tucked away in a cabinet.  Highly recommended!

CommentsTitle: A must have in every kitchen...i love it
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 19, 2020
CommentsContent: Best small appliance EVER...I have owned mine for 6 months now and can honestly say It is worth every penny and more. I USE MINE ALMOST EVERY DAY, I cook for 1 or 2, so I am able to cook both proteins and veggies at the same time. Very easy clean up and so versatile, as you can Fry, Bake, Grill, Roast and as a Notorious Grill Cheese Burner, I can swear to you, that you wont ever burn a sandwich again😉 It really is a great healthy option for cooking...I have been Keto for 4 years and missed "crunch" in foods...but not anymore! Thank you Corsori...for this Game Changer ...I can't wait to receive the new Toaster Oven type one that I am getting for my BFs house too😁 PS. CORSORI has thee best customer service ever, IF you need them AND an amazingly Fun FB Group to help you along the way😊

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 13, 2020
CommentsContent: I wanted to love my Cosori air fryer so bad. I purchased the white one, which looked very nice and was the perfect size to cook food for a family of 4. I liked the recipe book, and the settings made cooking super easy. I was so disappointed however that there was a terrible plastic smell. The odor was so overwhelming that we had to open windows to get the smell out of our house.! I returned it and purchased the stainless steel Bagotte air fryer. The switch was worth the inconvenience - I'm so much happier with my new purchase!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 14, 2019
CommentsContent: I wasn't really sure that spending the money on an air fryer would be worth it. After reading reviews, talking to people who have (and love) air fryers, I decided to give it a try. This fryer was one of the best I could find and the price couldn't be beat on prime day. I am SO happy with this purchase! EVERYTHING we have made in this fryer has come out even better than we ever thought it would. Even baked potatoes are amazing!Cleaning couldn't be easier - pop out the cooking basket and both the basket and the bottom of the fryer are easily wiped clean.It seemed overwhelming trying to figure out what could be made in an air fryer, but I'm slowly coming to realize that EVERYTHING can go in there! This fryer has buttons for some things (like bacon) making it even easier to use.I can't say enough good things about this and highly recommend adding this to your kitchen!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 26, 2020
CommentsContent: I did a lot of research before buying and it came own to this and one other. I'm satisfied with my decision and glad I finally got an air fryer! Having fun with it.  I read some reviews that condensation puddles along the bottom and I see that to be true, but it so minimal, who cares? Why complain about that. I've also seen comments that it smokes sometimes, this is true. It depends how much oil is in the air fryer, the more oil, the more smoke.  I'm still learning how to use it. So far, it's easy to use, I like the square basket, it's super easy to clean. No complaints other than for this price, they should have included some extras. I've seen other Cosori models with the dehydrating racks or skewers.  It should have come with some "toys" instead of trying to charge us $30 more for those things.  Because at the end of the day, this product is probably not so dissimilar to a $80 air fryer, except that it has the square basket and it's overall footprint is small for it's capacity.  The cookbook is handy only from the standpoint of giving you an idea of time/temperature for things.  But those are easily googleable.

CommentsTitle: beware: Non-stick comes off onto food
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 25, 2021
CommentsContent: While this does a great job cooking food, today when using it I flipped the chicken and noticed the non-stick had come off and was sticking to my food. Further inspection showed the bottom portion delaminating from the basket. Who knows how long this has been flaking into my meals.... I'm very bothered by this and can't recommend the unit as that's a serious health hazard.

CommentsTitle: Here’s how to quiet the beep!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 28, 2021
CommentsContent: Love this unit just Beeps Beeps Beeps too loud.1..Easy fix though. Unplug and make sure it’s cooled off.2.  Remove the top. It’s just held down with plastic clips so a butter knife around the edges and pry up.3.  Look inside, again **make sure this is unplugged**, you’ll see a small round black speaker with BUZR next to it. Just put a little sticker or tape over the top.4.  Replace the top by just pressing it back down and that’s it. A very nice low volume beep.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 27, 2021
CommentsContent: I purchased Cosori AF on 2/9/2020 thru Amazon. The reviews were outstanding, i didn't consider any other brands. I haven't used it a lot but i had a couple of issues with the performance of the unit. I joined a Face Book Group for Cosori Air Fryer recently which is super helpful with recipes and using the AF. With my AF having some issues and almost a year after purchase i thought i was just going to throw out the AF. I contacted support@cosori.com, one day ago. Sent some pictures, receipt etc and told them my issues with the AF. They were outstanding, quick to respond, they are replacing my Air Fryer immediately, all within 24 hours of contacting them.  I am so impressed with Cosori Customer Service. They truly stand behind their product. I would highly recommend doing business with Cosori and join the FB Cosori Air Fryer Group and you will be making wonderful meals. I see why Cosori is a top rated Air Fryer with Amazon.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 3, 2020
CommentsContent: My first air fryer and definitely not disappointed. This thing works great. I love having crispy fries, fish sticks, chicken nuggets, chimichangas, etc. I've made a few the recipes in the book it came with and yum! Great for cooking salmon, pork chops, and of course fried chicken. I've adjusted a few of the recipes as the cooking time needed a little adjusting for the thickness but that was expected. Try Parmesan garlic asparagus in this. Just need some oil, garlic salt, Parmesan and of course asparagus. About 7 minutes later (depending on thickness) at 400 degrees....yum!Make sure you get the right spray oil for this. It can cause a sticky residue build up.

CommentsTitle: Tray is very hard to clean (Customer Service Addressed it)
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 1, 2020
CommentsContent: The tray is very hard to clean. Even with extreme care, the Teflon coating is peeling off which is not healthy at all. Reached out to customer service several times but no help or action as of today. I am happy to revisit my review if I hear back and get this issue addressed.(Updated from 1 to 5 stars)Customer service provided assistance and sent us a replacement tray with no questions asked.  I will chalk their response time to the pandemic that's impacting everyone.

CommentsTitle: Great once you get it "seasoned" from the plastic smell
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 14, 2020
CommentsContent: I've had mine for a week now and really like it. I read reviews mentioning a plastic smell and taste. So I unboxed it, wash the baskets in warm soapy water, dried them, put them in the unit, and did 3 preheat cycles at 350, 380, and 400 degrees. Removed baskets each time and let it cool before doing another cycle. Yep, smelled like plastic. Then I did a test run with frozen crinkle cut fries. They cooked up good, crispy, tender on the inside...but smelled like plastic. Tossed them out. Undeterred, I cooked another batch, this time with meat rub seasoning. Still a little plastic aroma but not as bad. Wiped it out, did a couple more 400 degree preheats, let it cool and then did a batch of frozen hatch chili chicken wings. That did the trick, no more plastic smell, tasted great. I've made different things since then and the plastic smell is gone. So before you make something you put a lot into, run some preheat cycles and cheap frozen foods through it to season it. Works great now!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 1, 2020
CommentsContent: I loved my cosori air fryer. I used it once a week and always cleaned well. After only 6 months it started leaking grease and smoking out black smoke. I don't know what I did wrong but it stopped working after 6 months.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 21, 2020
CommentsContent: I like the wifi option and the ability to use an app. Setting it up is not the easiest. Maybe I had a slight dud out the box but the front panel isn't user friendly. To scroll through the functions or even push the buttons seem to be difficult. I've hade it since February and just now writing this review. Don't get me wrong once you get it working, its a great air fryer but the controls are difficult. And at this price point which is not overly expensive, I need it to be user friendly. I just finally got tired of fighting with the controls and donated this air fryer to goodwill and got a Ninja which so far works better for the same price.

CommentsTitle: Love the air fryer hate the buttons
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 26, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   First air fryer ever so I dont have much of a reference aside from a regular stove. But I do love the tine it saves me and the way it cooks my party wings. The only downside is, some buttons on the key pad are not selectable. So when you have to preheat, good luck with that.... And mine won't select the bread setting. Sometimes if you stand there long enough (about 4 minutes just pressing) it will eventually press. So ive tried to memorize the amount of pressure anf locstion of where I pressed but its never consistent. So i just press any button to preheat. Other than that, I do enjoy the item.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 20, 2020
CommentsContent: Not only do the screw pop off of the unit into your food while cooking, the drawer does not stay shut and pops open during the cook time! What a waste of money!!A screw holding securing the basket to the air fryer popped off while cooking, and ended up in my food. I nearly broke all of my teeth because of this. I would not recommend that you buy this product unless you’re willing to inspect your food prior to putting it in your mouth every time you use it. Seems like their is a massive design flaw, screws should not end up in your food!PS: I cannot not put the back because it is so burnt and corroded from the cooking process. So the unit isn’t functioning as it should.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 27, 2019
CommentsContent: I'm still learning how to use it, but I am overall happy with my purchase.It cooks HOT. I have found the recipe book settings to be too much. I have burned a few things. My advice - check your food several times after the half-way time. Whether or not the meat is room temperature may make a big difference in cooking times.I like the oven fry potatoes a lot. The thinner you slice them, the crispier they get. I have cooked 2 large russet potatoes in there, but it might hold up to 4. For smaller food items likes fries, it is imperative that you toss them at the midpoint, otherwise they have zebra stripes at the end.I also like chicken thighs, super easy. I like to marinate them in olive oil and teriyaki sauce, but the great thing is, you can use any marinade- barbecue sauce, chipotle sauce, tikka masala sauce, anything. My wife likes harissa sauce. The basket holds 4. I have found that 20 minutes is too long. Crispy on the outside, juicy and tender on the inside.Negatives - the unit is noisier than I anticipated, about the sound of your stove top hood running on medium. The non stick coating seems thin, I have already scratched it. Rubber tipped tongs are recommended. The basket is not easy to get totally clean.A 5 minute warm-up is recommended, but I'm going to experiment with shortening that. Most cooking times are going to be 15-20 minutes, so it's 20-25 minutes per batch.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 6, 2020
CommentsContent: We have been using this air fryer for a few weeks and we are really happy with the quality of the cooking and the convenience.  I have never made my own fried chicken and was pleasantly surprised how easy it was.  Heating up frozen foods for my kids has been really easy and quick and the quality is there.  I also had to contact customer service with an issue and they took care of me in a quick and easy manner.  I am looking forward to trying new recipes and I think the air fryer is a great alternative to frying in oil.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 9, 2020
CommentsContent: Made in China junk. Just purchased one of these and it was junk out the box. Touch screen wouldn’t work so I called customer support. The lady laughs and says oh yes we are aware of this problem. She then tells me this is a known problem and they will send a new one out at the end of the month. End of the month? Then says but I can help you get it connected to WiFi so you can use it. Well unless you have 2.4 which I have 5g like most everyone this unit is useless. Sure glad I had everything ready to cook and this piece of junk wouldn’t work. If they’re aware of this issue why are they still selling them? Buy if you’d like but I’d do a hard pass.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 13, 2020
CommentsContent: What a great addition to my kitchen! It’s big, but make some space and get to using it. I mainly use it to reheat leftovers, cook frozen foods, and make toast. It’s not so great on the toast front, but frozen chicken nuggets come out crispy and great. I do find the controls a bit frustrating. When you plug it in, you have to touch the Power On button. Then, after you choose a setting, you have to touch another button to start it. It’s a minor thing, but annoying. It’s easy to clean and the basket is big enough for all I’ll ever need for one person. I tried it with a rack, but that didn’t work as well. I’m not sure if I should have changed the settings with more food in there at one time. I should read the Manual. LOL. All in all, I’m happy with this appliance.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 27, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   I purchased this because my previous air fryer died on me. Since having an air fryer i have me come to love them and use it no less than 2X daily. So since my old one died, I decided to purchase this more expensive one of better quality.... so I thought.It cook perfectly however IT SMOKES! Smoke comes out of the bottom bin an fills the entire house and leaves the fried food smell.  I use the air fryer because it is suppose to be smoke free and less smell unlike frying on top of the stove.I wrote to the company they said it was normal but would send me a replacement. Now I’m thinking I don’t want a replacement if it will smoke and will just return it and purchase a different brand..... really disappointed

CommentsTitle: Great addition to the kitchen  and GREAT customer support.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 11, 2020
CommentsContent: A year ago, I was not an Air Fryer fan at all. One day, I saw a YouTube video of somebody cooking with an Air Fryer.I watched out of curiosity, since I like to cook. When it finished, I got more curios about it, so I search more videos.I couldn't believe all the things you can cook ! I research for 2 or 3 month and,finally, I ordered one. Cosori was number one on all the ones I did research. I choose the 5.8 qts.  My kitchen doesn't have oil splatters anymore and the basket is a cinch to clean. 200% recommended. Cleaning the stove top was not my favorite thing, nor washing all the pots and pans.  Only thing to clean ? the basket. Period.

CommentsTitle: I’m in love with an Air Fryer.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 3, 2019
CommentsContent: I’m in love with an air fryer. For real. This has been such an amazing addition to my kitchen and I have raved to every one of my friends and said they must get one! So easy to use and I used it to cook raw shrimp, herb rubbed chicken, anything frozen like chicken nuggets, pizza rolls, fries etc. My kids favorite is now egg rolls and spring rolls from it because they are even more crispy than if it was baked in an oven. It saves me time - I’m a busy working mom and we have a crazy sports schedule and this has been such a time saver to feed my family and get out the door. It always saves my home from heating up more during the summer from oven use.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 6, 2019
CommentsContent: I bought this back in July....and we looooooove it. I bought the 5.8 one because I usually make enough dinner so my husband can take lunch the next day. It has been perfect! An 8x8 pan sits in it perfectly, which means my 30 week pregnant self has been making freezer meals so we can have ready-made dinners once baby is here.So far I’ve made full racks of ribs in it, muffins, cheesecakes, bacon, eggs, grilled cheese, all kinds of meat and veggies, biscuits....you name it. I know this is one appliance that if it goes out, I will replace without hesitation. (By the way, the only think that I have not liked in it was a steak. I like my steaks cooked on cast iron so they have a good sear. Some may like it in the air fryer...I, personally, didn’t.)My gas bill has dropped because I use the Cosori air fryer daily instead of my oven! Yay!

CommentsTitle: Easy to use, has presets, cooks evenly
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2020
CommentsContent: Ordered this Cosori Max XL, 5.8 quart air fryer after reading and researching. It has so far exceeded my expectations. It is easy to cook and easy to clean. I made fried shrimp upon receiving it and they were delicious. I sprayed them lightly with Pam cooking spray and used a cracker meal batter. Today I made a 5 lb pork loin (cut in half to fit pan).I seasoned it with garlic salt and Lawry’s seasoned salt and drizzle Italian dressing on it. I started it on 400° For 30 minutes and flipped it halfway through. I then dropped the temp to 360° for another 25 minutes. It came out juicy and tender and so delicious. If I could give this more than 5 stars, I would. My fryer arrived in 24 hours and the delivery man even put it under a small awning on our porch to keep it dry from the rain.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 14, 2020
CommentsContent: Personally it has worked flawlessly. Some have commented bout the keypad being a problem but I've found that you need to use quick taps and not longer presses to get it to adjust settings. Out of the box did onion rings, egg rolls and twice baked potatoes without a hitch. I can see a light bit of oil spray (PAM) will improve these even further. A little practice will go a long way to making you a good cook with one of these, they are not magic boxes but a tool to save you all the hassles of deep frying things. The included cookbook is a nice starting point and has useful recipes to get you going. I did buy additional accessories because the pans & racks etc. I had on hand were jut a bit too large to fit. I would recommend at least getting some parchment liners to make cleaning as easy as possible. I haven't seen it mentioned anywhere yet, but I'm betting this is going to be the best hot nacho maker ever invented.

CommentsTitle: Before buying check temp & timer setting on the Corsair Air Fryer WORKS!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 30, 2021
CommentsContent: I loved this Corsair Airfyer until  the temp and timer setting stopped working consistently.  It has been necessary to attempt to push the setting as much as 10-15 times and still not move . I wrote several msgs and received a reply stating other owners have had no problem. However  I have read a number of neg. reviews on Amazon, which  thay have  allowed to remain on the page, voicing my same complaint.  The  temp/timer setting is faulty.  Amazon did reply and  advise me to advise the  company . We're seniors and we find it disappointing to have paid for this item and it not work properly. And also referred to two postives. But failed to to mention they have received a number of complaints for the same issues. Which can be found on Amazon reviews..It's a good product and could be an excellent unit if the Temp/Timer and issue could becorrected and the company stand by their Corsair Airyer. Any one having this same problem write directly to the company.  They state the company address located in in their pamphlet.Thank you.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 18, 2021
CommentsContent: This was my 1st air fryer and yes I had nothing to compare it to, but my family liked it.  Slowly pieces started coming off..screws bolts etc.The touch buttons are fickle, sometimes one touch sometimes 20...so annoying!! And the cleaning of all those slots and crevices are a nightmare to say the least. The fryer did crisp up many things and cooked food to our liking which are definitely strong points. But, I'm moving on,  decided to get a different design with glass so I can see my food cook, brown, or fry. This one is headed to the trash bin.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 30, 2020
CommentsContent: The bottom basket falls out when I pick it up, set it down, move it too fast, or lightly hit the handle. The construction appears cheap and the basket lining doesn't even match up with the rest of the unit. Separating the top and bottom set of the basket also requires special nudging movements and great force to separate causing it hard to clean.

CommentsTitle: Christmas Gift for Son, Received Wrong Color
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 1, 2021
CommentsContent: I ordered this Air Fryer as a Christmas gift for my son, which was given to him by his Grandparents.  As I was in the hospital with a broken leg & foot, I did not see the item when opened. He never mentioned the item being white (ordered the black) and saw it this past weekend at his home when visiting.  It's maddening for me to order an item and it come in wrong. I wish he had said something so I could set up a return. He's used it several times and said it crisps nicely.For the price you pay for this Air Fryer, it should've been correct and it wasn't. Hence the less stars.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 2, 2021
CommentsContent: UPDATE:  I was moving my air fryer and the drawer & basket fell out & crashed to a brick floor.  The fall's force caused pieces of plastic to break off on both pieces.  I actually cried.  It was usable, but seemed unsafe as the pieces no longer locked to together or stayed in place while cooking.  I researched buying replacement pieces & found I could only buy the inner basket.  I emailed Cosori to see if I could buy the outer drawer from them.  They generously replaced both pieces even though the damage was inflicted by me & not covered by the warranty. They arrived on Thursday & I have used it every day since!!!  If I hadn't been afraid of falling on the ice & snow, I would've jumped for joy!  Thank you Cosori for such great customer service!I often fall victim to buying kitchen tools/appliances that will change the way I cook.  In short, they never do...until my Cosori  Air Fryer.  I absolutely love it!  I use it at least weekly. And I continue to be surprised by what I can make in it.  I've made the frozen foods/snacks, veggies, flank steak, ribs, bacon, many chicken dishes including tacos & chimichangas, donuts from biscuit dough, etc.  I even took it on our vacation this year.  We had room in the car, so why not!  It is the 1 kitchen appliance that I do NOT regret buying & I tell everyone to get 1.  I even bought a cheap version for my son to take to college.  When he sets out on his own - I'll buy him the Cosori.

CommentsTitle: Awesome, get the stainless steal model because of the temp/time on different buttons
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 30, 2020
CommentsContent: AWESOME! I have had my air fryer for about 2 weeks and I use it everyday, I have made chicken wings, regular fries, sweet potato fries, hot dogs, roasted corn, tortilla Chips, Churros, bacon, this list is never ending. And everything turns out great.I watched May hours o reviews on YouTube and comparisons. This was my choice for the price point and size. I got the 5.8 Quart, I have a family if 5. Do you get an idea It fits 4 whole ears of corn at once.The only thing I would suggest is to get the stainless steel model only because it has the Temperature and time on different buttons.It is a hassle to have to push a button to alternate between these Two important settings. I wish I would have noticed that before buying this is the only thing I don’t love.  buy it and enjoy. You will be obsessed.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 4, 2019
CommentsContent: This is a sleek air fryer with excellent pre programming. It is very easy to use. I like to line the pan with parchment paper on the bottom to avoid moisture loss and for extra cleanliness (but do not have excess paper over the top, as it will singe with the heating element).It is durable and very easy to clean. The pans do fit in the bottom tray of the dish washer if you need to deep clean them. The unit does get warm but not alarmingly hot when in use. The beep function to remind you to shake the food is useful. Makes tofu, fries, carrots, chicken, to perfection. Used every week for a quick meal with painless cleanup. And no greasy splatter yay! I like the square shape it stacks well with other items on the counter. I like that it doesn't look too busy.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2021
CommentsContent: This is one of the best purchases I've ever made!! We've made SO many batches of wings in this thing! Even made entire meals. It makes way better wings than my oven has ever made, and way faster! Chicken, potatoes, vegetables, fries, pizza rolls, grilled cheese sandwiches... it cooks everything!! Anything you might WANT to fry will taste 1000% better from this thing. Fits LOTS of food- perfect for bigger families! Fast, fast cook times. I can't say enough- we love this Air Fryer!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 19, 2020
CommentsContent: I have had my COSORI for 3 months and my meals have become so easy and delicious. I had just moved in and my countertop appliances were not expected for weeks. I purchased the COSORI and it is the ONLY countertop appliance I have. All the others went into storage and will eventually get donated. For breakfast I make omelets, toast, cheese toast, toasted bagels and a delicious breakfast sandwich on an everything bagel. In a cravet I use alittle olive oil, egg and sausage patty. Roast at 350 for 10 min, the bagel is sliced and goes in the basket with the egg blend for another 3-4 minutes. Enjoy. I marinate my meats in single portion ziplock. I prepare a veggie medley of olive oil, Dales Seasoning, Dry Rub or Seasoning to choice, Salt and Pepper in a large bowl with zucchini, summer squash, mushrooms, cherry tomatoes, vidalia onion, chopped fresh asparagus, and sweet peppers. I then choose between tater tots, sweet potato fries or french fries. I will add the meat, spoon my veggie medley in and my choice of fries. The cooking temperature of 350 at 18 minutes usually prepares my meals to delicious perfection. My favorite is salmon as the salmon is the best I have ever had. I have found I will not need to go out to eat after the virus quarintene is over as most restaurant food will come in a distant second. I am still experimenting with different meals and honestly have not even opened the cookbook which came with the fryer. My alexa is somewhere in storage and have not found it yet, but the display is so simple, I don't think alexa can make it any easier, I maybe wrong, but at this time I don't need it. The Cosori is easy to clean, takes only a minute and ready to back into use. Again, ENJOY, this is a great product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 5, 2019
CommentsContent: I had been shopping for an air fryer for about a year and when this showed up in my search on Prime Day, I decided to take a chance. There are sooo air fryers to choose from so I feel lucky that I LOVE this purchase. It’s been super hot in SoCal, I’ve used the air fryer almost every single day to make fries, hot dogs, homemade meatballs and salmon patties, frozen dumplings, toasted bread, reheated leftovers, etc. I appreciate how quickly the preheat happens, the hot air circulated nicely to cook food evenly and quickly.  I move the air fryer to the backyard when I cook so it doesn’t heat up my house and I keep the cooking smells outside. The one trick I would suggest for any airfryer is to be sure to shake the basket every 5-7 minutes. Shaking makes a world of difference. The basket holds more than enough food for the 2 of us. I will be taking this to the next level soon - like baking muffins and cake. Can’t wait!

CommentsTitle: Can't speak for the cooking part, but....
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 12, 2019
CommentsContent: This arrived with some sort of oily film on the front screen.  it is impossible to remove. (yes, I removed the plastic label cover with the writing on it).  Looks like somebody with greasy fingers wiped their hands on it.  Can't remove it no matter what.  Looked like someone had previously tried because the plastic had a lot of light scratches.  Just didn't look clean.  I don't know if it is the type of plastic used or what, but just didn't look clean to me.  Once I pressed a few buttons, my fingerprints were quite obvious.  I have better things to do than wipe a screen constantly, especially when it still looks greasy after I do.  Also, I didn't like the flimsiness of the shield/button on the basket.  I know there are a lot of good reviews out there, maybe I just got a reject?

CommentsTitle: You will never want to cook with anything else.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 17, 2019
CommentsContent:
I use it several times a week. It is simple to use and to clean. I’ve had it Three months.
So far these are the things I have tried in it.
Bacon
Chicken wings
Chicken drummies
Chicken thighs
Chicken legs
Chicken breasts
Pork tenderloins
Pork chops
Swordfish
Hamburgers
Hard boiled eggs ( not really boiled but cooked in the Shell until hard)
Sausage links
Sausage patties
Asparagus
Cauliflower
Carrots
Onions
French fries
Cornish Hens
Toasted Cheese Sandwiches

I like everything I’ve cooked in it. Some more than others. For instance, carrots, I liked them but I really prefer the taste of them cooked another way. The roasted cauliflower was one of my favs.

I gotta tell you, as much as we like wings, that would make it worth the purchase alone.

We were down at our cabin with friends. I had taken the air fryer down there with us. One day I made wings, flats and drummies, no sauce. They ate and ate and ate. Went home and ordered their own fryer.

Bacon is another thing. It’s amazing. You pour out the grease and wash the pan and boom, you are done. No mess!!

It’s really just a small convection oven. I don’t know why but I could never achieve the same results in the large one I have in my kitchen.

I’m a big fan of mine so much so that I would like to buy another one so I could cook two dishes at the same time. Hubby would have a fit though.

All this being said, the food does not cook itself. You do have to prepare it and by that I mean oil and seasoning. You also have to experiment with cook times. And you have to check on the food when it’s cooking so that you don’t over cook it.

I use a Facebook page that was set up by Cosori for tips and questions. The people on there are always very helpful. Also whenever I want to cook something, I just google “air fryer________. “, that usually brings up some nice recipes.

I bought Cosori because I didn’t want to pay 300 dollars for the Phillips, which is top rated. The GoWise was second rated but it has horrible reviews on Amazon. I opted for the Cosori which got good reviews and a fair price.

CommentsTitle: I finally got an air fryer...
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 9, 2020
CommentsContent: I am not sure why I waited all this time to get an air fyer. So I need to make up for lost time. It’s easy to cook and easy to clean. I cook a lot on a charcoal grill, but this beats it. I will share one of my favorite chicken recipes:Jerk Chicken Thighs6 chicken thighs2 tbs of low sodium soy sauce2 tbs of olive oil1 tbs of Island Spice Jerk Seasoning (from amazon)Toss them up in mixing bowl. Let it marinate for 15 mins. Then, put in preheated air fyer for 15 mins at 400 deg, flipping it halfway thru. Check temp when done.

CommentsTitle: Great product even before we fixed the defective issue.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 19, 2020
CommentsContent: This was my second purchase after I returned the first for digital display malfunctions. This one has the same issue. Instead of returning it to amazon I reached out to the COSORI company with a request to assist. They were very apologetic and helpful with this. They said I could return it but I didn’t want to. I requested a replacement so I could get them the defective one to find out what went wrong. They sent me a replacement and man so much better all buttons work and we love it. This is a great product even when it only worked sometimes. I recommend it to anyone that wants to air fry their food.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 20, 2020
CommentsContent: When I received my air fryer, some of the buttons did not work properly. I could still use the fryer but it was a bit of a pain without all of the buttons.I contacted Cosori directly despite buying from Amazon, and they immediately offered to send me a new fryer at no cost to me. Within 2 days it had arrived and this time works perfectly- great customer service, thanks Cosori!As to actually using the machine- it's pretty good all around, only used it a few times but so far so good.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 25, 2019
CommentsContent: I purchased this air fryer after the one I had fell apart.  I used it but not everyday.  The teflon inside had come off and the clips holding the basket fell out.  I am happy to say that I received a refund since it was less than a year.  With so many now on the market this one caught my eye.  Its color and finish is perfect.  I chose the red.  The inside is larger than whati had so it fits more. And the size is perfect.  This is kind of square which fits on my counter much better than the round one.  Made a few dinners and everything came out perfect.  Clean up was better than my last.  Anything left inside slid right out.  I am very happy with my purchase and will look forward to making some of the recipes that came with air fryer.

CommentsTitle: The buttons dont work half the time
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 16, 2020
CommentsContent: This review would be a 5 star if it werent for 2 reasons:1) It doesnt like Alexa. I can ask alexa to preheat the air fryer and it turns it on bake french fries mode. It doesnt work as well as other Alexa devices I have (10+) do.2) The button panel on this thing sucks. Changing the temperature and the time daunting. I have to hit the temp button 10  plus times to activate the temperature change mode then have to hit +.... wait.... hit +.... wait the plus minus buttons on the in hopes that I dont go over what Im trying to get too. The time adjustment is the exact same way.The cooking, cleaning, the taste, the ease, its all there. Maybe its just my machine but Im not happy with it. Its very frustrating.

CommentsTitle: Update on prior review. Fantastic Company.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2020
CommentsContent: Update: I Have to raise this to 5 stars for the simple fact that this company actually reads the reviews and WILL respond. I received an e-mail from this company out of the blue in regards to my prior review, They promptly obtained my information and sent me another unit. This company is top notch in my opinion. I did not request a new unit as I waited beyond the time to return do to work travel. They reached out and proceeded to take care of my situation. I would highly recommend this company!!!Prior review:  Not simple to use. The main touch screen control panel will not allow you to adjust the time or temp, it seems to be only for preset cooking. Not all the screen options are usable. If you want to adjust the time and temp you must down load an app and connect to the fryer through wi-fi to you properly control this unit. I would definitely purchase another brand if still shopping.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 16, 2019
CommentsContent: We live in a hot climate (all year). This eliminates heating up the house by using the oven which is a HUGE plus for us. The buttons are great for people who don’t really cook. Just preheat (using the preheat button) and choose what you’re cooking. There’s a chicken button, a pork button, a root vegetable button and so on. This was also a great function for someone like myself. It’s THAT easy. The nonstick is just that. Avoid using sprays like Pam, as that’s what will take the coating off as you may see in other reviews. Just dab olive oil or get a “spray/mister” that you can put your olive oil into. We don’t have a lot of counter space so we store it in a cabinet and because it’s lightweight...another plus for this gal! The cleaning is as simple as cleaning a nonstick cookie sheet. Done. Make sure to follow their Facebook page for recipes or help. We’ve cooked steak, chicken, pork, cauliflower and brussel sprouts so far and have yet to be disappointed.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 8, 2020
CommentsContent: Unit look great and cooks great, when it works! two major challenges; first there are a dozen presets on the front of unit but only 2 actually work when you push them (in addition the temperature adjustment buttons do not work). second challenge is the fry basket pops out about 3 minutes into cooking, every time, and I have to hold it back in for at least 30 seconds to get it to stay back in and finish cooking.

CommentsTitle: Excellent product - trust the many positive reviews
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 24, 2020
CommentsContent: I don't normally come back to post reviews. And in this case, I waited a little while so I didn't get carried away by great first impressions. Well, after owning the Cosori for a while, I can safely say this air fryer is................great. It's just great.When you see a product with sooooooooooooooo many great reviews from verified buyers, you feel a large amount of trust in your purchase. Still, anything can happen, right? This air fryer is everything I thought it would be and more. Perfect in execution, large basket size, easy to clean, and it looks great on one of my kitchen counters.To anyone concerned about noise, take a moment to understand how these devices work. There's a fan inside that circulates the heat coming off a heating element. There's a small exhaust area on the back of this air fryer that pushes out some warm air. This fan does *not* put out noise that should bother you at all. I think you'd have to be super-sensitive to the smallest noises to even care. I've had the air fryer running about 5 feet away from me while I'm watching TV and I don't even notice it. Again...look at all the verified "great" reviews and make up your own mind.I couldn't be happier with this purchase, and I look forward to medium-to-heavy use of this Cosori air fryer in the future.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 31, 2019
CommentsContent: WOW!  This thing is amazing. U can drop in a couple frozen solid chicken breasts spray with olive oil sprinkle salt and pepper and 25 min later have browned tender juicy delicious chicken!  I have made all kinds of simple easy tasty stuff. Google how to cook anything in air fryer its always easy. Cleans with a damp sponge! So easy so healthy!  I just bought a second one for my dad. Great product!  Get this big size one. U need space around the food for it to cook correctly

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 3, 2019
CommentsContent: I was never sure that I would like using an air fryer. Saw the many adds but could never see how it would take the place of my regular oil fryer. 70 years old and now I find that I have a new best friend, my Cosori Air Fryer. I have found that I can make everything so much faster and easier and I am not disappointed in the results. From steaks to veggies, to my favorite grilled cheeses, the air fryer has made my life so much easier. So quick, so easy, and very easy to clean and maintain. And, no oil. My grease can, that I used to drain my pains into after every fry, is no longer here. My expensive cooking oil purchases are gone. And nothing is easier and quicker than preparing snacks for my grandkids when they visit. Thank you for teaching an old dog new tricks.  Great buy and well worth it.

CommentsTitle: Screws Popped Off & Almost Choked My Boyfriend - Durability Concern
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 20, 2020
CommentsContent: I had an incredibly disturbing experience tonight- My boyfriend literally ended up with a screw in his mouth. I cooked some potatoes in the air fryer and it appears that two screws popped off of the inside of the inner basket and into the potatoes. This is incredibly dangerous, he could have choked or broken a tooth. Don't want to think about what would have happened if this had happened to a small child. I've only had the air fryer for a month and use it just once or twice a week (so light use). See attached pictures. Was very happy with the air fryer up to this point but I feel that this shows a safety concern that I can't overlook.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 9, 2020
CommentsContent: I liked this air fryer,  it has a nice design and also offered a wi-fi connection to be used with a phone app. I read some nice reviews about it but unfortunately forgot to read the bad ones.  The touch display didn't work and only way to use the fryer was thru the app (which worked flawlessly BTW) .. but even though that's an nice feature it's not ways possible or convenient to use it. After that I found a bunch reviews stating the same problem what to me shows a lack of quality control.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 8, 2019
CommentsContent: I had an actifry from tfal for many years and was really happy with it for some applications but was irritated that the stirring mechanism kept me from air frying larger items or fragile items. My actifry finally broke and I went in search of a replacement. I googled best air fryers and this was number one on the list.I can't believe how easy it is to cook with this appliance. The buttons are all very user friendly. The basket is coated in non stick and has generous air holes but they aren't large enough that food falls through. It has been a breeze to clean. I've had it for a week and we've made fried chicken, schnitzel, Brussels sprouts, tater tots, fries, mozzarella sticks, pot stickers and jalapeno poppers in it. Everything turned out great and nothing was hard to clean up, not even the fried chicken. The bottom basket/tray is also coated in non stick. I soaked it in warm water for 5 minutes and it wiped clean.I have a family of 5 and we had to split the fried chicken into 2 batches. It comfortably fit 4 thighs in one batch and a breast and 4 legs in the next. I just kept the first batch on a plate covered to keep warm and then popped them back in for a minute after the 2nd batch to heat them up.

CommentsTitle: Easy to use & yummy fries, etc
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 13, 2021
CommentsContent: Received this for Christmas. It’s easy to use, easy to clean, and makes some things super crispy & good. Makes amazing French fries but doesn’t hold much so have to make several batches for my French fry loving family.Positives: easy to use, good crispiness on most foods we’ve tried (even pre-blanched green beans!) easy to clean, lots of recipes online.Negative: doesn’t hold much food at one time.NOTE: I’ve no clue why you would want a WiFi connection for your air fryer... think that’s just a marketing gimmick 😂

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 14, 2019
CommentsContent: Let me just start by saying an amazing product I’ve cooked lots of  Fried chicken ,french fries and other things, at first took me a little time to get use to the flavor with out all the oil but let me tell you I never got sick from my stomach again after eating fried chicken from this air fryer so worth every penny . it takes a little time to get used to cooking your food the way you want but once you do it’s amazing so I truly recommend this product!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 17, 2019
CommentsContent: This is awesome! Very healthy option and it already has featured timers/temp according to which food product you would like to cook.It shaves a lot of time off of some products and it comes out crispyI’ve already done, chicken, bacon(all the time), tater tots, fries, and even steak!Definitely worth the price and yes it is huge I say each portion is a good 3-4 pplI’ve never tried other air fryers so I don’t know where this one would fall on the comparison level, but as a beginner I can tell you this is great for a first purchase air fryer

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 2, 2020
CommentsContent: Never had an air fryer before and did a bit of research before settling on the Corsori.  It is a perfect size for 2+ people; is incredibly easy to clean (by hand or dishwasher); simple to use and good instructions; light enough to store away in cabinet; works like a charm.  We use it weekly for the obvious:  buffalo wings, fries, egg rolls, kale chips... Believe you will be satisfied with performance.

CommentsTitle: Disgusting burning plastic smell that taints food and does not go away!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 31, 2020
CommentsContent: This machine cooks well and is easy to use and clean.  However, it fills the house with a burning plastic or burning metal smell which permeates the food as well.  I have made several meals in this and washed it per the instructions, and the smell is not going away regardless of the food setting that is used.  I am not sure if the smell is from the teflon coating, the heating element or elsewhere in the machine, but the smell is toxic and sickening, and it completely ruins the food.  There are many reviews that complain about this.  Cosari needs to redesign this.  I am returning it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 14, 2019
CommentsContent: Not happy with fryer at this time. There is no book telling you how to cook things. Just a how long to cook. How do you make fried chicken in it? How do you make crispy fries?  And it’s a lot smaller than I wanted. Cleaning was hard because food got stuck in the ridges. I prob would of liked it more if There was a cook book with it on how to cook with it. So it just sits in my kitchen.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 2, 2020
CommentsContent: Our oven broke so we were debating on what to do since it’s only two of us in the house. First thought was an air fryer. Best idea ever. This thing works like magic. Very easy to work with and is not loud at all. Also for a little more $ you can Add their extra pans. A must for us. So far I made chicken with 2 sides and everything cooked throughly very well. 2nd was frozen pizza and pizza rolls those cooked very crispy better then oven my opinion. You can fit so much but do not pack as you want everything to cook well.Update: became my best friend lolI’ll be adding pictures as I use it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 21, 2019
CommentsContent: I was so excited to try the air fryer, however it didn't turn on when plugged in.  I prepared everything to cook with the air fryer, but I couldn't turn it on.  My husband and I spent about an hour to try everything but still the air fryer wouldn't work.  I should have tried to turn it on first before preparing the food.  I ended up frying everything with oil the old way.  I was so disappointed.  The machine had a sticker QC passed on it.  I returned it.  Never want to try a product from this manufacture again.

CommentsTitle: Error code E1 showing when using, smoking like a fire
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2020
CommentsContent: After looking into any issues with the air fryer purchased,  error code, E1, started coming on whenever we started the fryer. Worked around it by manually setting time and temp. Looked into trouble shooting and read if this error code repeatedly shows to return the product. I called the customer support and only got a person on the phone wanting to sell me a $100 credit for using my credit card to purchase the card for $1.99. Return says I had till November 16th to return, which would have been fine if the error code showed within that period of time. Not sure of my options at this time and look forward to someone contacting me about this issue.To further the issue, it is now February 16th and we have had to put the air fryer away when it started smoking when we were attempting to cook some fries. Everytime we have used it since our first review we have had to reset the temp and the time, sometimes that worked, sometimes it didn't. This was the last  straw when it started smoking and looked like it was an electrical risk. As stated before, reached out to manufacturer and have not been able to contact. I want to return the airfryer but have not way of doing so. Never, never will I buy or even consider purchasing anything from this company again. (one of the reasons we bought the Cosori was it was highly recommended and a fav of Amazon.

CommentsTitle: Corsori Air Fryer is a great Deal!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 12, 2021
CommentsContent: So I had owned a competing brand and it honestly never worked properly. The touch pad buttons never really worked the down key went out completely in the first 6 months so it was impossible to move time or temp down. It did do it's job and the cooking was so easy I could not bare the thought of losing it for even one day, so I made work arounds that did the trick for all the Gourmia's many shortfalls. When the Corsori arrived I was hopeful but not overly so because I had tried The Ninja Foodi first and was also disappointed in it's shortcomings (tried to do too much and did nothing well). So I took out the basket Ah ha! Square! Not circular or Semi squarish with a kind of tapering basket but actually square! The basket also seemed noticeably larger even though it was only half a quart bigger. The button functionality is awesome many, many presets and it easy to adjust to whatever time or temp you need. the one con I would say is that you have to empty the fryer basket every time you use it. There is no space because of the size of the basket. Other than that awesome machine!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 18, 2019
CommentsContent: I  think I must be the happiest customer ever...lol! I never cooked well in my life and I was pretty much buying food from delis/ restaurants/ grocery stores for my family. And this can be very costly and not always the healthiest. So I decided to give it a try after all my friends told me about the magical air fryer. I was looking literally for a magical device where I could press a button and ta da! food would be ready. And I found it!! It's the Cosori Air Fryer. Family is super happy and all meals have been delicious! Now my kids think I am a great chef! hahaha!PROSIt's easy to cook and to clean.Comes with a little recipe book (and I also bought some extra gadgets to cook other plates).Has great customer support.CONSWish I had known about it earlier lol!!! ;)Totally recommend it! Be like Nike and just do it!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2021
CommentsContent: I had looked for awhile for an air fryer, final found this one.  I wanted a tray that would hold more food, this is square with rounded edges so you can fit chicken legs, fish, etc because of the size.  Other fryers are round and have lower quality, but not Cosori.  GREAT QUALITY!  I love the extended warranty, recipe book and you can see recipes on their Facebook profile.  This is awesome and have recommended it to friends.  Love it, though it was a gift to myself and my husband uses it all the time. 10 stars if they rated it to 10.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 17, 2019
CommentsContent: This fryer does exactly what it's supposed to do.  Meats are cooked to perfection and they are not dried out.  This appliance saves me so much time.  I can season and throw wings in the fryer and they're done in 20 minutes.  I also have air fried steak, lamb and chicken breasts in the fryer.  I love this machine.  My husband, who is very picky about his meals, loves the way the meat tastes.  I strongly recommend.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 21, 2020
CommentsContent: I’ve been hearing about these Air Fryers but didn’t purchase because I recently purchased a 8qt multi cooker. I wanted something versatile but easy to use. I must say I’ve used this Air Fryer 3 times and have not used my multi cooker at all. What sets the Corosi apart is how easy it is to use. The one push cook buttons make everything so easy. The first time I used it, I made potato wedges (had a nice crisp to them). I should’ve taken a picture. Next, I cooked 2 NY strip steaks. Listen, those steaks were so tender (cooked to perfection). I would like more of a sear on them next time so I may try something different. Finally, the chicken wings....BABY never in my life have I had chicken wings so light but crispy AND flavorful without the grease. I’m never cooking friend chicken in a pan again. I’m going to try salmon, sweet potato fries, pizza and veggies next. I love the shake function and it’s easy to clean. The recipe book is nice but I haven’t used it yet.Definitely worth the money and there is no need to buy a more expensive one. I can’t imagine another item in my kitchen that’s worth $99. I am seriously considering returning my multi cooker because of this savior. Buy it. You won’t regret it.

CommentsTitle: Great size, cooks well, build material is meh
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 21, 2020
CommentsContent: The size of this air fryer is great. You can fit 12 wings in here, chicken— bigger items—without doing several different cooks. Performs great. I like the separate basket and bottom which makes cleaning and juggling it easier. It is bulky because of its size, but the material is a little cheap.I’ve had this for several months and still good. My only complaints are it’s a little cheap material and the digital screen can be finicky, the drawer has smoke that comes out so it’s not completely shut, and the smell of it isn’t amazing. But it cooks fantastically.

CommentsTitle: Crappy cheap handle. Cooks really fast though. Too much
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 7, 2020
CommentsContent: Don’t know why my friend chose to purchase this from me. My friends oven broke and I brought this one over, I un-boxed it at her house. Upon unboxing, product felt okay. We cooked the fryer part is TINY, the features are pretty, but the handle is jacked up and made very cheaply. It also cooked very fast, you can definitely cut your cooking time in half. It even cooks faster than the ninja, the original air fryer, I have a ninja and love that. Anyway, she called me to tell me she wanted to keep it, was going to pay me, she is so sorry but the handle broke when she was opening it. I told her no way, I will return it but she insisted to keep it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 16, 2019
CommentsContent: We've owned, but rarely used, a much smaller air fryer of a different brand.  After deciding to increase our air frying and reduce grease/fat frying we purchased this Cosori 5.8.  It's wonderful.  Lots of room in the squarish basket.  The times and temps in the recipe book are spot on.  We've cooked chicken, meats, and lots of vegetables with amazing success.  Meats and chicken came out with a crunch to the outside but nice and juicy and tender inside.  AND - this is an important point - with the air fryer there are no meat spatters on the stove top so less cleaning!  The basket washes up easily, even after doing pork chops and chicken thighs.  We are totally enjoying our new, more spacious fryer and have great plans for future meals.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2021
CommentsContent: I was doubtful about an air fryer, but this one won me over. With the presets, it is SO simple to use. It holds a lot. I often put about two pounds of veggies in it. We use it several times a week from fish to veggies. I bought an oil sprayer and keep melted coconut oil in it to spray on the food. Then I add my favorite seasonings, preheat, add food,  press preset, and turn on. At first, I forgot to turn it on after choosing the pre-set, but I soon got in the habit.I highly recommend this air fryer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 21, 2021
CommentsContent: Simple, looks modern, not too bulky, BPA FREE, fast and easy to clean, placing it into/out off is a little tricky..  the plastic slider is flimsy..can't use paper as it can lead to a fire... can't overcook anything because of the carcinogen (burnt parts)....learning curve with the types of foods. ... loud but tolerable. .  Beeps when u need to shake .... can use your phone to preheat thats Convenient... still there are plenty on offerup..  bought for baked potatoes,  fried tofu and cooking veggies instead of the oven.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 22, 2020
CommentsContent: so the tray that slides into the air fryer is poorly designed.1. you have to slide this button for the tray to slide in, over time this is going to break or wear away and not work anymore2. you have to unscrew the main grill from the tray to clean this. even if you had a dishwasher it would be very hard to clean.those two reasons are enough for me to return and realize that im going tohate this thing down the road and realize i wasted my money. its like a bad relationship you know its going to end up bad and migth as well get out now!

CommentsTitle: So Far It’s Been Absolutely Great!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 28, 2021
CommentsContent: So far my family and I are loving this air fryer, only have had it for a few days.  User Friendly, Great Tasting, Perfectly Crispy!!  I did not start out with high expectations either.  I had bought an oven type previously it was terrible, fried chicken etc awful!  Took it back.  I’ll do another review in the near future on it but can’t see it’ll change are minds maybe just more food suggestions!!  Hamburgers, corn dogs, pizza rolls, chicken nuggets, fried chicken, blackened salmon fillets, and french fries all have been EXCELLENT!!!  Will Highly Recommend This!!!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 5, 2020
CommentsContent: I think air fryer is a misnomer. This is really a compact convection oven. It has a heater and a fan. It is an intense convection oven. It produces a wide variety of foods with unique characteristics, in addition to mimicking oil frying pretty well. I find it works especially well for breaded chicken and catfish, frozen french fries, frozen breaded shrimp and fish, sauteed vegetables like mushrooms and zucchini, and drummies. I am using my Cosori almost every day and it is adding a new creative element to my cooking. I am using my regular oven quite a bit less.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 29, 2021
CommentsContent: I use this everyday for everything.We had purchased another 5 star highly rated air fryer. We sent it back. Uneven, unstable etc. This device is the one for us. I use it to heat leftovers, crisp baked potatoes, and for “grilled” cheese sandwiches. My mouth is watering writing this review.Recommended!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 9, 2020
CommentsContent: LOVE my COSORI air fryer. I had a different one that was very messy to clean but this Cosori amazingly doesn't get near as greasy as my old PowerXL. I wonder if it's the shape or something. I like that it's more square inside. Also, it is truly non stick. VERY easy to clean. It doesn't seem to have a coating on the basket or inside like my old one. So there is no peeling. I like that it has the preheat function which it says is crucial for proper frying. I get good results, but the best thing is how easy it is to clean. Food doesn't stick. it is not a chore to clean it like my old one was. I would definitely get this same one again if something happened to it. Ive had it several months now, so I know what I'm talking about., lol

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 3, 2020
CommentsContent: This is great for making French fries, corn dogs, tater tots, frozen chicken wings, mostly frozen stuff unhealthy stuff. Ha.  Tried a few recipes out of the book when it first arrived  but they came out so dry. It took some trial and error but I’ve finally got the hang of it. It does have a mind of its own every once in awhile it won’t shut off or pause. But I’m overall pleased, Paid it’s worth just in making the kids fries.

CommentsTitle: Great product, even better support from the manufacturer
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 30, 2020
CommentsContent: We have been using our air fryer now for about 5 months pretty regularly.  Roasted veggies, chicken wings, fries, and all sorts of stuff.  We love it.Cosori is also a great brand that stands behind their product.  Our basket had the 3 screws that hold the handle start loosening.  They have lock washers, but my guess is the frequent heat-cycling between cooking and then cleaning allowed it to loosen up.  Easy enough to tighten up.  But I emailed support, and they sent us a new basket free of charge.  We can now alternate and the screws don’t seem to back off now.  Very happy with the product, and happier with the support.

CommentsTitle: WIFI feature is good and bad.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 4, 2020
CommentsContent: Mom was happy using the WIFI app and the internet went out. There was no warning (cable didn't go out) and the food burned. Have to unplug the fryer to stop the cooking. If you don't know you need to watch the time and depend on the app, it's a bad situation. Plus, you cannot use the machine without internet. You can stop by unplugging but you need the app to start the food.

CommentsTitle: Quick and easy low fat cooking
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 28, 2019
CommentsContent: Basket size is square and large enough to prepare food for 3 people (or more).  Very easy to clean, even in the dishwasher.  We were somewhat doubtful that this type of appliance was something we needed, but after a day or two it became a regular in our kitchen. Chicken wings, vegetables, pork roasts etc. cook much more quickly than in the oven and it doesn't heat up the kitchen.  Comes with easy directions and a nice selection of recipes.  Strongly recommended!UPDATED REVIEW: We continue to use this appliance more and more over time. It has continued to amaze me with the range of cooking it can do. Whole chickens, sausage patties, hamburgers, whole sweet potatoes and more come out perfectly.  Pork chops in this air fryer are the best we have ever eaten...even better than using the souse vide method.  Much quicker and easier as well!Although we have used this air fryer multiple times a week for almost a year, it has absolutely no signs of wear. Other products I have read reviews on often speak about the finish flaking off and other defects....but not so with this product. Truly a great product that I continue to recommend in the strongest terms !!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 13, 2020
CommentsContent: I really love this air fryer!  I use it almost daily.  It has replaced our old fryer completely.  It is easy to use and cooks my food perfectly.  After using it constantly for a few months, mine started to have some issues with the door popping open by itself while cooking.  I reached out to the seller and they were very responsive, and replaced it for me right away.  The new one works great, and I haven't had any issues with it.  I appreciate the healthier cooking option for my family, as we can enjoy many of our favorite fried foods without the unhealthy oils.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 1, 2020
CommentsContent: Don’t buy. Impossible to remove tray and basket easily. Costs a lot of money to be so difficult to use. Pieces are plastic and break easily. It’s big, bulky, has no “stop to shake” option for chicken. But mainly it’s so difficult to use. If it cooked well (it doesn’t - it burns easily) you would be willing to put up with everything but it’s not and you should buy something else.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 18, 2021
CommentsContent: Only had it for 4 days, I got it Monday it came fast! Only took 2 days to receive it! I got the red one and love it! It goes great in my kitchen. The 5.8 quart is perfect for my teenage son and I. No smell, easy to use, easy to clean ( dishwasher safe too), non stick and food comes out great. So far I have made chicken wings, chicken legs and salmon in it and everything has been delicious!! Sooo many things you can cook in it. Even cakes and other desserts and toast bread. Oh can’t forget making bacon too. It came with a recipe book as well over 100 recipes. So far it’s a great product and no issues. Happy with my purchase.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 16, 2019
CommentsContent: I was apprehensive about trying an air fryer but had heard a lot about them. Totally impressed.  Not only is the styling excellent for sitting on a counter, but it is easy to use and very easy to clean up.  Where we live, we can't BBQ and this was the unexpected answer to our problem. We cannot believe how wonderful it cooks meat -- juicy and brown. I recently roasted vegetables in it to make soup and it was just delcious and so easy. I have a lot to learn but have a list of recipes to try. I actually did 6 nice sized pork chops and they turned out perfect. We may get a second one and forego the stove.  I highly recommend.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 11, 2020
CommentsContent: I was in the market for a deep fryer, I assumed an air fryer to be a silly idea and could never touch the flavor or crispiness of a deep fryer.  After having this for a few months and using it practically every other day, the wife was right.  I wouldn't say it's absolutely equal, but I no longer want a deep fryer.  Reliable, easy to use, easy to clean, everything comes out great and it's so very low maintenance.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 1, 2021
CommentsContent: Bought this brand because it has been proven tried and true by a friend.  Love cooking meats in it. Haven't had the oven on since getting it.  It especially cooks salmon fillets perfectly!  Still trying to figure out how to make potatoes crispy like fries, but we rarely eat them anyway.  Am still experimenting with settings that I will enjoy most for the types of foods I cook. Since I eat a KETO diet, this is perfect.  Love it!!

CommentsTitle: I really wanted to love this airfryer, but the plastic smell is SO BAD!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 17, 2021
CommentsContent: I really love the basket size, the color, the ease of use . And the recipe book is really wonderful! But the burning plastic smell is overwhelming. It was so bad we moved it outside , hoping it would go away after a few uses. My kids were coughing it was so bad!! But after 6 uses, including bacon and peppers, the smell was still intense, so much so you could not smell the food.  Very disappointed. I had my heart set on this one so so many reasons.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 21, 2020
CommentsContent: I normally don't write review but with this company's outstanding customer service I am writing thus review.Since Covid19 in March, most of the restaurants in our state and areas are closed and we have to cook everyday.  Thanks to this air fryer, it makes our life easier.  We used it almost everyday experiencing with all types of meats and vegetables.  With so much use and knocking around the external basket was a little dented.  I wrote to the company since this external basket was not in the market.  The customer service was very helpful and they send me the external basket for free even after the warranty period was over and now I am a very happy customer.  We still use the air fryer everyday.Everything comes out very flavourful and even the skin of chicken is crispy and the meat is still moist.  Perfect.Keep up the good work COSORI.  Will buy again once my air fryer run its course.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 29, 2020
CommentsContent: UPDATE: Since we purchased this, we use it fairly regularly.  It gets used, washed, and set out to dry. Lately, we have not been as diligent with cleaning and I've noticed a few things. The screws need to be tightened regularly. More importantly, the sides take a little longer to clean.  Today, I decided to put it in the dishwasher for the first time because it says "The nonstick basket is removable and dishwasher safe, made with PFOA-free and BPA-free basket materials."  This is grossly misstated. I took it out of the dishwasher and it looks terrible. Much of the coating has come off and there are spots all over it. Btw, the dishwasher is about a year and a half old. Such a disappointment that  I now have to get a replacement basket. Those 5.8 quart baskets are not easy to come by! Anyway, buyer beware.I absolutely love this thing! I am just starting to use the app more frequently for different recipes. Food comes out as expected. I bought an oil sprayer from Amazon as well. Helps to really keep fries crispy rather than using a tablespoon of oil like some recipes call for. Been trying to convince my wife we need another because lets face it, if you make burgers in it, the fries would not be immediately ready when the burgers finish. Same with veggies etc.
