Fortunately I was not disappointed. As long as you’re willing to play around with settings and try to make things a few times without expecting perfection off the bat, you will be happy! Read what works for others online (Pinterest is great).I use this to cook an assortment of foods, but also enjoy using it to reheat almost anything I can.My boyfriends only discrepancy is that he expected it to be a quicker way to heat everything up (he’s an instapot guy...) so don’t expect everything to cook instantly, but it is a much healthier way of cooking. I will also say that many foods I make have a very short cook time.I will also say that I am so obsessed with this product that I bring it with me to a lot of locations, and find myself wishing I had it when It’s not with me lol.Would buy again!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 21, 2021
CommentsContent: Buying this was such a great purchase! Completely changed my view in cooking! I’m still getting used to it and how it works but I’m in love! I did realize that it makes a really BIG difference to preheat the air fryer! It takes 5 minutes, but it is definitely worth it! I love reheating pizza I can’t even taste the difference from when I bought it! The noise is low and at times gets a little higher but it goes back to being low, nothing to loud. It’s so very easy to clean the basket however the inside always needs a little bit of work but be careful what you clean it with because you don’t want to damage the coating inside. And be very careful with the basket when it’s hot I have burned myself a few times when I get distracted well taking the food out!

CommentsTitle: Great fryer rendered useless by horrible interface
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 18, 2020
CommentsContent: This is outstanding in every way except how you use it.It cooks great. It’s even, consistent and fantastic.Unfortunately, it is paired with the worst control pad known to man. It’s a quasi-touch interface and it barely works at all, thus rendering the product useless.Skip this one until they give you actual buttons.

CommentsTitle: Change the way you cook - BUY IT!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 8, 2019
CommentsContent: Changed my life! If you don't have an air fryer, GET ONE! This Cosori is fantastic because it is larger than the round ones. I have another air fryer, which was a gift and I loved it, but smaller. Just needed a second one for our 2nd home. And I wanted bigger. The ease of use, faster cooking times, better flavors and healthier cooking makes me happy every time I use. No hot kitchen from using your stove oven in the summer! Baked potatoes (any potatoes) come out fantastic. Meats (chicken, pork chops, steaks) are delicious and moist/juicy. I haven't baked anything in it, but plan on doing. Once you start using, you won't ever want to turn your oven on. Can't say enough about air frying, and this model is fantastic!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 15, 2019
CommentsContent: The Cosori was my first AF so I was a bit intimidated, not really knowing much about them. I can honestly say it's my fav kitchen appliance now. Was very happy about tossing out the old grungy deep fryer. Between cookbook/owner's manual that came with it an awesome FB Cosori group I mastered it in no time. I love that it has a square basket as opposed to the normal oval basket. Another thing to consider is the excellent customer service and 2 year warranty!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 15, 2020
CommentsContent: The food comes out amazing in this fryer.  But within the first week we noticed the basket would esaily dislodge itself, popping open, and the fryer would turn off.  Sometime it would just pop an inch or two.  And sometimes it would straight up eject out and fall on the floor.  We even tested on ways we could push the basket in, adding pressure up, down, or side to side.  Anyone who lived through the infamous blinking Nintendo screen will know what I'm talking about!  Then we'd hold our breath to see if it was going to pop itself out.  Sometimes it worked.....sometimes not.Over the past couple of months we kept saying "Should we return this thing?  The food is great but it keeps popping out".  Well today it finally killed itself . Despite being at the back of the counter with about 1.5 feet of clearance in front of it, it ejected onto the floor.  This time, in addition to ruining my food all over the floor, some plastic snapped off and the cage got bent and no longer fits into the housing.

CommentsTitle: Very quick and easy to use.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2021
CommentsContent: This is basically a small convection oven.  As such it is much more efficient than my large oven when making small meals for one or two people.  It also replaces the frying pan and eliminates the grease splatter on the stove cook top.  The french fries are great and it does well in cooking things like chicken leg quarters.  I wondered if this would just be another semi useless kitchen gadget, but it has proven very useful.  I use it almost every day.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 4, 2019
CommentsContent: I like this product sooooooooooooo much! It's so convenient and healthy! I don't need any oil with this cooking, still taste so good！Any kind of meat and vegetables match so perfect! Also, I can make dessert or cake with this. Besides, there's no smoke and food will be done in very short time. The most valuable product for kitchen!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 31, 2019
CommentsContent: We purchased the Cosori after doing our research at “YouTube University” where we watched a comparison between a Cosori and the new air fryer from the Instant Pot folks. What cinched the deal?  Cleanup!  We also were shopping for an air fryer that would best replace the simple recipes we would bring out our deep fryer such as fries, tots, fish and chicken! We are glad we followed the KISS principle and are delighted with the value our new 5.8 qt Cosori brings our kitchen, table and diet.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 13, 2020
CommentsContent: Honestly, we reseached and shopped a ton before buying this and now that we have had it for a month I'm saving you the time, just buy this one you will love it.. for our family of 5 we use it minimum once or twice per day and the food turns out perfect and kids LOVE the flavor without having to fry in oil.

CommentsTitle: Buttons on front of machine stopped working after three months
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 29, 2020
CommentsContent: I loved the way this Air Fryer worked.  Easy to use, makes great food, but the buttons stopped working after three months.  The basket is hard to clean, and if you don't clean it thoroughly every time, it gets gunked up.  The square basket size is definitely better than the round ones, you can fit more into it.  The shape and size also is a very efficient use of space.Seller reached out after my review of the buttons failing and replaced my unit. So its all working now.  Thanks Cosori!

CommentsTitle: Touchpad Doesn't Work (same problem on 2 units)
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 21, 2020
CommentsContent: I had high hopes for this air fryer - especially after all the great reviews. Unfortunately, the touch screen doesn't work.I even got a replacement unit, and the second machine had the same issue. Some buttons would not work at all and others would only work if you were lucky enough to push them the right way after trying 5 or 6 times. Others have had this same issue, so I think there must be a certain batch of these that are just defective.Cross your fingers if you decide to order, and maybe your machine won't have this problem. I ended up buying the InstaPot 6 quart Air Fryer instead.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 4, 2021
CommentsContent: I had a small AF which I found basically useless. After watching ProHomeCook on youtube and researching, I ventured into the AF game with the Cosori primarily cause it cleans up so well based on the reviews.Air circulation is great, super easy to use pre-existing programs or set your own and best reason - EASY TO CLEAN. Microwave + Air Fryer makes food (especially Trader Joe's Chicken Pot Pie and Sheperd's Pie) taste so much better without the 45-60 minute wait for a stove to heat up and bake the food. I have baked lasagna, ziti, chicken, fish, steak, appetizers, eggs and burgers...so far. I prefer steak on the outdoor grill but I was able to get a very good medium rare steak straight from the fridge.About Cosori Support - I received as a gift the wrong size cooking accessories (for the 3 QT unit) for XMAS and Cosori support stepped up and arranged a replacement (long story but the seller (ahem, WalMart marketplace) would not replace/refund). They were fast and efficient, what you want in customer support.Highly RECOMMEND

CommentsTitle: Excellent product and excellent customer service!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 21, 2020
CommentsContent: Cosori stand behind its product! I had a concern with my airfryer and their customer service team did not disappoint me. They are very responsive to my concern! The product is really good, the food that I cooked from it is very tasty and crunchy, like it was deep fried. I had this thing called “enoki mushroom test”. I have another airfryer (Nuwave XL airfryer) and I couldn’t get a crunchy enoki mushroom from it. It is precisely for that reason that I bought this and give this a try. I did not go for the very expensive Philips airfryer. Why would you pay more if you can get the desired output for less? So anyway, I managed to get a crispy enoki mushroom here - and surely it passed my enoki mushroom test! :) I rarely post reviews and I feel I need to post a review for this product because it deserves it! Go buy this! You won’t regret it!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 15, 2019
CommentsContent: quise esperar un tiempo para opinar luego de usar la olla.Estuve enamorada al principio porque primero si asa las alitas , papitas y las deja realmente sin grasa y doradas.  Luego las costillas de cerdo son muy buenas porque todo queda sin grasa. Tengo que llevar comida para mi trabajo y la comida permanecia suave, ademas la limpieza es super facil y no hay que restregar casi nada.  Pongo a cocinar y solo espero el momento de revisarlo y luego al final lo saco y listo.Los contra: no todo queda bien en ella, no asi un bistek de res, queda fatal, o un pescado.  Hay cosas que quedan mejor en la sarten o el horno convencional.  Si quieren una mejor idea, visito a unos amigos que se compraron un hornito electrico y es mucho mas funcional que esta olla definitivamente.

CommentsTitle: SUPER air fryer and worth the money!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 23, 2020
CommentsContent: I LOVE this air fryer!! Very easy to use, cooks super fast and needs NO oil. Not any more noisy than your microwave and the coking drawer is non-stick. Really easy to clean, fully digital, and comes with a recipe book and instruction book. It is just amazing and I wish I had bought it sooner! ❤️

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 5, 2020
CommentsContent: I highly recommend this airfryer. No hot spots, has a pre heat setting, cooks evening and easily.  Not a lot to say about it, but easy to clean and does it's job quite well. Fits in plenty of food. Looks quite nice on my counter top as well. Saves a hell of a lot of time cleaning the kitchen too. I cook sausage, hot dogs, hamburgers, scallops, chicken wings, potatoes, french fries, fish...love this thing!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 29, 2021
CommentsContent: I’ve just returned this fryer.  The smell of plastic was terrible.  I tried everything suggested to get rid of the smell (running it empty for long periods of time, scrubbing it, running it with lemon and vinegar) with no success.  The corner where I had it still smells. Also, the latch broke easy.  Also, it is quite loud.  Find something else, preferably metal.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 11, 2019
CommentsContent: Large enough to cook 10 short kebobs, with a small insertable rack I made. Or 12 large meatballs. Or a serving of fries for 2 freedom fries loving Americans. Everything comes out awesome. My microwave broke and I haven't replaced it in months. I put a little Pyrex bowl in the air fryer to heat up leftovers in the same amount of time, but better quality reheat. I even lined it with tinfoil, put bits of graham cracker down, layered mini marshmellows and chocolate shavings and made toasted Smores nachos in 5 mins on the steak setting. Endless goodness and no radiation like with microwaves!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 10, 2019
CommentsContent: I would have given this 5 stars, BUT.....The Recipe book states to flip the chicken wings half way trough the cooking time limit. The Pre set for Chicken is 25 Min at 380. There is no warning to stop ad flip said chicken. The Pre set for Fries is also 25 Min at 380, Guess what, it automatically pause at 13 Min, and tells you to "Shake the Fries". So, when I cooked Wings on the pre set Fries setting...……….PERFECT! I would have given this 5 stars , had it the "Flip" warning at 13 minutes for Chicken. No smoke, very little odor when cooking Chicken. Very good product. I also cooked Quiche, again...……...perfect. Amazon had this on sale for $100, a day after our current Fryer took a Dirt np, and this one is pretty amazing. Last one...……...pretty bad. Buy this, period. I also recommend buying the kit for the cooking peripherals, well worth it.

CommentsTitle: Just wasn't what I was looking for  They did not claim that it had a large crack on one side
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 11, 2019
CommentsContent: Item came with a large crack on one side about 3" wide, I was willing to keep it anyway but I made some French fries and it only crisp the top and bottom and in the middle it was still a bit raw

CommentsTitle: Love this air fryer but it gets really smoky
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 6, 2019
CommentsContent: Perhaps I hadn't thoroughly researched air fryers before buying this one, and therefore did not understand that you absolutely have to clean the heating unit between uses or there will be a wall of smoke pouring from it while cooking.  With that understood, I now clean it between EVERY use and I still LOVE this thing!  It's amazing.  My bacon comes out absolutely delicious and all my wing ding recipes have been better than anything I've made on the stove or in the oven.  I'm sorry I waited so long to buy an air fryer but I'm really happy that I bought the COSORI.

CommentsTitle: Everything Cooks Perfectly- Even Grilled Cheese!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 23, 2020
CommentsContent: Everything comes out SO PERFECTLY!!!Frozen Oreida Tater Tots took 8 minutes and were cooked perfectly.Then I used the Sourdough I made earlier in the day(yay covid hobbies) and buttered one side of each slice, sprinkled with some shredded cheese and cooked on the Bread preset for 7 minutes.This thing made a better Grilled Cheese than the panini press or stovetop.I cooked Breakfast Sausage Links this morning- 350 degrees for 8 minutes and DONE- omg good.I love this Air Fryer so much- I wish I had bought it sooner.The app paired effortlessly, and I’ve had no issues with the WiFi.Literally my only complaint is that the beep is SO LOUD and I wish there was a way to turn it down/off.

CommentsTitle: Get a big one, and with trays if its an option
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 31, 2019
CommentsContent: Love my air fryer!  I am glad I got the big one too! The tray and cooking area is a bit small to me, and this is one of the larger ones.  You can fit maybe 4-5 chicken thighs in the cooking tray.  Super easy to use and the food looks great after cooking. It would have been nice to have a stack-able tray so you could cook two trays of wings at the same time. However, not sure if that would cook evenly with the air circulation. Either way its a thumbs up!

CommentsTitle: Bought an air fryer with low expectations but LOVE it!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2020
CommentsContent: I'm an overthinker.  I watched way too many videos and read way too many reviews before deciding on my Cosori.  I purchased an air fryer with the thought that circulating air is going to dry out meat and taking the fat out of fried foods is going to make them like cardboard.  Wrong.  i was most concerned with vegetables which it does amazing on.  Crispy kale chips, awesome roasted broccoli and cauliflower, brussell sprouts etc.  I finally tried meats and have not been disappointed.  So far I have only tried tilapia and chicken breast and both were wonderful.  Looking forward to trying more.The Cosori is easy to use, very self explanatory but comes with a nice directions booklet as well as a good time chart for cooking the basics and a recipe book.  It's super easy to clean at this point but I've only had it a couple of weeks.  The only problem I have at all is the plastic latch that moves to allow you to pull the basket out; on mine it takes some manipulation to push it forward.  I think I probably have a faulty one but I've learned to deal with it.In spite of the plastic latch this air fryer is a great purchase.  I wish I had gotten one a long time ago.

CommentsTitle: Best appliance I have ever purchased!!!!  Used almost daily!!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased this as my first air fryer and cannot compare it to any other brand.  My family uses this almost daily and could not be happier.  I love that we can just take any frozen food and put it directly into the fryer and within a few min the food comes out almost perfect.  French fries and onion rings come out so crispy with no oil.  Chicken, steaks, and pork chops all come out better than I had made on the stove or in the oven.This machine has paid for itself many times over.  If you are looking for an air fryer, then I highly recommend that you give this a try.

CommentsTitle: Expensive but worth it. 5 stars if there were options to place skewers and a bit difficult to clean.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 4, 2019
CommentsContent: Its been almost a couple months since I purchased this, I use it 2-3 times a week for cooking dinner or lunch. I use it to cook breaded okra, potato slices, papad, fryums, spicy raw banana andhra style etc. Cleaning both the trays with soft brush and dish soap is not enough, it has the air vents which are hard to clean. Presets are easy to work and straightforward to work. Only thing missing is an option to place properly metal or wooden skewers or skew sticks so that we can air fry veggies or kebobs. A little pricey but I am hoping it lasts for many days with proper maintenance.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 14, 2020
CommentsContent: I have been researching air fryers for 6 months and ended up buying this one. From unpacking, through setup, cooking instructions and Cosori recipes, this air fryer has exceeded my expectations! The product is intuitive to use. The fryer is very well put together. The basket and cooking surface cleans up easily. The user manual is very well written, the recipe book even better. The Cosori website has recipes and other useful information. I have become a Cosori fan, if this is the end-to-end experience they build into their products. Wonderfully surprised!

CommentsTitle: 👍🏽 Great for eating a little healthier 👍🏽
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 9, 2020
CommentsContent: We're using this thing at least five or six times a week. It is FANTASTIC and is also good for reheating pizza slices if you're into that type of unhealthy food.We do not use the smart feature so I don't know how useful it would be.BTW, I love pizza.

CommentsTitle: Easy, fast and food comes out roasted to perfection
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 30, 2019
CommentsContent: I love airfryers, this is my second one. I gave my first one away as it was too small and I had to cook per person. I bought a bigger one so I could cook in one step. Temp and times recommended are spot on so far. Fish and Meats comes out perfect as do roasted veggies and baked potatoes. So handy cooking appetizers when company comes. It’s quiet and easy to use. I use foil or parchment paper liners to save on cleanup but the dishwasher does a great job

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 1, 2019
CommentsContent: Having an air fryer has been a life savor! I LOVE this air fryer and it has made my life much easier. It was so convenient and easy to make meals while pregnant with this and now postpartum with a newborn. I love the different buttons you can push that have specific settings/times for each thing. It also comes with a book full of recipes that I haven't used yet, but I'm looking forward to making some of them soon!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 31, 2020
CommentsContent: Amazing air fryer. This has completely transformed my life and I am obsessed with it. I use it all the time and it really crisps up different foods and makes amazing food overall. Comes with a super cool cookbook and I think everyone needs an air fryer in their kitchen. Very simple and easy to use and set up and fits a good amount of food

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 31, 2020
CommentsContent: This thing is garbage The door won't stay closed so I can never cook in it. with the virus coming around I never got it sent back but trust me it's a piece of crap don't waste your money on it

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2019
CommentsContent: This is our second air fryer. The first is a bit easier to set the timer and temperature on, but this one has a larger interior and much easier to clean. Was able to cook about 6 lbs of boneless turkey breast for Thanksgiving in an hour, which was perfectly crisp on the outside and deliciously juicy on the inside.We typically use it for tater and veggie tots, but we've also made some delicious mini fruit pies and pot pies in this as well. It's also fairly quite compared to the our first air fryer, and doesn't leave such a strong lingering cooked oil smell.

CommentsTitle: Top Notch Product and Customer Service
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 5, 2020
CommentsContent: This product is fantastic kitchen appliance that I have already recommended to many people.  You won't be disappointed.Cosori's Customer Service deserves a sixth star.  I needed to contact them about a struggle I was having with one of the buttons.  Long story short, I was quickly FedEx a replacement after they verified the problem.Great product and great shopping experience.Update: I can't emphasize enough how great their customer service is.  They are a very customer friendly company and exercise good judgment in resolving problems.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 3, 2019
CommentsContent: I am 82 years old and still cook from scratch, most of the time. Never do frozen foods. Fast food  and restaurant food once in a while. I bought this on a whim and am so happy that I did. I use it several times a week. I’ve done chops, burgers, a beef roast and several vegetable dishes. I have never been  a person who baked despite my Mom being a wonderful baker. I have now baked a variety of tarts and hand pies. Despite ready made crusts or biscuits and canned pie filling, everything is delicious and quick. I did prepare my own blueberry filling with fresh blueberries. My next project will be pretzels!I would recommend this to anyone of any age. I think this XL size is good even if you cook for one or two. This is a large machine and I thought it would be too heavy for my arthritic hands but it is light. The only problem would be storage space because it is large if you don’t have the counter or cupboard space.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 3, 2019
CommentsContent: I am 82 years old and still cook from scratch, most of the time. Never do frozen foods. Fast food  and restaurant food once in a while. I bought this on a whim and am so happy that I did. I use it several times a week. I’ve done chops, burgers, a beef roast and several vegetable dishes. I have never been  a person who baked despite my Mom being a wonderful baker. I have now baked a variety of tarts and hand pies. Despite ready made crusts or biscuits and canned pie filling, everything is delicious and quick. I did prepare my own blueberry filling with fresh blueberries. My next project will be pretzels!I would recommend this to anyone of any age. I think this XL size is good even if you cook for one or two. This is a large machine and I thought it would be too heavy for my arthritic hands but it is light. The only problem would be storage space because it is large if you don’t have the counter or cupboard space.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 13, 2020
CommentsContent: Alright so I didn't really know too much about Air Fryers until recently. Picked this up around Christmas time and it's really a fantastic appliance to get low-fat fried foods. We've done home style fries, sweet potato fries, chicken wings, you name it! It all came out great and very tasty. It's nice not having to use oil and we know it's healthier. Did a lot of research and this is the model you'll want for just sheer capacity alone. A lot of the other air fryers just don't have enough room in them. This one does. Highly recommend!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 14, 2019
CommentsContent: I don’t normally write reviews but this one was review- worthy! This is a must buy! I have probably made chicken wings in this 3 times a week since I got it and they are the best wings ever. Hands down. So far I have made, chicken wings, bacon, asparagus, salmon, chicken, grilled cheese and they all have turned out perfect every time. There is no learning curve and it comes with easy to follow directionsThe best part is it comes out of the box ready to use!

CommentsTitle: Super easy to clean. Heat fries and grilled cheese sandwiches
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 15, 2019
CommentsContent: Love this machine especially for fries.The cook book That comes with it is the best way for making the fries. I’m still learning to adjust the times on different sizes and cuts of meats because the cook book is a little off on the times of how long to cook and I don’t like rare meat but I’m still experimenting. It’s terribly easy to use and it is a whiz to clean up. I love it. It makes good grill cheese sandwiches too

CommentsTitle: COSORI Air FRYER MAX XL 5.8 QUART, 1700 Watt.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 9, 2019
CommentsContent: Let me say in a nutshell  without writing a lengthy  review it is simply the best I had used so far the price I paid for the cheap brand why I say cheap brand the teflon coating started peeling off within three months of usage , the residuefrom cooking chicken drumsticks etc was hard to remove by simple washing, in contrast this one is a breeze to clean. apart from this it evenly cooks the food of course  you have to turn it one time that is it. The timer for each variety of food is on the dot. Previous one I had to increase the temperature and the minutes for the food to be cooked evenly. thank you COSORI FOR THE WONDERFULL PRODUCT.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 14, 2020
CommentsContent: This appliance has changed my life because I no longer have to clean the stovetop, convection-traditional oven, or microwave-convection oven. This does not fry. It is a convection oven. It is so easy to clean by hand but is also dishwasher safe.  It is large enough for a family of four. It is easy to convert recipes by reducing the temperature and time, but the recipe book is terrific. It looks good on the countertop. I will never fry again. Did I mention it is easy to clean? 😊

CommentsTitle: Love this thing already! There's a small learning curve but the food is worth it.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 15, 2020
CommentsContent: This was the first meal I made - Cajun Salmon and prosciutto-wrapped asparagus. I really hate fish but my husband got this huge lake salmon and I thought it would be a good thing to try with the new air fryer.  The asparagus was in the cookbook that came with it and the salmon recipe I found on Allrecipes. Cooked the asparagus first, which was a little fussy but it turned out perfect. I've never cooked fish that wasn't breaded, deep fried and frozen, so the salmon was a challenge - I didn't know big fish have scales - LOTS of them! But I followed the simple recipe and had to cook it a little longer than it said, but after 11 minutes plus a 2 minute rest these very thick fillets were perfect. Tender and juicy and didn't taste FISHY. I made a sauce with homemade mayo and Brava sauce. We just had to dig in, which is why I forgot to take any before-eating photos. The meal was nearly done when I remembered to snap a quick pix.My only complaint would be that the paper bound cookbook that came with it disintegrated the very first time I used it. Pages 15 to 54 just fell out when I opened it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 7, 2020
CommentsContent: I ordered this back in March and it says it has wifi capabilities. I couldn't figure out how to use it from the Vesync app but recently revisited it and realized that my air fryer doesn't even have the wifi icon to get wifi! I feel ripped off! I wish I realized it sooner!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2021
CommentsContent: I only hand-washed this-never put it in the dishwasher.  I used it regularly but not harshly.  The photo looks like what would happen if someone were to slam it on the counter or something.  I never did that of course.  The handle suddenly fell off (the plastic broke, screw came off, etc.).  All I did was pick it up and the basket dropped off from the handle.  Thankfully it wasn't hot at the time and it didn't fall into anything else.I will attempt to contact customer service and update this review depending on how they respond.

CommentsTitle: How hard should it be to open it. Am I doing it wrong?
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 16, 2019
CommentsContent: The biggest problem that I have with this and maybe I am doing something wrong, is ... I have trouble with the latch. The clear plastic thing-a-majig is difficult to push open with my thumb. It takes too long to open the drawer.  Anybody have this same trouble? Everything else is good. Still disappointed though that I couldn't get the white one, which was more expensive for some unknown reason.I don't feel that I got a satisfactory answer on the pricing from the sellers.No idea about the rating where it says "flavor", I don't know what that even means.Thanks,Angela

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 28, 2019
CommentsContent: This was a most wonderul purchase. I got this on Prime Day and couldn't be happier. I like to cook and I already had an insta pot but was interested in an Air fryer. This ,  Air fryer is perfect. It is so simple to use and is a true sit and forget appliance that is super convenient for the cook. I have found the presets to be right on target but if I don't I can adjust. The food comes out tender, well done and flavorful !! I look forward to many years of use !!

CommentsTitle: The bomb! Super fast tasty meals in no time.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 23, 2019
CommentsContent: This thing is the bomb!Every I've made gas turned out great. Porkchops come out 100% cooked and not 1 second overcooked. Whole chicken? No problem, if you get the spices right you can make a whole chicken juicier, tastier, and bigger than whatever rottiserie chicken at the grocery stores. Cornish hens are the bomb and you don't even need to know how to bake, you just have to follow recipes.The recipe book that comes with is a nice starter and you should try it, lots of good stuff there. However, you can find lots of easy recipes online too.Don't cheap out and get the smaller one, get the bigger one, even if you are only cooking for one. Why? Because if you want to make, say, more than one batch of steaks or a whole chicken the bigger one is going to be the best one.Super easy to clean, easy to use.Don't forget to preheat. All those reviews saying this doesn't work are due to not preheating.If you are a single guy who struggles in the kitchen and want good home made meals that taste like you know what you are doing this is it, as long as you can read and follow instructions you'll be fine.Highly recommended.

CommentsTitle: Love vegetables even moreso thanks to this air fryer!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 14, 2020
CommentsContent: I love, love this machine. Once sister got three of us sisters to get it based on how much she used it and loved it. When I want restaurant quality onion rings or French fries I make them in my air fryer, the quality is amazing! I love air frying beets, zucchini, cauliflower, broccoli, anything!! This machine has gotten me loving vegetables ever so much more. One sister said anything from the freezer should be cooked with the snowflake preset. I have never had an issue when I’ve used that, from all my fried appetizers to pierogis, egg rolls, dumplings, potato skins! I tell all my friends to buy this one now! Highly recommend!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 20, 2021
CommentsContent: Our air fryer basket had broke so I figured it was time to get a new one. The one we had was great but an eye sore on the counter so I was constantly taking it out of the cabinet. While looking I decided why not get one that matches my kitchen so I could leave it out? This is beautiful! It’s sleek has tons of options and I like that the basket doesn't lay flush on the bottom. I immediately tried it out and I was pleased with the cooking and the buttons were easy to use. Dont hesitate to get this.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 23, 2019
CommentsContent: Love this Air Fryer! So easy to use and this is coming from a single dad with limited cooking experience. There are numerous pre-sets for all types of food. I have cooked sweet potato fries, regular fries, bacon, hamburgers, fried chicken, chicken wings and roasted vegetables. All tasted amazing!This system is self contained and really easy to clean. The only negative would be the size of the unit. It does take up quite a bit of space on the kitchen counter. It is worth it to me!

CommentsTitle: Great, but the buttons might not work eventually
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 17, 2021
CommentsContent: Purchased this product 4/2020.  It was great, easy to use, cooked evenly.  I thought I hit the jackpot!  I used it about 1-2 times a week, but then in December 2020, the buttons were getting temperamental specifically the temp/time button which is a big deal.  I couldn't adjust the temperature or length of cook time.  I had emailed Cosori since the Customer Service was unavailable due to the pandemic.  I did not receive a response.  I called their customer service & finally got to talk to someone.  Since I'm within the warranty timeframe, the issue is covered.  I had to send pics of my order details, a video of it not working & the sticker on the bottom of the unit with the batch number.  I'm not sure if they'll send me a replacement, but I'll update my review with the outcome.

CommentsTitle: Great little machine. Great time saver.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 14, 2020
CommentsContent: I originally received a damaged product, but it was replaced within a week. I have had it less than a month, and am very happy with the results.  I've cooked wings, steaks, chicken, burgers, fries, veggies, salmon, etc. It is not too loud, but does make noise from the fan. I have not had any issues with excessive steam, as some other users experienced. The only thing I have noticed, is the cooking times are more of a suggestion, especially for things that may very greatly in size. A thick cut bone in steak is going to take at least double the time for the preset.

CommentsTitle: Its a great product just poorly put together
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 1, 2020
CommentsContent: This would be great if it wasn't poorly put together I have had it for about a month or so and the entire basket and drawer came apart. I am pending the seller to send a replacement lets see if they try to make it right.They made it right! I guess the first basket was a fluke because this second one was very strong. Great for the price and amazed by wonderful customer service 👏

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2021
CommentsContent: I was so reluctant about this purchase and I couldn't have been more mistaken. Turned out to be one of the best purchases I've made on here! Now granted it's only been a week, but I haven't used my stove or oven since. It's so easy, and the food quality and flavor are better! I have much more options now! I've made anything I couldn't trust myself to cook before lol. Rack of lamb, lobster, salmon, even fried Oreos! In absolutely no time! I love that I can operate it from my phone, and the shake the the reminder is awesome! The 5.8 qt is a perfect size! Not too big, not too small.  Not to mention affordable!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 31, 2020
CommentsContent: The fryer is easy to look at but the positives end there. Couldn't get it to power on but after using different methods (tapping, pushing, holding, etc) using my thumb was the only way it turned on. Took 20 minutes to set time and temp to boil a couple of eggs. However, fryer turned off after five minutes. Needless to say I didn't get beyond the eggs. Cannot understand how this Cosori received such high ratings. Maybe I got a dud but I'm not willing to give it a second try. It was boxed up and sent back.

CommentsTitle: Where Have You Been All of My Life?
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2019
CommentsContent: I'm a bit of a kitchen snob; I hate gadgets. I don't need an Egginator or a Peel-o-matic 3000. I'm happy with my knives, my skillet, my Crock-Pot, my KitchenAid and a few basic things. The only reason I ordered this thing is because my adult son wanted one, and because it's one more thing I can add to my nerdy smart home.That being sad? THIS THING IS AWESOME!!!!!!I had no idea how easy this could make life in the kitchen. We've had it for two days and already we've managed to air fry side dishes, veggies, snacks, wings, cherry pies, and the list goes on on and on. It's easy to use, very spacious, easy to clean, and everything we've made has been fast and delicious.From a smart home perspective, we're finding the app is more useful than the Alexa connectivity. There may be more to it than I realize, but there's very little guidance as to what it will actually do with Alexa, where the app is simple, clean, and easy.I can't recommend this unit enough; if you're in the market for an air fryer, this is the one.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 28, 2020
CommentsContent: I didn't open the box of the Cosari Air Fryer for a few weeks because I was dreading trying to figure out how to use a new appliance. Big regret! This air fryer is so easy to use...super easy to clean. I've baked potatoes, cooked bacon and french fries, roasted turkey...EVERYTHING has come out beyond my expectations. The other great aspect is that there is no hot oven air...I will be using this air fryer all summer long. I chose Cosari because of the reviews about how easy it was to clean. Also, it has a larger basket capacity. Great price too.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 23, 2019
CommentsContent: This air fryer gives off a bad plastic or electrical smell when used!!  Two days after use, I am still trying to rid the house of this odor.  I returned it for a refund because I did not want to take a chance trying another one.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 16, 2020
CommentsContent: I love this air fryer. I mostly use it to make veggies or reheat leftovers. It's makes reheated pizza perfect. Better than fresh actually. But for an XL it still doesn't hold a ton of stuff. That's just how air fryers are. Best for 1-2 people. Also a little annoying to hand wash and dry. But it's negligible. It's still my favorite fun kitchen gadget.

CommentsTitle: Cooking and cleanup is a breeze, food is delicious.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 16, 2019
CommentsContent: Virtually everything about this fryer is perfect. Everything I have cooked in it has come out great. French fries, chicken tenders, bacon, toast, pizza, reheated pizza 🍕 was just like fresh cooked, baked red potatoes, etc. Clean up is always a breeze, nothing is ever stuck to it. The only oil I use is spray olive oil from a pump pressure spray and usually very little.The one and only thing that I was not impressed with is the recipe book. When I first opened the book the backing split and all the pages fell out. Good thing I can get all the Corsori recipes online.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 21, 2020
CommentsContent: I can't believe I didn't know about Air Fryers and have one sooner.  I LOVE this machine.  I have done Pork Chops, Steak, Bacon, Breakfast Sausage, Frozen egg rolls, Green Beans, Brussel Sprouts and more.  All turn our excellent!  Was really surprised with the Steak, it was awesome and the pork chops come out tender, juicy and better than any I have ever had!  Use this almost every day.  Cleans up super easy and cooks things in less than half the time of a traditional convection oven!  If you don't have this, you need it!

CommentsTitle: Great for leftovers and frozen foods
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 22, 2020
CommentsContent: We cook so many things in this air fryer! Frozen foods and leftovers are a breeze to heat up, we barely even use our stovetop anymore except for stews and boiling water. I really like the fact that the timer pauses when you take food out to shake and resumes when you put the tray back in. Really easy to clean as well. Our go to this week is air fried hot dogs: 5 minutes at 400 without the bun, then an extra minute at 400 with the bun. Yum.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 3, 2020
CommentsContent: This would have been been prefect if it lasted longer than 5 months. My unit randomly cuts off in the middle of usage.

CommentsTitle: The best fried fish I ever made!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 15, 2019
CommentsContent: I became a pescatarian this year and I’ve really missed fried chicken, so I needed a fish alternative. I’m so happy I invested in this!!! I can fry a whole catfish no problem! And would you believe it tastes better than regular fried fish in oil. You can really taste the flavors of fish and shrimp in this thing! I highly recommend it.I got the biggest size to accommodate a whole fish I lay it diagonal in the tray. Cook it on one side for about 10-12 minutes then flip it over on the other same time on the default degree setting for fish.

CommentsTitle: You will want to put EVERYTHING in this thing!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 23, 2020
CommentsContent: Little pricey but with the stamp of approval of being an Amazon best seller, it delivers!Easy to use, sort of a pain to clean (depending upon what you put IN the basket), but efficient...from veggies and roast chicken (smallish) to fish and wings, this air fryer cooks evenly and quickly. Ive mastered making crispy chicken wings (psst, arrow root flour after patting wings dry before seasoning) in this air fryer and it has become a staple for every football Sunday. There is literally no end to what you can put in this air fryer....if youve been waffling for a while about whether or not to purchase one, take the plunge and you wont regret it. I love this thing...I mean, I'm actually taking the time to scribble a review of it!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 30, 2021
CommentsContent: Super excited to get product.  It was delivered Monday but due to hectic week opened today. The shipping box was in perfect shape but the product box appeared to have been taped back.  Once opened there was a 4 inch crack on the left side of the cooking element section.  That section completely came off appliance.  It had several pieces broken inside as well.  I returned and hope that I get my refund.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2021
CommentsContent: Purchase and replacement failed after at most 10 uses each - no heating. I'm guessing either the thermostat or heating element.Company was willing to send another replacement but too much of trouble. Kudos to the seller.The product itself is great. The very big basked is very easy to clean. Connecting to WiFi was simple. The app was simple to use too. Doesn't come with any accessories.

CommentsTitle: Wings are the ticket.  A Lot of other great uses too.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 22, 2021
CommentsContent: Best air fryer I have owned.  Easy to clean and operate.  The BEST feature is the wifi/bluetooth option to cook, alert and control from phone.  It’s a convenient  way to keep track while it cooks.No issues, easy to set up.  Makes the BEST wings period.  I bought this because of a wing video on youtube they looked as good as I make me. Didn’t regret it one bit!!  Wife says it’s the best too.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 28, 2021
CommentsContent: I am so happy I chose the Cosori air fryer! I had been comparing air fryers and reading reviews on the different brands for a few weeks and Cosori always came up with great reviews. It’s a solid well built air fryer compared to some of the brands I looked at in stores. All of the food I have cooked in it has turned out perfect. I recommend this air fryer for anyone trying to decide which brand to buy.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 7, 2020
CommentsContent: Please excuse my inattentive video un-boxing haha.  I couldn't wait to recieve the air fryer. After taking it out of the box I wiped down all components with a dry paper towel.Downloading the app was easy. Aside from controlling the air fryer with my phone,  I was able to connect it to Alexa as well,  which is a plus.The steak i placed into the air fryer came out beautifully. I was a bit concerned about the steam that was escaping on the bottom right hand corner(pictured), but this is my first air fryer,  so I'm not the expert on what to expect.Overall I feel like it's done an amazing job.  I can't wait to try all of the recipes.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2020
CommentsContent: From the first minute I plugged this machine in only half the buttons worked. The app works so I cook using that. But a waste of half the money considering the entire product needs to work not half of it.I already recycled the box before I tested the product out, which is why I don’t feel like dealing with the pain of returning this machine.My opinion is to buy a different product. Don’t buy this one. It’s really crappy that only half of it works.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 14, 2020
CommentsContent: I really want to be positive because I love and use this air fryer often but the basket is on the verge of being unable due to rust around the vents. It’s always hand washed and properly dried but no luck beating the odds. I also have noticed that a burnt smell is starting to emerge when I use it.

CommentsTitle: Hands down the BEST air fryer!!  Best customer service!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 22, 2020
CommentsContent: We LOVE our air fryer so much we cook just about every dinner in it!!  We bought it at the beginning of quarantine and have used it daily since! When you cook your meat it is so juicy and crispy & QUICK!! BACON CRISPY IN 6 MINUTES!!  WHAT??!  NO SPLASH NO MESS!  It even impresses my very hard to please husband! He has even learned how to use it when he know my kitchen is closed. Lol.  The only issue we had is the screws started to come out of the basket and base area. We just kept screwing it back in until that no longer worked. The machine was STILL useable.  So I called customer service and they were VERY HELPFUL!!  They called me back in a timely manner and then we started to email back and forth and within a couple emails they quickly resolved our issues!!  They have us a FULL REFUND. You know what I'm gonna do??  BUY THE SAME AIR FRYER!!  That way I can cook meat in one and side dishes in the other!!Side note my sister bought an air fryer(different brand) and it is nothing like this Cosori!!  Hers smells like burnt plastic when she uses it and it was the same cost as this wonderful machine!  GO WITH COSORI!! THEY ARE THE BEST & SO IS THEIR CUSTOMER SERVICE TEAM!!!

CommentsTitle: Very good air fryer, one of my best purchase.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 19, 2020
CommentsContent: One of my best purchase. I use this all of the time. Works very well and cooks good and fast. Wifi comes in handy if you're away from home or not near the air fryer. Cleans fairly easy and even comes with a recipe or instructions book. The only bad thing I can say about it, is that is very loud when it goes off or when you press the buttons. Definitely would recommend.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 8, 2021
CommentsContent: I gifted myself the 5.8 in red, for Christmas.  I am very pleased so far - still figuring out a few things along the way.  It does provide a very easy way to prepare meals, and the results are some very tasty dinners with hardly any clean-up.  I can see this being a healthier way to eat, as there is little need to add oils to prep - example, chicken cutlets, eggplant parmigiana, without having to cook on the stove top with splattering oil -

CommentsTitle: WiFi Can only run on a 2G network. If that's why getting this model beware.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 20, 2020
CommentsContent: 4 stars It's an easy and basic air fryer. I use it all the time and it works great. The only thing I would have done differently is probably not choose it because of the Wi-Fi. The Wi-Fi can only be used on a 2G network which nowadays everything's 4G or 5G 🙄The only option it tells you is to call your network provider to use 2G which I don't understand why anyone would do that 🤔Overall no complaints just can't use my Wi-Fi with it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 3, 2020
CommentsContent: What a game changer. Perfect size bin, easy to clean, and very easy to use. I love the touch screen and presets but having the option to set my own time and tempature. I love that it pauses when you remove the basket to shake. Only downfall is you can only set the timer by 10's and not 5's. So you can't do 375°. If you can I haven't figured out how to do that yet. It's a bit loud when cooking and buttons are loud when pressed. But not a huge deal. The sleek design is really nice too!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2020
CommentsContent: We have cooked chicken, steaks, pork chops, French fries, and probally ten other things , the quality of the finished products is fabulous and the taste is unmatched, it makes the food taste like a chef cooked it. in addition to what I  mentioned, the customer service is outstanding, the handle broke on it, when the basket popped out we had it to close to the edge of the counter, and it fell on the floor we contacted customer service and had a new basket shipped out at no cost to us, I am extremely pleased with the outstanding customer service of this company highly recommended, and again I am just mind boggled by how well the food comes out..

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2021
CommentsContent: I had an air fryer before that made food taste very peculiar and not appetizing at times. This one does not have any weird smells or anything of the sort so I automatically loved it.No complaints at all I love it altogether and I pretty much only cook using this now. If I could complain about ONE thing is that it doesn’t go higher than 400 degrees, but it’s not really a complaint that bothers me too much.It cooks food very quick and leaves it crispy when you want it. I’ve been looking for an air fryer for a while and this one was exactly what I wanted

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 14, 2019
CommentsContent: Excellent although not as quiet as I had expected. I love it though and hopefully the nonstick surface doesn’t peel off like my other one if a different brand. Opening and closing also seems different or not smooth but maybe I’m not doing it right. The food cooks exactly like the photo in the recipe book that it comes with and it’s very tasty. The Mongolian chicken wings are delicious. I highly recommend this airfryer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 8, 2020
CommentsContent: The unit was working really well until the part that holds the handle on the tray melted off. Not sure why this piece was made from something that can melt. I am very disappointed and would advise that you order a more reliable product and manufacturer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 17, 2019
CommentsContent: I wasn't sure I'd use this much, but after having it for a few weeks I'm not sure how I managed to cook without it. I don't like to spend a lot of time cooking, so this has been a huge help. I've made chicken wings and buffalo wings. Fish. Roasted Brussels sprouts. Homemade potato wedges and fries. Even the kids admit that store bought fries and nuggets taste better when I make them in the air fryer. Extremely time saving when I'm hungry and don't want to spend a lot of time cooking...and cleanup is ALMOST as simple as rinsing it out (light scrubbing and the nonstick surfaces are easily cleaned). I also prep a few days worth of meals. Between this and my instant pot, my meal prep time has been drastically reduced.

CommentsTitle: Great Machine!! Easy to use, great results!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 2, 2019
CommentsContent: Our first air fryer ever. This machine is extremely easy to use and understand. Recipe book included has loads of really nice recipes! Made MY fried chicken today, pan fried some, just in case we did not like the way it cooked in the air fryer. We did not use their recipe, just mine! It was better than the pan fried, and used only @ a teaspoon of oil!!!! I reheated the leftovers for dinner in the air fryer, the chicken came out hot and just as crisp as if it were just made! We have also made salmon in it, perfection!!!!Excited  to keep trying new things with this wonderful machine!

CommentsTitle: Wow! So much quieter than our last one. This one is a winner!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 5, 2020
CommentsContent: Wow! What a difference from our last “big name” brand which conked out after 18 months.I highly recommend using parchment squares which makes cleanup a breeze. What you’re going to love is how quiet it is. The difference is significant.The presets are helpful especially the preheat. Don’t put food into a cold air fryer, just as you wouldn’t out food into a cold pan.All in all I am thrilled with this air fryer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 24, 2019
CommentsContent: I’ve only had it for a couple days so I’ll update my review if I change my mind but so far my family loves it. I’ve made pork chops, chicken wing, kids chicken nuggets, fries and quesadillas . They have all turned out great and I can’t believe how crisp the outside of the food gets. It’s so nice not to have to turn on the oven for small items like a  quesadilla.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 30, 2020
CommentsContent: I normally do not buy countertop cooking tools. I'm really glad i bought this one. I live alone and use it more than frequently. I use it to cook my proteins and I also use it to warm them up. I put leftover meats in and turn the cooker on to preheat. My leftovers come out hot and crispy unlike a microwave where they come out hot and gooshy. IOt cleans easily. The only thing I don't like is that it is large and must stay on the countertop. Even though I measured it was larger in life than I thought.

CommentsTitle: Oh so handy to have at work
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2020
CommentsContent: I have an airfryer at home and I love it so much I decided to get one for work. I wanted something big enough that I could also make my colleagues or my students something and this one is the perfect size to do that. I can make myself a healthy, freshly cooked lunch right in my classroom and clean up is super easy. The only issue I've experienced is that the basket can seem like it's all the way in when it actually isn't and it can then pop open during cooking and stop the process. Just have to make sure it's truly clicked into place.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 21, 2020
CommentsContent: Arrived broken , the box was crushed and taped up but the machine was cracked on the side and the inside the metal was crushed and the drawer won’t go in . Very very upset I’m trying to return it but it’s big and hard for me to find a box and take it somewhere or have ups pick it up . Ahhhhh but the machine itself looks really nice I just wish I could use it

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 25, 2021
CommentsContent: I was a little hesitant to buy this style of air fryer, as i had a larger one previously that i loved! But i didn't have as much counter space at this new house, so wanted to try to find one that could still fit a decent amount of food in it, but that didn't need to be on the counter permanently and didn't take up as much room - well, this is perfect!  We are really happy with it, it has a ton of pre-set features for veggies, fish, meat, etc., and is super easy to clean.  The recipe book that comes with it has some really good recipes and with just the two of us, the portions are ideal.  I like the square basket shape and the size of the area for placing the food is great.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 21, 2021
CommentsContent: Although this worked fine with no problem, I could not keep the outside smudge free. It is a fingerprint magnet. When the light hits it ( we have a bright kitchen) the fingerprints were so visible. We even had company comment on it. We tried everything. It did not look good. When I called the company for help they told me to use “Goo-Gone” on it. IAm not comfortable using that on a food appliance. I returned it. We bought a Go Wise and did not have this problem. The Go Wise sits nice and shiny on our counter and problem solved.

CommentsTitle: Good Bye Toaster/Convection Oven - HELLO AIR FRYER
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 20, 2020
CommentsContent: My family absolutely love the Cosori air fryer. We have used and owned various toaster ovens and convection ovens for years. But this Cosori air fryer by far is our favorite. It is very easy to use. My 66 year old Cambodian mom can use it with ease. We cook various things including chicken wings, nuggets, fish, ribs, frozen fries, fresh fries, tater tots, chicken thighs, roasted vegetables, toast, etc. We toss it in and that's it! The cleaning is also very easy except the side grills require a little more attention. Highly recommend this.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2019
CommentsContent: I have been trying so many things in this,so here we go.1) thick hickory bacon (push bacon icon twice) no flipping crispy yummy.2) lemon pepper chicken (boneless, skinless thighs) (push chicken icon) flipping once crispy juicy flavorful brown (FYI no oil).3) fries and chicken strips (hit icon fries) flip once cooked through crispy, juicy, brown yummy (FYI no oil)I’ve tried many more items and loving it, I bought the nuwave and wasn’t to impressed this one is so much better.If you want videos on what I make and cook let me know, I’m trying to get away from processed everything and healthy but yummy (getto fab).

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 14, 2020
CommentsContent: I have put off buying an air fryer until now.  But my daughters convinced me to try one.  I picked this one from Amazon.  It is easy to use for a beginner and is very easy to clean because the baskets have a coating.  I am going to bake some beer battered cod tonight.

CommentsTitle: Everything has a "factory" taste to it!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 17, 2019
CommentsContent: I bought this unit about a month ago and have used it 5 times.  I have washed it before and after each use because all of the food I cook in it has a taste very similar to the smell that you get when you take something out of the box from the factory for the first time.  It ruins the cooking experience when you can taste that in your food.  No amount of seasoning can hide it!  The times work well, and the size is nice.  I would probably love this fryer if only my food could come out without unintended flavoring from the factory.

CommentsTitle: The screws don't stay in the basket
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2021
CommentsContent: We bought this for the house (and also holidays!) as we have 5 kids and thought easy to get them onto fresh french fries (we have a french fry maker) vs the frozen, and fresh chicken nuggets (versus processed), etc.The screws that hold the handle to the basket have come out 3 times.  My husband is a GC and has screwed it back in properly versus me manually doing.It's also very difficult to clean.Other than that - happy we tried it, but on our next purchase I'm going to move to a better more professional brand.This seems like a good idea for maybe a single person or a couple - not for a family with 5 stay at home kids due to schools closed with Covid.  It's not meant to handle a lot of use.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 29, 2020
CommentsContent: Have had the air fryer for about 2 weeks and very impressed with the product.  Our family has used the appliance about 10 times and the meals/snacks we cooked have been delicious.  I, like others who have commented, was reluctant to purchase an air fryer, but I am pleasantly surprised with the ease of use and the taste of the food we've cooked.  For those looking for an air fryer, I would recommend this product due to the simplicity of the controls, the ease of use, and the simmpleness of cleanup.

CommentsTitle: A list of pros and cons from a real person
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 14, 2020
CommentsContent: AMAZING PRODUCT!I’ve been wanting an air fryer for a couple months now, and since going vegetarian this is the best kitchen gadget I have invested in. There are so many different things that I can use it for! So far I’ve made tortilla chips, fries, sweet potato fries, roasted potatoes, and bread! I’m obsessed! Pros: super easy to clean bc of the nonstick surface, doesn’t heat up the entire kitchen like an oven, amazing safety features, “high tech” for only $120, looks nice on the counter, variety of uses, great recipe book included, awesome shake feature, FAST COOKING, pretty big basket!Cons: temperature doesn’t go lower than 170°F, have to be more cautious as to not burn food, the smell from past foods sometimes remains in the fryer even after cleaning but it’s not a bad smell, more like that grease smell that’s always around fast food fryers, pretty loud button sounds and beeps (cant cook at midnight without waking the whole house up)Overall this is the best purchase I’ve made for my kitchen and when shopping for new kitchen gadgets I will definitely come back to the brand first.

CommentsTitle: Better than my Convection oven for small portions
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 4, 2020
CommentsContent: So I have a Microwave/Convection oven that I use everyday. But, some foods do not really crisp like I would like.I got the Cosori 5.8 qt. as a good size to use. French/Sweet Potatoe fries do Extremely well. I tried several type of Chicken recipes and this unit was superb. Roast vegetables are great. Larger recipes I still use my Convection oven, but using them together gets the job done that much faster.

CommentsTitle: I'm glad I got the COSORI Air Fryer Max XL
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2021
CommentsContent: I got this machine because it has a timer and the it stops when done. I take care of an elderly parent and she walks away from our stove and forgets to turn things off. This air fryer solves the problem and we are now safer.  We've had many successful meals from the air fryer. Last might we had kababs. Really good. We've had mixed veggies and pizza. The absolute best items have been the potato fries and zuccini fries. We love and recommend this machine.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 1, 2021
CommentsContent: I was convinced based upon reviews that I had to have a Philips XXL.  Did some more research and found the Cosori was comparable.  After watching some You Tube videos, decided to purchase this machine.  It is excellent and does a great job.  We have "air fried" several things and they have all been great.  I would recommend this product and the price is much more "friendly" than the other brand.

CommentsTitle: Don’t buy if you have dogs.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 7, 2020
CommentsContent: Great air fryer. Gorgeous. Large capacity. Food crisps very well. But WARNING (I wish I was warned) the seemingly innocent beeps it makes drives my 115 lb dog crazy. He runs out of the room like a scared little kitten. It’s bizarre. So I don’t use as much as I would like cause it’s torture for my doggy. Any help would be appreciated....

CommentsTitle: She is very happy with it and so am I, customer service is outstanding!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 23, 2020
CommentsContent: We had this for almost 20 months now and we love it especially chicken,french fries and soft pretzels!There was an issue with the power cord getting damaged and I contacted the company they got back to me very fast. After sending them the proof of purchase date and then pictures of the device and the damaged cord they are sending a new one under the warranty. Outstanding customer service other companies could learn from them.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 20, 2020
CommentsContent: This is my first time to write comment in Amazon.com.After receiving this Air Fryer days ago, I use it every day.  This leads totally many changes.  It takes me much less cooking time in kitchen with good flavour, and it's really easy to clean.  I have tried Salmon, Vege, French fryer, pork rib and so on.After cooking lamb rib with 8 minutes, I feel I will never use my oven any more, and maybe much less grill. This is really convenient.Other details:- No odd smell since beginning.- The noisy is acceptable.- I'm figuring out how to use it via Alexa.  Till now, "turn on my fryer" is for pre-heat by default. But if I say "turn on my fryer in 5 minutes", Alexa cannot understand it. I just bought Alexa weeks ago, and not very familiar with how to integrate both.- Customer service is surprisingly quick and responsible!5 star !

CommentsTitle: The  air  fryer is  worth purchasing .
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 22, 2018
CommentsContent: I like it because  it  easy and convient . Tried on homemade  egg rolls  they cooked up crispy and brown  golden color! Just spray with cooking spray  before cooking👌

CommentsTitle: Convenient cooking for all types of dishes. Do it. It is a game changer.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 26, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   It is slightly bigger than i thought and slightly noisy but this is much better than turning on the vent and standing in front of a stove. I just put in my food and walk away to work in my living room and everything is done.  No more sizzling sounds, no more grease splattering, no more scraping pans no more standing in front of a stove. I can now eat healthy and save tons of time and energy to do things I want to be doing.

CommentsTitle: Easy to use, easy to clean, & tasty food.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 28, 2020
CommentsContent: Easy to use, like the preheat button. First use of fryer was making teriyaki boneless skinless chicken thighs...top was a little crispy from sauce but bottom was moist from sauce and inside juicy. Family devoured the chicken. The first day we tried shrimp,  fries and vegetables and all were delicious. We are so impressed by the ease of use and taste of food, we will be purchasing a second one to use when preparing food for more than family of 3 adults. A plus was the baskets were so easy to clean in sink. Takes up a little more space than a regular coffee maker Looking forward to trying more recipes with our air fryer.

CommentsTitle: Great Idea - Terrible Workmanship - handle disintegrated
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 10, 2020
CommentsContent: If this machine was (a) made better and (b) could hold more  It would be perfect.  Unfortunately, the coating in the basket quickly wore off and began to rust.  The plastic handle that secured the basket began to crack and eventually disintegrated.  Don't be fooled by the advertised WiFi feature, the fryer isn't able to maintain a Wifi link to allow you to start, monitor or stop cooking via your phone.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2021
CommentsContent: I have made so many things in it.  I have made hamburgers, meatloaf, toasted cheese, hard boiled eggs, chicken, pork, banana bread, cinnamon rolls, pizza.  I love to make different things everyday.  My oven has become a place to store things for my air fryer.  I put a magnet over start so I remember if I do use it.  I think you will love it.  If anything changes I will post an update.

CommentsTitle: Plastic smell makes food taste bad and fan rattling
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 12, 2019
CommentsContent: There is a strong plastic smell that is still there after three weeks of usage. It makes the food taste the same. I was hoping after constant use it would go away but it never did. When ever i use it it makes my small apartment smell like burning plastic. Also the fan is starting to rattle.  Going to return

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 29, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   This air fryer is amazing! Oh my gosh I love it and use it all the time! I’ve done hash browns, O’Brien potatoes, chicken fried steak, chicken Parmesan, fried pickles, bread sticks, cookies, steak, French toast sticks, egg rolls, I have done so much and love it! Reheats food much better than a microwave also. Great buy and very easy to clean. The cookbook that came with it has many good recipes, have not made anything I didn’t like out of the little cookbook.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 27, 2020
CommentsContent: I'm seriously so in love with this thing!! It took me a while to finally try it but once I did, I was hooked! It's so easy to use and very convenient. And the food comes out AMAZING! I've joined some air fryer groups on FB for more recipes but it also comes with a little recipe book as well. Also super nice to be able to connect it to your phone. It's pretty easy to clean except for the slits on the sides but it's worth it! 10/10 recommend!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 10, 2020
CommentsContent: Have had for a about a year and a half. Great size and easy to use. Food taste great while being super easy. Unfortunately last week the handle melted. The screws holding handle on would loosen after every 5 or so uses. Always having to tighten them. Used a soft sponge to clean and steal the coating wears off. For the price and length of usage it was great. Trying to get warranty to replace parts. If all goes well I'll update review.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 19, 2020
CommentsContent: We was really looking forward to our new Air Fryer, however the buzzer/beeper on this item is the same noise and loudness as our smoke detectors which tend to send my German Shepherd into major panic causing stress and detection to us and the house.  Discovered that you can remove the top by gently prying up around all the sides to gain access to the circuit card.  The buzzer is labeled on the circuit card BUZ1 in the attached picture.  Just disconnect the power cord and use needle nose plyers and twist it off the circuit card and it will come off.  Put the top back on and plug into the outlet and off she goes, Air Fryer without a buzzer or beeper!!  Back in business! Pictures attached with top, circuit card, and peizo removed.  Enjoy quietly without German Shepherd attack!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 29, 2020
CommentsContent: I really wanted to like this air fryer, but unfortunately the buttons on the fryer didn't work 99% of the time every once and a while I would finally get a button to work. I thought maybe it was a one off issue and tried it two more times but all three of the units I received had the same issue and only one of them was able to get connected to the app which allowed for it to be used but without the main buttons on the unit working I couldn't keep it

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 3, 2020
CommentsContent: I got this brand new and I can’t turn it on after trying everything.  The touch panel is non responsive.  Returning at once.

CommentsTitle: New to air frying, on a learing curve
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 11, 2020
CommentsContent: I have found that it take some time to learn to trust the preset ; I have had to adjust my cooking time for some item,still trying to get thick cut bacon  right, preset for chicken  is about right,I had to adjust the temperature up to 390  for the preset time., only other problem I have is the basket will pop out sometime,  Cosori has offer to re place this unit., love it so far. still learning  how to cook without peeping, My wife love the way is cook chicken wings and fish.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2021
CommentsContent: We love our new air fryer.  it's got a large basket and  is easy to use and clean.  It came with a handy little cookbook and the instructions for use are clear.  It is pretty large and takes up a bit of counter space.  You would need a good size cabinet to store it.  I don't have anything to compare it to but it seems like a good air fryer for the money.  Definitely recommend.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 28, 2019
CommentsContent: Wasn't sure what to expect. Had held off on buying an air fryer, because I didn't really understand them well. A friend's wife kept telling me that she uses it all the time and how great hers was. Actually saw her use hers one weekend and thought time to do this. Bought the Cosori and love it. I thought what the heck, I'll make buffalo chicken wings. Verdict: tastes just like the restaurant. Again, I didn't understand how an air fyer worked, so I thought there was hot oil at bottom and air would circulate throughout. Nope, not how it works. No oil. But I will tell you this: those wings tasted every bit like they were 'fried'. They were delicious. Highly recommend.

CommentsTitle: Where have you been all my life?
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2020
CommentsContent: All I can say is --if you're a foodie, you need to have this in your kitchen!!! It's quick to learn the device (presets are built in - so press a button and your selected meat or other foods are done)...and it is easy to clean (the tray basket pops out and any drippings are a breeze to remove from the nonstick surface). Lastly, the cooking speed is fast and thorough (because the heat circulates around the food). The only thing you have to be ready for is the operating asdound of the device...it can be loud (but what do you expect from a unit having a strong fan to move that heat around). Look, its versatile and sturdy...a rare thing in today's market of kitchen appliances. Make the investment...you will not be sorry!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 31, 2020
CommentsContent: I have to admit, when my husband ordered the air fryer I gave him a hard time about having another kitchen appliance on the counter.  But we have enjoyed this air fryer immensely!  We cook something in it almost every day, whether it's meat, fish, veggies, cheese curds...everything comes out delish and cooked perfectly.  I would say my favorite are the roasted veggies.  Easy to use and clean up.  Just soak it in the sink for a while with some soap and warm water and it cleans right up.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 31, 2019
CommentsContent: This new air fryer is a great addition to our kitchen's cooking tools!  Large capacity, very user friendly, beautiful red color, no finger prints, light weight, delicious results and not noticeable heat add to the cooking areas. Amazing selection of presets to make it so easy to use with great results.  After we got ours we bought another for a gift to our daughter's family.  They rave about how everyone in the fast paced family gets fast hot cooked food home rather than eating fast/junk food away from home.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 18, 2020
CommentsContent: This air fryer cooks well and has a lot of space.  On average I’m putting 12 wings and that without piling on type.  Also made a nice salmon.  Only con is the touch buttons mostly do not work.  Bluetooth is your second way to control it.  If your WiFi dies on you, you can’t use the fryer.  Make sure to use the preheat setting as recommended by the instructions, otherwise you cooking twice the time recommended for your choice of meat.  Also customer service is nice.  They sent me a replacement quickly.  I haven’t had time to see if those buttons work.  Might update this later.

CommentsTitle: Chicken nuggets for an army in a hurry!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 8, 2019
CommentsContent: Best way to cook chicken nuggets! If you have little people who eat protein only in the form of chicken nuggets, this air fryer is for you! Also works for reheating meatballs, french fries, taquitos  and pizza. Makes great bagel pizzas too. This was quite possibly the best kitchen purchase I've made when it comes to feeding small humans! Side note: The design of the basket is superb. MUCH better than the cheesy/flimsy trays I've seen in other brands of air fryers.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 26, 2020
