CommentsContent: I waited so long to buy an air fryer because so many people would tell me oh i dont like it or they said so much was wrong. Well I decided I loved the look of this one and I finally wanted to try it for myself. I am so GLAD that I did . I use my Cosori EVERYDAY! I have made wings, cheese sticks, chicken breast, pork chops and so much more in it already and I have only had it maybe 3 weeks. The meat comes out so juicy. I cuts my cooking time in half almost with a family of 5 I am able to set down and enjoy dinner without having a huge clean up after as well. Best choice I have made. Oh and I tested my Cosori with someones NuWave  just to see the difference. Lets just say my Cosori won!

CommentsTitle: Its roomy basket is very convenient
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2021
CommentsContent: A year ago, I purchased the newest modal of Cosori Air Fryer (without the wi-fi feature) and immediately enjoyed using it.  I am almost totally blind and so had bump buttons placed on the different settings on the front panel and thus made it easy to use.  Its larger square size basket is roomy and a good shape to hold a whole chicken or for laying out a row of veggies.  Its simplicity and quick-cooking have made it more convenient and fun.  I also should mention the company’s excellent customer service.  Recently, the Cosori Air Fryer stopped working.  I contacted the company and was offered a refund but I wanted a replacement and they obliged.  So, I got a replacement within a couple of days and happily am using it every day once more.  They asked for the old one to be returned to inspect and that tells me that the company is a conscientious one.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 12, 2019
CommentsContent: Easy to operate. Some recipes needed to be cooked few minutes longer than suggested by the recipe book, same goes for preprogrammed dishes. Not a problem, though, once you experiment few times. Lemon/garlic chicken was, actually, better than I ever tasted. Cooking times  for most dishes are pretty fast. So far could not get a good steak from it. Could have been problem with the meat itself. I gave this unit as birthday present to friend of ours, and he was praising the steak he cooked in it.

CommentsTitle: Don't know how we waited this long
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 10, 2020
CommentsContent: We cooked our first meal in the air fryer and it was absolutely delicious. Tempura asparagus, tempura avocado, tofu and sweet potato. The resulting flavor was amazing. Everyone should have an air fryer in their house! Very easy to clean as well. 10/10 🌟

CommentsTitle: Air fryer is a must have
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 31, 2021
CommentsContent: Very nice product. Worth the money.I love the color. It is red and beautiful. I should have gotten more red cookware. It looks so pretty. Also, it makes my frying process way way way easier. I don’t need much oil, and it can taste just like tea fried recipes. Also, the size is very good too. I use it for one to three people, and it portion is just perfect. Love it!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2021
CommentsContent: Needed to update my previous one which was not bad, different brand and after several years was starting to act up. This is much better, I’ve cooked steaks, fries, hash browns,  Italian sausage etc, you name it including small whole chickens. Everything comes perfect, easy to clean, easy set ups. There’s not one negative thing  I can say about it. Get it, you won’t regret it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 20, 2019
CommentsContent: Have had the AF for about 3 weeks and love it!  The design is attractive which is important since it will live on my countertop.  The inside is easy to clean non-stick.  Operation is intuitive.  Also appreciate the 2 year warranty offered to Amazon customers.  Contacted Cosori customer service with a question and received an email back within 2 hours...can't beat that!  If I didn't already own an instant pot, I would buy the Cosori pressure cooker based on their service alone.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2020
CommentsContent: I am very disappointed in the quality and build of this airfryer. I've had this product since Christmas (~2 months) and within that time, the plastic handle on the basket has cracked, with plastic breaking off in chunks and slivers along the back side of the handle. In addition, the basket often pops out during the cooking process, creating the need to put a heavy object in front of the door to keep it closed. Based on reviews I have read, others have also experienced this issue. The Cosori brand unfortunately seems to have some quality controls issues with the build of their pieces. Once you figure out the best settings to use based on the food you are cooking, this airfryer makes tasty and juicy food, however the quality issues with the product overshadow the positives. Based on the price-point of this model in comparison to other airfryers on the market with good reviews, this product should quality should be higher and these issues should not be occurring.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 2, 2021
CommentsContent: Our first air fryer was another brand & the basket was round.  It finally gave out & we decided on this one.  We like the square basket, it’s bigger than our first one, & we like the digital temps & time.  We have had it for about 3 months & usually use it several times a day.  It really gets used & it’s still just as good as day one.  We also like the recipe book that came with it & have made some of the recipes.  We would highly recommend this brand.

CommentsTitle: Amazingly Easy to Clean - Great Air Fryer!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 2, 2020
CommentsContent: We bought this in November 2019 and have used it regularly. 9 months later, it still looks brand new. The basket is extremely easy to clean! I looked at reviews of all air fryers before choosing this one, based on other's feedback on ease of cleaning and they're all right, this is the best of the best when it comes to easy cleaning. We especially love boneless chicken strips floured with ranch dressing mix, super tasty and healthy.

CommentsTitle: Loved it, but it is damaged after only 3-4 mos./Replaced
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 21, 2020
CommentsContent: I have really enjoyed this air fryer since I purchased it in June of 2020 and used it regularly. I had given it 4 stars, but I may have to adjust this. Recently when using it, part of the heater coil burned off and fell on top of my food! I have contacted the company to see what protocols or guarantees they offer. Will provide an update if and when I hear back from them.Update:  11/1/20~Cosori was great in standing behind their product. Communication was timely, and they provided me with the means to replace  my air fryer which I have done already.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 10, 2019
CommentsContent: So I've only had this for a few weeks but literally everything I've made has come out perfect.  I've made creole sausage hash, brussel sprouts, wings, fries, tofu... Amazing.  It doesn't take as long to cook as some of the recipes I've been looking at on Pinterest, so I watch it very carefully--ex. Recipe says to cook tofu for 20 minutes at 360 degrees but it only took 15. It is also super easy to clean.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 27, 2020
CommentsContent: When I originally bought this I was very excited until I got it and started having issues with it.  The touch buttons were not working properly, I had to use the app to turn it on.  I contact Amazon about it and they sent me a new one.  The new one was working fine until a new firmware was done and now it won't even preheat.  For something that is supposed to make my life easier it has caused me quite a few stress.  Also, as smart as it is, you can't tell Alexa to preheat, which is strange since all the recipes requires you to preheat before cooking.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 29, 2021
CommentsContent: The Cosori 5.8 is an amazing air fryer. Works great...very quiet and the pre-set cooking programs work perfectly. Seen many recipes online with various cooking times/temps for whatever I’m cooking. I’ve found the presets on the Cosori are the way to go whenever you can use them...Just yields better result in my opinion. Cleans easily too! I’d buy again in a heartbeat.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 30, 2019
CommentsContent: My air fryer literally arrived 30-minutes ago via USPS. Mail carrier arrives around the same time daily so I had my shrimp ready and seasoned. The air fryer arrived, I did not even clean the trays, the heat will destroy the germs hopefully! I pre-heated the unit by pressing the pre-heat icon, which goes on for 5-minutes, then pressed the shrimp icon, and 6-minutes later I had DELICIOUS shrimp!All I did to season was dump the defrosted shrimp in a bowl, spray them with olive oil, dumped garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper on them. That's it!The tray is a bit small as-is, you can likely only fit a few adult-sized cutlets in there, so hopefully I can find a rack for the tray. There's a lot of "dead space" at the top of the tray. You'd likely be better off making chicken stripes, instead of cutlets, and going that route.Anyhow, this air fryer is AMAZING. I NEVER leave Amazon reviews!Off to buy some accessories!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 15, 2019
CommentsContent: Hoping for a replacement...

CommentsTitle: This item was NOT new but open box and defective
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 1, 2020
CommentsContent: Be careful buying from this account - describes as new this item was clearly open box as the top was re-taped and I side the item was poorly repackaged. I wondered at first if it really mattered to me as it seemed in ok shape and why waste a product. However upon plugging in the device it would not turn on. The touch buttons were faulty - probably why the last person returned it..  complete waste of time and shady to sell something described as new when it’s not.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2021
CommentsContent: I have been using it for like a week and I completely love it. It made cooking so easy and quick that I feel like a chef experimenting with different things lol. Everything gets cooked evenly and crispy and not counting that its way healthier than cooking with oil. Most of the bad reviews I saw were from people that clearly did something they were not supposed to do with it and now they are complaining when it got damaged

CommentsTitle: EZ clean up and simple to use.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2019
CommentsContent: This is a terrific product. My husband may just quit the BBQ grill and microwave. He likes crispy wings and they came out great. Steaks, veggies and ribs too. Two Cornish hens came out perfect. Customer support response to a small issue was unbelievable.I wish they had square accessories. A raised rack would allow twice as many wings and veggies.

CommentsTitle: All my french fries come out baked instead of fried
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 31, 2020
CommentsContent: No matter how much oil (1tb or 1TB) I put in the fryer all my french fries come out baked instead of crispy fried like in a oil bath. Easy making french fries is the only reason we bought this air fryer and now it sits useless on the counter waiting to be trashed. Very disappointed!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 4, 2020
CommentsContent: I’ve had this air fryer for over a year now and it’s literally a life saver! Cooks your meats and veggies in half the time and I love how crispy everything comes out! The chicken tastes almost as if it was hot off the grill on a beautiful summer day! I absolutely would recommend this to anyone! Compared to other air fryers this one certainly comes with a lot of room in the basket which is great because it allows me to cook everything at once!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 19, 2021
CommentsContent: It looks very sleek with its minimalistic design.Outer material feels like matte, brushed aluminum even if it’s actually plastic.Easy to clean. Easy to use.Package came slightly torn but everything inside was fine. Quite heavy as a whole, but it’s proportionate to it’s capacity. Overall, it appears to be the most good looking & efficient air fryer out there. ✌🏼

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 16, 2020
CommentsContent: Oh my! I was a skeptic about an “air fryer”, but my view has taken a sharp turn. Not only is this a nice looking air fryer, but the features, recipes, and ease of use are phenomenal. One of the coolest features is accessed through Wi-Fi and your phone. I’ll look up a recipe, prepare my meal, and place my food in the basket and hit Start Cooking on my phone. The Cosori air fryer will set the time and temperature based on the recipe I have selected. I always have the ability to tweak the time and temperature to my liking. The buttons on the front will set the time and temperature based on the food type, although they are not to any certain recipe.I have a friend that has a different brand air fryer, and the bottom of it got so hot that it cracked her countertop. Just to be safe, I always plays mine on the stove top; however, I have placed my hands beneath this air fryer while it has been cooking and have confirmed that it barely even gets warm.The only slightly negative thing I would have to say about this model is that sometimes the buttons take a moment to recognize that they are being pressed. Still, I would give this an A+.

CommentsTitle: Easy to use, food is delicious!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 4, 2020
CommentsContent: Sooo simple to use, and food is delicious!My 17 year old granddaughter, gets up everyday just to try a new recipe from the recipe book that comes with product. It’s a blessing during this time of isolation and stay at home. I very much enjoy this cooler.

CommentsTitle: Not a substitute for trying for sure
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 25, 2019
CommentsContent: I bought this thinking it would be a safer,  more healthy, easier option than trying in oil. Not so much My kids are all teenagers and honor roll students...the machine does not preheat and cook as outlined in the guide. The food is also not tasty. We tried the suggestion of using  a little oil or spray oil to help but it did not make the food taste good. It was very dry. I would rather pan get with oil than use this machine.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 23, 2020
CommentsContent: Yes, air fryers are bulky and tend to take a lot of counter space. But I have a Hoosier cupboard that it sits on perfectly and I end up using it almost everyday. It is great for throwing a frozen chicken patty in and in no time at all I have a chicken sandwich for lunch. The food comes out crispy and delicious. I was hesitant to spent the money at first but once it got here, I have got my money back in the ease and convenience.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 16, 2020
CommentsContent: This appliance is the best money spent. Purchsed it on a prime day. It cooks in less time, press a button for anything you want to cook. Cooks onion rings, tater tots, and fries in less than 15 minutes. Preheat devise in 5 minutes, then press fries button no heating up oven and entire kitchen. Onion rings are cooked to perfection in 12 minutes. Anything of appetizers cooks in 15 or less. I recommend this 300%.

CommentsTitle: Awesome fryer, stopped working after 6 months
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 26, 2019
CommentsContent: I decided to wait a year to see how well the fryer would hold up over time. Unfortunately the fryer stopped working after 6 months. I now have to contact customer service. But I will say, loved the air fryer, loved the food, loved the flavor, hopefully whatever it is can be easily fixed.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 1, 2021
CommentsContent: I purchased my air fryer in October 2020 mainly because I eat only meat and wanted a way to easily and quickly cook bacon, chicken, steaks, etc.  This air fryer did not disappoint.  I used it at least once a day, sometimes twice a day.  It performs beautifully and cleans up easily.  Unfortunately, it stopped working in March and I contacted customer service as it was still under the one year warranty.  I was not expecting to have an easy replacement.  Boy, was I disappointed!  Brandon, a Cosori representative, was very responsive and after determining that I had indeed "fried my fryer" (my words; not his!), he notified me that my replacement is in the mail.  I have not encountered such an easy and friendly customer service experience in quite a while.  You can purchase this product knowing it performs perfectly and if needed, customer service is right there to help you.

CommentsTitle: Has become my go-to cooking appliance
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2019
CommentsContent: I've been pleasantly surprised with my Cosori air fryer.  I now find myself cooking at least some part of most of my meals in it.  Bacon, steak, frozen fries, chicken - you name it.  Incredibly easy to use and cooks most items quickly.  I find myself experimenting with various recipes.  One of my favorites was brussel sprouts.  I cut them in half, tossed some salt, pepper, and balsamic vinegar on them and then cooked them in the air fryer for about 10 minutes at 350.  Good stuff.

CommentsTitle: Great air fryer and great customer service.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 9, 2020
CommentsContent: I use this air fryer almost daily and it works great. It has one problem though. There are three Phillip's head screws holding the fry basket to the handle. These come loose due to getting hot then cold over and over  is my guess. The first time the basket fell to the floor it ended breaking part of the plastic handle when I tried to save my meal . I suggest  tightening the three screws each week to avoid this happening to anyone else. other than that, nice fryer. Adding to this review. I contacted customer support and in less than a week they sent me a replacement basket at no charge. They have a great customer service team.

CommentsTitle: Basket slides out, major burn risk!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 24, 2020
CommentsContent: I have had this product less than 6 months and have used it maybe 25 times.  The basket no longer stays shut and will spontaneously slide out.  Twice its fallen onto the floor which poses as a burn risk not only from the basket itself but also the food and grease.  I have used this product as directed so this is a design/product flaw.  The machine will not run unless the drawer is propped shut.  I am very disappointed!  A very big waste of money for what is niw pretty much a useless item.  Go with a different product!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 19, 2020
CommentsContent: I've bought two of these, one for myself and one for my parents. Mine is fantastic but the one I bought my parents seems to be defective for two reasons.  1) The control panel intermittently doesn't respond and I have to press really hard on the buttons. 2) The screws in the tray are stripped which causes them to frequently fall out. This means the handle is now only connected to the tray via a single screw because the other screws do not stay attached. Since we cannot use the tray the whole air fryer is practically unusable. My parents have only had their air fryer for 6 months.

CommentsTitle: Do not recommend it rattles & basket clip broke luckily just missed falling onto my foot.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 28, 2020
CommentsContent: I was really enjoying the functionality of this fryer, I liked the reminder to shake and the fact it just starts up again when you put the basket back in. We made roasted veg, pizza, wedges, sausages, fries, egg bites and cake. Unfortunately now it make a loud metal rattling noise when we use it and the basket doesn't clip into place as easily. very disappointed, I only bought it 24 days ago :( I do not recommend

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 28, 2021
CommentsContent: I love, love, love my new cosori air fryer. Since I got it, I've used it almost every day. i love how its compact and neat and can fit on any counter surface or corner. I enjoy the ease of using it with the digital display and its really easy to use and understand. The food comes out juicy and flavorful. I like it too because Im finally eating healthy....no oil and grease. No other problems noted thus far. I'll definitely recommend this air fryer to anyone who wants and needs one.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 12, 2019
CommentsContent: Love this air fryer. Very good size for a family...5.8 qt., easy to use, easy to clean, and fries came out perfectly done. Not too big which is important in a kitchen with pressure cookers! Especially like the large square basket which holds much more than round baskets.Price is very reasonable as well. Can program it with your smartphone to use in room in your house.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 9, 2020
CommentsContent: I was skeptical about buying this. I kind of procrastinated on it and read reviews and talked to people who owned one....but I never pulled the trigger. Now I wish I had sooner. This thing is great!  Easy to use. Food is awesome. I even made a steak in it that I’d say was 90% as good as a grilled one. Indoor...with no real prep work...in 10 minutes. Chicken comes out juicy inside, crispy outside. Kids love it and use it often as well. And a favorite thing for me is reheating cold pizza, left overs. It does a much better job than a microwave of reheating but not over drying. It’s pretty awesome. If you’re reading this and have been debating it, get it.

CommentsTitle: We love our Cosori air fryer!!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 11, 2019
CommentsContent: We use this air fryer for far more than we ever thought we would.  It has changed how we cook things.  For example, we used to cook scrapple in a frying pan and it would take about 45 minutes.  Now, we cook it in our Cosori air fryer and it takes 15 minutes and tastes better and looks better than it ever did when cooked in a frying pan.  We cook fish, meats, vegetables, and so much more.  It is a most efficient little oven!  Oh, and we love that it is square instead of round - we can fit more in the square shape and it is awesome!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 26, 2019
CommentsContent: This air fryer is beyond amazing!  Do you want perfect wings, super crispy?  Well this is what you need.  I never knew everything you could make in this!  If you want to make a salmon patty, here you go!  This cooks it perfectly inside while giving it the brown crisp you need on the outside while at the same time not making it dry.  Veggies, whole chickens, fish it does it all.  The thing I think I like most about it, is reheating fried foods... Your chicken, fries or whatever is brought back to life.  We get to go fries, refrigerate, and use the air fryer to bring it back to life.  THEY TASTE BETTER THEN THEY DID WHEN THEY WERE FIRST BOUGHT!  I kid u not.  You have to see and taste it to believe it.  I love, love, love this product!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 8, 2020
CommentsContent: My 2 teenagers will eat their weight in fries. This machine holds enough for them to gorge themselves on. Holds a frozen bag of fries or tots well (2lbs)4 scotch eggs40 mini corn dogs1 1/2 pounds of hot wingsCleans easily. So much better than bubbling oil-less mess, less grease, less garbage. It's a big item, I put it in the counter for cooking and put it away after it cools and gets cleaned. We have an olive oil spray bottle to add crispiness.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 21, 2019
CommentsContent: This air fryer is my new love! I have had it for 2 days and I have made mozzarella sticks in 5 minutes that were amazing, chicken nuggets that were so tender and wings that were wonderful! Clean up is a breeze due to the nonstick finish. This machine has made my life easier and has given me so much more time to do other things instead of being in the kitchen. I can't say enough great things about this fryer and I will be purchasing another one so I can cook a variety of things at one time. I am one happy momma!

CommentsTitle: Best small kitchen appliance purchase ever!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2019
CommentsContent: I bought one of these on a whim thinking I would give it a try. I have another brand that I was never happy with but I wanted an Air Fryer. I received this item and I have made three meals in it so far and it is absolutely amazing. I would highly recommend this Air Fryer to anyone wanting to make the investment, it is well worth every cent.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 30, 2020
CommentsContent: This is probably one of the best air fryers I have ever used. As long as you pre heat it your food take no time to cook. The only thing is it is easy to over cook food because the settings are off. So it’s more of a trial and error type deal. Over all it get the job done !!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 12, 2021
CommentsContent: I'M new to the Air Fryer cooking world, AND this is GREAT PRODUCT.  I bought the 5.3 qt size and it fits well on my small counter.  I cooked chicken thighs in 12 minutes that were so tender and juicy but crispy.  I can't wait to try other foods.  This will be especially helpful in the summer  because my gas oven, which I use ofte, makes my kitchen almost too hot to bear.  I highly recommend this air fryer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 20, 2019
CommentsContent: I have mostly cooked chicken in this.  It always turns out well and makes dinner simple.  I just sprinkle some seasoning on the chicken and put it in using the preset button.  It has always been well cooked and not over done.  I like that I don't have to keep an eye on it.  Just put it in and hit the chicken button.  This leaves me time to do other things.  It is easy to clean although I do use the parchment paper liners.  The nonstick coating seems to work well.

CommentsTitle: Works great, easy to use and clean
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 28, 2020
CommentsContent: If you are a single person, this is the best 'oven' for you... Why heat up a full size oven if you are making food just for yourself? Made meat loaf, cookies, ribs, hamburgs, steak, fries, baked potato, summer squash, banana bread, pork chops, biscuits,etc. in less time than an oven. Once the pan is cooled down, put in hot water and soap and use it as a dish pan.The only problem is the learning curve..... it needs to come with 'regular food cook book' not fancy meals...

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2021
CommentsContent: Bought this to make a recipe for book club. Used it twice. First time I put the stink down to my inexperience with the device- I thought perhaps I had not followed the directions of what or how to put ingredients in. Second time was not the charm- I double checked the process and did everything according to the recipe and appliance instructions- but the food still stank and it took multiple days of vinegar application to get the stink out of the kitchen.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 6, 2019
CommentsContent: I purchased another brand and I loved how it cooked but it eas touch to clean. This one is easier to set on preset larger and it is really no stick the basked is just made out of great material. The price was great since it is such high quality. I highly recommend to anyone does not know which one to buy. You will be pleased with this Air Fryer especially if you a 1st-time buyer. Great cookbook even has a telephone number if you have questions. I love the preheat future and reminder when to shake your fries if you make the.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 7, 2020
CommentsContent: love the concept but bad design, the screws constantly need tightening  and now after 7 month of use the inside handle has burned up and the screws are not being held in and has to be thrown away.  No repair is going to work.  easy to use, but the craftsmanship is pretty faulty, but it is only $100ish

CommentsTitle: Panel is hard to response + scratches on frying surface
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 30, 2020
CommentsContent: Was using it for almost 2 month, 3 times a week approximately, so we used it <24 times in total.Benefits: it's indeed cook nice and delicious meat, fish and veggies.Drawbacks:1.  Scratches on the surface of the rack, while we were cleaning with standard sponge.2. Panel is very hard to navigate and change the temperature, non responsive and you have to press button several times.3. preset recipes for cooking were never right, that' minor one.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 8, 2020
CommentsContent: I absolutely loved this thing up until a couple months ago that it started to short out or shut off for some reason and you would have to remove dinner and wait for it to cool completely before it would work again. Well now I bought this in august. Abd it is now may 8th. I do not feel spending this amount of money I should be having technical issues this soon. Great little air fryer when it works. But sadly I'm going to need to find a new one.

CommentsTitle: Easy to use and clean up is a breeze
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 14, 2020
CommentsContent: Happy I went with this model as it has a large basket. It is also very easy to clean!I have had to make adjustments to suggested cooking temps and times in the included cookbook because there are some variables to portion size, etc.Downside is that the flavor is still not equivalent to actual fried foods, and even after several uses there is a certain "aftertaste" unless the food is heavily seasoned.

CommentsTitle: Very easy to use and clean
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 13, 2019
CommentsContent: I am very pleased with this air fryer. The cookbook has lots of pictures and recipes that I am eager to try. The quick start guide makes it so you can pull the air fryer out of the box and use immediately. The touch screen is so easy to use and the baskets are easy to clean especially because they separate. We are a family of 7 and the 5.6 quart is a great size for us. I have had it a week and we have made, homemade fries, buffalo chicken, cooked carrots and mozzarella sticks. My children and husband have enjoyed it all. I have also already received an email from customer support asking for feedback and an offer to answer any questions I might have.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 20, 2020
CommentsContent: I’m in love with this air fryer! My husband bought it for me for my birthday. Today was our first day using it and we made personal pizzas and jalapeño poppers. Everything was delicious! The bacon on the jalapeño poppers was perfectly crisp. The product is very user friendly with clear instructions. Clean up was simple. We will definitely recommend this product to others. Can’t wait to try new recipes in our Cosori Air Fryer!

CommentsTitle: Shopping for an air fryer? Get the Cosori!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 19, 2019
CommentsContent: I chose the cosori air fryer because it looks sturdy. I like that it is not made of plastic and doesnt look cheap. I also purchased the assessory pack to go with it. The recipe book looks easy to follow and I can not wait to try it. I recommend getting the cosori because it is sturdy, easy to use, easy to clean and makes consistenly good food. So far I only cooked a few batches of ribs, but they came out really good!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 15, 2019
CommentsContent: This is the best thing I have ever purchased. Between this and my toaster oven I rarely ever cut the oven on anymore. It has exploded my love for baked potatoes. I have used it to make make flavorful juicy chicken breast. Most importantly, it has given me the power to make buffalo wings at home. Ive never made wings at home before because I am extremely picky about wing texture and flavor but this air fryer allowed me to produce slightly crispy on the outside while remaining flavorful and not dry on the inside wings in my own home and it was the best thing ever.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 25, 2020
CommentsContent: I really like this air-fryer! It has a good size capacity for food. The shape of the basket is more rectangle so it fits more food. It works well and cooks food pretty well.The reason I gave it a 4 star is because the basket does make a clunky noise when removing or putting it back in. Like you have to jolt it slightly  out. I did read that in others’ reviews. But it doesn’t bother me too much.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 28, 2019
CommentsContent: THIS AIR FRYER IS SUPERB!  I GOT THIS FOR A REALLY GREAT PRICE ALONG WITH PURCHASING ALL THE ADDED EXCESSORIES.  WHEN IT CAME IN I CLEANED AS INSTRUCTED AND USED IT THE VERY NEXT DAY TO AIR FRY CHICKEN. THE FRYER WORKED EXCEPTIONALLY WELL.  I HAD TO EXTEND THE COOKING TIME BECAUSE MY CHICKEN PIECES WERE QUITE LARGE.  IT IS EASY TO USE AND UNDERSTAND AND I AM SO HAPPY THAT I PURCHASED IT.  I WILL AGAIN USE IT THIS FRIDAY TO PREPARE BLACKENED SALMON.  NO GUILT!!  I WOULD RECEOMMEND PURCHASING THIS OVER ALL OTHER AIR FRYERS.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 14, 2019
CommentsContent: We are trying to eat healthier and this air fryer is helping. I like the size (5.8) and I like that the food basket is square, I think it makes it easier to fit food in. It's easy to use and the buttons make sense mostly. They take a little getting used to.  Basket fits in the dishwasher easily and it comes clean nicely. We've been making "sauteed" mushrooms and they come out amazing. Well worth the price.

CommentsTitle: ONLY GOT 11 USES OUT OF IT. TRASH
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 26, 2020
CommentsContent: So I ordered this air fryer on February 10 2020. When it arrived the buttons did not work and it could only be used via the WIFI connection. I recieved a rebate for it and I try to use it when ever I get the chance which inst often. Tonight I decided to air fry 8 chicken wing sections(8 wing dings). I updated my Vesync cosori app and I put them in set for 25minutes and continued to watch TV with my son. Not even 10 minutes later I hear a crash. I check in my kitchen and my airfryer tray and chicken is all over the floor.  The airfryer pressure was able to push the tray out because the locking mechanism is no longer working to latch it tightly closed. Vesync tracks my use and after 11 uses this thing is completely trash. I am so disappointed. Would not recommend!

CommentsTitle: Wanted an air fryer, got an air fryer.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 18, 2020
CommentsContent: While I haven't had an air fryer before so I can't say how it stacks up to other brands, I can say that this product has delivered exactly what I was expecting when looking for an air fryer.  Fries come out okay and wings cook awesome.  It's pretty convenient too.  I make chicken strips all the time in it right before I go to work.  Been fun experimenting with putting different foods in it, like flaky biscuits and cookies.  Those didn't come out so great but it was still entertaining.  The basket is easy to clean, it comes apart and is machine wash safe. Holds a good amount of food too. Cooking has been consistent and it hasn't shown any sign of breakage yet. Used it almost constantly for a whole day making appetizers on New Year's and it kept up just fine. I've been more than happy with my purchase, especially for the price. Would reccomend.

CommentsTitle: Do not purchase. Fails on first use for over temperature
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 20, 2019
CommentsContent: Failed halfway through first use. Display flickered twice then shut down. Reset after 30 minutes. Seems to be a recurring problem with over temperature sensing.

CommentsTitle: Wonderful product and excellent customer service
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 25, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased this product because many of my friends had been singing the praises of using an air fryer for healthier food, and I am so glad I did! Not only am I able to cook many of our favorites in a healthier manner, but I have been able to teach my 10 y/o grandson to use the fryer to prepare food. He is so proud of himself and I don’t have to worry and hover over him while he’s playing chef. After a year ( 2 weeks over) of use, we did lose 2 of the screws from the basket, but when I contacted customer service to see if I could purchase replacements, they went above and beyond to make sure my little chef could continue cooking! I cannot say enough about how wonderful they were.....

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 22, 2019
CommentsContent: I am amazed at how well it cooks food, either fresh or frozen. I have done chicken, burgers, veggies, fries and pizza. Reheating pizza that is in the fridge is amazing, better than when first brought home. This is an amazing machine, if you are thinking about it and aren't sure, let me tell, just do it!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 22, 2021
CommentsContent: I have had this for a while now and although I believe it cooks ok, there are some design flaws.  Worst being if you try to pull the draw out slightly to turn food around, be prepared for the draw to fully slide out onto the floor.  There is nothing that holds the draw in place when not fully locked in, so if you open it partially  be prepared for it to fall off the counter and onto the floor.  Second is washing it.  I don't have a dishwasher so I have to clean it the old fashioned way which is rather difficult because of the vented sides. But my revert back to main main complaint that the draw falls out and my has become so bent from falling that I have to use a screwdriver to release the basked from the main tray

CommentsTitle: Why didn't I get this sooner?
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 16, 2020
CommentsContent: Did my research and this was one of the top rated brands for air fryers. It was on sale so I nabbed it at $96 USD.It's such a breeze to use. The buttons have a slight delay I think, but also I'm very impatient. Haha.There is a slight smell in the beginning like plastic, but it's not a big deal. it heats up fast, does its job and it looks sleek too. I love it!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 4, 2019
CommentsContent: I love this air fryer it has been a huge beneficial item to have in the kitchen. It is very large and holds a very large quality of food. It is great for cooking chicken wings steaks fries pretty much anything. The only thing that I do not like about this air fryer is the pre-heat button is different from the turn on button. Sometimes when you hit one button over the other he turns off the air fryer. So you must be careful to make sure that you are hitting the start button rather than the off button. They cleaned really well and is very low maintenance.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 4, 2021
CommentsContent: I am a newbie when it comes to air fryers but I was blown away by this one. No big manuals to read, just put food in and set temperature (or tap on the picture for the pre-set cooking times/temp). Chicken wings- delicious; Chicken breasts tasted like they came straight off of the grill and no fuss clean up- no greasy smell in my house! Hands down great air fryer!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 6, 2020
CommentsContent: The instructions state to shake basket when cooking (making sure not to press the release button). We tried several times to make sure we weren't doing something wrong but when the basket is hot it releases when shaking causing a seriously dangerous situation. The basket does not release when it is not hot. I would not recommend this air fryer. Everything else was good though. Bummer....

CommentsTitle: Excellent product and loved the customer service!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 23, 2020
CommentsContent: This was in my wish list for awhile and I finally decided to get it. Totally LOVE it. Fish and other food tastes great even without oil for frying. I thought the taste would suffer but I have been happy with it and the food isn’t weighed down by grease. AND I had some questions for Cosori customer service - they were the best! Decent customer service seems difficult to find these days but not with them. I will definitely buy from this brand again.

CommentsTitle: Could not be happier with this purchase
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 5, 2021
CommentsContent: No bull. This is an excellent air fryer.It is super easy to use and has changed my kitchen completely. I mostly use it for heating frozen Garlic toast, tater tots and frozen fries for the fam. SO QUICK! And it has a huge capacity for the price. Great quality of construction- durable.But without even utilizing the full potential of its features, it is an amazing machine for the price. Full stop.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 13, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   I bought this one December 2019, it’s been six month by now. I don’t use it everyday, but as you can see on the video it’s already giving me problems. The operation pad sucks so much that it doesn’t work when you press on it.

CommentsTitle: My first air fryer and it works great!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 28, 2020
CommentsContent: This is my first air fryer and it works great! 11 simple presets and easy adjustments for recipes you find online. Comes with a one year warranty but if you register it within two weeks of purchase you get a two year warranty. The 5.8 quart capacity is nice and I wouldn't want anything smaller. It has 1,700 watts of cooking power, cleans easily, sleek look and well made. I highly recommend this product and merchant.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 14, 2020
CommentsContent: This fryer lasted a mere 8 months before it became garbage. Cooked food well however, the screws would constantly becomes loose on the basket. Easy to tighten so wasn't a huge bother. But now the basket won't click in anymore, in the last month we've had to really give it a good shove to click in. Tonight the basket literally shot out of the air fryer onto my floor. I can't believe I spent this much money on something that didn't even last a year.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 22, 2019
CommentsContent: I'd wanted an air fryer for a long time, but was nervous I wouldn't actually like it and would regret spending the money. But I have not regretted this for one second. I love this thing! It is amazing all the things you can cook and here and they're so delicious! Plus it's super easy to clean up, which had been another concern of mine. I absolutely recommend this

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 6, 2019
CommentsContent: So far, I've only made chicken wings with this machine.  Best chicken wings I've had in a very long time.  Absolutely amazing tasting and simple to make.  Cleanup is super simple too as the basket is dishwasher safe.  I can fit about 8 wings in there and cook them in 30 min.  I tried to make 20 wings at once, but they took nearly an hour and they weren't quite as good.  So it is possible in a pinch, but I recommend making fewer at a time.

CommentsTitle: Do not use for more than 20 minutes
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 1, 2020
CommentsContent: I used this product many times over a period of 8 months, the very first time I used it to cook three batches of food, total time 45 minutes, the handle melted off.

CommentsTitle: Control pane was not working properly in less than 6 months
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 13, 2020
CommentsContent: After reading several comments about the unresponsive buttons of this machine, as one of the unfortunate owners, I have to give this air fryer an honest review - I do not recommend this product. Unresponsive control pane, thin metal, poor coating and stains hardly come off no matter how long you have soaked the tray in warm soapy water or regardless how long you have tried to wipe away the oils with a sponge.Thankful that I have got a refund but still, the tax has not been refunded.

CommentsTitle: Love it, love it, love it. Get one today, don't wait
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2021
CommentsContent: This is the best appliance in the world. You can cook everything with it.Get it today, don't wait.You can replace your oven, toaster oven, toaster. Amazing.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 12, 2021
CommentsContent: This is the easiest/best appliance we have ever purchased! In the first week we made catfish, egg rolls, hamburgers, shrimp, onion rings, and even grilled cheese sammies! How did we live without it?! My husband ASKS to make supper as it always turns out great! We did shop around for different models, but this particular one was "Amazon's Best Choice". You can't go wrong with that! We are EXTREMELY satisfied with this machine; looks great, too!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 22, 2019
CommentsContent: Ok, so I'm the type of person who has to research for weeks and read a thousand reviews before I buy a producr. After driving my self crazy, having the price going up along the way and trying to decide which model to buy when I decided on a brand, "Phillips" way to many models, very confusing, I switched gears and bought the 5,8 quart Cosori  because of the size and price , more than $100 less, and I'm very happy I did. First off I'm not an oven person, I grill and anything I oven, fries, egg rolls, and any frozen products just tastes blah. But when I use this air fryer its awesome and it's so easy. Preheat, through in stuff, press the frozen button, flip or shake when it tells you another beep, done 100% better than an oven and way faster. It's easy to clean and it's just great! I love it!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 2, 2020
CommentsContent: The buttons don’t work. The buttons don’t work. One maybe two pre-sets are available if you crush you fingers to get them going it’s great ! So handy. If you want to do actual times cooking that has to be to a temp and not just warmed up, maybe try another brand

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 29, 2019
CommentsContent: Saw plenty similar for much higher price. Glad I chose this one and saved money. So far everything I have tried cooking with it has come out great. All the texture & taste or deep fried without all the grease. Chicken fingers, fries, tots & hash brown patties all cooked up golden brown & crispy with great taste. Easy enough to clean up. The cooking area all comes out and can be placed in a dishwasher. Invest in a couple of cans of spray on cooking oil and you can keep your grandkids happy without feeding them fast food crap.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2021
CommentsContent: We bought this for Christmas for friends. They don’t use the wifi feature but they love it!! They love it so much that we bought the Cosori without wifi and use it daily. In fact we have taken ours to their house so we could run them both because we prefer it to using the oven. Definitely among the best kitchen purchases we’ve made. I absolutely LOVE how well vegetables come out and how quickly. We have only had it for a month and have enjoyed several meals we have not tried before. I have read a lot of reviews on Facebook about the handle. No complaints here but I can see how easily it would break over time. The cosori Facebook page is worth logging into while your getting used to using an air fryer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 21, 2021
CommentsContent: Yes yes yes. I have also been cast under the magical air fryer spell. This thing is sooooo convenient and quick for making food. I work long hours and don’t feel like a labor intensive meal prep at night and this machine has changed my diet. All features are preset and easy and bc it turns off when it’s done, it’s safe. Highly recommend.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 7, 2020
CommentsContent: I love this! Bought this during quarantine because I wanted to eat wings and fries for some sense of normalcy. Great product and would recommend. Food is tasty and does not dry out. Only food I had trouble with was porkchops. They cooked nice but seemed a bit dry. Just wish the fryer was bigger HOWEVER its a nice fit on the counter and doesn't take much space. Food cooks quickly so don't leave it too long lol. Made some teriyaki wings that were bomb!! Now I'm not afraid to cook for the bf to impress him lol

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 9, 2020
CommentsContent: We bought this Cosori Jan 4 and yesterday it quit while in the middle of cooking hamburgers!!  Before it quit working, i would have given this product a 5 star on all accounts.  It was easy to clean, cooked food evenly, big enough for family of 3 and was AWESOME!!  Now - i am without an Air Fryer and a little upset that it only lasted 5 months!Burnt to a crisp.......:-(

CommentsTitle: Best purchase in the last year
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 28, 2021
CommentsContent: This is the second air fryer I purchased. The first one was from another company and no where near as nice as this one. It's big enough for anything I want to make and clean up is a breeze.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 16, 2020
CommentsContent: There’s definitely a learning curve but I have found that my food gets really crispy even without the cooking spray addition the user manual recommends, which I love! The parts that get dirty are dishwasher safe which is great because it would be a nightmare to hand wash after every use! It is quite a bit larger than I anticipated so it’s been hard to find a storage area in my kitchen and it takes up a fair amount of counter space. I have been enjoying trying different foods in it and getting great crispy results; last night I made crispy “carrot bacon”! It’s a cool kitchen addition if you’re a crispy food lover!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 10, 2021
CommentsContent: DO NOT GET THIS!! Buy something else. I brought this after researching different types of fryers. This was up there. The first time I used it went ok and took 40 minutes to fry some chicken tenders. Next we tried frozen Fries and we ended up using our oven. This past Sunday we thought we could do some wings. The 1st batch of 12 went ok but took 1 hour and I still ended up baking them. The 2nd batch after 1 hour was completely raw we had to fry them in a pan and it was only 6, so no over crowding. I’ve used this a total of 3 times and each time it has failed. My daughter is going to get me a new one. One that was better rated than this thing. Now I’m not sure what to do with this. But don’t buy this what so ever.

CommentsTitle: Made me Fatter cuz my Wife cooks more now
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 5, 2020
CommentsContent: This was supposed to make me thinner but my wife uses it so much I think I’m actually fatter now lolMy wife loved this gift and uses it all the time, even my kids use this thing. I don’t use it because i don’t cook indoors much but I still give it 5 stars due to the results I’ve consumed out of it.

CommentsTitle: Too long to cook than it claims
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 19, 2020
CommentsContent: I got the WiFi model but didn't use the Wifi. We first tried the french fries using fresh potatoes. Followed their recipe and instruction. The fries seemed like steamed after 28 minutes, then we cooked for another 15 minutes, still they were limp and soft. I tried frozen fries too but they were the same. Then we tried to cook a brussels sprout following their recipe that calls for 5 minutes of preheating and 8-10 minutes of air frying. The brussels sprout were uncooked so I gave another 15 minutes, they seemed cooked but not crispy at all so we put them in oven to get a bit crispy. The whole process took about 40 minutes. It's lot easier to just roast them.If you want to use it, don't expect to get crispy foods and figure out how to use it in combination with other means of cooking to get the flavor and taste you want.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 14, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this product in May to replace a cheaper air fryer that had given up on me. I searched and thought the Corsi had some nice features and good reviews, so I took a chance on it. It worked great for a month or so then its buttons lost functionality. As of right now, I cook everything at 177 degrees Celcius in 15 minute or less intervals. I do this because the touch screen does not work no matter how hard or gentle I press the buttons. I can't change the temperature, time, or scale. I saw that a number of customers had this same issue. I really like having an air fryer. I work a lot and it's good to be able to whip up dinner for myself and my child without much effort. I will not purcahse another one of these. I think I will just go to Target and see what they have to offer. Cheers to the people with functioning Corsi air fryers but if you're still in the market ther there are other options.

CommentsTitle: I use it all the time
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 8, 2020
CommentsContent: I have many kitchen gadgets.  I buy them for my wife, but they're really for me (JK).  We have twin 3 year olds - aka, lots of chicken nuggets.  They cook so quickly and taste great.  I eat a ton more vegetables now, because you can literally wash them and put them in whole.  Peppers, onions, squash, OKRA (the best).  I made chicken wings, they were awesome.  Love this thing.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 12, 2020
CommentsContent: Space-effective, works as advertised, results range from ok to great. Setting time and temperature is more effort than it should be (it apparently can't store settings for commonly used recipes and there is no numerical keypad so you have to press the up and down key a million times)

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 3, 2021
CommentsContent: This is very easy to use and clean.  We have a family of 7 so someone is using it every day.  It is now easy to have a vegetable (or french fries!) with every meal.  Kids use it to heat pizza rolls.  Have cooked breaded chicken breasts and also wings.  Bread and cook pork or diced chicken for Chinese dishes.  WiFi works but I am not sure I will ever use my phone to turn it on across the kitchen.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 24, 2019
CommentsContent: This is the best kitchen purchase I have made. I have tried many things on the menu and every dish came out perfect. Ribs, chicken nuggets, chicken wings, crispy tofu, ... Everyone loves the meals. The best part is that I don’t have to be at the stove anymore. All I do is to marinate the food and drop them into the basket. Finally an easy way to cook healthy and delicious meals for the family. What’s not to love?

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 18, 2021
CommentsContent: First experience with an air fryer. Did some experimenting with small portions over the past four weeks. So far, easy clean-up, and very good food flavor. For example, potatoes cook up crispy, golden, but meaty inside - very good! A little big for the counter yet easy clean-up versus cleaning up after a frying pan. Good purchase and recommended.

CommentsTitle: One of the best items I ever purchased!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 3, 2019
CommentsContent: I love everything about this air fryer. I can enjoy healthy eating and have some of the things I miss. Baking just wasn't making me happy. I have been on keto for a couple of months and had some garlic/parmesan chicken wings today. They were crispy on the outside and juicy inside...so delicious! It is so simple to use and cleanup is easy. So far I love everything about it! The preset buttons are wonderful and it looks so nice on my counter. I wish I had purchased this months ago! Very happy with my purchase!!!

CommentsTitle: Simple to use.  Easy to warm up thanksgiving meals after the fact.  It just works.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 1, 2020
CommentsContent: All the little buttons for default items you cook make it so easy to use.  I've used it for searing potatoes and reheating food.  But see so many other uses that I want to try.  Great for melting cheese on broccoli.  It does come with a cook book with a lot of ideas and a nice note on the box cover when you open the box saying 'Happy Cooking!'

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 24, 2020
CommentsContent: I loved the price of this air fryer.  Our food has cooked nicely.  However, the basket and handle is not easy to use . I had another air fryer that I replaced with this Cosori as the old one's coating began peeling. It was much more functional.  The worst part is that on several occasions, water puddles under the front.  This is not ok.  It should not be venting so that it is coming out of the bottom. I did not take pictures the first two times but it continues to pool water. I would not recommend this air fryer even for the price.  I will be returning it as defective.

CommentsTitle: This is well worth the extra $40 for the larger unit.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 12, 2019
CommentsContent: I had a cheaper smaller unit of a different make that the non-stick surface easily chipped off.  This unit is fantastic.  I have used it nearly every day with no signs of wear.  The keypad is easy to use and the pre-heat setting is a must.  Get the larger unit.  I cook pork chops and steaks with it although I do recommend using a digital thermometer for best internal temps.  This made French fries perfectly.  I make roasted veggies, corn, potatoes in it.  Much easier clean up than pan frying and less energy than an oven.  Always spray the interior with Canola cooking spray and clean up is quick.  I particularly like the square interior.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 19, 2020
CommentsContent: We love our air fryer. First meal was chicken thighs and they were just as good as the cast-iron skillet chicken cooked in butter that we usually have. Made chicken Parmesan last night and perfectly crispy. Using the air fryer is so much easier than firing up the oven! Very easy to clean and easy to use. Set up on the app and connection to Alexa devices was very simple. Highly recommend!

CommentsTitle: Great addition to any “set it and forget it” type of cook
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 1, 2019
CommentsContent: I got this for my mom as an early Christmas gift, I couldn’t wait until Christmas to give it to her because she had cash in hand ready to buy one, lol. So far she loves it! The touchscreen display and easy to understand buttons makes the entire experience easy from the most tech savvy in my family to those who aren’t too into technology. We haven’t tried to put the 5lb chicken in there to cook like it says you can but knowing her we’ll be testing it out.

CommentsTitle: I wish I would have never gotten this thing
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 2, 2020
CommentsContent: I asked my husband for an Air Fryer for Christmas and he bought me this one. I HATE IT!!! And wish it could be returned but I missed the return window by 2 freakin' days ugh! It either under cooks the meat or burn everything else. Buyer beware, why this had good reviews is beyond me.

CommentsTitle: Versatility reduced cooking time, ease of use.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2020
CommentsContent: This has become my favorite kitchen cooking appliance and these are the reasons why.  This cooks fresh meat, fresh vegetables and  many frozen food items you can buy in your local grocery store.  I have used several of the recipes with great success and have even cooked some of my own favorites.  This cooks food faster and cleaner (No splatter) than more traditional frying and oven baking methods.  Breakfast, lunch and dinners,this does it all.

CommentsTitle: It's pretty good with a couple of small issues
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 13, 2021
CommentsContent: It's pretty good.  The only annoying things I notice are that the tray pops out while cooking sometimes and you have to put it back in so the machine keeps cooking.  Changing the cook time takes a few more button presses than it should.  Otherwise, it cooks well and works fine.  I'd probably get a different one next time that had a better latching system though.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 19, 2020
CommentsContent: I love my Cosori Air Fryer! I mostly use my air fryer to make my french fries right now, but I have made bacon and even a burrito one time. A fantastic air fryer that cooks food evenly with minimal clean up. Especially for fries, it just as easy as running it under some hot water. When I cooked Bacon it did release a lot of grease, so clean up was a little more involved and required me to use hot water and a wash cloth to clean it up. All in all, I love this product and think you will too.

CommentsTitle: Works ok. Good size but pre selected cooking times off
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 24, 2020
CommentsContent: I had heard about air fryers for a while and picked this large sized well regarded one alhough the brand name meant nothing to me. I works fine. The biggest negative is the pre-set times by food type are way off. It overcooked the chicken badly. It way undercooked the fish. I suggest you experiment with these pre-sets then determine for your own use based on experienced what times work best for you.  Cleaning is easy. The functions are also easy to use.

CommentsTitle: crispy, tasty  food without the grease and fat
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 8, 2020
CommentsContent: Love the air fryer!  The size is a bit bigger than we need but it holds a lot and is easy to use and clean.  touch screen is great and takes the guess work out of many foods.  Pre-heating is suggested ( takes 5 minutes ) and I highly recommend to do that as your food can burn easier if you don't ( just like preheating an oven ).  Frozen french fries came out really crisp and browned without the grease.  Frozen wontons too.  Haven't cooked meat in it yet but it comes with a recipe book so will try some of them.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 9, 2019
CommentsContent: I was really really skeptical about purchasing this. You know how appliance fads go. But i have to say, I use it all the time! This will not just wind up hidden away in a cabinet. I keep it on the counter next to my stove. We'll see when the electric bill comes in but i do believe it will be lower. It cooks the exact same as my oven but only faster. You can adjust the temperature and time even if you use the preset modes. The preset modes are like a starting point for what you are cooking. Yup, this purchase is not one that i will be regretting.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 26, 2019
CommentsContent: Although I still have to navigate my way around adjusting temp/cook time, as not all packages contain air fryer instructions, it's pretty easy to use.  Flavors have been great and honestly, you wouldn't even know it was air fried!  The sound it makes when on, is one of the more quiet ones  I've heard.  Would definitely recommend.  My only issue so far has been trying to register this product for the bonus 12 month warrenty being offered through COSORI.  When I go through wesite (provided with product),  it goes directly to "403 FORBBIDDEN".  When I try to register it through Amazon Order History, the website has an error pop up that says "The system is under maintance, please try again later".

CommentsTitle: Touchscreen Doesn't Function Out of the Box
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 25, 2020
CommentsContent: Opened up and tried to use, half the buttons on the touch screen don't work. The touchscreen is generally very flimsy, cheaply constructed and if it did work, it would not likely last long. I did considerable research before ordering, very disappointed in this machine quality. Questioning the legitimacy of the review.s

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 26, 2019
CommentsContent: I absolutely love this thing!! Best kitchen gadget I've ever bought. I've made cornbread, hard boiled eggs, muffins, hamburgers, chicken wings and thighs. hotdogs, pizza, and of course french fries, tater tots among other goodies. Everything comes out great and I've only scratched the surface.... I have become an airfrying addict!🤣

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 12, 2021
CommentsContent: This is a very cheaply made product. After 2 months all the screws were falling out and I kept having had to screw back in. Last Sunday was the final straw. I was making chicken wings, and carefully pulled the basket out and the handle came completely off and I not have grease burns on my right foot. Total piece of junk I notified the company and demanded a full replacement of the air fryer. I will never buy anything from them again. Don’t waste your money . Didn’t even last 4 months. Garbage product

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 27, 2021
CommentsContent: I got a toaster oven style AF for Xmas, I hated it, took it back, bought another toaster oven style, hated it, took it back, and bought this one.I use this all the time, it has an extended warranty if you register it within 14 days, making it 2 years.Cleans easy, cooks everything like it's fried with little oil.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 21, 2020
CommentsContent: I think the problem with an "air fryer" is that you aren't literally frying, and so the illusion that you are eating delicious, healthier stuff is true in terms of healthier, but not nearly as delicious as frying something.  So my crockpot and oven and smoker will get a lot more duty than this thing.  Fad.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 6, 2020
CommentsContent: We’ve enjoyed using the Cosori Air Fryer, I wish it were larger but it is what it is, we’ll just have to deal with that.  The first thing we tried was the Pigs in Blanket, which turned out like pieces of charcoal.  I think the instructions said to cook at 400 degrees for 10 minutes, either the temp is too high or too long.  I tried 400 for 3 minutes which was perfect, so experiment.  Over all very happy.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 4, 2020
CommentsContent: 3-4qts too small, 8qt takes up too much counter space and puts off too much heat in your kitchen. The Cosori is well-made and sturdy. The square pan is so much better than a round pan. Detachable basket is a must. And I really love the additional pan liners they give you. Highly recommend!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 30, 2021
CommentsContent: I use this for Chicken, Fish, meat , shrimp, and all of it came out fantastic. What's great about this is everything was cooked perfectly and so easy to clean. I spray all my items that I want to air fry. I just make them as I always do , with breading and an egg mix and then I spray them and press the appropriate button for cooking that item.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2021
CommentsContent: I think this air fryer is great, I have cooked salmon, shrimp, grill cheese and a whole chicken all came out delicious juicy, crispy. My husband and I love it and have not used the stove all week. It's easy for my 17 year old to us for something quick before going to work. Really please, I think I will get the accessory kit to make cakes !

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 2, 2021
CommentsContent: Absolutely Loved the chicken wings (no oil, just salt, pepper, and garlic)... and mushrooms (lemon juice, garlic, salt & pepper)... French fries need a little work on timing not to get dried out... I appreciate the “shake” feature to remind you to turn items midway through cooking, as well as the preheat function. Clean up of the basket and it’s catch-bin is very easy, and the basket cools very quickly.Can’t wait to try many of the recipes in the included recipe book!

CommentsTitle: One of the best purchases of my life!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 2, 2019
CommentsContent: I don't know why I waited so long to get kne of these! It made my life so much easier. I'm a mother of 4 plus my husband and it is a God send! It's everything you would want for a kitchen aid. Easy to use, EASY to use, EASY TO USE! Makes amazing food quickly. I never thought you could make some of the thinks I've made with it. If you're on the fence it's time to hop over. This thing is for EVERYONE! Came with a cookbook too. It truly will be one of the best purchases of your life!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 20, 2019
CommentsContent: I purchased this one the first week of January and could not be more happy with the cooker and the food from it... I'm very disappointed in the fact I was going to buy a second one and in about 15  days the price had raised by $20.00  I like to keep all the products the same so once you know the controls each cooker works the same... At the new price point I'm not interested but would have likes a second cooker of the same brand... GL

CommentsTitle: Very satisfied with my Cosori 5.8 Air Fryer
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 9, 2019
CommentsContent: I just received this item earlier this week. Fast shipping which was great.  I’ve cooked two food items so far in this air fryer. Fried chicken wings and pork chops. They came out pretty good. Still learning, so 8 know I can do better once I use the fryer over time.  Cleanup was a breeze! Which is why I bought this air fryer, after reading owner’s reviews on how easy clean8ng this air fry was. I’ll be trying hamburgers, steaks, and ribs next, as well as some veggies.  Very happy with this purchase!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 20, 2020
CommentsContent: There are so many air fryers on the market, I was overwhelmed looking for one to buy. I pulled the trigger on the Cosori, and I'm so glad I did. The air fryer is perfect. I had a small issue with the product, and customer service was prompt, helpful, and exceeded all expectations.If you're on the fence or trying to pick which air fryer to purchase, you won't regret going with this one.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2020
CommentsContent: This air fryer is the best I've had so far. The takeaways are its a bit difficult to clean and you cant cook food according to the times provided in the book. I cooked chicken drumsticks at the temperature and time suggested by the manufacturer and the first batch was slightly burnt and the meat was a little dry. So for the next batch I took the chicken out 4 minutes earlier and it was very crispy, juicy and was thoroughly cooked.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 21, 2020
CommentsContent: I love this air fryer. The only thing is the material seems cheap. In May I purchased it multiple times I had to tighten the handle and the handle came off and melted a piece of it. I purchased the extended warranty since it’s digital it wouldn’t work anymore. The manufacturer is aware of this issue or something similar but they was out of handles and offered my a $25 amazon credit. After talking to them I contacted amazon and they were amazing. They offered a refund or a new air fryer. I took the air fryer and send it the next day. I love the build in alexia since I work from home I have her to preheat it before actually going on lunch. I’m thinking about buying a second one for backup. Make sure you purchased the extended warranty you will NEED it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 25, 2020
CommentsContent: We love fried foods, but don't like the mess or clean up or the health risks. This air fryer has made it quick and easy to cook a wide variety of foods with minimum fuss, clean up, or grease. It does a better job than a microwave at heating up many left overs as it does not seriously alter the texture and taste. Its very easy to use and comes with a very helpful book of recipes and instructions.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2020
CommentsContent: So far so good! I love my new SMART air fryer. The app and the device is super user friendly. Connecting to my home wifi was super easy. I have only cooked a few items and I am honestly impressed. The food isn’t dry, it cooks all the way through, and controlling it with my Alexa is awesome!!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 6, 2019
CommentsContent: We love this air fryer and use it daily. Especially love the shape as we can get 4 burgers or salmon patties in at a time without stacking them so they're well cooked all sides. This has become our go-to appliance.Update: We just bought another one, giving the first which still works great, to our daughter. This new one connects with Alexa so easily. Now we just say "Alexa, turn on Fryer (that's what we call it) to 400 degrees for 5 minutes.  Very happy with both of these machines for cooking and when it comes time to clean up.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 15, 2020
CommentsContent: This device would be relatively easy to use...if the touch display worked. Within a few minutes of setting it up, I found the touch control panel to be unusable and downloaded the (primitive) app.The app does the bare minimum--it does not offer noteworthy customization or complex custom presets. (It would not be difficult, from a software engineering perspective, to allow multiple temperature settings in one preset, so this is disappointing at best.)The screws on the basket handle required frequent tightening starting after the first month of using this. The product isn't complete garbage, but it wasn't worth the money.Clean up is actually very easy with the device, and the cooking method works as advertised, but I would still rather have gone with a more reputable brand (like I usually do these days). It's most unfortunate because this would have been my favorite kitchen appliance, had they finished the job. Another great idea ruined by shoddy craftsmanship and uninspired software development.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2021
CommentsContent: Received this air fryer for Christmas and we are enjoying it. We've only used it a few times so far, to reheat something and to make chicken wings. Will attempt more recipes as time goes on. It works well. Like any new appliance, it takes some getting used to. I'm in a group on Facebook with others who use this device and it's been helpful. Very happy I have this product!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 6, 2020
CommentsContent: There is not enough to say about the world of air frying! I have used this gem at least once a week; whereas most other cooking appliances are used once every couple of months (crockpot, pressure cooker, etc.). That has earned a prime spot on my kitchen counter.The recipe book that comes with this one is great. For those who like salmon, there is an excellent recipe for you.As far as features, this fryer has all of the features that most others have on the market. The only annoying thing I've noticed is I'm still getting used to the button settings. If you do the wrong sequence, or press the power button like I do, then it will reset and you have to start over. For some reason my brain is trained to hit power instead of the play/pause button.All-in-all such a great investment for everyone's kitchen!

CommentsTitle: Cooking is NO longer a CHORE, its FUUUNNNN!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 7, 2019
CommentsContent: This air-fryer has inspired my 14-year-old daughter to cook!! What more can I ask for? Aside from the fact that this air fryer cuts down cooking time tremendously, what I love most about the product is the cookbook. The recipes use ingredients that everyone should have in the pantry and they take little to no time to prepare. We have worked through half the book and most all of the recipes have been flavorful. We are in love with the air fryer, the cookbook, the clean up time is awesome and it has allowed for my family to bond more in the kitchen. Its like the new toy that everyone wants to play with. It's totally awesome.

CommentsTitle: COSORI Red Air Fryer - Mat red color should be glossy red
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 10, 2020
CommentsContent: Would have loved to keep this product but the mat red finish color should have been a glossy red finish color instead.  The product appears to be glossy red in one of their advertised products video.  Willing to try the more updated black with app function.  However; i did purchase the COSORI air fry toaster/grill oven - and I already Live it.  I can’t wait to try it out - it is similar to the Breville toaster/grill oven and will place an update soon.

CommentsTitle: First day, and won't turn on. [edited]
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 16, 2019
CommentsContent: Getting ready to use it for the first time... Power on. Timer set, temp set. Hit start. Then the display goes blank. No power.Tried to call support but they're not available over the weekend. Will update review later.Edit: Received replacement, and I've used it a few times. So far, completely satisfied with product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 21, 2021
CommentsContent: I use this for everything from frozen eggrolls to brats and more... it literally replaced using my oven to cook for two people because it uses less energy overall... Easy to clean, and I can even pre-heat it by voice command using my Alexa...  My instapot is on the shelf but my air fryer stays on the counter I use it that much.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 10, 2019
CommentsContent: Ditch the microwave and get yourself one of these! This is an excellent machine. There isn't anything it doesn't do! I made chicken wings within 3 hrs of unboxing it and they came out perfectly! Even garlic toast was crooked to perfection! Shaking and turning is a must for even browning when making certain items and the preset buttons alert you when it's time. Even my 16yo said he wants one of his own when he moves out...lol  My only reason for giving four stars is that the basket is hard to pull out because of how it snaps into place.
