Other than that, my kitchen will never be without one again.

CommentsTitle: Tell a friend to buy one!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 7, 2019
CommentsContent: I bought for my girlfriend because I got felt sorry for her, seeing her have to slam the tub in on the crappy Power Air  Fryer she go TV off QVC.With this machine you an close it as smoothly as shutting the door on a Mercedes. Really!!As with all these things the markings on it sucks. No words, only mysterious symbols!!! I'm going to remedy this screwup by  having my signmaker-buddy print a custom (worded) legend on white vinyl and put it on the front of the fryer.But compared to the "Power Air Fryer" this thing is a Cadillac.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2019
CommentsContent: Last Christmas we bought an air fryer and it was a disaster. We had given up on the whole hype of the air fryer. Throughout the year, everyone raved over their different air fryers, so we decided to search the market and try again. Saw this one on Amazon and the glowing reviews and decided to give it a try.This thing is AWESOME! I’ve used it everyday since purchase. I’ve even put frozen dinner rolls in there, ready in 5 minutes. Definitely recommend. Also downloaded the app and it’s easy to set up/use. Haven’t quite figured out why I need the app though. So save a few dollars and get the one without the app. Overall, LOVE my new air fryer! Definitely worth it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 22, 2019
CommentsContent: MY HUSBAND SAID THIS WAS THE BEST PURCHASE OF A KITCHEN APPLIANCE I EVER MADE, AND I AGREE! WE COOK ALMOST EVERYTHING IN IT. MAKES THE ABSOLUTE BEST FRIED CHICKEN, (NEEDS NO FLOUR); BEST STEAKS, BACON, HOTDOGS, SAUSAGE, RIBS, PORKCHOPS, ETC. YOU NAME IT. I LOVE IT. SAVES SO MUCH TIME IN THE KITCHEN. EASY, EASY CLEANUP. REALLY WORTH THE MONEY.

CommentsTitle: I can't believe how awesome this airfryer is!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 3, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this for my fiance as a Christmas present to use at his house...I borrowed it for a week to try it at my house and wouldn't let him take it back to his place because I loved it so much! I ended up ordering him a new one for his house. Best tater tots, great for warming tortilla chips, chicken nuggets to die for, veggies!!!, chicken is moist and delicious...the list goes on and on. So easy to use and not too large to leave out on counter. 5 stars for sure!

CommentsTitle: Time efficient. Easy to clean. It cooks great!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 22, 2019
CommentsContent: I love this air fryer! Understand this is pretty much like a small super efficient oven. The things that would take me like an hour to cook in oven, it only takes like 20 minutes in the air fryer. Try beef meatballs and spray them with olive oil PAM. They turn out AMAZING! Super easy to clean and it’s very practical for making meals. Probably not suitable for larger families since you won’t be able to fit a lot of food in there. But it works great for my husband and me. I make dinner and get enough food left for lunch the next day for myself and hubby.

CommentsTitle: Was great, now not so much.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 7, 2020
CommentsContent: LOVEEEEE IT. I finally got rid of my toaster oven and use this thing every day. Highly recommend.****update a year later. I bought this 12/26/19. First six months, amazing. Now, almost a year old this thing still works, but is very frustrating. The buttons don’t recognize touch anymore, and the BIGGEST complaint is that after about 4 minutes the drawer dislodges and stops frying until pushed back in.I feel like this was great to begin with, but ultimately disappointed.

CommentsTitle: Great fryer but buttons do not work well
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 27, 2020
CommentsContent: We love this air fryer and anyone with kids or want to save time needs one!  But the touch screen does not work well.  Some buttons are better than others but it is so frustrating when I want to adjust the temp or time.  I end up having it to do in the app.  My sister got this same one a few months after I got mine and hers is worse.  After a few tries, I can get some of the buttons to work but she is often not even to get it to do anything.  Touch screen design sucks but the fryer itself works well.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 7, 2020
CommentsContent: I love this air fryer but it did not last long. I bought this on June 18, 2019. It started acting up like keep turning on and off before June of this year but I did not call Cosori regarding the issue till yesterday 8-6-2020. I was told that the warranty expired year of purchased. For anyone who purchased or planning of buying an air fryer make sure you register your product for a 1 year extended warranty.Update - as mentioned earlier my warranty expired from the vendor fortunately I used Amazon Credit Card and I have an automatic 1 year extended warranty. Thank you Amazon  for an amazing customer service support. I just received my brand new replacement Cosori.

CommentsTitle: May Have Gotten a Lemon But Won’t Purchase Another
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 17, 2020
CommentsContent: I was so excited to get my air fryer and was SO disappointed when I plugged it in and it wouldn’t turn on. The power button lit up, I went to push it and nothing. After messing with it for a bit, I finally got it to turn on but then half of the buttons wouldn’t even work. My sister was over and she tried and nothing. What a disappointment. I bought this specifically because of all the raving reviews and my friend has it and loves it. Guess I got a lemon. I returned it the next day and don’t plan on buying another.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 24, 2019
CommentsContent: This was my first time using this air fryer and my first experience. I cooked 8 bone-in wings using the chicken setting. There was still room for 6 more wings single layered. 380 degrees for 25 minutes didnt seem like enough but my first time I trusted the setting. I faced them all skin up (4 drummies, 4 wings) and sprayed them with olive oil cooking spray. These came out with the skin brown and crispy just like deep fried. They werent as juicy but not at all dry. This will be my wing maker this football season. I'll try to update how durable it is.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 14, 2021
CommentsContent: This has replaced our microwave, convection oven, toaster, and more. Costs less to operate and does a great job cooking food evenly. We use ours several times a day

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2020
CommentsContent: We use this all the time.  Ribs, chicken, pork chops, salmon, homemade French fries, and all different kinds of fresh veggies come out perfect and delicious.  Time in the kitchen is greatly reduced due to fast cooking times and super simple clean up.  I’m not usually a kitchen gadget person and will typically buy something, use it when I first get it and never touch it again.  This item however, is used over and over again and makes an appearance  almost nightly at dinner.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 21, 2019
CommentsContent: My first attempt to make the blueberry scone from their book recipe - came out nice but I’d add way more sugar next time. I added 3 more minutes in top of the 12’ asked on the recipe. In general it takes a little longer to get the Desiré results in wings or ribs but I think this is very personal. The 5.8 is Big enough  for a family of 4 and Im planing in recipes that is airfryer base and doesn’t require stove at all - can’t wait to try my own recipes! Higher recommended!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 18, 2019
CommentsContent: Not an indictment on this particular model / brand, but air fryers just dont do as well as they advertise.  Stuff tastes fine, but looks bad.  Very hard to get anything to come out evenly cooked or looking appetizing.  As far as brands go, this one is fine, works well.  Just takes up a lot of room for whats looking like very little use.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 4, 2020
CommentsContent: First week I've had it, and I've had little complaints. Easy to use/start with the user guide. The basket is not the easiest to clean , but that's nit-picking. A robust recipe book comes with it: I've made fried fish, chicken parm (perfect), baked egg, bacon (perfect for draining grease & great finish), and french fries (sadly a little burnt using their suggested time).

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 21, 2019
CommentsContent: New to airfryer but so far it's great. Clean up is easy. Using machine is pretty self explanatory, although the manual has helpful hints. We haven't experienced too much with recipes yet but everything that we would normally put in microwave for our toddler (chicken nuggets, pizza rolls, etc) we've been air frying instead and it comes out crispy. We also used it to eat up leftovers (fries, eggrolls, etc) which is nice because it's not soggy.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 2, 2020
CommentsContent: I've had this product since April 2020.  Since then it has lost some screws holding the basket together. It's now a safety issue. It also has began to leak smoke as it cooks.After my review COSORI tried to make it right.  So good customer service.  They offered new machine/fix but it wasn't worth the time.  This is an entry level air-fryer.  You get what you pay for with air-fryers.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 6, 2020
CommentsContent: Smaller meals are fast and consistent. I kept notes on everything I cooked with suggestions for improving it next time. This thing is really consistent and versatile! Every few uses, I recommend letting it cool down, lay it on it's back and wipe down the burner and interior with damp paper towels. Be conscientious about not scratching the nonstick basket and pan. They clean so easily with a soft brush or sponge. Just being fairly thin sheet metal, I often have time to wash them before the food is cool enough to eat. If this air fryer only lasts a year, I'll buy another one. Yeah, I like it and use it that much.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 3, 2020
CommentsContent: before I bought my first air fryer I did my research  and this one is one of the best one and I did choose right its wow amazing i love it its easy use and your dinner is ready quick I'm so happy with my purchase and its a good price as well everywhere i would go it was 120 150 and amazon has a great deal 85 and its the best air fryer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 19, 2020
CommentsContent: This item smokes a lot when cooking or reheating things . I was reheating some chicken fingers and all of a sudden my house is Smokey . Why do it do that

CommentsTitle: Cheaply Made for a Large Sticker Price
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 20, 2021
CommentsContent: I was hoping that this airfryer would stand the test of time when I ordered it. The "touchscreen" is a plasticy film that is really just confusing to use. They offer an app mainly centered at using the preheat feature. With the preheat feature on the app, you will have to click to confirm on the actual airfryer unit before it starts, therefore, the app is really just useless. There are many modes you can click on the fryer which do no different than just manually setting the temperature and time. The fryer cooks food just fine, like any regular one.Overall, this product seemed cheaply made for a high price. They tried to overcomplicate things on the interface which causes a clutter of useless buttons.

CommentsTitle: The coating in the basket started peeling out withing 7 months of use. Don't Buy!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 13, 2020
CommentsContent: The coating in the basket started peeling out withing 7 months of use.I have contacted the support let's see how they handle this,Honestly i wasn't expecting for air fryer this expensive.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2020
CommentsContent: I used this 2 times.  Both times it was miserable to clean.  After both cleanings there were white dots everywhere?  After the second cleaning both the basket and tray would not come clean and the coating was coming off .

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 26, 2020
CommentsContent: I like that it takes less time to cook my food without all the grease.  Although the tray is small, it forces you to not to be able to cook all your food at once.  In the end, the cook time ends up the same but less fat than fried food.  That was important to me.  My 15 year old uses is every day to cook her lunch vs. me having to make it for her.  Bonus! I will now eat more of a variety of food with this!! So far, I really like it.  I've read reviews that it's hard to clean but I think it has been very easy.  That includes cheese sticks.  Spraying with olive oil beforehand is helpful.  I recommend this item.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 20, 2019
CommentsContent: My husband fell in love with air fryers because of an Airbnb we recently stayed at.  He makes pretty much everything in it.  Bacon, chicken (thighs, breast, nuggets, legs), french fries. If there’s not a recipe in the little book that comes with it, he will find on.  The kids are almost as devoted as he is.  It’s easy to clean and easy to program..

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 9, 2019
CommentsContent: I purchased the Cosori Air Fryer on Amazon Prime day since I thought the price was great....Little did I know that my wife and I were going to use it on a daily basis. If I would have know earlier I would have purchased it at the regular price. I love fish, but we did not like to prepare it because of the house smell in the regular stove, however with our Cosori Air fryer, we just take it out to our patio and cook the fish outside. For the rest of the foods, the come out much healthier since you don't have to use to much of the oils....we actually just spray a little avocado oil and follow some of the recipes in the book that is included with the product. Ideal for 2 people..... Bon Appetit!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 13, 2019
CommentsContent: What took so long to get this product.  Can't wait to try everything in it.  We have done fries, mozzarella sticks (the best) and corn dogs.  Everything is crispy on the outside, moist on the inside, perfect like they are supposed to be.  Clean up is Amazing.  dump crumbs, wipe out.  DONE.  I gave 4 stars because the basket/drawer is a little hard to get in and out.  seems to stick a little with a little extra tug.  But still well worth it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2021
CommentsContent: This has made my life so much easier. Really, food cooks quickly.  No mess, easy clean up.  I have made an entire dinner using this air fryer.  I have even tested cooking frozen foods in there.  I have no regrets purchasing this.  The basket is large so it is easy to fit 4 boneless chicken breast in there at the same time!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 17, 2019
CommentsContent: I have had three air fryers since this past Xmas. The first one was Cook's, the one they advertised on TV, it had a 30 day warranty, it lasted 4 months, the second one I bought was a smaller one called Go Wise, so far so good, I love the black finish, it was much better than the gray finish the Cook's had. I decided to buy another but I wanted a bigger one to cook a whole chicken with. This air fryer is terrific to clean up, comes off so easy and it has a black finish. So, I tried today to cook the whole chicken but I shouldn't of rubbed it with olive oil, it smoked up my kitchen from the oil, next time I am going to just put spices on it, the chicken tasted great even though I smoked up the whole house. I love the warranty and the customer service I got when I called, they are happy to help you out. I would of given 5 starts but 4.5 because the fan is quite noisy, my husband has to raise the voice on the TV to hear it, sounds like an airplane. I have cooked many item in it so far and I highly recommend buying it even with the noise, you get used to it. I would buy this again if it broke, just love how the food comes out fast & crispy. The cook book is real nice too.

CommentsTitle: It's now my go to appliance
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 27, 2020
CommentsContent: I absolutely love this. I was hesitant to jump on the air fryer wagon but boy am I glad I did. 1st of all, I ordered it and received it in the same day, I mean that was Amazing! Anyway, back to the review. It is so easy to use and clean. It came with a very easy to read instruction booklet an a cookbook. I love it and highly recommend purchasing it. You won't  be disappointed!

CommentsTitle: Takes the guesswork out of air frying
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 30, 2019
CommentsContent: This is my second air fryer and a real upgrade.  Love the programmed buttons. Good instructions and easy to learn.  Impressed with the cookbook that comes with it.  I like that you can separate the basket before you take your food out  and only the food comes out, not the drippings.  By all means join the Corsori Cooks Community on Facebook.  Lots of useful recipes and tips from other users and the Cosori chefs.  My new favorite toy!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 5, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased another air fryer before this one and returned it to Walmart. This is the one to own. Easy to use,easy to clean and make the best chicken wings and thighs. French fries and tater tots are super crisp. Highly recommend.After 2 months still rate 5 stars!!

CommentsTitle: Lucked out! Believe this is one of best Air Fryers!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 5, 2019
CommentsContent: So many things to love about the Corsori. First of all, very quiet. Love the digital controls, which have lots of options yet are not complicated. Materials seem high quality. Shell of unit does not get overly hot.Capacity of the 5.8 is great and the square shape makes it able to fit more than a rounded shape! It takes a while to learn how to cook various items and on how fast your particular air fryer cooks various items. Love this air fryer!

CommentsTitle: Excellent customer service and product support
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 12, 2021
CommentsContent: Great, easy to use air fryer.  I’m amazed at how good food turns out using this appliance.Had a problem with the handle after only two months of use. One screw came loose and the other two fell out, causing one screw to be lost. I contacted Cosoris. They were very responsive and sent me a whole new basket I only asked for a few screws (which they couldn’t send to me for some reason).  Excellent customer service and product support!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 30, 2019
CommentsContent: If you like the idea of roasting a whole chicken with crispy skin on the top and bottom, this is the machine for you. I use this for almost everything frozen like eggrolls, burritos, chicken nuggets, and French fries. It's so easy and convenient to use, I have almost retired my microwave. The removable basket and basin are really easy to clean having a Teflon coating. There is a learning curve though. I first sprayed my whole thawed chicken with olive oil in order for the seasoning to stick. I soon learned you could fill a kitchen with smoke pretty easy if you don't take some precautions. Putting a little water in the basin and using an oil with a higher smoke point fixed the problem for me.  everything else goes straight from the freezer to the basket and out hot and crispy. I struggled with which air fryer to buy, so I'm glad a read the reviews on this item first. I have never written a review on a product until now, and I hope this helps.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 4, 2020
CommentsContent: I REALLY like how the food turns out. It does exactly what it says. We are vegetarians & eat a good bit of freezer meat alternatives, as well as egg rolls & things of that nature.  I can fit 4 “burger” patties in the basket at once.What I don’t like is how LOUD it is. The fan is louder than my exhaust fan. Also, my oven is split style with a toaster feature on top that produces a very similar result with a much larger capacity.

CommentsTitle: Easy to use; cooks well; cleans easily with a rinse and microfiber.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 6, 2020
CommentsContent: Very nice unit. 5,5 liter basket is good size. Perfect frozen breaded fish; very good roast vegetables; good french fries, but getting the right amount of oil on the raw fries is necessary to learn with experience. Controls are simple and accurate. One can change timing and temperature in the middle of cooking. But the ease of cleaning is very, very nice!

CommentsTitle: Great new addition to the kitchen
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 10, 2020
CommentsContent: First time air fryer purchase and I wanted white to match my kitchen appliances. So glad I purchased this it works great frozen food is crispy in 10 minutes. I love that there’s no long preheat like an oven makes it super fast. Food gets crispy just like a fryer would with less greasiness. Haven’t had any troubles with it and use it daily. Good size for a family of 4.

CommentsTitle: How quick and was it was to set up and use
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 19, 2019
CommentsContent: I was so excited to get this delivered the other day. I’ve been wanting an air fry for a while now and whenever I would start looking for one this is the one I kept coming back to. I finally decided to bight the bullet and just do it. We have such a crazy schedule in my house with my husbands crazy work schedule and a five year old picky eater. My son like most five year old loves chicken nuggets and French fries or tater tots. I really hate having to heat up my oven for 6 nuggets and a handful of fries so I was thinking this would be perfect And I was totally right. I’ve only made a few things in it but I can already tell I’m gonna love it. I made my son chicken and fries in about 10 minutes and I made some baked chicken cutlets in about 12 minutes. I loved that I didn’t have to heat up my whole kitchen by turning on my oven and I’m hoping it will help with my electric bill (everything in my house is electric) and the clean up was a breeze. Just some warm soapy water and a few swipes with a sponge and it was good to go. I did invest in the liners to put in the bottom of the basket just to be on the safe side

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 20, 2020
CommentsContent: We have cooked in this from the very first day it arrived. It’s great for everything. We cook chicken and fish easily. fresh vegetables roast in here Nicely. Of course frozen foods like fries, fish sticks, nuggets are so much better than cooking In the regular oven. And clean up is very easy. Love the digital icons makes it very user friendly. Big drawer in here  cooks a lot. But when cooking chicken and side dishes it’s hard to cook everything and finish together So we are thinking of buying a second  one. This way we can cook meats that take longer and veggies and other thingsAt the same time.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 20, 2019
CommentsContent: I had heard for a while how great air fryers were but never knew what I was missing out on. After looking at all the options available and reading ratings we decided to give this one a try and OMG we are in LOVE! This is seriously a game changer for cooking.  We bought it with the expectation that it would get put away in between uses because it's a little big.  Well, we use it SO much it has a permanent home on our counter now. Not only can you fry food in here but you can cook vegetables (roast), meats, reheat food and so much more and without any oil.  We have made fried chicken, fried pork chops, whole roasted chicken, roasted broccoli, cauliflower, etc. and so much more and everything turns out perfect each time.  SO happy we finally purchased this!!

CommentsTitle: My New Toy in the Kitchen
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 10, 2020
CommentsContent: I never thought I would purchase a Air Fryer.  After reviewing many air fryers I decided to purchased the Cosori with WiFi.  Love the size and style.  It matches my contemporary decor.  Works like a dream.  Can you say "Easy Clean Up" heck yes!  Throw the baskets in the dishwasher and call it good.  The best part no grease to clean up from the stove. My new favorite is thick boneless pork chops cook at 370 F for 9 minutes. Yummy!!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 24, 2021
CommentsContent: If I ever sold a product, this would be it. I LOVE this! I make everything in it. It's super easy to use, and even easier to clean up. Everyone needs one of these

CommentsTitle: Very easy to use!! Love using it!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 6, 2020
CommentsContent: I have used this for all kinds of foods... from French fries, to onions rings to fish and pork chops! All have come out amazing and in a short amount of time! Love this air fryer!! Especially during hot weather  when I don't want to turn my oven on… Good tip given to me, put tin foil in the bottom tray for easy cleanup!! It saves so much time and energy, and it is so true!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 14, 2020
CommentsContent: Corre a comprarlo, es lo mejor que puedes tener en tu cocina solo es tomar el truco con el tiempo y la temperatura para que la comida no se seque demasiado o se queme, una ves aprendes no lo dejaras de usar todos los días 👍

CommentsTitle: Liked this more than I thought I would !!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 12, 2020
CommentsContent: Made the best chicken wings I've ever had. Cooked everything from Cornish game hens to fish sticks and brownies. Also use it to reheat every thing. I've had it 3 weeks, and haven't used the oven once in that time. It cooks so much faster as well. Made sirloin steaks also. They weren't the best I've ever had, but they were  the best I've cooked "inside" the house . Compared to frying or broiling. No complaints about the air fryer at all. Works great.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 25, 2020
CommentsContent: The only drawback is the size. I have a family of 7. I don’t like having to cook in batches like this. BUT the flavor and fact that I don’t have to add oil or butter to most things is huge. It makes for healthier eating. I skipped the butter the cookbook suggested on some things and the food still came out great. I have made pork chops, chicken wings, chicken thighs, sweet potato fries, fries. All came out delicious.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2021
CommentsContent: This was a great purchase! We were skeptical it would live up to the hype about it's ease and versatility, but it did not disappoint. After considerable research, I found this was probably the best value. Cooking healthy food for two has never been easier. The recipe book that comes with it was helpful also.

CommentsTitle: Great product and great customer service
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 23, 2019
CommentsContent: We purchased the air fryer in May of this year and immediately began using it to cook everything from brussel sprouts to steak. Last week the something happened and the unit shut off and would not come back on, this had happened once or twice before but the unit restarted in a few minutes, this time it didn't. I called Cosori customer support, they were great. I explained what was happening, they said they would replace the unit. Within minutes I received an email with the request asking for a copy of the original Amazon order and with the address where the replacement unit should be shipped. I did that was on August 20th, they acknowledged getting the information and I received the replacement unit August 22nd. Just fantastic customer service. Thank you the new unit is great.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 5, 2020
CommentsContent: I will have to agree with other posts that there is a bad smell when first using this, so after some google searches I found if you run it several times empty at 400 degrees for 40 minutes with a 15 minute cool down between each that it took care of the smell-yay !I am now using it regularly and love it !Very user friendly and super easy to clean!

CommentsTitle: Ridiculously short cord makes it difficult to find a safe location without extension cords
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 22, 2020
CommentsContent: Shame on you floor such a Ridiculously short cord need and extension cord to properly vent when cooking .  Beware people check cord lengths when buying air fryers .Also difficult to navigate .  I’m not a fan but I’m hoping to figure it out .

CommentsTitle: Loved it so much, I bought two
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 26, 2020
CommentsContent: This is the second Cosori air fryer I’ve purchased from Amazon. This one was purchased as a gift for my father in law because I loved mine so much. The basket is HUGE, you can literally cook an entire chicken in it. I really like the cookbook that comes with it, filled with lots of great recipes. Most kitchen appliances, in my experience, are cool for a while then get put in a cabinet and forgotten about. I use my air fryer all. the. time.Makes great hot wings, french fries, eggplant parmesean... really you can put anything in it. Great for doing a Ketogenic diet, too.

CommentsTitle: So thankful I ignored all the bad reviews and listened to the good ones!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 31, 2021
CommentsContent: I am so so so thankful I ignored all of the bad reviews and listened to many good ones! When you look at the reviews of any of the air fryers, they all say “do not buy” so I was like, “ok then which one do I buy?!”I cleaned it and ran a few cycles before cooking food as recommended in the manual (READ THE MANUAL!) and haven’t had any issue with my food “tasting like plastic”. It takes some getting used to, to learn how long to cook different foods, but my food has been coming out nice and crispy. This is everything I hoped it would be!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 24, 2020
CommentsContent: This is my first air fryer and it is so easy to use and clean up.  It makes frozen food like fries and fish bites very crispy.But so far my favorite is a lean burger, it is juicy on the inside and brown on the outside and usually lean burgers (4% fat) just dry up when made In a skillet.  I bought some accessories and made some small muffins in it.  Also fresh cauliflower came out crispy and juicy.  I look forward to making salmon in it and different veggies.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 22, 2019
CommentsContent: This does a good job of making things crispy without burning them. I use this for frozen foods like chicken nuggets, french fries, beer battered cod, and batter covered chicken from TV dinners. The only thing I don't like about it is that you have to have the cooking basket in the machine for preheating. The one I had before this that I ended up returning because it was too small didn't force you to do that, it would heat up without the basket in it. The size of this one is about ideal for me.

CommentsTitle: weak latch that holds the cooking drawer in unit
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2021
CommentsContent: I love this cooker. But there is a problem with it. The food drawer has a weak latch and a meal that I was cooking flew out onto the floor, with the food in it. I will keep this and continue to use it, but my solution was to turn the entire unit sideways to the kitchen counter so that if it pops out, will just land on the counter. I had to glue a plastic piece back on and unbend the drawer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 1, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased this air fryer after wanting to get one for a while. I did a lot of research and felt confident purchasing the COSORI Air Fryer because of its high ratings, being a "#1 Best Seller," and mostly positive reviews. Before buying my air fryer, I read several reviews that mentioned the air fryer would stop working halfway through the cooking. This issue has now started happening to me. I will be making food, and it turns off and on several times and then stops altogether. I've tried using different outlets in my kitchen to see if it is an electrical issue. That does not seem to be the problem.Before my air fryer stopped working, I liked using it a lot. It was easy to use and easy to clean. I made fries, mozzarella sticks, roasted veggies, and reheated pizza to get a crispy crust. It worked well in a lot of those instances. I am not sure if this is an issue isolated to a few air fryers, but it is frustrating now having a non-working air fryer just taking up space in my kitchen after spending more than $100. I can not recommend this air fryer after my experience.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 3, 2020
CommentsContent: Ease of use. Safe for the counter top. I see where some people say it leaves puddles, mine does not, but I do not place the vented side close to a wall either.  I feel the presets are set alittle shy of getting food done, and I can not compare it  to any other.  I will still give 5 stars because the machine is a great addition to my place, and the food ither than a cake has turned out great.  I dont think you will be disappointed in your purchase

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 17, 2020
CommentsContent: Looked good, packed well, nice recipe book, easy setup - but it just failed the taste test. I tried 3 recipes, sweet potato fries, regular french fries and onion rings - one was ok - one was below average - one was bad. I can do much better in my oven in less time. Not worth the time and effort - pretty disappointed actually.

CommentsTitle: Great products but makes it very dry
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 26, 2020
CommentsContent: It is indeed a great product for a healthy meal however even though we use the spray oil, the end result is very dry which my kids aren't enjoying - they don't get the flavour and and finds difficulty in swallowing then

CommentsTitle: Cooks great. Design needs to be made more safe.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 7, 2020
CommentsContent: I would've given a 5 star rating but in 1 month the plastic plate that is on the front of the basket - the screws fell out and the face plate fell off. Luckily I was cleaning it and not cooking. The face plate hold the 2 baskets together if I had been cooking I could've been seriously burned.The performance of the air fryer is great.Would I buy again? No not unless the face plate to baskets were made more safe.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 25, 2021
CommentsContent: Even though the machine was easy to clean and use. The unit broke and would not operate after only 4 to 8 uses. It was a waste of hard earned MONEY and time. I would not buy this again!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 6, 2020
CommentsContent: I have heard people talking about how much they love their air fryer so I thought I would give it a try and I’m glad I did.  So far I have cooked chicken, artichokes, bacon and steak in it and they have all turned out great.  It’s simple to use and the clean-up is extremely easy.  I purchased this brand / model solely based on the reviews and I’m glad it did.

CommentsTitle: Simple to Set and Simple to Operate!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 22, 2019
CommentsContent: Large capacity for big steaks and chops.  Mostly use in place of broiling in the oven or pan frying protein items.  Works excellently with fish and chicken thighs.  Learning more and more each time I use the air fryer.  Presets easy to use and built in shake feature for some items is a great reminder.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 28, 2021
CommentsContent: This is my first air fryer and I love it! The presets are accurate. I haven’t experienced any puddling or anything yet. The crispy factor is on point. Flavor is on point. So easy to use. Simple cleaning especially if you put foil in the bottom like I do. The recipe book is great. I love that I can cook for just me in this thing and make healthy food quick and easy!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 2, 2020
CommentsContent: This is our first attempt at an air fryer. This one is a good place to start. Controls are easy to understand. Easy to set up and use. The only issue we have is trying to modify recipes and or instructions for different food items. But that being said, we use it several times a week. Best outcome so far......chicken wings.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 1, 2019
CommentsContent: I’ve never used an air fryer before.  I picked this up to give me more variety.  Wow!  I made turkey burgers in here instead of grilling them and they were killer!  Crispy brown outside and moist in the center without the shrinkage I usually get on the grill.  I’ve also roasted butternut squash and chickpeas.  My only gripe is wishing it could hold more.

CommentsTitle: Easy to use, Easier to clean.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 10, 2019
CommentsContent: We've had the air fryer for a few weeks and seem to be using it all of the time. We've cooked wings, salmon, steaks, calamari, chops...all come our great and I clean the pan under the faucet with hot water only. Nothing sticks. I wipe it all off with a paper towel and put it away. I can cook 6 full wings at a time. I wish it were twice as big, but I'm super happy with it. BTW...none of the burning plastic smell that I read on other reviews for other fryers.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 12, 2019
CommentsContent: Works great! Have made so many delicious meals in it. The nice thing is that you can cook food from FROZEN in no time at all. Comes with a handy recipe book as well. A little hard to clean as the grease tends to stick in some of the crevices, even after soaking. But overall, highly recommend!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 5, 2021
CommentsContent: Pros:Works as expectedFast preheatingMetal basket is easy to get in and outEasy to operateGreat alternative way to cook most dishes that would otherwise require a pan or broilingGreat for crispy kale snacksCons:Uneven heat distribution leads to some corners being more cooked than othersThe metal basket bottom bent a little after a few usesProbably not specific to this item, but not good for cooking patties - potato cakes, crab cakes, burgers and such.

CommentsTitle: If you like wings or veggies, go for it !
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 31, 2020
CommentsContent: I was skeptical first about it's capabilities. The first day it came, I just dropped in a bunch of wings and set it. Woohoo! In 15 minutes I was eating chicken wings at par with the ones I get at our local bars.Since then, I tried many things: carrots, veggies, potatoes, asparagus, fish, calamari, nests, etc. All turned out very tasty.Most of the times, I have to put no oil in meat. For veggies, a thin stay of oil suffices. This makes all the meals much healthier without losing the "required oiliness" of the food.Cleaning is also easy. The rack comes out, gets separated into the base pot and inner sieve and is dishwasher safe.Now, I just stick up things and don't have to plan elaborately. Just come home, decide what I want to eat, out it in the fryer and 15 mins later, ready to eat!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 10, 2021
CommentsContent: I ordered this during Amazon Prime deals and have used it almost daily. It's life changing if you cook a lot. I know that a lot of people experience problems with the basket but i'm very careful not to hold it by the handle alone and so far mine has been great - 5 months old. Good value air fryer.

CommentsTitle: Failed after two months horrible customer service
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 14, 2020
CommentsContent: After a very short period of owning this air fryer around two months all of the touchpad became on responsive. I emailed the company to get help and they were not helpful at all and I am stuck with a non-functional air fryer but I spent $120 on. My opinion is not to buy this fryer especially since the customer service was horrible

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 8, 2020
CommentsContent: We initially loved this airfryer, easy to use and clean. However the handle holding the basket has broken off and renders the airfryer completely useless. I have reached out to Cosori to see if they will stand behind their product and replace the basket/handle and will update this post accordingly.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2021
CommentsContent: See heres the weird thing about this air fryer. To begin using it you have to hook it up to wifi and your phone. I have a basic easy air fryer that I just plug in and use. I gave this one to my boyfriend for a Christmas present and took him a while to set it up. The cool things about this air fryer though is it has a recipe book and an app for your phone to keep track of meals and recipes.

CommentsTitle: My new go to way to cook!! Delicious!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 20, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. He is usually the type to do research before buying anything but I never do so he was skeptical at first. It was a cyber Monday deal that I could t resist.  He loves it and can’t wait to use it every night. I love it too! We have used the cookbook that came with it and everything we have tried is so delicious! Chicken tastes better in it than any time I’ve ever cooked chicken! The sweet potato fries were unbelievably good! I’m addicted to using it! Easy to clean too!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 2, 2019
CommentsContent: For the longest time I resisted buying an air fryer - I didn’t want another appliance taking up space in my already too small kitchen. But after seeing some great reviews, I did a bunch of research and settled on this model. I’m very pleased with it - it’s easy to use, easy to clean and it cooks wonderfully. I use it for things I’d previously not considered air fryable and everything comes out great. Even rolls and bagels. I use this a ton and am so glad I bought it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 17, 2020
CommentsContent: The air fryer works well but the button volume is obnoxious!!! Easy fix!1) Pop off the top2) Locate the soundbox3) Cover with tape or stuff with foam like I did.  (Snipped from a foam painbrush)

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 15, 2020
CommentsContent: I did my research and I'm very pleased with the results I have had it for at least 6 months works perfect every time makes cooking easier specially with bacon and sausage without the greasy mess on your counter top.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 27, 2019
CommentsContent: The Cosori air fryer meets my needs. The digital control panel is easy to understand and program. The oven is reasonably quiet. The cook chamber is roomy and square to provide maximum cooking capacity. It is also easy to insert and withdraw the basket. Cleanup is up not a problem with the non stick coating and the absence of protrusions into the cook chamber.I have used the Cosori at least once a day since I purchased it last month. Hopefully the air fryer will continue to provide this good service for a long while.

CommentsTitle: This is an amazing kitchen tool!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 8, 2019
CommentsContent: LIke many, my schedule is stupidly busy and it's a challenge cooking healthy meals quickly.  I did a lot of research and recently purchased this model and I absolutely love it! Everything I have tried has come out great.  Steaks, chicken, fritattas, veggies...all cook and taste so good and it takes hardly any time at all.  I bought accessories to go with it and I use those to cook an entire meal at once or to reheat items instead of placing them in the microwave.  I don't cook any "french-fried" foods so I cannot comment on how it does with those types of foods but it is exactly what I wanted...a versatile and easy to use cooking tool for quick healthy meals.  Simply add water and dishsoap after cooking, let it soak for a bit and it cleans right up....no scrubbing.  Highly recommend.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2020
CommentsContent: This air fryer amazing!  I seriously use it at least 4-5 times a week.  I work long hours and it is nice to come home and be able to cook a nice meal quickly.  I air fry a whole chicken every week.  I have made steak tips several times and they taste grilled!  Hotdogs and  Steak fajitas are amazing!  My daughter got this one for Christmas, then I got one, and I have told many people at work and they have bought one.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 9, 2020
CommentsContent: PLEASSEEEEEE get yourselves this air fryer. This has got to be one of the best inventions of all time. Hahahhaha. I absolutely love my air fryer. At first I did not know which brand to get, until I visit my sister-in-laws house and she had this one. When her husband made his chicken wings and I saw how crispy they came out. I just knew I had to get my hands on this product. Here are some pictures, I even made some burgers on it. Super good.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 18, 2020
CommentsContent: I am just writing to say i have had this air fryer for over a year now and started having issues where the keypad would not respond to touch. I saw that some others have had this issue so i emailed Cosori customer support after sending a quick video of the issue Cosori authorized a replacement to be sent to me with no further questions. In this day it is hard to find a company that stands behind there products like this and even though i had the issue with the air fryer i would not hesitate to purchase any of there products do to there outstanding customer service also before this issue the air fryer worked flawlessly was  easy to clean and overall a great addition to the kitchen.

CommentsTitle: Best purchase I have made in a very long time.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 24, 2019
CommentsContent: I am nothing but pleased. I was on the fence for so long about buying an Air Fryer. I now wish that I wouldn't have waited. I did the research and this was very highly recommended. The reviews were not wrong. It does everything advertised and then some. This is the best purchase I have made in very long time. I have absolutely nothing bad to say about my Corsori Air Fryer Max 5.8.

CommentsTitle: impossible to clean heating element and fan area
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 22, 2021
CommentsContent: I bought this for mainly cooking small chickens ,steak and some roasting. And of course ff, But the last chicken splattered the heating element and caused a terrible burnt smell. Now I cant get rid of the odor and cleaning is impossible.If you plan on cooking whole chickens, BEWARE.Otherwise it has not disappointed.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 24, 2020
CommentsContent: Had the air fryer for one day and only used it once and now it turns on but will not heat up food. Called cosori customer service and they advised to return it because it appeared that the heating element is damaged after only one use. I am getting a replacement sent to me hopefully it last more than one day or I will be switching to a different brand.

CommentsTitle: Easy to use and clean and the food is AMAZING!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 6, 2020
CommentsContent: Never heard of an air fryer before until my neighbor mentioned it and how she uses it to cook french fries. Being a FF addict myself I had to try it. We got the air fryer and well instead of making french fries i made chicken thighs with the skin on (making a recipe from the book that came with the fryer). IT WAS AMAZING! Juicy on the inside crispy on the outside - so fast and quick and easy to clean.We made pork tenderloin in this thing and i can't even tell you how juicy and tender it is - cutting it with a fork. Again, easy to clean.We finally made french fries and well- that was actually disappointing. LOL the reason i bought it- french fries- and well i like them better baked in the oven.I use this air fryer at least 4 times a week. I love it!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 30, 2019
CommentsContent: I really liked this air fryer. But when I cleaned it today I noticed this wear mark between the basket and the basket holder. Now I'm freaked out and afraid to use it due to the carcinogenic properties of non stick coatings. So I guess in the trash it goes due to being 12 days or so outside the 30 day return policy. I used it about 10 times :/

CommentsTitle: My first try for an Air Fryer.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 8, 2020
CommentsContent: What I like about this is that it makes the cooking a lot easier. It basically helped us during the stay at home quarantine time of March and April 2020. It offsets us from using cooking oils on our food, hence lesser consumption of oily substances.

CommentsTitle: This COSORI Air Fryer is incredible!!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 17, 2020
CommentsContent: You cannot do better cooking than in our new COSORI Air Fryer! So quick, very easy, easy cleaning. We have cooked meat, potatoes, vegetables, everything came out perfect & so much more tasty! We bought the red 5. quart size so it will feed our children, when they come over! Love, love this air fryer. Perfect in every way!

CommentsTitle: I've used it every day since I purchased my Air Fryer.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 20, 2019
CommentsContent: I've only had it a few days and I've used it every day. This air fryer is definitely my favorite kitchen appliance right now. I needed a large basket for meal prep and this is the largest I could find for the price I wanted to pay (Prime Days Deal). The programmed options are easy to follow, it has a safety button on the basket and it is very easy to clean (dishwasher safe).

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 30, 2019
CommentsContent: My friend got this and showed me hers and told me all about it.  I had to have it!  I'm so happy with this purchase.  It's easy to use, and everything that I have made in it has turned out perfectly and delicious.  I've made shrimp, salmon, chicken, apple pies, asparagus, chick peas, and more.  One tip that has been helpful to me is to put aluminum foil under the basket to make cleaning easier.  You just have to clean the basket, and not the little tray thing that it goes in.  I would highly recommend this air fryer.  It's a real time saver!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2020
CommentsContent: I’ve owned this air fryer a couple of months and just LOVE IT!!! I’ve made chicken wings, french fries, cookies, bagels, brownies, muffins, egg rolls,  mini pies, bacon......what haven’t I made?!! Everything comes out beautifully browned and crispy!! It cooks faster than most recommended times so I’m still experimenting with that. It cleans so up so effortless, it’s easy to use and it has a decent sized basket. It seems to be well made, isn’t too big to sit on my counter and not too loud.Do yourself a favor, get yourself a good air fryer cookbook and you will be able to use it for everything! It’s not just a chicken wing and french fry maker!!

CommentsTitle: The only kitchen gadget you need
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 7, 2020
CommentsContent: This air fryer is absolutely incredible, it makes everything taste amazing, it cooks things perfectly every time and is so incredibly easy to clean. I have a small kitchen without much counter space and this does not take much space and tucks away perfectly in a corner until it's ready to be used again. It's a great time saver and makes vegetables taste great and cooks them in half the time.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 11, 2021
CommentsContent: Great purchase. Mine is fromAmazon wear house. No cosmetic issues that I can see. Works perfectly. I paid about $20-$30 less than brand new. I’m thrilled with it. I have a toaster oven I’m in love with, so I was skeptical of air fryers,I waited long time to get on the air fryer train. I’m glad this is my first air fryer. I’m sold. It cooks my food super quick and it nice a crispy in 3-5 min.

CommentsTitle: Recipe book and presets works great
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 3, 2020
CommentsContent: This works really well, and it’s a good size for my hungry family of three with plenty of room to spare. The presets are super helpful and mostly very accurate too. I will say that the one thing I learned with an air fryer is to use cooking spray. Spray the basket and the food and everything comes out crispy! Super easy to clean.

CommentsTitle: Won't stand the test of time.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 28, 2020
CommentsContent: Easy to use and decent results. So much so that I often use this once or twice a week to help speed up dinner prep.That being said, it clearly won't last the test of time. I've never dropped this thing but the handle is already falling apart. The container itself doesn't slide in "flush" any more either.I expect more bits and pieces of it to fail as I use it more.

CommentsTitle: Excellent and well worth the money.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 30, 2021
CommentsContent: This air fryer is as good as the hype! Incredible taste and so easy to use. I did a lot of research and I am very happy with this air fryer!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 10, 2019
CommentsContent: It took me a while to convince my husband for us to get an air fryer, but after doing research and seeing all the great reviews, he gave me the ok! After, he was so happy with this air fryer, he said we could get rid of the oven! Not that I was going to do that, but most of our meals are cooked in the air fryer now. And, the cooking time is cut in half or more! Chicken legs cook in 25 mins. A personal pizza that took 30 minutes in the oven, takes 5 minutes in the air fryer! Would definitely recommend!

CommentsTitle: This is my second unit...buyer beware

PS.  Liked it so well we got one for our grand daughter for a weddingpresent.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 6, 2021
CommentsContent: Makes cooking fun and easy to do. My son keep asking me to buy a air fryer because apparently it's supposed to be more healthy. So fast I love it. Easy to clean 5/5  which that was my number one priority.  Delivery time 5/5  Package 5/5  Instructions 5/5  Value 5/5  Taste 5/5  Recommend it 5/5

CommentsTitle: Mine stopped heating up after 5.5 months

CommentsContent: Pros:It works great.The functions are easy to understand.It connects to wifi.It cleans really well/easily.Doesnt take up too much kitchen space.Cons:It stopped heating up after over 5 months of use.. not sure if it is the fuse that is causing the heat to not turn on, but all that circulates is cold air. CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 29, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2021

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 19, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 5, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2021
CommentsContent: Only gave this 4 stars because I've only used it once.  I just recently got this and have only made french fries.  Both my husband and I were pleased with the taste of the fries. CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 3, 2019
CommentsContent: I purchased this air fryer during the prime day deals and read all the reviews about it and was I satisfied with the description and direction what kid if air fryer this is.We have used this air fryer at lease twice a week since we purchased it. We have made fries, steak, fish, veggies(string beans and Brussel sprouts), chicken wings, chicken tenders etc.The directions are simple whether following the food products directions of temp and time or the controls on the fryer.Overall great fryer if anything changes I will update this review

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 30, 2020
CommentsContent: Day One - EXCELLENT frozen fries. My guinea pig, er father LOVED them. I ended up adjusting the time down to 18 minutes total from 25 (preset for fries) after the shaker timer (so cool) went off at the 14 minute mark and revealed crispy yet tender fries. Totally stoked to try some of the recipes in the book and some of my signature recipes to see how they come out. I expect nothing but greatness. Will update soon!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 17, 2020
CommentsContent: This fryer is absolutely the best!  Makes an entire crispy chicken, the best crunchies fries/potatoes, and what I call "egg cupcakes".  I bought one for my vacation home and one for each of my sons.  Only negative is you can't make the chicken and potatoes at the same time.  The recipe book is quite nice, although my first copy had the pages fall out.  I would not buy the accessory kit.  You are better off buying silicone baking cups.

CommentsTitle: My mom and dad love it
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 13, 2021
CommentsContent: Bought this for my mom and dad.  They have said nothing but good things about it.  The air fryer is a pretty good size so make size you have some counter space.

CommentsTitle: Built in preheat that’s a must!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 9, 2020
CommentsContent: Have a smaller one Cosori but I couldn’t cook enough food because the basket was too small that’s why I got a bigger Cosori in white.. now I can cook veg in the smaller one and meat in my big Cosori.. love them both!!!!

CommentsTitle: Is it going to become my go-to kitchen product?
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 25, 2019
CommentsContent: Well, truth is I have no idea! It's a new product and concept for me to use an air fryer but, as I do for everything else, I research before buying anything. The reviews were great and this product was rated in top 5 by Amazon. I love fried foods :) this one product will allow me to eat what I like and reduce greatly the fats used, I'm a happy camper. It will also cut the time I spend in the kitchen and give me more time for hobbies that I enjoy. What's not to like?

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 20, 2020
CommentsContent: Cosori's customer service went above and beyond with my concerns and issues with my new fryer. I contacted them directly through phone and emails. I always received a response back from them within hours. Well their product did not meet my expectations ,they were apologetic and offered me a full refund. I loved the style and white color . I am leaving a 5 star review because I feel if someone does have any issues with their products,Cosori will make it right to keep their consumers happy.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 11, 2020
CommentsContent: Upset about our purchase. We bought this unit on March 2, and the coating in the basket is already wearing off. Who knows what we are ingesting. The basket is also now a bit warped due to the heat, so the door pops open. Was awesome for three weeks! The “support” page listed in Amazon goes to a 404 error page. Not impressed; hoping someone reads this and offers some assistance.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 10, 2019
CommentsContent: I absolutely LOVED this air fryer until it just quit today. Nothing...just quit. I even bought one for my sister because I liked it so much. Has anyone else had this problem? It's just 8 months old. I would have given it 5 plus stars until it quit. I am so disappointed.UPDATE: I contacted Cosori and they sent me a new machine. I received it in 3 days!!! What great customer service. Now I am back to using my air fryer daily because I love it!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 5, 2020
CommentsContent: This air fryer is a good product, easy to use, however it is impossible to mute it's beeps and they are SUPER LOUD!Lots of annoying beeps and reminders all the time

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 26, 2020
CommentsContent: The basket and tray lock together. The tray falls off the basket a lot. Be careful. Don't let your animals or children be under your feet when you pull it out. It is hot and fairly heavy.

CommentsTitle: One of the most used appliances in my home
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 13, 2019
CommentsContent: The air fryer has been a life changer for me. We use it at least 3 times a week either for preparing the main dish or a side dish. Veggies come out wonderfully roasted. Chicken is moist and tender. And, it makes the best salmon filet I've ever tasted. We plan dinners around how we can use the air fryer now. Clean up is a breeze. Easy to operate, too. I'm so glad I finally purchased it, worth every dollar spent.

CommentsTitle: Cool But The App Feature Doesn’t Work
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 8, 2021
CommentsContent: I really like many features of this air fryer. It has the shake reminder, preheat, and digital face. Sometimes the buttons are difficult to push to adjust the time and the temperature. I’ve also NEVER been able to get the app to actually connect with my phone which is kind of disappointing and was a big selling feature for me.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 12, 2020
CommentsContent: This is the best appliance that I ever bought!!!!! Really crisps the wings without oil.  You don’t need the wax paper . It is very easy to clean and dishwasher proof!  1000% I will buy it again!  I will love to give this as a present to everyone I know.... I am on diet, I lost 40 pounds and 20 still to go.  It’s amazing how I eat fried chicken without frying it!!!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 21, 2019
CommentsContent: I waited a bit to write this review, because I wanted to try out a bunch of different things. Now that I have, I'm in love! We have done fresh sweet potato fries, carrots, green beans, broccoli, kale, frozen pot stickers, and fresh chicken wings. Everything came out crispy and delicious by either following the directions from the included recipe book or by finding a general air fry recipe online and figuring out the time and temperature for the item. Some take some minor tweaking, but overall it has been amazing. My husband is obsessed with the quality of the chicken wings!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 5, 2020
CommentsContent: This is a great product. Easy clean up and cooks well. I would advise you skip the bluetooth model and get the normal model. The bluetooth just isnt worth it.

CommentsTitle: I love it best kitchen product I ever bought
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 10, 2021
CommentsContent: I love it I hardly use my stove now. It's perfect for working parents, you just need to make sure there is always, chicken, nuggets, burger patties, fries, vegetables, potatoes and puff pastry in the house and your kids can cook for themselves especially when you have to work late or go to work. It beeps to let u know it still on or needs to turn. YouTube has lots of recipes to help you. I would recommend to anyone

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 1, 2021
CommentsContent: This was our first air fryer. I bought it with low expectations because of the price, but was not disappointed. It's light, has alot of presets, heats up pretty fast, has a nice design, and it's fairly easy to clean- though a bit annoying to clean as well. It comes with a massive recipe booklet that has all kinds of foods in it, though you can probably find some better recipes online, but the book can still give you amazing ideas. I would give it a 5, if it was larger. It can comfortably fit about 4 or 5 chicken thighs, to give an idea of the basket size. Overall a great fryer, especially for the price.

CommentsTitle: Cooks extremely well, evenly and clean up is a snap
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 5, 2021
CommentsContent: The air fryer is well constructive has a good design instructions are real well written and easy to follow which helps and getting up and going quickly are use frozen chicken wings in the cooker and the rash was perfect the front programs are easy to cycle through and you can change the setting Byam to fit your preferences as well As setting the time and temperature that works for you. I highly recommend this product. I will tomorrow

CommentsTitle: Very easy to use and prepares great tasting foods
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 18, 2021
CommentsContent: For the 1st 30 days of use, it appears to meet all expectations.  One added benefit was the recipe booklet that came with the air fryer.  Food taste great and cooks quickly.  Wondering about the energy efficiency and whether using the air fryer is more or less efficient than an electrical oven ("broiler").

CommentsTitle: Great air fryer, two minor quirks
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 7, 2020
CommentsContent: I really like this air fryer! The digital display is really nice, and you’ve got the option to choose your temperature and cook time manually, or with the preset buttons (there’s a bacon button, which cooked my bacon perfectly). My only gripe is that sometimes it seems as though the drawer has to be inserted/removed a few times before it actually shuts, but it might just need some breaking in since it’s new. I also noticed that some condensation has dripped out under the basket lip in the front, but not a huge deal...just a little messy. Overall, I’m happy with this!

Cooks everything amazing there’s some great recipes out there too! It’s big enough to fit entire meals in can cook more than one thing at a time on it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 23, 2020
CommentsContent: I use this a lot for frozen foods (fish sticks, chicken nuggets, popcorn shrimp) and it makes them come out crispy on the outside, tender inside, and evenly cooked as opposed to the microwave. I feel it is very easy to clean and easy to understand how to use.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 6, 2020
CommentsContent: I love this product !! it’s easy to use and it comes with recipe book . No additional book needed . It’s all the recipes you will ever need . It’s big and I am shocked that it’s didn’t cost that much . There’s a $10 off on it also. I am like 🤩 .  This can be possible. Wingstop would charge a Hand and 🦵 for this wings I just made . The Buttons on it of 🥘 u want to make . Three-year-old can use it .

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 13, 2019
CommentsContent: I  have to say I was underwhelmed.  Yes, it cooked the chicken nuggets, tater tots, chicken wings to be crispy faster than my oven does .  The bad thing was that all the food had a slight metallic taste to the food.  Maybe it was the non stick coating, maybe over time that wouldn't happen... I don't want to find out.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 6, 2020
CommentsContent: The product does its job. The only thing is that it is extremely difficult to clean. I left it soaking overnight. The next day I washed it and the grease wouldn’t come off. Left it soaking a bit more. Finally I decided to scrub. The inside paint came off. 🤦🏻‍♀️ Very disappointed with that. Haven’t used it since.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 29, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased my Air Fryer almost a year ago and love it. I use it almost daily. I did have an issue recently where the sliding button guard somehow became cracked. I haven't dropped it, and am not sure how it happened, but the Cosori customer support was awesome. I took a picture of the button guard, sent in a support email, and within 24 hours had a complete replacement basket shipped. I love cooking with my Air Fryer, and have cooked everything from simple snacks to complete meals in it. And again, the customer support for this product is just amazing. If you are looking for an Air Fryer, Cosori is definitely the way to go. Simple to use, and the food is amazing.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 25, 2021
CommentsContent: I was so worried about my teenage son moving out this year, and him not being able to cook and fend for himself... not anymore! I gifted him this for Christmas, and it was such a smart move. He cooks everything now: vegetables, French fries, pizza, meat, and even skewers! He’s cooked steaks, chicken legs, chicken thighs, drumsticks, chicken tenders, shrimp, salmon filets, and beef skewers. Never did I think he would be able to cook all those things for himself!  He gets on his phone, finds a simple recipe, seasons the meat, and forgets about it. He doesn’t mind being in the kitchen. He prefers the taste to many things I’ve done over the stove with oil, and he loves the healthier food. It’s so easy to clean up!
