CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 1, 2020
CommentsContent: I was very surprised at how much I would actually like an air fryer, but I love it. Everything that I have made so far has been great. Fries, pork chops, steak, chicken....you name it, it's amazing. Clean up is easy. I would highly recommend trying it. It's very easy and it comes with a recipe book as well. Just for registering with the company online you an extra year warranty.

CommentsTitle: Better wPoor quality, research and buy one that last longeay of coking
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 18, 2019
CommentsContent: Poor quality, research and buy one that last longer.I received my order in November of 2019.  Love this machine and used it about 4 times a week.However, January, 2020, less than 3 months after receiving it, the button on the display that allows you to change the temperature and time no longer functions.If this happened so soon then I assume within one year the unit will be useless.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 17, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased and received this unit in early March 2020.  The bottom half of the buttons on the touchscreen did not work at all.  If you sort reviews by "most recent", you'll see that there are a number of other reviewers who have experienced the same problem recently.  I'm guessing they had a bad batch of these produced and they somehow slipped through QA at the factory (assuming that they check each unit, of course).  Until you start seeing a pattern of positive reviews after March 2020, I would be hesitant to order this air fryer unless you're willing to run the risk of having to return it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2021
CommentsContent: I am so happy with this purchase.  No more heating up a large oven for a baked potato.  No more going outside in the winter to grill a steak.  I am beyond pleased with this air fryer.  I like the app for saving times and temperatures for recipes I fine tune.  Other than that I don’t really use the app.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 29, 2020
CommentsContent: This is the best air fryer I have had. I had one before this that cost $80.00. My girlfriend bought this fryer and it made my fryer look like I was cooking with an easy bake oven. This fryer heats up faster, cooks in 1/2 the time the other fryer did, and what ever I cook, especially poultry, burgers, etc are so much better. Nice crispiness to the top of the meats.I had a question on the product and their customer service is top notch. GREAT PRODUCT.

CommentsTitle: Holds up well and works as advertised
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 17, 2020
CommentsContent: I've had this air fryer for around 2 years and enjoy using it.  It is easy to clean. I've just been putting it in the dishwasher and it is ready to use again.  There has been no chipping of the non stick basket. There is a nice recipe booklet that comes with the fryer and the recipes are easy to use. Chicken wings, fish, french fries, hot dogs, hamburgers all come out tasting great. Chicken parm is our favorite.  The only disappointment is when we cook steak. The steak cooks fine, tastes good, but has a gray coloring to it when done.  Just doesn't look very appetizing.  It might be the way we are cooking it, but other than that, it's a great fryer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 10, 2020
CommentsContent: I’ve had this air fryer for over six months and it’s only ok. It crisps up veggies and potatoes nicely, not salmon though. It’s very loud and feels extremely cheap for the price. I already noticed a screw is coming out that holds the basket to the handle. I did a lot of research before buying this and I’m slightly disappointed, I based my purchase off reviews. I was trying to upgrade :/ I had a Phillips air fryer before this that cost less and did just as good of a job.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 19, 2021
CommentsContent: I absolutely love this air fryer, I can put a whole bag of French fries into this and it cooks them all and they are very crispy. I've cooked all types of stuff in this, the only thing I'm not crazy about is cooking fresh meat in it, my opinion it dries it out. But things like fries, onion rings, pizza bites, anything frozen it cooks amazing. I've made my own wraps in this with biscuits, flatten out biscuits and add meat, vegis, cheese pop it in cooker, amazing

CommentsTitle: Nice Air Fryer But Clean Up isn't Easy
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 7, 2021
CommentsContent: This is a very large air fryer that I enjoy using a lot but clean up isn't easy because as a right handed, the design of it inside is good left handed people. I don't have a dishwasher, I do everything by hand and that's my only complaint. Other than that it gets the job done!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 8, 2020
CommentsContent: Every now and then you make a purchase and, looking back, you say That was a really good purchase. This is one of those items. We’ve made home made fries, sweet potato fries, chicken parm, pizzas, tons of veggies, shrimp, bacon (without the mess), the list goes on. People that don’t know how to cook are suddenly being praised at parties for their food. Those that normally don’t cook at all re now making dinner for the family. I just honestly can’t say enough good things about this. Every household should have one. Period!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 20, 2020
CommentsContent: The machine in general is great. The tray is horrible..I have officially owned my air fryer about a month now as I write this review. However, within this month, I have one huge problem. THE PAN WILL NOT STAY CLOSED. It pops out for no reason and whatever I am making ends up on the floor. This happens often. One month and this dysfunction.It's disheartening. I love all of the other features. I never thought I'd need or use wifi but it turns out to be handy and the recipes in the app or great.However, BUYER BEWARE! Unless you're willing to manually hold the tray in, YOUR MEAL MAY END UP ON THE FLOOR!!

CommentsTitle: Easy to use and clean up!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 7, 2019
CommentsContent: I needed to find a way to cook my favorite foods in a healthier process. I decided to go for it and ordered the Cosori based on reviews I had read.I LOVE it. My first attempt was “fried” chicken. It was the best I have ever had. The skin came out crispy and the meat was amazingly juicy.  The next best part was clean up. No oil to dump. Nothing sticking to the pan. The unit is lightweight so putting it in the pantry is easy.My grandkids love what I’ve made them... egg roll pizza roll ups & chicken fingers. I should also mention that I will be purchasing another one for my daughter so I don’t have to take mine with me to her house!I don’t put it in the dishwasher and I only use a Misto sprayer before putting food in the tray. No chipping in or peeling.

CommentsTitle: Choking hazard with loose screws from basket.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 14, 2020
CommentsContent: Firstly I love this air fryer and use it multiple times a week! I bought it in September as my first air fryer. I would give it 5 stars However, I’m extremely disappointed because it has already broken. The screws came out while I was air frying my dinner and they won’t stay in anymore so the basket and handle are broken. Has anyone else had this problem and were able to fix it? I truly love this product and want to keep using it but won’t be able to. I bought it in September and it’s December now and it’s already broken. I wonder if I should have spent more money for a better product now. It’s a great air fryer but just didn’t last.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 11, 2019
CommentsContent: I never thought cooking could be so easy!! I made chicken wings in my new air fryer today. Seasoned with garlic powder, black pepper and pink Himalayan salt. Turn out great and crispy!! I shook then at the halfway point but didn’t flip. For my first time using an air fryer, this has been a great experience. I did extensive research before deciding to purchase the Cosori 5.8 QT and this is perfect size for 1-2 people. I like to make plenty of food so this is perfect for that.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 24, 2020
CommentsContent: I'm glad I got it, it's very easy to use, I read through the recipes, I have even gone looking for recipes. I made apple chips, they were okay, not great like in the oven. I've used it at least three times for tater tots. That seems to be the best thing with this machine. I cooked Omaha Steaks chicken stuffed and I put the time in 5 minutes too long, they were overdone, but done. Sometimes wish I had tried a smaller machine. I would recommend this machine, it's not for large amounts, I think it's good for two people or one person.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 25, 2020
CommentsContent: I like that is very good at cooking steaks, fries, eggplant, anything. It has a booklet with recipes. Then you have those recipes also in the app and from there can send, with one touch, the recipe to the Cosori and food will be ready, just simple, easy, clever. Is very easy to clean (only 2 baskets), is big enough for a large meal. Is not loud, just normal. Is fast with the internet and signals from the app.My whole family loves the food that I prepare in the fryer. The price is totally worthy.I have a question and the customer service was 5 star. I highly recommend this product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 25, 2020
CommentsContent: Wings, fries, roasted veggies, and pastries are good. Air fried food taste different but in a good way, light and crispy. Fried food generally sucks when delivered but this fits the gap nicely. It generally cooks way faster than you think so keep an eye on your food at the halfway mark. Cleanup is super easy. Keeps the heat and smell in your kitchen down.

CommentsTitle: Make healthy fries but just need patience to learn

CommentsContent: It's pretty hard to learn to cook appropriately at the beginning. Once you learn you can master the art of cooking with this. The meats used to get either burnt or lose flavor when I first tried it. But as I continued to use I was finally able to cook meat perfectly while keeping it's flavor and spices. The key is flipping the meat once or twice at the right time during your entire duration. I once served chicken legs at a party, all of my guests really liked the way chicken was fried.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 24, 2021
CommentsContent: absolutely a must have in any kitchen! This cooks frozen food like a boss without having to pre heat an oven and go through all that time consumption.Best of all no more greasy fryer to mess with or splatter all over my kitchen. Absolutely recommend this product!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2019
CommentsContent: I love this air fryer. I cook almost everything in it. I have made great bacon I will never go back to frying or cooking in oven. I’ve cooked steaks, pork chops, that have come out nice and brown and so juicy. Best bacon wrapped cheese stuffed jalapeños. Great homemade French fries. I could go on. Best little machine. When dirty just put in dishwasher. So easy. Love it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 20, 2019
CommentsContent: I bought a different product originally and the knobs were hard to use and the tray didn’t slide in easily. I returned it and bought this air fryer instead. I love this one, the tray is sturdy and goes in and out easily. I love the digital touchscreen as well, there is no guessing in temp or time and the presets are easy to use. I highly recommend this Cosori!

CommentsTitle: Great food and easy to use!  Kids are raving about chicken cooked in air fryer.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 31, 2019
CommentsContent: I got the unit for Christmas and used it for the first time last night.  I made thick chicken strips two ways, one with a breading and one with a dry rub. I made 2 batches for dinner and they were done in no time.  Wow!  My son had them for lunch today straight from the fridge and said they were still moist.  Yum!  The basket is big and easy to clean.  Using the unit is super easy.  The recipe booklet has many delicious looking recipes.  I will use this unit often in place of my oven and stove.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 4, 2020
CommentsContent: I wish I had not waited so long to buy this. What an incredible machine and it serves my family of 5 really well. It cooks them quickly, perfectly, and they taste delicious.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 14, 2020
CommentsContent: Look no further! This is literally the BEST impulse buy yet! You will not be disappointed. I have literally been cooking EVERYTHING in this and it’s a great size! Cooks everything to perfection! No complaints over here.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 20, 2021
CommentsContent: Admittedly I have a very sensitive nose. But after cleaning the basket several times, everything I cook in this tastes and smells like plastic. It’s bad enough now where I’m going to give it away and buy one of the more expensive ones made with better quality materials (most likely Breville or Cuisinart). Keep all the packaging and box for at least a week before throwing it a away. Wish I would have. Do not recommend this product at all. Plastic tasting food cannot possibly be safe.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2020
CommentsContent: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS!  I need to trim some pounds and this was my reason for the purchase. . I cook almost everything in it and have dropped 15 pounds in six weeks. Today made Cornish  hens. All the grease drained into the bottom pan. I could go on and on. We like grilled steaks but this air fryer takes a cheap piece of sirloin and cooks it melt in your mouth and juicy.  We usually only buy ribeye but rethinking. I have found that it doesn’t a take nearly as long as every website suggests to cook all the food I have tried. So pleased that three  family members each boUgh this one just like it and love theirs also.

CommentsTitle: Plastice smell not that bad smells like a new pair of shoe long as you take all the plastic out
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 27, 2020
CommentsContent: Got this in the mail today I was worried I seen the good reviews and I never checked the bad until yesterday I seen people saying about a plastic smell make Sure all the plastic is out before preheating not a over powering smell nothing more then a new pair of shoes smell. Doesn't make much noise the size isn't bad not much bigger then a 2LTR sprite bottle . My only problem the WiFi won't stay on long enough for my App for it to sync  for me to use my phone I tried for over an hour I wrote customer support they said I should have a reply within 48hour so we should see . But I am very happy so far for having it for less then 24 hours!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 3, 2020
CommentsContent: I thought this would be a fun gadget to add to the kitchen - just something to do special things with, primarily make wings. I did not expect that it would become the most versatile, frequently used appliance appliance in my kitchen. It’s so quick, easy to use, easy to clean and works on practically everything, I use it almost every day now. Frozen foods, bacon, wings, fried chicken, the texture it gives everything is amazing. Highly recommend!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 25, 2020
CommentsContent: This product was good for about the first couple weeks. Easy to use and clean. I loved it. After a month screws came coming out. I would screw them back in if I found them. Slowly but surely now all the screws are out and I can’t use it. Your better off buying one at Costco so you can return it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 18, 2020
CommentsContent: I have wanted an air fryer for some time now! I looked at a couple different ones and thought this one sounded the best! I was right! Amazing! We used it for the first time to make jalapeño poppers and they were amazing as always! Super quick, never even had to turn them. Delicious and easy to clean up after.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 14, 2020
CommentsContent: The Cosori air fryer is perfect in so many ways. However, there has been multiple times where the basket literally pops out while cooking. Yes I make sure it is completely closed. The air fryer sits on my counter top and the basket pops out so hard, it flies over a foot from the counter and lands on the floor and spills the food. It almost landed on top if my little maltese dog 😠

CommentsTitle: The functions of an a good air fryer is there but it comes with a metallic taste
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 19, 2020
CommentsContent: I like the functions of the Air Fryer so that's why I didn't down vote it terribly. The food however was awful. There was a weird metallic taste to all the food I put into it after cooking it and decided it was not worth my time to keep it.

CommentsTitle: Versatile and easy to use. Makes delicious food!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2019
CommentsContent: F'in love this thing. Have had it for about two weeks and it is so versatile. Chicken tenders, bacon, frozen sweet potato fries, crab cake, filet mignon, and an Beyond Burger all came out perfect. We did try a chicken parmesan that was just okay, bc you can't really flip it. We got the 5.8 QT and it fits well beneath our counter. If you are entertaining or cooking for a family, I'd say get the 5.8. I can easily get 4-6 strips of bacon at once. It's pretty easy to use, especially with the presets. And cleaning is easy, as the grease is between two non-stick baskets that decouple.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 19, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought in July mainly to cook french fries in the hot weather instead of heating up the oven! Well I use it for everything and use it at least once a day or more! This device has become my life line so needless to say when it quit working I was devastated!!Cosori's customer service was wonderful!! I spoke to Rep/Peter at 2:30pm followed instructions that were emailed to me and by 5:30pm I had a reply back and by Saturday I had a replacement! Thanks Cosori!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2021
CommentsContent: Exactly what I wanted. Works great. I previously jumped on the InstaPot bandwagon and used it 2 times. Just to hard for me to figure out how to use. This on the other hand is very easy to use and haven’t had any issues. Food is quick and delicious. Clean up is quick. We use it in the camper all the time.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 23, 2020
CommentsContent: After a few weeks of use it decided to literally explode on me. I heard a loud buzzing after starting it. I pulled the basket out hoping to stop it, but the buzzing continued. So I pulled the plug out of the wall and then there was a loud pop, a burst of light from somewhere under or behind it, and then smoke rising from the back. It was completely dead after that.What a piece of junk.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2020
CommentsContent: I got this for my dad for Christmas and he loves it! It's easy to use and makes very good food. The best thing we have made with it is potato chips and French fries. Very crisp.Note: it seems to make a noise that humans cant hear but my dog absolutely despises this thing and cries whenever we use it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 12, 2020
CommentsContent: I truly love my AF!!! It’s fast and easy to use!!! I love the fact you can use it with Alexa plus you can download app and program it from there if you’re not in the same room. The only thing is that the baskets are a little hard to separate when trying to clean them. But overall, I love it!! 😍

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 23, 2021
CommentsContent: Gave as a gift and they are thrilled with it! This was for my sister who isn't one to want to make elaborate meals and dirty up the kitchen. She loves the ease and speed of preparing her food and no messy stove or oven. She can put a few different foods in at once too.

CommentsTitle: Works good for me in my Rv
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 6, 2020
CommentsContent: Works great. Just have to cook with it an learn the cook temps an times. I tried to defrost some chicken other day an it kinda started cooking the thin edges so that didn’t work very well. An it’s not very loud. I can turn it on an watch a tv show an before you know it I don’t even hear it anymore. If Standing next to it just sounds like a floor fan. Not nearly as loud as hairdryer

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 27, 2021
CommentsContent: We were a little skeptical about air fryers; wondering how much would we really use it.We did a lot of research and found the Cosori 5.8 had better reviews than the others we looked at.We are thrilled we made the purchase! We use it at least 3-4 times a week. Cooks chicken beautifullyA big positive for us was the 5.8 quart basket. The size is perfect for my husband and I.

CommentsTitle: Best Investment for Mom on the Go
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 11, 2020
CommentsContent: After reading so many reviews about different air fryers, I decided to choose this one. By Far one of the Best investments I've made. I work full time and have 4 little ones always on the go and hardly have time to cook now. If you're trying to meal prep, buy this, if you get lazy and want something quick by this. It's so easy to use and super easy to clean. I have used it probably 6 times now. Nothing has broken off. You do need to be careful on that clear little plastic thing that you push to slide out the basket though. If you're not careful It looks like it can break. So don't get frustrated trying to open it. To sum it up I cooked chicken and asparagus in 8 mins. Lol

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 24, 2019
CommentsContent: I looked up a lot before purchasing my first air fryer. I wasn't initially convinced this was worthwhile purchase. But going through the reviews decided to go with this air fryer. This is a perfect size for family of 3-5. Made fried chicken as the first experiment, it was delicious. It was perfectly crispy, juicy, not dry. This has preset buttons for meats, and the temperature and duration were perfect. Definitely recommend this.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 6, 2020
CommentsContent: Love this product! Im glad I spent the extra money for this. I've had friends comment that the quality is much better than the cheaper more affordable ones on amazon. I like that to fry basket is square and large. The settings are easy and convinient to use. Only down side is it is hard to clean off any stuck on food/oil. But I think that will be a challenge for any air fryer. Strongly recommend if you need a break from using the oven. Makes any frozen food 100% better than the microwave and is faster than the oven

CommentsTitle: Actually kinda fun to use, possibilities are endless
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 5, 2020
CommentsContent: This thing saved my life, I mean literally because I really needed the help to maintain a more healthy diet. I was surprised by the size at first but it was 100% worth it, I ended up needing that size and loved how quick and easy to roast veggies and cook nearly anything and make experimenting more fun in the kitchen

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 9, 2020
CommentsContent: My unit is slightly defective. Steam would release from the lower right corner causing water to drip causing a puddle to accumulate. Other drawback is that you must flip/rotate food in order to have even cooking. Washing is a bit difficult because the upper try has too many ridges to properly clean. Overall is a decent purchase.

CommentsTitle: Buy it and through out the oven in your house.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 30, 2020
CommentsContent: I have to say, I will never cook with my oven again. This air fryer was so easy to use. Cleaning it is a breeze. The recipes are fun and very tasty. It has a loud alarm to let you know when food is done or needs a flip. The user manual was extremely easy to follow for first time users. I spent less time in the kitchen cooking my meals now because I use this bad boy. Also it’s pretty big, definitely had to clear some counter space for it. I do recommend it to all my family and friends.

CommentsTitle: Only a few of the buttons work. Very frustrating.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 2, 2020
CommentsContent: I usually have to  press the "on" button 10 times before it turns on. Then I just cook the food on whatever button happens to work that day. It does cook well. I make the best salmon using the "steak" setting and just run it twice. The "steak" setting seems to work the most. LOL!  I wouldn't buy  this one again.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 14, 2021
CommentsContent: This probably unfair, but in order to say do multiple foods, say brussel sprouts and salmon for dinner.....need a second unit.  Otherwise, we are continuing to use the air frier learning what works really well, such as vegetables, fish, french fries, etc., and what doesn't....baked potato!We find that we are adding more variety to our diets since we purchased the Cosori.....a couple of our adult children have asked for the link to purchase one.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 27, 2021
CommentsContent: I had a problem with the touch panel on my corsori air fryer relating to the WiFi app connectivity.  I reached out to corsori via email.  They responded within a day, asked me to send them a few items like picture of unit, short video of me trying to reset via power button, and original receipt order information from Amazon.  They responded immediately and are mailing me a new unit!  Easy!  Very happy with the result.  I love the food that this air fryer makes, absolutely recommend!!  Love it, love the company!!!  Thank you Corsori for your customer service and for standing by your product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2021
CommentsContent: Unsafe product. This product has many problems and I’ve seen several that have fallen apart and/or were defective. I’m going to give mine away. It’s not worth losing your home over due to a fire or a trip to the ER because you got burned from the handle falling. Also, issues with the basket closing and staying shut.

CommentsTitle: Best Air Fryer On The Market!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2021
CommentsContent: The BEST air fryer on the market. If you already have a pressure cooker, and a slow cooker, just buy an air fryer. It is very fast, it never heats up my kitchen, food is cooked in half the time, it is excellent for anything that you normally fry, bake, broil and grill.

CommentsTitle: So far it’s better than both my Phillips but it isn’t sturdy
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 26, 2020
CommentsContent: I used once a day since I bought this about two weeks ago and the screws fall out all over. I lost one when I washed it and now the pan is wobbly. Too many little screws and they become loose and fall out when you wash the pan and basket.It is a good airfryer. I love the way it cooks but those darn screws are awful

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 20, 2020
CommentsContent: I LOVE my Cosori air fryer! The 5.8 quart basket is big enough for my family of 4. It's easy to use. The directions are simple and the machine itself is practically fool proof.It comes with a cookbook, which has proved to be very handy.10/10 and I recommend this to all my friends who don't have an air fryer!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 24, 2021
CommentsContent: This was an impulse purchase that has proved to be one of my better impulses!  I love this air fryer, I use it on a daily basis and can’t praise it highly enough.  I use it for fresh food, never frozen, and I have to say, every day I look forward to preparing something new for dinner.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 10, 2021
CommentsContent: Everything we had hoped, obviously not as delicious as deep fat fryer food but holy crap is it better than using the oven. The difference is amazing and the ease of cleaning it was better than expected. And your house doesn't smell for days afterwards like a deep fryer...my only opinion is the wifi one that can connect to alexa is cool but completely unnecessary and pointless unless your using it almost everyday and need to preheat it on your way home from work, but honestly come on lol. Who needs that. It preheats in minutes. The only reason for buying the wifi one would be just to flex on your friends.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 5, 2020
CommentsContent: Absolutely love being able to use the app to control my air fryer. I can use the buttons on the air fryer as well, but there are way more options on the app.  It's easy to clean. Best thing to make is bacon. Super crispy and yummy as well it takes away the need to get spattered by grease. Cooks way faster than using the oven so it makes veggies a breeze.

CommentsTitle: Good but watch the screws in basket area
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 11, 2020
CommentsContent: It is a great air fryer but.... the screws are always falling out. I have never had this happen with any other air fryer I’ve owned so it gets to be a bit annoying to have tighten the screws before every use. We use it about twice a week. I’m not sure why this happens but it is definitely a design flaw. Aside from that, it cooks great.

CommentsTitle: Look no further, this is the one!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 23, 2020
CommentsContent: I purposely waited until I’ve had the product past the return date and have given it good use... I purchased this in March- it’s now June and one of my favorite gadgets in my kitchen! I use it approximately 5 days out of 7 and hardly ever turn my oven on because of this thing. Since this was my first air fryer I shopped around and read tons of reviews prior to making this purchase. Clean up is super easy and preheating literally only takes 3-4 minutes!  Extremely user friendly with endless recipe options. The perfect addition to any home space, apartment or college dorm!You’ve definitely hit the jackpot with this purchase, enjoy!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 26, 2020
CommentsContent: So far so good. Haven't tried to get too fancy with it yet. But all meats I've prepared i.e. chicken wings, breasts & thick  pork chops have come out perfect & moist. French fries came out a bit overcooked. But that could be my fault as I may have cut them too thin. Still learning, but so far I really like it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 27, 2020
CommentsContent: I personally really love this product. I’ve never used an air fryer until now and it’s great! It’s super easy to use and has a ton of presets (chicken, fish, steak, vegetables, etc). The air fryer also comes with a cookbook with a ton of recipes ranging from appetizers to desserts. The only negative thing I have to say about this air fryer is the weird smell it gives off during the first couple of uses, but otherwise, this thing works great! You can also spend the extra money to get the version that is compatible with the app, but I don’t think that’s necessary.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 22, 2019
CommentsContent: Very happy with this unit after a couple months. It does make a fair amount of fan noise, but it’s not overly annoying.Dredged whitefish has been great. Tater-tots with just one very small shot of grapeseed oil on the basket has been phenomenal. Calamari we need to tweak our time/temp, but still very good.I’d suggest a very soft cloth and a very small shot of a cleaner like “greased lightning” or similar to cut the small film you might get on the touchpad front.Overall, very content with this purchase.

CommentsTitle: Red Color is Deceiving but Great Air Fryer
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 30, 2020
CommentsContent: Love my Cosori air fryer. Very easy to use, clean and food comes out great.  I only wish the color Red Burgundy was actually color shown.  There is no Red to it. More like Burgundy or Cinnamon color. My kitchen appliances are red and purchased this thinking would match. Way off color. All in all besides color it is nice.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 17, 2019
CommentsContent: This product is amazing.  It is easy to use - you select what you are cooking and the temperature/time are automatically set (but easy to adjust if needed).  I hate the smell and mess associated with frying foods traditionally and this fryer has eliminated those issues.  My family is happy because they still get to enjoy their favorite fried foods and I am happy because it is easy to clean and much healthier.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2021
CommentsContent: This product is great. It works beautifully and is so easy to clean. I've made fries(the skinny cut is best. I reduce the time to 12 minutes for best results.  I use the fry setting a lot to cook every thing from sandwiches to fingers and veggies. I am gluten free so I dust GF flour on meats and veggies. Delicious!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2019
CommentsContent: LOVE. LOVE. LOVE this air fryer!!! It works exactly as described, easy to use & the recipes are really good. I've had to make very slight adjustments to temps & time for some fish & smaller cuts of meat but have finally perfected the adjustments so everything turns out great! And buffalo wings .....what can I say....nice & perfectly crisp!! I could go on & on!! Love this air fryer!!!!!

CommentsTitle: Cooks faster than recipe may call for be aware of food temps
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 29, 2019
CommentsContent: Worked great for cooking if you have some experience using an Airfryer, cook book has great ideas for meals but monitor the temp of the food the fryer does cook faster than most directions would indicate, my fryer unfortunate malfunctioned and does not work will be contacting customer service, I have had it a little over a month and used it 1-2 times a week depending on what we had planned for food.

CommentsTitle: Don't be afraid to get this Cosori it's GREAT!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 26, 2021
CommentsContent: If you are on the fence about getting this don't be!! It's great and and my husband wanted it.. I really didn't want one. I use it almost every day from. Vegetables, steak, burgers, homemade fries sweet potato and white potatoes. I have even done frozen oysters and they came better than frying them in a pan. Much healthier and the easiest thing to clean.  This is very unusual for me to want to write a review but I had to say how great this Cosori is.

CommentsTitle: Meh... not sure what all the fuss is about.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 21, 2020
CommentsContent: I have very limited counter and kitchen storage space so I generally avoid extra appliances that do tasks that my basic kitchen appliances can do. But, I'd heard great things about air fryers from so many people that I had to try one.  Well, this wasn't worth it.  First, the thing is loud.  Both operating the touchpad and when it is cooking your food.  The food coming out of it is... nothing special... my oven can do the same and I can monitor the food while it is cooking in the oven  Even with the XL size, I have to do multiple "loads" of food to feed my whole family.  My oven can handle all the food I need.  So, yeah, I'd like my $120 and counter space back...

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 24, 2019
CommentsContent: Man, this has to be one of the most used items I ever purchased from Amazon. I make almost everything in this air fryer if it fits. I barely use my oven anymore. This thing also reheats food like a boss. The price was great and it is really easy to use and clean. I do wish the Temperature went up +-5 instead of +-10. Example is if you want temp at 375 you have to choose between 370 and 380. Amazing that is my only complaint lol

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 12, 2021
CommentsContent: This MF right here is the MVP of air fryers. You need bacon put all your bacon in this bish, you need those French fries from McDonald's refreshed bang bang shes gotchu. The wifi thing is kinda silly but you bet your ass i hooked this bad boy up and we cooking through wifi now baby. 10 out of 10.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 1, 2020
CommentsContent: When I can actually get the buttons to respond, I love how this product cooks things. Unfortunately the buttons on the machine fail to respond to the point that I cannot adjust the time or temperature and have to choose the closest preset that I can get to work. This has been a problem since I bought the machine 7 months ago, but has gotten steadily worse to the point that even the on/off button takes several minutes of pushing to get a response.  I would not recommend this particular air fryer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 7, 2020
CommentsContent: Product overall good for its price and does the job good, spacious also. The problem is basket some times pops out automatically and fall down. This is very dangerous when kids are around. I though this is only the problem with my unit but looks like there are many number of reviews reported this issue. Not sure why this was not recalled and fixed with some solid locking mechanism.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 26, 2019
CommentsContent: I got my Cosori beginning of July, I used it quite a few times but there was a smell which I did not think was right. I had posted on Facebook asking others if they had this problem to my surprise I was contacted by the Cosori Support and they sent me a new replacement and shipping label to send mine back. They emailed me when replacement was sent and after I received it to be sure everything was okay. I was pleasantly surprised with the service. I have used my new one only a couple times but very pleased with the results. Think now I will really enjoy my Cosori and happy with my purchase.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 28, 2020
CommentsContent: Convenient and healthy. I'm trying to be more healthy as I get older. No more deep frying lumpia or chicken wings and easy baking salmon! The presets are also very convenient. Although I would love for it to have come with rack so I can put more food in it to cook! A baking paper or foil on the bottom helps with grease and cleaning.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 5, 2020
CommentsContent: Some buttons don’t work!! Not sure what to do. I can’t increase the time or temp cuz the plus doesn’t work. The fish or some other buttons don’t work, or works after 10th try! Very frustrating

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2020
CommentsContent: In one word - it’s fantastic. It has brought a revolution in our kitchen. All fries - let it be sweet potato fingers, chicken/pork chops or it’s marinated small-cut cube versions, reviving cold pizza slices - you name it. All done so nicely - I never thought possible without deep oil fry.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 30, 2020
CommentsContent: As far as cooking goes, it’s a great air fryer.As far as manufacturing goes, it’s not a great product, in fact it’s dangerous.After a few uses and being washed in the dishwasher, part the handle melted and broke off, this isn’t necessarily a safety issue, but rather just terrible construction and irritating to have on the counter.*Today the handle became loose and I found a screw and washer in the food area. This is dangerous and negligent manufacturing.*I managed to shake the bolt that accompanies the screw out also, there seems to be no way to fix them back in due to the design of the handle.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 14, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this on September 15, 2020. And it stop working in less than a month. When press on preheat button, it instantly beeps 3 times and showed “ready” , but basket and the unit still cold. The fan is blowing but there is no heat emitted. I call the customer support and it said no phone support at this time.It makes me have kinds of doubt That the ratings is real. I think it was some kinds of robots rating.

CommentsTitle: No more microwave! Perfect for college kids too
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 13, 2021
CommentsContent: It is the best thing ever, we use it for everything, reheating pastries, making french fries, heating chips, making baked weggies, etc. and everything is restaurant quality.We don't use the microwave anymore.We got 2 more for our college kids too!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 8, 2019
CommentsContent: Have had 2 Philips Air Fryers, QVC Air Fryer, Power Oven Air Fryer and this 5.8 Cosoriblows them all away ! Size, easy clean, square shape and cooking results are the best.Customer service is one of the best I've ever experienced. First Cosori worked greatbut would intermittently make a loud metal fan noise that could be eliminated witha gentle shake. On notifying Cosori they immediately sent me a new unit that worksflawlessly. If you've never purchased an air-fryer or in the market for a replacementfor your current unit, I could not give a higher recommendation than this Cosori XL  E. Joseph Villeneuve  Florence, SC  ejvcrna@me.com

CommentsTitle: Good but doesn't hold up well with regular uses. Broke after 4 months of regular use.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 3, 2019
CommentsContent: What I liked:Great air fryer for air frying lots of food at once. It does a good job crisping  food if you have some experience with the process. For example, to best crisp wings and not have any burning, its important to first cook them in the oven and finishing to crisp them in the air fryer.What I don't like:We've had the Cosori Air Fryer since mid-June ( 4 months) and the fryer basket that pulls out broke in End of October. It looks like the basket just cracked due to head damage. Now I'm trying to figure out how to reach Amazon to get a replacement basket (assuming they will make this process easy for me). I'm not sure if anyone else has had this issue but we are regular users of our air fryer. Since we bought it, we have probably used it twice a week (sometimes more). Most of the uses are of serious preparations such as wings, brussels sprout etc.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 9, 2020
CommentsContent: Love how it makes fried food taste like fried foodI lost two screws in the dishwasher and two others I’m constantly having to tighten.  Not sure whyThe buttons are hard to press and can be frustratingThe online app is amazing and my favorite feature.  Would by a different brand with wifi If I could do it again.

CommentsTitle: Product and the company behind it is outstanding
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 13, 2020
CommentsContent: This product was purchased as an accessory to the kitchen and had become an item used to prepare many types of items.  My wife is the cook in our household and for her to be excited about a kitchen item, it has to be a big deal. It has turned out to be the best kitchen addition we have ever made. We no longer eat fried food and this product has been a real winner. It has a large removable basket to ease of cleaning.We can't more highly recommend the Cosori air fryer. I also must add that when we had questions about the product the Cosori customer service response was equally responsive and satisfying.You will love this air fryer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 20, 2019
CommentsContent: Wow. Just wow. Cooked vhicken breasts in 12 minutes, used recipe book, super crispy. I was expecting soggy - NOPE. Surprised me I had to a double take. Make entire house smell like subway. Not super quiet, sounded like it was powering up to take off, but IT IS AMAZING. Id buy again in heartbeat. Ive only used twice so hopefully it lasts a long time. Perfect for 2 people. I even just ordered the inner attachments as I love it so much.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 9, 2020
CommentsContent: Love this fryer, great size for a family of 4!  Basket is easy to clean, but now that I’ve been using it for 6 months I’ve learned it’s important to clean the area of the fryer unit that’s left open when you remove the basket - I never read any of that in the maintenance facts.  So. Be sure to clean that area of your fryer - I’m working to get off some build up today.Only reason I didn’t give a full 5 star rating is because sometimes the touch screen on the unit does not respond to my touch.  When that happens, I just get on my phone and use the WiFi feature to get my unit going.  Love the WiFi feature, it even lets me know when my family is using the unit  when I’m away from home!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 15, 2020
CommentsContent: It’s a shame. I read the review of people having problems with the buttons responding on the front and thought they just got bad ones. Not the case.... this thing cooks great if you can get the buttons to work. 3/10.... would be 10/10 if it actually worked like it’s supposed to

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 13, 2021
CommentsContent: I got this fryer on special around the holidays.  I wasn't sure we would use it, but took a chance.  It's been great.  My wife and daughter use it daily for things like sweet potato fries (which are hard to crisp in the oven but come out much firmer in the fryer) and many other things.  I recommend this device.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 12, 2020
CommentsContent: It’s a nice size. Not too big but holds a lot. I’ve made burgers quite a few times and they’re great. Onion rings, bacon, fries. All good.  My favorite thing is heating up leftovers..  kFC was delicious and crispy. The best was a leftover Reuben Sandwich. It tasted better heated in the air fryer the next day.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 12, 2020
CommentsContent: For the price range, this has been the best buy during the Black Friday sale. For someone who is too lazy to cook, this has been a perfect equipment to ease that stress of cooking everyday. I love how easy it is to use with its multiple cooking presets for a variety of foods, and with the recipe book of a hundred food recipes, you will be set for quite some time. It is very easy to clean as well, only need to careful not to use any metal so as not to ruin the non-stick coating. The size is large and the price is very reasonable as well. It has already booked a permanent spot on my counter top.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 31, 2020
CommentsContent: Heavy & difficult to use. Took me several minutes to understand how to use cheap plastic button to remove basket. It’s loud & big. After using my friends Ninja air fryer (small, compact, easy to use) I was disappointed with lemon I purchased. Instructions are confusing.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 10, 2019
CommentsContent: I .bought this for my daughter for a gift.  She loves it ! So does her family ! She uses it all the time ! She likes how it saves time., and her and her husband are trying to lose weight so she can make healthy recipes in this without all the oil. She has made meat,  veggies, sweet potato fries and more. It also is good for warming stuff up too because it doesn't dry food outI think Im going to order one for myself now

CommentsTitle: Not liking the basket is not flushed to the unit, x 2 units now
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 24, 2020
CommentsContent: Just unboxed this.  I still see gaps in the basket.  It is not flushed with the body of the unit.  This will let steam or heat escape if it isn't flushed. Outer basket Teflon already peeling.  This was the replacement unit from Amazon.  Fist one was defective too.  Sending this one back too.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2020
CommentsContent: We read lots of reviews before committing to this air fryer.  We really only wanted it for fresh chicken wings and it was worth every penny!  A Costco pack of wings needs to be cooked in 2 batches, 25- 30 minutes each, but worth every minute!  I would recommend this to anyone in the market.  It's really easy to use and clean, plus is lightweight for storage.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 21, 2020
CommentsContent: Omg loved this so much and now the basket is chipped and the screws are loose?! Come on I loved it and recommended it to several friends and family and the buttons work when they want!!!! I called a number today sent me to the site cosori.com that took me to a answer question site that took my info. Blocked my card had to go to the bank get a new card cancel all my direct pays and all I want is a replacement fryer. Why is it so hard for someone to answer and replace a product that should not fall apart in two months. I loved - love it but got a defected one and my account hacked. The phone number won't work. Please send me a new one.Received a new one after ALL this and new one the basket flys out. This is the worst expensive waste ugh!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 19, 2020
CommentsContent: We have owned this for 3 months now and we love it.  This is our first one and we bought this model because it has a large capacity and a square basket so you can fit more food in easily.  Until a week or so ago I thought of it as a fryer, it is called and air fryer, right?  Well no it does so much more.  I found a recipe online while looking for a different recipe.  It was for Yorkshire pudding!  Think of this as a small, versatile cook almost anything you can fit in it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 29, 2020
CommentsContent: This is our first time of using air fryer and till now it worked well.We tried with the all basic stuff and few complicated too.All were cooked very fast according to the time.Manual was explained well and was understandable to assemble the product and also few recipes which we found good (PS: Very less vegetarian recipes).There was some foul smell for few days, but as using it that smell has lightened.Overall, we love the product and has improved as using .Good to invest in this product.I would like to recommend this product to everyone who wants to eat healthy and mainly who wants to save time.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 22, 2019
CommentsContent: Bought this after my Air Fryer XL dies after a few months and I discovered it had only a 60 day warranty. So far it has been a good product and cooks good foodThe only thing negative is could say is, I hate having to double press one button to swap between time and temperature selections , however overall I would buy again

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 25, 2019
CommentsContent: My brother had one and strongly recommended it... I was hopeful, but didn't expect it to be as good as it is... my wife thought I bought another failure, until she tasted my first batch of fries... she still doubted, but then made the juiciest lemon pepper chicken.... now she uses it more than me.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 10, 2019
CommentsContent: I'm really impressed with this product. I purchased it as a replacement for the "other" brand after it started having issues. The Cosori is a fantastic little machine. Its super quiet, easy to clean, and cooks wonderfully. Our food comes out perfectly and its surprisingly quiet! You won't be disappointed with this at all!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2020
CommentsContent: I love the fact that I can control it using my phone. I found it is easier than pressing the buttons from the air fryer because they don’t respond as quickly as I wish to. And the cooking is great the fries are delicious and it’s easy to clean. I don’t like the screen because of the buttons and if I clean it I see some weird lines on the screen not sure why. But overall it’s great

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 21, 2020
CommentsContent: Absolutely love this item. Easy to operate and clean. Programs are cool features and WiFi makes it easy to program. Loving it throughout this heat wave we’re having here now. I can prepare meals easily without standing over hot stove or oven. I can cook, roast, and bake in this air fryer. Way to go Cosari!  I bought one for my two sons and their families as well as one for my college age daughter living in the dorm yay me! Lol

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 3, 2020
CommentsContent: I've had the air fryer for about a month now and with one exception have been very happy with the purchase. It's a nice improvement over the T-Fal air fryer I had been using. The feature that I like most over the T-fal is the 2 piece square basket design over the T-Fal's single piece round basket. Ironically the basket is also my single disappointment with the product. I cooked up some frozen chicken the other day and was surprised when I found a screw and washer in with my food. On examining the basket I found that one of the screws that hold the handle in place was missing and the other two were very loose. A simple fix to tighten them back up again but a bit disappointing all the same.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 21, 2020
CommentsContent: I wouldn’t know how this works because the whole thing is defective. After trying to connect it via WiFi and finding out the app is garbage and that won’t work I tried to use it manually and come to find out the display is defective and most of the buttons don’t work. Waste of time and money and now I have to make a stop at the ups store to return.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 2, 2020
CommentsContent: Wow!! This thing has been amazing. My first air fryer and I love it. Easy to use buttons on the front and big enough basket to hold half bag of fries at a time! Get an 8" round baking pan it helps with easy omelets in 8 mins! Also great for heating certain foods which taste so much better than using a microwave.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 29, 2020
CommentsContent: doesnt work straight out of the box. touch screen completely unresponsive. customer support had me on hold for 15 minutes, told me two people were ahead of me, eventually told me i was next, then said noone was available to help me and to leave a message.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 4, 2021
CommentsContent: It was a gift for my brother (which he loves)..I have one of my own. They work well. This is my second one . The first one quit working about a year after purchase. I contacted customer service and sent me a new one. You can’t beat that. That was the main reason for my purchase for my brother. Good customer service and they stood behind there product. That’s all most unheard of these days.

CommentsTitle: Keep your eye on your food
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 21, 2020
CommentsContent: Works pretty good, you will need to adjust times, so check on food while cooking, does a great job on bacon, and baking biscuits, best grilled cheese ever, but, it's large, wish I had bought the one that folds up out of the way, but my kitchen space is lacking, so if you have room, get it

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 9, 2021
CommentsContent: This was a Christmas gift and it is so easy to use and so easy to clean. The times to cook are off on the recipes but the seasonings are great when used as if you were going to cook in the oven or fryer.  Foods are crispy outside and juice inside.  Love mine.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 26, 2020
CommentsContent: Nice Fryer. Only had it for a week. Works great so far. Good recipes included in a booklet.I fix the best pre-buttered English muffins(cut into half and butter before cooking). Use only the Warm-up option at 360 degrees for 4 minutes. They end up perfect and lightly crisp.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2020
CommentsContent: I really enjoy an air fryer and feel like I’m more creative with my meals because of it. However I’m very disappointed that I spent so much on a product and the manual controls don’t work well. It works well with app but not well without it. I will be contacting manufacturer.

CommentsTitle: Cheaply made, fell apart, cooking is adequate
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 27, 2020
CommentsContent: This is our first “air fryer.” Initially it seemed good. The release button made me weary from my he second I touched it. It’s the very hard, clear plastic piece,(which is supposed to slide and be pushed in).The overall cooking and cooking selections are good. However, we’ve owned it for about 2 months, using it a few times a week and the screws and washers holding the cooking surface and drainage area have came apart. I found most of the pieces and put it back together...conclusion, it’s cheaply made, looks great but falls apart after 30 or so uses...

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 20, 2020
CommentsContent: Wow. What a bummer. The buttons only worked intermittently before going out completely after the very first use!! We just got this and were able to cook one thing in it, which cooked great, but the touch screen buttons were barely working, it was a miracle we got it to cook that one and only time!! So so disappointed. Going to return

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 16, 2020
CommentsContent: We absolutely love this air fryer.  It is everything that was promised in the features!  We would definitely recommend this to any one.  Love the way the food is crisp on the outside and tender on the inside, and so glad that we don't have to deep fat fry anymore!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 22, 2019
CommentsContent: I ordered the smaller version first and quickly found how so many foods are cooked perfectly in the air fryer, so I ended up ordering this larger version for my kitchen. So useful! I use it daily. Easy to clean, easy to learn to use, quiet motor and makes frying foods healthier with no mess. I love it!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 22, 2021
CommentsContent: I love my cosori air fryer, it is easy to use and clean and the taste of the food comes out delicious. I was able to enjoy my cosori  air fryer twice before something happened where I could not get the inner pan to lock in place. I could not figure out why because  everything looked exactly the same. I contacted cosori customer service  and a representative assisted and looked into the issue for me. He was very nice and gave me superb customer service. I sent him photos  to better explain the issue. Cosori  cares about their customers and goes above and beyond to help them on top of their amazing product! Thank you Cosori!

CommentsTitle: Does what it says. I recommend it.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 16, 2019
CommentsContent: This is my first cosori product purchase. I am very happy with my decision. Recipe book thay comes with it is amazing too. Have tried a few recipes from it already. Bakery items come out really well. Fried items become a little dry with a little resting time. But I guess this probably is because of little to no oil usage.Overall I am really happy with my cosori 5.8 qt  air fryer

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 6, 2019
CommentsContent: I received my Cosori air fryer Tuesday and was going to save it for Christmas but just couldn't wait to try it! It not only came with easy to follow instructions on how to use the air fryer, it also came with an awesome cookbook with several different delicious recipes. I decided to try making chicken legs in my fryer. They were simple to make and I was really surprised how nice and crunchy the outside was and still moist and tender on the inside.  The clean up was also a breeze! Cleans up real easy with soap and water.  I hope it lasts a long time....I'll have to update you on the longevity of this particular fryer.I strongly recommend this product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 29, 2020
CommentsContent: Do not buy this unless you like cleaning. We exchanged first one because something was loose inside/rattling noise. The replacement was worse, although it didn’t rattle. The basket does not properly fit. A few times it shot out of the air fryer throwing food everywhere. Lol. Not kidding. It leaks out the bottom. Also the basket doesn’t clip correctly to the bottom part, so when you remove it from the airfryer it falls apart, spills everywhere. Our return window has closed, so we are going to throw it away. Ps- the heating part works great. 👍. LOL

CommentsTitle: cosori make some of the best cooking  appliances cooks fast
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 22, 2019
CommentsContent: i Can’t begin to say enough about this air fryer I need and upgrade and I got this one not only cause it I love this brand cosori has some of the best kitchen  appliances I’ve ever gotten in this air fryer is by far the best not only does it cook faster but cleaning it is a breeze not like your other ones the you have to soak it and it’s never really fully clean doesn’t take a lot of counter space it’s not loud about the same noise as having a  Air conditioner onmy only complaint would be is that when you put the  drawer back in you have to push it to make sure it in there it doesn’t bother me as much but just a not it’s not broken it’s just amazing

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2021
CommentsContent: Love the square basket, it holds a LOT of food. Glad I got the larger size. Works great, very easy to use and clean. Would definitely buy again!! Bought the red color and its a darker matte red, looks really nice. Have made so many delicious meals in it!

CommentsTitle: Best thing I have in my kitchen.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2020
CommentsContent: I absolutely love this air fryer!!! I decided to pull the trigger and purchase this after seeing it in deal of the day and I am so happy I did. It's super easy to use, the food comes out so moist and delicious,  I use it almost everyday. Definitely worth every penny. I cook almost everything in it my favorite is chicken and veggies. Dont wait any longer and buy this machine, you will not regret it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 15, 2020
CommentsContent: It worked great, but the plastic handle broke off after 10 months.  It is designed to only start with the handle in place so we have to buy another.  They all look like they have plastic handles.  Will now stir contents and not shake as is suggested by manufacturer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 10, 2019
CommentsContent: Very impressed with this Air Fryer. I owned a few and even though the others had a larger capacity with horizontal cooking grates, this uses a basket which is removable and allowes you to separate from the plastic housing for cleaning, but also for draining extra fluids that have accumulated (frozen foods, etc) easy startup guide was actually easy, and the touch screen is responsive (didnt have to double tap anything). So far I have cooked wings in it and it does a GREAT job. I used some spray cooking oil for a little crisp and it did exactly that. I gave it 5 stars for everything because it really does perform. Very happy with the purchase.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 18, 2020
CommentsContent: This Air Fryer is awesome. Works so well and is a great size. All of the features it has are awesome and the recipe book it comes with is great. Biggest perk is that you can put the parts in the dishwasher! Well worth the price. We had a Phillips before this one that was more expensive and not as good quality.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 19, 2021
CommentsContent: Because there are only two of us at home, I purchased the smaller 3.7 Quart Cosori air fryer.  I thought it would be easier to store.  It is very easy to use and cleans up beautifully.  We took it to our vacation home, and used it there.  Then decided we needed to buy the 5.8 Quart one for home, and leave the 3.7 Quart on at our vacation home.  We cooked a whole chicken in the big one and decided it was better than any cooked chicken you buy at the store.  We are glad we got the 5.8 Quart one for home, even for the just two of us.  And it is just as easy to store, and clean.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 25, 2019
CommentsContent: I was in the market for months trying to find the best one. I’ve used a couple of friends and had something specific in mind. Wanted it big enough I didn’t have to make multiple batches. Went for the 5.8 quart and I’m impressed. If i can’t cook in it I really don’t cook.Turkey burgers- Chicken setting for 18 min, flip once. So nice didn’t have to sit and wait at the hot stove and have juices splatter everywhere.Chicken breast- chicken setting for 15 min, flip once, so juicy and soft.I cook a lot of my frozen veggies in here.Reheated a cheesesteak and it was soooo crunchy on the outside tbh better than when I first bought it!My roommate made skinny taste bagels in here so perfectly. Clean up is super easy just 2 things to clean really. I couldn’t be happier! Def recommend.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 5, 2019
CommentsContent: This air fryer works great.  Anything I've cooked in it has come out outstanding.  Any type of chicken I've cooked has been amazing!  Chicken breasts are very tender and there's no need to cut into thin slices.  Thighs and drumsticks are better than a restaurant and the best part...no deep frying in oil!  Just a little dab of olive oil spray and that's all it takes for a great crunch!  My salmon has come out delicious.  It may take less time than it calls for in the cook book.  I pretty much set my own temperatures and time limit.  The only thing I can say that I disliked about it was it smelled a little like plastic for the first couple of uses but went away thereafter.  I like the fact that it is PFOA-free & BPA-free and the size is perfect for my counter space.  I've seen some of the comments with a less rating but I have not had any issues with it.  It has worked pretty good for me.  I would recommend this product.

CommentsTitle: Great but problems with basket popping open.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 21, 2020
CommentsContent: Bought this as a gift for my daughter. It was nice, but the basket kept popping out while she was using it. The company itself did send her a new one, but it does the same thing. She would love it if this didn’t happen periodically with the basket. Company even told her to keep the older one.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 6, 2020
CommentsContent: I LOVE my air fryer. It’s so sleek and looks good on my counter. My food comes out perfect with the settings for the most part. Sometimes I have to do some adjusting but once I tweak it to the right temperature and time, so yummmmmy! And it’s such a healthier option than frying. I use about a tsp-tbsp of oil, depending on what I’m cooking. One of my best buy’s to date!

CommentsTitle: UPDATE: They sent me New AirFryer----Temp and Time buttons do not work correctly
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 30, 2020
CommentsContent: UPDATE: After the first review and me contacting them. They have sent me a new airfryer and OMG it works so easy and it is GREAT. Love it!!The main issue I have with this product is my buttons have never worked correctly. When I push the buttons they may work or may not. Most of the time I just have to use the preset buttons because I can not get the temp button to change the temperature or even the time button to change the time.

CommentsTitle: The touch panel is not working
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 2, 2020
CommentsContent: This is very bad that the touch panel is not working well. We are waitting for about 4-5 weeks and finally get our air fryer delivered, but the touch panel is totally not working excepted on/off button. we just tired about waiting for another 4 weeks to get an replacement so better return it and get one from local store.

CommentsTitle: Amazing product! Super easy to use, clean and great customer care from Cosori!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 1, 2020
CommentsContent: This product has been amazing and a great addition to my kitchen. Extremely easy to use and so nice to not to have to stand over a skillet while cooking - I just pop the food in there and do something else until it's done. Clean up and easy and it comes with a recipe book. The customer service was amazing after I somehow lost the screws that attach the inside basket. 10/10 recommend!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 9, 2019
CommentsContent: I purchased this item because I lost my spouse and did not want to spend a lot of time preparing meals and cleaning up afterwards. The ease of use and time to prepare meals is easy and the clean up afterwards is great. I used to eat a lot of grilled foods on a vented cook top so the flavor is not quite the same, however the health benefits are great as I have lost weight from eliminating the fats, and butters. I am still experimenting with new items and times with good results. Start at a known temp for an item and play with times, I start with short times and work up from there until I determine my desired level of being done. Works great for frozen meats in case you forgot to take them out of the freezer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 20, 2020
CommentsContent: This air fryer is amazing! You don’t even need oil to make something really crunchy. I love using this for making quesadillas. (Tip: if you make a quesadilla sandwich make sure you stick the top tortilla to the cheese and inside toppings, or else the tortilla will be sucked up to the top of the air fryer and it will burn.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 4, 2020
CommentsContent: First:  Would not have purchased this product had I known more about it.  Seems to overcook items such as chicken wings and vegetables if you go by the presets or recommended settings. Second, there isn't a feasible way to determine if raw items such as chicken or fish will be actually cooked through.  In an oven, you can bake a chicken for 1 1/2 hours and you know it will be cooked through.  Also we tried to call  Cosori company well into their posted hours and were advised the company was closed.  We left a message and it took them a week to respond. Also, the digital touch screen is very temperamental.  Touching directly, didn't really turn it on.  I had to almost wave my finger gently across the blue light for it to respond.  It took several attempts to turn the unit on.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 28, 2020
CommentsContent: Why did I wait so long to purchase an air fryer?  Don't hesitate a minute to purchase this.  It is very easy to use and takes up only a small portion of my countertop.  It has a large basket and can hold a large amount of food.  I have used this to make fajitas, wings, sausage and peppers, pork chops, etc.  It is great to use in the summer - it doesn't heat up the house like my oven does. It is very easy to clean as well.  Well worth the price!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 30, 2020
CommentsContent: followed all he directions and took care of it very well...  used about 10x over 5 months...  just stopped working...  no product support

CommentsTitle: I may not know my way around the kitchen but.........
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 31, 2021
CommentsContent: I can’t really give an honest opinion as I do not cook. However, my husband (who makes a meal every single night with a rare occasion of takeout once every two months) seems thrilled. He uses it about once a week and everything tastes delicious! Also the little cookbook/meal suggestion ideas that came included has been a great guide. I may not know my way around the kitchen but I know what to buy for a husband that does :)

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 28, 2019
CommentsContent: I was hesitant to purchase an air fryer because I love to cook and I just couldn't imagine food being that good--that fast!  I was wrong.  My first time using it, I put chicken drumsticks in it, with fresh lemon juice, Himalayan sea salt, cracked black pepper, garlic powder and herbs de provence, and a little olive oil.  The chicken was not only crunchy on the outside but juicy on the inside.  I love this cooker.  This morning I threw in some fresh broccoli and roasted it.  It was so good.  I just love it! I will be using this a lot!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 10, 2020
CommentsContent: Delivery and receipt of products are very punctual!  After several weeks of continuous use, the product performs well!  It feels so easy to use , I didn’t know how to cook, but now I can make a lot of delicious dishes with this air fryer!  And easy to clean!  Easy to use!  highly recommended!  👍

CommentsTitle: Couldn't Ask For A Better Company Experience!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 17, 2020
CommentsContent: Great company customer service! The fryer I ordered was defective (steam would condense inside the LED panel after one use and the buttons would not work until it dried out.) I contacted the company and they were EXCELLENT about sending me a new fryer! The new one works fine and produces awesome wings!  The basket is large and cleanup is exceptionally easy!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 24, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   We purchased this item and did not keep the box. The drawer portion of the air fryer pops out on it’s own randomly and smoke seeps out from the cracks. It turns off on its own as well and the product is clearly defective. Very frustrated because I cannot return it because I don’t have the original packaging.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 30, 2021
CommentsContent: Update to previous review:  my fryer did not quit working, I had a breaker issue.  Still love my fryer and would recommend it.  Would buy again.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 27, 2019
CommentsContent: Did some research and Cosori came out on top in large part because of capacity (5.8 qt), square shaped basket, ease of clean up (only two pieces involved go straight into dishwasher), and there were a lot of youtube reviews. Two year warranty. Company really stands behind its product. Amazon had the best price. Sometimes they have coupons you can attach to it. If you buy the older model, that knocks a few more dollars off it. I've been using it for a couple of weeks. I love using it and the family loves the food coming out of it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 24, 2021
CommentsContent: Soooo easy to use.  I haven’t eaten at a fast food restaurant since I bought this 7/2020.  Really great with meats. I still cook vegetables on the stove and a few other things.My favorite is going from a frozen burger to a hamburger in 8 minutes.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 3, 2020
CommentsContent: I've cooked turkey bacon, regular bacon, battered fish and a few other things in this so far and so far its great! I tried to make pizza using Tortilla wraps instead of dough and that's where I had problems, I think the air lifted the Tortilla up to the burner and caused it to burn. So don't cook anything too light in it lol.

CommentsTitle: We've tried buying this unit in different colors twice, both arrived cracked
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 1, 2020
CommentsContent: The lower portion of this device appears prone to breaking, the first unit arrived in pieces and the bottom never made it out of the box, the second one, has a crack about 2" long on the bottom and seems like there is a serious lack of quality control \ design flaw that makes it prone to breaking. Buy something else, don't waste your time here.

CommentsTitle: Stop thinking about it and buy it
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 9, 2019
CommentsContent: I can't say enough good about getting an air fryer. I just wish I had gotten one a long time ago. The food is fantastic, cleanup is easy, the fat calories are lower. What more can you ask for?We decided to cook marinated salmon fillets and now we've had them 3 Sundays in a row because they are so dang good. A little trick is to use parchment paper and then clean up is a breeze.

CommentsTitle: convenience and varied things to cook
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 4, 2019
CommentsContent: It takes a little time to convert over recipes and getting familiar with new cooking times, but the variety of foods to make are endless. I have a convection large oven so I can combine it with the air fryer for combinations of foods. I love my Cosori. You Tube is a good resource.John D

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2021
CommentsContent: I seen this product used on YouTube, couldn’t believe how perfect the food came out.  I had to rush to purchase on off her link in description box.  I finally used it today and I’m AMAZED how simple it was to use, the crispness of the wings 🤩

CommentsTitle: Works better than the last one that I loved
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 10, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this one as a replacement to one I had for 8 years and used militiamen’s times a week.I love the size for my family, easy to clean and easy to use. Today was my first time using this one and the baked potato cake out perfect. Soft and fluffy inside with a crispy skin.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 1, 2020
CommentsContent: The fryer is simple to use and the cookbook provided excellent guidance and recipes. The wifi connected feature is nice too,

CommentsTitle: This fryer does what it is supposed to do.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 2, 2019
CommentsContent: I find that this fryer is very easy to clean and with care will remain so. It does just what it is designed to do. I think I had unrealistic exceptions for an air fryer. They are not going to be as versatile as a deep fat fryer so be realistic about that. That said, I believe this COSORI fryer is as good and any of the air fryers out there.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 6, 2020
CommentsContent: OK absolutely love my air fryer.
