One small thing it’s hard to get the baskets and attached from one another it’s sort of sticks but it seems to be loosening up a bit - this is after you cook and you want to clean it.Makes the bomb pork chops-The best roasted potatoes chopped up rosemary potatoes/ A baked potato is delicious.  The best chicken wings you’ve ever eaten!  I also made crab cakes in it.It is sort of large I keep mine on the floor out of the way and I just put it on the counter and it cooks up everything super easy and ready to go and you can find a lot of air fryer recipes on Pinterest.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 26, 2021
CommentsContent: Ran the air fryer for 5 minutes and had to turn it off because of an awful chemical smell. I can't believe this item is listed in the Amazon's Choice. How disappointing.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 28, 2020
CommentsContent: I have owned multiple air fryers, this one is really easy to clean, gets hot quickly and is durable.  I would recommend to a friend.  The preset settings are a little off but you can just as easily turn it to whatever temp/time you need.  Would prefer if the buttons were a little easier to use.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 5, 2019
CommentsContent: Very impressed with this air fryer. Works very well, cooks fast. The buttons for ea item are accurate.Preset buttons work well and cook things perfectly. Large basket holds plenty of food. Shake reminder tells you when to move food around. I was hesitant to buy another gimmicky sm appliance. Already have several unused things in the cabinet.We use this alot. Cooks anything.

CommentsTitle: I don’t know how I lived this long without one!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 3, 2020
CommentsContent: My air fryer has been the answer to my prayers. I’m not the best cook, and out of our family of 5, I am the only female. Boys eat a ton! And they can eat stuff that if I even smell, I gain weight. Ugh. I am also still trying to get in shape after our last baby (he’s a year).  This makes cooking healthy SO EASY. I have our 1 year old happily eating kale chips!! Like whose kid is this??! The sweet potato fries are insanely good. It’s amazing. Buy one. Buy THIS one. The fryer basket is big enough to fit an entire chicken in and it is so easy to clean. You’ll thank me later.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 20, 2020
CommentsContent: Very pleased with this unit. My daughter purchased one & recommended, so we tried it and were very pleased.  Pork chops, chicken, tuna patties, french fries and breaded mushrooms are a few items we’ve had good results with.  My thought is the unit is cleaner, healthier, faster and produces better tasting food than the old stovetop method.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 30, 2020
CommentsContent: Purchased for family used 2 times and no longer turns on.  The touch screen seems to be a big problem.  Either too sensitive or not sensitive enough I guess.  Was extremely disappointed was unable to use after only 2 uses.  Will explore other brands not touchscreen.  Never connected to my wifi either, just kept sayin connection failed and I have the highest speed internet and a wifi booster.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 16, 2020
CommentsContent: We like the actual cooking process of this air fryer, it does a great job there and the recipe book is helpful.  However the touch controls do a very poor job.  If you do not mind it taking several frustrating tries, repeatedly pressing the controls to set up the cooking program, then it does a good job once the program starts.  In an age where touch controls are on practically everything, this air fryer really disappointed us.  I would not recommend this brand for this reason.

CommentsTitle: It is nothing more than an oven.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 5, 2019
CommentsContent: I really bought this thinking that I would get something beyond what my oven can do, especially with fries. I love to make fries, and I read that this could get me closer to crispiness that I had been missing with my oven. That turned out to be false. That said, it is a good oven. It is efficient as an oven, but it is just an oven. It should be sold as an oven because that is how it works. Do not expect to get something more than that. If you are looking for a counter-top oven because you do not want a microwave, then get this.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 19, 2019
CommentsContent: Finally purchased my Cosori Air Fryer on Prime day and I'm VERY pleased.First thing made was grilled cheese sandwich.  Came out perfect and crispy never knew I could have a grill cheese that GOOD!  It's light weight and does not take up much kitchen space.  Recipe book comes with 100 recipes and looks good and easy to fix.  I'm looking forward to making many more great dishes with this air fryer.

CommentsTitle: Frys everything perfectly and the food taste great!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2020
CommentsContent: I cooked ribs and Cornish hens in my air fryer. I love that I researched air fryers and purchased this brand. It has a high temperature of 400* degrees, the basket it large enough fry a meal for a small family and cleaning after each use is easy.It cooks everything. I adjust the longer cook time to my taste. Everything has tasted excellent.I don’t like the push button release for the basket. My Thumb nail is long.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 29, 2020
CommentsContent: This makes frying food so much easier. I keep recommending this to others. We don't really use the oven much in my household and we are using this as a replacement for microwave and oven. My store-bought takoyaki (and other premade fried food) finally taste crispy on the outside and mushy on the inside!!

CommentsTitle: Turns off and won’t turn on again
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 15, 2020
CommentsContent: Not sure if it was only me but from day one it’s just turns off, within minutes of using it,  sometimes it goes for 15 mins without a problem, I would not buy this again!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 26, 2020
CommentsContent: I love my air fryer and it is now used significantly more than my toaster oven.  It is my go to appliance in the kitchen from tortilla chips to veges.  I gave it four stars because the screw in the basket fell out after a couple months.  This happened to the fryer purchased for my son, too.  With that said, Cosori customer support is exceptionally good.  It was very easy to communicate with customer service at Cosori, they were more than happy to make things right, and I will buy from them again.  I highly recommend them.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 2, 2021
CommentsContent: So far....so good.  We probably did not need the multiple buttons with programmed cooking times,  After using it several times, we can program it ourselves.  Basket and tray are easy to clean.  Basket size is large enough to accommodate almost all dishes.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 6, 2020
CommentsContent: Got this on a recent run of the Treasure Truck near my location. A very good price; there is a learning curve as you try different foods but so far, LOVE the many features. Tater Tots and fries finally come out the way we love them with just the right amount of crunch and no grease!  Quick preheat which is great and VERY easy to clean!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2020
CommentsContent: Perfect air fryer for my needs! Made great steak and fried steak today (first use), and the ability to control it from my phone (vie VeSync app) is even better! For the price point, and the capability, this is a great deal! I just need to learn how to better prepare (with recipes made for air frying) items and utilize the benefits of less (if any) oil..

CommentsTitle: Don’t think about it, just buy it
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 8, 2020
CommentsContent: Bought this as a gift for my friends birthday and she absolutely love it. We experimented with ribs and they were delicious. Can’t wait to test out more recipes!Update: Rotisserie Chicken in the air fryer. We made ranch wings the day before yesterday, but I forgot to take pictures.

CommentsTitle: Great size, cooks well, vents hard to clean.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 27, 2021
CommentsContent: I love rhe size of the basket. The food comes out great. Sometimes I add 3 more min on 400 to really crisp. Frozen fries better then homemade in this. Only con is cleaning the basket. The air vents are very hard to clean. I need to buy a small brush or something to get in those vents. Vinegar added to soapy water works best. I use it every day for something. Great buy!

CommentsTitle: Doesn't over cook and keeps your food moist.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 22, 2020
CommentsContent: I'm glad I didn't base my decision off of the reviews, because I would have missed out on those fabulous air fryer. I would definitely recommend this to anyone. Oh, I also got the echo dot and contacting it to the air fryer was very easy.1. Setting it up via bluetooth was very easy. Once I installed the app it was smooth sailing.  I used my tablet to select my menus and always used the preheat.2. My meal came out perfect. The roasted eggplant wasn't over done nor did it over cook my salmon.3. Clean up was very easy since I purchased the liners, which minimize contact with the basket..

CommentsTitle: Excellent fryer for fried food and others
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 3, 2020
CommentsContent: It’s very easy to use, and the oil used to cook is much less than the traditional fried food, the cooking time is also reduced a lot, food flavor is good too, we tried chicken, fish and tofu, love it. Forgot to mention one thing, it won’t generate the deep fried food’s heavy smell.

CommentsTitle: Why Didn't We Get One Sooner?!?!?!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 8, 2020
CommentsContent: This thing is much larger (and heavier) than I anticipated! It. Is. Freaking. Beautiful. I've  had to change my diet as of late and this air fryer is my GODSEND. I think I'm going to get on for my mom and sisters. They definitely need one of these.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 8, 2021
CommentsContent: I've been thinking about purchasing an air fryer for quite some time now, but was hesitant because I thought it might be something I wouldn't use much. Finally made the purchase and happy that I did. Foods come out crispy and good tasting and it's a very easy clean up.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2020
CommentsContent: This is a great addition for the kitchen.  The only negative is that with a family of 4, I sometimes have to do multiple batches while keeping cooked food warm.  This is perfect for a family of 1-3 people.  My favorite part is I can get my frozen french fries crispy without the oil and quicker than in the oven or fryer.  It does take some trial and error on cooking times and temp.  Until you know for sure, it is best to stay close and keep opening and checking and depending on what you are cooking, shaking.  Highly recommend this product.

CommentsTitle: Cosori Air Fryer Handle Needs a Revamp
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 18, 2020
CommentsContent: I am a personal trainer got this on 2/14/19 and use it regularly to cook nutritious meals.  I loved it initially and today the handle fell right off.  It looks like the heat melted away the plastic.  I was raving about it to everyone & told of my clients to buy one.  Today however, as I was actually showing and demonstrating to clients how I use it to cook healthy options and it literally fell apart as I picked it up to show them how easy it was to clean it.  It was kind of comical though.  I am wondering if it was possibly a defect that made the handle melt off?

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 12, 2020
CommentsContent: Keeps popping open

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 12, 2021
CommentsContent: I've had this air fryer for a while now as it was a Christmas gift, after a lot of use the handle became brittle and broke off due to I'm guessing heat, I reached out to customer service and they are sending a new basket with handle to me.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 30, 2019
CommentsContent: This is my first air fryer.  Once you get one you won't go back!  Cuts cooking time by 50% to 75% compared to oven, grill, or stove and cooks very consistently.  To give you an idea on what you can do, I cooked five frozen biscuits in less than 10 minutes with no preheat to a perfect golden brown, straight out of the freezer.  My convection over can't even do as well.  This fryer is working spectacularly.  Definitely a recommend.  Just keep in mind, you will need to drop your temperatures on almost everything you cook because this provides a very concentrated heat.  It takes a bit but it's easy to figure out temps and times in order to achieve perfection.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2020
CommentsContent: This machine eliminates multiple pans and fryers, I went for a large air fryer and I am very happy with the amount of wings it can cook. So far our favorite food out of this is Cumin Tumeric Cauliflower, amazing.One thing I would watch, the time to cook items is overstated, found times off by about 3 minutes or more, so pause and check until you get it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 26, 2019
CommentsContent: When I bought "another appliance to take up space" (my husband's words, not mine), I thought I would use it a couple of times a month.  See the pics of the food I've made?!?  Yeah, I use this bad boy EVERY DAY.  Sometimes multiple times a day.  My husband has been converted and has dubbed my Cosori "THE MAGIC BOX."  When he hears it preheating, he comes running to see what I'm cooking.  Buy this.  You will NOT regret it.  I mean, seriously, look at the pics of my delicious food.  Salmon -- best salmon I've ever had/made/eaten.  Nuggets?  Those bad boys are coated in pork panko to make them keto.  OMG, to die for.  Jalapeno poppers?  OH YEAH.  Steak?  In an air fryer?  YESSSSIR!  Do not hesitate.  Buy it.  Then come back here and thank me.

CommentsTitle: Liked it so much, I bought another.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 18, 2020
CommentsContent: Didn't take long to become comfortable with the air-frying times. I use it weekly and am happy with the taste, consistency and quickness of preparation. My daughter liked it too, so I bought her one for Christmas. Just too bad they don't make it with a bigger basket so I could cook a larger quantity rather than having to do it in multiple steps.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 1, 2021
CommentsContent: Loving the convenience, easy to use, cooks evenly. Watch for rust: only had this a month and the basket is already rusting at the seam (rust stains weeping from the seam).

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2021
CommentsContent: I liked this, but after a year and a half, the handle broke off as I lifted the hot basket out and the basket and food fell onto the floor. Dangerous, and also expensive if it doesn't last longer. I'm going to look for a different one.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 18, 2020
CommentsContent: I did a lot of research on these fryers. My previous one lasted 1 year. It had a whopping 90 day warranty. This Cosori comes with  a 1 year warranty, but they will add an additional year if you register your fryer with them online. Easy process. It is also made in the USA in Anaheim California. My wife loves it!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 4, 2020
CommentsContent: Have used many times bacon ,chicken, fries ,steak and many other things. had problem with basket popping out on finishing cooking. It flew completely out once but by being more forceful on putting back in , seems to be working so far. Looking forward to more cooking adventures in the future.

CommentsTitle: Outstanding customer service and they backup there products.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2019
CommentsContent: I must say COSORI is a great company.  I had a COSORI 5.8 Qt. Fryer that after 5 months will shut off by itself and would not turn on until it got cool.  I call them and they replace it with a new one immediately.  They back up there products and warranty.  I am very happy.  I will always buy COSORI products.  Thank you very much for your excellent customer service.

CommentsTitle: Healthy food, easy prepare, no messy kitchen!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 24, 2020
CommentsContent: Beginner cookers, healthy eaters! Easiest and cleanest way to cook. The food making process was fast, easy to clean. Little noise, no smell.Extra cooking book was helpful for the food choice and the preparing! I bought the white one, it looks timeless.It was a great gift for my college kid.

CommentsTitle: Love to use it but basket keeps breaking
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 19, 2020
CommentsContent: We love to cook food in the air fryer.  Our favorite treat is donuts made out of Grands biscuit dough.  Our only complaint is that the basket keeps coming apart.  We have put the screws back in several times, but it still keeps coming apart.

CommentsTitle: It came fire and blast when plugin so terrible and worst
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 30, 2019
CommentsContent: Neaver buy this i send to my sister as gift and it blast and fire with smoke inside when plugin so terrible ....😡😡😡😡😡😡  I send gift to my sister after 6 year for first time and it was worst my heart really broke down . Amazon refund me but it I am so sameful infront of my sister

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 5, 2021
CommentsContent: I'm NEVER using my oven again!!!  Air Fryer is the way to go!!  Cooking has never been so easy..... Less dishes, Less stress makes this Girl VERY HAPPY!!!  Highly recommend for kids, college students, single people, elderly & mom's on the go!!  I have two boys 11&13 & they make their own fair food with the air fryer....  Corn Dogs, French Fries, Chicken Strips, Waffle Fries, Poppers, Tornados, Mozzarella Sticks, etc.....This is probably my BEST Amazon purchase yet and I buy daily....I also NEVER write reviews soooo........BUY THE AIR FRYER, You will LOVE IT, I PROMISE!!!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 13, 2019
CommentsContent: I love this air fryer. I have tried pork chops, chicken, brats, burger and baked potatoes, everything turned out delicious. I have the mid size, which is great for two people.

CommentsTitle: This is a superior air fryer!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 27, 2019
CommentsContent: So convenient to use. I find myself using this air fryer everyday. You really can cook anything in it. Makes great salmon and bakes sweet potatoes just like the oven. I bought a small set of pans to use and also use them everyday. Clean up is a breeze. A little soap and water or the dishwasher.

CommentsTitle: Quick, easy but taste isn’t that great.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 29, 2019
CommentsContent: The flavor doesn’t taste as great as cooking it in the oven or stovetop. It has a weird after taste, I can’t describe the taste but it’s there after every meal. Total yuck!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2021
CommentsContent: Item arrived well packed and protected.Easy set-up.  Followed initial cleaning and test run instructions and no issue with any unusual odors while cooking.First test dinner was a siracha cauliflower nuggets - reheated!  A good test as it can often come out somewhat soggy out of the oven.  They browned up nicely in the air fryer and had lovely crisp edges!A great start - looking forward to trying out more recipes!

CommentsTitle: WONDERFUL !!! Where have you been all my Life !!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 21, 2020
CommentsContent: I wish I had bought this sooner ! It’s Great !My granddaughter loves chicken nuggets, I have always put them in the microwave. They come out gummy. I made them in the AF and they were crispy and juicy !  I also made grilled cheese sandwich and it was also great !

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 21, 2021
CommentsContent: The manual buttons never worked when it arrived and still don't work almost a year later. We have hardly used it, glad I just looked through my manual as I just realized I can have it replaced under a one year warranty that I didn't know I had. I still do not recommend. I will most likely sell the new one that I receive.

CommentsTitle: I can not say enough about this
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 7, 2020
CommentsContent: It is so easy to use and it is amazing we love it fries and especially tator tots come out amazing even better than oven and baked potatoes are to die for and I cant say enough about this product chicken comes out moist inside and crisp outside....pork chops are delicious cant wait to try more stuff yea

CommentsTitle: Convenient, easy, food tastes great, and little to no mess!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2020
CommentsContent: I love the convenience of this air fryer.  I preferred the digital version because it is easy to wipe down.  It is so easy to use and very little clean up.  My first experience was making my own sweet potato fries, just a light spray of olive oil and they turned out perfect.  I have done chicken breasts, and frozen steak fries too.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 24, 2020
CommentsContent: I wanted an air fryer for the longest.. then I saw that this works with Amazon Alexa and Google ... man oh man... I have a fully automated smart house and this fit right in... love the Alexa integration .. easy to use... and I love the recipes it comes with ... yummy

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 16, 2020
CommentsContent: The First time I was so nervous because I would be failed LOL! I was surprised that it was a super easier and simple. I did try to put my salmon. OMG It was a champion tasting. I was glad I did the right choice this product. I already have recommended my sister that she should get this one for her. She did taste my salmon and she was surprised. She would definitely purchase it soon.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 12, 2020
CommentsContent: LOVE IT! We bought this air fryer because we don’t have an oven in our studio. The first thing we made was a cake and it came out AMAZING! The second thing we tried was chicken nuggets and french fries... they came out great!! I was very skeptical at first but so far so good. I recommend looking over the instructions on how to prepare certain foods and trying that first. If not cooked fully or not at the desired “crunch”, add some more time or crank up the temp a bit. Overall very happy with my buy!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 2, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   This is now my second air fryer in a week  from Cosori that the buttons just doesn’t work. If you press hard or soft some of them just don’t wanna do anything. Do they at least test them before shipping? Doubt it. It probably sits in inventory for weeks and months without being tested. I’m going to try one more time just one more and if this one don’t work I’ll have to buy from someone else. Sending back again.Update: Seems like the air fryer was made during a bad batch number. If your buttons don't work consult with cosori themselves to get a working air fryer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 5, 2020
CommentsContent: We love the concept of this air fryer and it works well but - here’s the big but - This machine continues to smell horrible. It has a very plasticky smell and even the food taste like plastic. We have washed it and used it several times and it is not dissipating with time.July 11 - I told my husband tonight I won’t eat another thing cooked in this thing. Everything we’ve cooked in it has a plastic taste. He says he’s okay with it. I’m not! The Who,e upstairs of our house reeks when it’s on.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 22, 2020
CommentsContent: I have not turned on my oven since I’ve bought this air fryer. It’s so easy and keeps things healthy. I have been air frying apple slices with a little cinnamon every night for dessert. I’ve made pizza, seafood, fries, mozzarella sticks, chicken, even fried some Oreos. It’s amazing.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 9, 2020
CommentsContent: It's absolutely amazing. The basket has so much room and there's no awkward trying to puzzle piece everything in there. Super easy interface. My only complaint is the inner basket gets a greasy build up between the angled slats and it's super hard to get rid of. The rest of the basket in easy to clean.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 4, 2020
CommentsContent: Purchased almost close to $120 early this year and its base material inside is rotten not easy to clean / put in dishwasher.Buyers beware !

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 3, 2019
CommentsContent: This provides more even and crispier cooking than the Phillips at a much higher price. It is very quiet when running. Cleaning is a complete snap. The outside stays cool and even the exhaust isn't all that warm. Temperatures seem accurate. The slight rubbery smell went completely away after we ran it empty a few times at 450. Adjusting time and temperature are easy once you get used to the order of pushing the buttons. One thing we don't mind but worth mentioning is that the three screws that hold the handle onto the basket loosen and need tightening about once a month. If they get too loose the drawer gets difficult to insert. If yours gets difficult to latch, check this as the likely cause. Other than that, reliability is great - we've used it most days for going on six months, no problems.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2021
CommentsContent: Cleaning it is a bit hard.  But the main problem I have with it is the screws keep coming loose and then I have to put it back together. In this picture you can see one of the screws is missing (fell down the drain while washing). Wish it was a bit more sturdy. Food turns out great every time.

CommentsTitle: Why have I waited so long???
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 18, 2019
CommentsContent: This thing is amazing!! It arrived today and I made the hamburger patties from the enclosed cookbook.  I figured it would be just ok but boy was I wrong. It was delicious!!!!  The air fryer is easy to use, instructions are simple and it’s very easy to clean.  I’ve never used an air fryer before so I wasn’t sure what to expect. It was much easier than I thought  and the food was delish.  I’m sure I will be using this a lot, especially this summer since it doesn’t heat up the house.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 9, 2020
CommentsContent: Had ordered and received the Consori air Fryer 5 weeks before using it. Surprised to find that upon plugging it in, it would not turn on. Things happen so wasn't overly concerned just frustrated. The main issue for me in these situations is what will the company do to rectify the issue. After calling their customer service department and proving the purchase, I was shipped via FedEx a no charge replacement which works perfectly. Great product support and the company representative was very polite and easy to work with.

CommentsTitle: Only lasted 4 months DO NOT BUY!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 23, 2019
CommentsContent: Extremely faulty product. Only lasted 4 months.

CommentsTitle: Will never fry wings without this air fryer again. Total Game changer!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 22, 2021
CommentsContent: This is hands down the best purchase I have made!!! There were so many air fryer options on the market and it was a little overwhelming to decide but so glad we chose this one. The basket is large enough to cook a whole meal for my family of 5 without cooking multiple batches. It's super easy to operate and the clean-up is a breeze.Our favorite thing to make in the air fryer so far is chicken wings. They are perfect every time. Super crispy and flavorful. I am completely happy with this product.

CommentsContent:

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 8, 2019
CommentsContent: I had been hearing about airfryers for a while and wasn’t sure what the hype was until I made this purchase.  I use this machine multiple times a week.  It’s not just for wings but let me tell you it makes the best wings ever.  All the food I make is perfecting cooked, crispy and brown. The machine is so easy to use instead of heating up my large oven.  The basket is so easy to clean and nothing sticks.  I highly recommend this product.

CommentsTitle: Best Air Fryer for the money!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 3, 2019
CommentsContent: Works great!  We love it!  Great tasting food.Love the preheat setting.  This one also remembers the time left after you pause it to turn food or shake it.  A lot of other machines don’t have these features.I make chicken thighs and wings with the Garlic Parmesan Wings coating recipe and my husband says it’s the Best fried chicken he’s ever ate (this coming from man who really didn’t like fried chicken very much before)All I can say is Cosori makes high end products for a lot less money!I also have their blender which is replica of a Vitamix, for a Lot Less money.  Great products!!!Highly recommend 😊

CommentsTitle: If you are on the fence on a not so expensive good size air fryer....get this!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2019
CommentsContent: I have had this for about a month and oh boy what a ride has it been! My girlfriend and I cant stop using this infact it made our george foreman grill and our oven almost unnecessary. Everything you cook like sandwhiches, meat, chicken breasts (the best tasting/juicy), veggies...etc all come out tasting amazing without having to add oil or anything. This doesnt dry out your food like the microwave or the foreman grill or make it come out "soggy" from baking it in the oven. Dont think about it and just buy it you will not be sorry.

CommentsTitle: Absolutely the best money I ever spent.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 16, 2021
CommentsContent: Bought this for my husband for his bday this month. He absolutely loves it. Comes with a cook book, and can't go in the kitchen without looking at it. We cooked bacon so far and it was perfect. He is the cook, so I know this will turn into our new oven. Best money I ever spent.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 25, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased this air fryer in April 2020 and almost immediately started experiencing a "flying basket" during cooking.  I continue to deal with it until now after only 3 months after purchase, the basket won't even latch shut completely.  This is unacceptable on a $100 appliance.  Now the return window is closed on Amazon.  I am currently reaching out to the manufacturer to see if they will accept a return.  I will be looking for another brand air fryer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 30, 2019
CommentsContent: You name it, I've cooked it in this thing. From squirrel to melting cheese this thing can do it all. Sometimes I will go into a store and buy a random food item just to test how well it will cook in this air fryer and let me tell you, it's never let me down.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 16, 2019
CommentsContent: Loves this things I have used it almost ever day since we got it. I make so many different things in here . Chickens wings so many different ways . Fish sticks pizza tater tots French fries, and my kids favorite pig in a blanket and corn dogs. If you haven’t brought one of these you need to life changing no oil needs or if so just a little sprits if cooking spray.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2021
CommentsContent: Super quick and easy.  Don’t know what I’d do without it in the kitchen.  Like the microwave.  Part of everyday use now!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 17, 2021
CommentsContent: Easy to clean, adds a lot of variety to my meals. Cooks almost everything. A game changer for me

CommentsTitle: The inner basket is very difficult to take out to clean
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 29, 2020
CommentsContent: I love everything about the fryer , food turn out good as descripted . But the keypad buttons start to break down as sometime you couldn’t press it .The only nightmare is taking out the inner basket to clean it . After pressing the button on the holder , it’s act just depend on your luck to test how many times you need to press before it can be removed .Sometime I just get so tired and leave it the next day to see if o have better luck . ....I m not sure if every buyer experience this or is this particular fryer I received that has this problems ....

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 15, 2019
CommentsContent: Works as advertised. Included cookbook is medioker. Good for crisping up leftover fried  foods. Ihe internet has much better recipes for this air fryer. Way too many buttons and symbols. Needs an English labeling for all those buttons. I don't like Time/Temperature button, just give one more button instead. With all those other buttons one more won't make much difference.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 9, 2019
CommentsContent: I bought this very excited to use. But in 2 months it stopped working. I would cook with it for 10 minutes then it would shut off half way through the cooking process. I’m never buying anything by this company again. This air fryer is not worth the price.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2021
CommentsContent: Best purchase from Amazon ever ! easy cleanup easy to use easy to cook with fabulous recipesI should’ve bought one sooner but after reviewing other ones and listening to other peoples complaints this one was by far the best purchase

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 23, 2020
CommentsContent: Initially, I was skeptical about air fries . I watched  so many review videos on Youtube and ended up buying COSORi XL . It is consistent, quick and never failed so far. Whole family can easily use it in daily life . We now use it more than regular oven. It is very easy to clean. It is a very good size for family of 5 in terms of design.Only thing I wish it is a little bit quieter.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 15, 2019
CommentsContent: Genial para hacer todo lo que se te ocurra y quede con un toque crujiente. Especial para hacer empanadas jaja

CommentsTitle: Junk!  Do not waste your money!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2020
CommentsContent: I ordered TWO of these, one as an original order and the second as the replacement.  BOTH were broken when received.  The touch pad did not work on either unit.  These are a complete piece of JUNK!  Unless you only want to use your smart phone to work these, DO NOT BUY THEM, because if you want to use these with the manual buttons, they do not work.  I will be getting a refund and will never buy a COSORI product again.  this has been a complete waste of my time!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2021
CommentsContent: This is my 3rd air fryer. 1700 watts is way better than 1500. I like the removable basket and it is easy to clean. Digital panel prevents numbers from being worn off from touch. Pictures show how clean it is after months of use. I use this to crisp up waffles, and fries from restaurants and it does frozen chicken wings beautifully. I roast vegetables and cook just about anything that can be baked or broiled in this.Only down side is storing cuz I like my counters clear so I have a little shelving unit with a towel on it and I just slide it in and out of there

CommentsTitle: The digital buttons are intermittent or non-functional
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 19, 2020
CommentsContent: This product was defective right out of the box. As soon as the unit was powered up and connected to wifi, a firmware upgrade occurred. When I went to use the unit for the first time, some of the preset buttons would not work and the time/temp button was non-functional. I was able to use the VeSync app to control the unit but every time the unit completed cooking and shut off, the wifi connection would disconnect. I would have to delete the re-add the unit in the VeSync app to use it. I worked with Amazon support online but they were not helpful at all. I returned the unit and purchased another unit from a different manufacturer.

CommentsTitle: BPA free and easy to use
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 7, 2020
CommentsContent: I love my air fryer.  It was a life changing experience.  The kids can use it themselves to make healthy lunch or snacks without me.  I don’t don’t like that the handle is always coming lose from the basket and face comes lose too.  I always keep the screwdriver handy.  Otherwise, I love it.  I picked this one because it is BPA free.

CommentsTitle: I use  it every day. So versatile and easy to use.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 27, 2020
CommentsContent: Love love love this airfryer.  I use it every day.  So easy to use and easy to clean.  I recommend this larger size.  Very little oil is used so it’s a healthy choice.  It’s great for reheating too.  My kitchen is cooler and no bending over into a hot oven.  Highly recommended.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 8, 2019
CommentsContent: I have to say, the Customer Service Rep for this product was fantastic.  Although the air fryer didn't work out for me, the person that took my call was very kind, and professional acting. Based on that fact alone,  I highly recommend buying from this Company.  They do stand by their products.  I believe my experience with the product to be an isolated situation, so, otherwise a good product in my opinion.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 3, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this air fryer because a youtuber I watch recommended it as she loves hers. I love it! It is so so easy to clean which may be my favorite feature cause I hate dishes. (no dishwasher though it is dishwasher safe) It is super simple to use even my 80 year old grandma is going to buy one. I love it. Very happy with my purchase.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 30, 2020
CommentsContent: We love this air fryer.  We could easily cook almost every food we make in this.  We have not even fired up the grill in months.  I am very happily surprised.My one complaint is if you cook bacon in it it smokes A LOT!  We have to angle it toward an open window or it will set off our fire alarm.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2021
CommentsContent: Great product. So easy to get roasted veggies and baked potatoes in no time at all. Loved that I could Reheat a burger and fries in about 3 minutes and it tasted so much better than trying to microwave it.Sweet potato fries are amazing!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 13, 2020
CommentsContent: Not what we expected, preheating and all takes more time then expected and every time we use it, it sets off the smoke detectors even when we use the exhaust fan 4 foot away!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 9, 2020

With only a tablespoon or two or oil we  cook a 16oz bag of broccoli and it is absolutely delicious. Even our boys eat the veggies on their plate now. Much better flavor than steamed vegetables. We have recommended it to numerous friends.

CommentsTitle: Didn't like it, other air fryers seem better.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2020
CommentsContent: Other people I know have had great luck. This never makes good fries, and seems to not cook evenly.

CommentsTitle: There's very little you can't do with this air fryer.

The recipe book has given me other meal options.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 5, 2021
CommentsContent: Just as described. This is a great product for people who want a healthier option to cook. Fast, easy and convenient. Not too big that it takes up to much room on your counter. Easy to use and understand features. We have used the recipe book (included) several times.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 26, 2020
CommentsContent: If you follow the instructions they dont work, you cant change the preset 350 degrees @ 22 mins like it says. It takes 25 mins to heat up! The instructions are wrong. That should be the last warning.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 20, 2020
CommentsContent: It is no different than the convection on my toaster oven. But for a fryer I love that I can use my Google Home Voice on it. Easy to clean and use.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 20, 2020
CommentsContent: I've tired the Ninja, Instapot and a few other air fryers and this is hands down the best device. You also get an alert when your cooking is finished!

CommentsTitle: Buy one - you won’t regret it !
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 23, 2020
CommentsContent: We loved our first air fryer so much that we bought a second one because we use it for almost all of our family meals in the evening. It crisps everything so perfectly without oil and the flavor is incredible. By far one of the best purchases we’ve made for our kitchen ever.

CommentsTitle: Not worth it for us, wouldn't recommend to my family/friends, bad taste
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 23, 2020
CommentsContent: All our food tastes like plastic. We've had this air fryer for almost a year hoping the flavor would dissipate but it has not. Would not recommend to my family

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 25, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased 2 units.  There was a slight issue with one of the units, I emailed them directly and their response was amazing.  Quick, efficient and very considerate towards the customer.  I highly recommend this product and this company.  They stand by their product and I we are very pleased with our purchases.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2021
CommentsContent: When searching for our first air fryer I didn't know what I needed. My friend recommended this one to me and so I took the leap and I'm so glad I did. It's very easy to clean, either by hand or in the dishwasher. We use it often and are getting the hang of it. It's good a nice large capacity so I do very much appreciate that. I'd highly encourage anyone looking to stop here. You want this!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 2, 2019
CommentsContent: Throw out your pots and pans and still avoid mcdonald's the future is here. That's right bask in the glory with pockets full of money cuz you're going to be saving a bunch boii. CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 22, 2019
CommentsContent: Me hizo mi vida más fácil en la cocina.

CommentsTitle: Best air fryer I’ve had so far.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 12, 2019
CommentsContent: I purchased this air fryer because the one o had before was only 3 quarts, this one is much bigger. I can cook air more food. I also love that cleaning this item is so so easy. Sometimes it takes me overnight to clean it, and all the grease still just comes right off with ought leaving anything behind. I have has it for a couple of months and still looks like new and I use it 2-3 times a week. You do need to change the presets because they don’t really have the best optimal times for cooking but it doesn’t take long to figure out what to put.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 22, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 6, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased this one as a gift as I have owned one for almost a year and have found it to be used in various Tube videos of recipes and how to use Air Fryers.  The two times I contacted customer service with questions I have been treated as a valuable  customer.  Highly Recommend and gratitude to those that have served me;

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 30, 2019
CommentsContent: I did a lot of research before I made my purchase. I got this based on reviews that there was more surface area than the others as the other’s had baskets that were round, this Corosi’s basket is square and it makes a world of difference. Will be giving these to adult children for Christmas this year.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 10, 2021
CommentsContent: It does fries and chicken perfect. However I tried fish and shrimp disnt come out  how I wanted. Guest I have to try another recipe. Over all a great airfryer. Don't second guest. It look really great on the counter top. Easy to clean.

CommentsTitle: Great air fryer and would recommend to others
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 17, 2020
CommentsContent: We never used an air fryer before and this was our first purchase of one. This cosori is super easy to clean and the food comes out crispy and tastes great! It is trial and error to figure out how long to cook things when the food bags themselves do not have directions for air frying, but that is no fault of the air fryer. Once we got the hang of how fast this thing cooks, there was no stopping everyone in my family to air fry everything and anything. Would definitely recommend this product. It has a big basket and plenty of room for food for 2-3 people.

CommentsTitle: Worked for one day then stopped heating- But Great CS!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 10, 2020
CommentsContent: I was so excited for this Air Fryer. I've been slowly transitioning to smart appliances. It was easy to set up and I ran one batch of French fries.  The next day it stopped working. I was heartbroken. However, I reached out to the company to see what further troubleshooting I could do since I can't get out much right now... and they honored the warranty. I can't wait to make more fries, and only took a star off for one defective unit. A+ customer service.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 27, 2021
CommentsContent: Works good. The size is just right and the feature buttons make a good thing. The dislike is the temp and time buttons you have to touch it just right for them to work. Makes me very frustrated when i have other things going on.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 28, 2021
CommentsContent: The touchscreen doesn’t work well. I try to hit a button and it doesn’t register OR thinks I hit the button next to it. What should take me one touch, ends up 2 minutes of touching different areas to try and get what I really want. Mines probably a defect, but I can’t give it a good review despite all else being good about the unit.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 29, 2020
CommentsContent: Oh my goodness!  I cooked for the first time with air fryer and wow! This is awesome!! Easy to use and follow directions.  I wasn’t sure about cooking the steak on 400 degrees so I set it 330 for 6 minutes then check on it and tip it over add 3 more minutes.  Oh my goodness! Move over TOP CHIEF!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 15, 2019
CommentsContent: I love the convenience and versatility of this air fryer! I've cooked frys, fried chicken, steaks, hamburgers, liver, eggs, corned beef hash and so much more in this and everything has turned out great! The non-stick isn't so non-stick and it's a pain trying to clean in between the vents of the main tray. Other than the cleaning of this, I love everything else about it!

CommentsTitle: Worked Well, then Died on Day 22
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 22, 2020
CommentsContent: The air fryer worked well and was easy to use for 21 days.  I also like that it comes with a cookbook and has WiFi/Alexa connectivity, Problem with mine is that on Day 22 it wouldn't turn on.  Completely dead.  The outlet had power, there were no visible signs of fraying or distress on the cord (mainly because it's only 3 weeks old and it never moved), and the basket was firmly in place.I have ordered a replacement unit and will give it another try.  Very disappointing to have a total product failure after 3 weeks of limited use, (we used it 3 times).

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 10, 2019
CommentsContent: I rarely write reviews . No different than other air fryer. Large square basket ,many functions but This thing smells cheap burning plastic. I think for holidays they have mass produced it with cheaper material . After many uses it still smells cheap burning plastic . I am thinking to return it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 24, 2020
CommentsContent: It sounds like it is falling apart with the rattling while it is running, but it works great.  Easy to operate and clean the basket.  Beats the heck out of a Deep Fat Fryer, with the exception of the rattling noise while in operation.

CommentsTitle: Digital display leading to inability to use after barely using it.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 14, 2020
CommentsContent: Within several uses digital screen just stopped responding each time then just not at all. I wanted to love it and keep it, cost enough. I only made fries, tots, chicken wings once. Never got to do real meals. I'm w a's iting for response from service, its past return date. Otherwise I'd give it back and buy another brand.

CommentsTitle: The screws in the removal basket constantly need to be tighten.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 15, 2020
CommentsContent: I enjoy the fryer very much but we have lost one screw from the basket and the other one is constantly in need of attention. I'm worried that at some point the basket will come lose and fall, spill, or injure someone. Other than that the food is always great and I'm considering purchasing another one!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 24, 2020
CommentsContent: Ok, so I’ve never written a review before, but I just had to write one for this product, as it is amazing!Fast and healthy cooking. So far I’ve made chicken wings, chicken thighs, salmon, potatoes and French fries. My sister even made apple turnovers. Everything taste truly wonderful without all the fat, while also adding crispness.  The cleanup is so easy,Nothing sticks . I just spray the bottom with very little non stick cooking spray or add a little olive oil to coat potatoes. I definitely recommend this product. I’m not sure why others had puddles or what not , because I’ve never experienced any problems. I would recommend using something under it while cooking though. I use a chopping block.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 2, 2020
CommentsContent: Love this air fryer! I use it for everything! Great size basket...I’ve had it for 3 days and have not had to use my oven. Tonight was salmon and it took 7 min and came out perfect! If you were debating about having another appliance- Don’t!! You will not regret this air fryer!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2021
CommentsContent: Had this product for almost two years. It was great. Like other reviews the handle is starting to be loose but hasn’t come off for me. However, now I turn it on and after a minute it shuts off automatically. So it is of no use. Doesn’t work anymore. And it’s been almost two years so out of warranty. Pretty poor appliance if it can’t even last two years. Don’t buy if you want it to last long.

CommentsTitle: Hard to Clean in the Small Holes
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2021
CommentsContent: When cooking frozen broccoli in the air fryer, it get’s very difficult to clean through these small ventilation holes, and no way to detach it from the machine. Very Hard to clean, and had to remove about 10 small screws to clean it. Very much a hassle

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 8, 2020
CommentsContent: This is a tiny convection oven that takes up a lot of space. The word fryer in the description is misleading. There is no frying. Another problem Is it takes enough time to cook barely enough of one thing to serve 2 people that if you wanted to cook more than one item or for more than 1 or 2 people, you’ll be cooking for hours. Just use your oven or toaster oven. It’s not worth the investment.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 23, 2020
CommentsContent: Overall easy to use and clean.  However the initial cook left food with a plastic taste.  I was sure to remove all the packaging, not sure where this is from.  I am going to run it without food for a while to see if the plastic taste goes away, if not going to return.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 30, 2019
CommentsContent: Great air fryer my first one and use it almost daily.  One mistake i made I used aerosol oil so kinda ruined the no stock finish on the basket. Now use oil sprayer much better. May buy a new basket if sold separately. Highly recommend this air fryer

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 13, 2020
CommentsContent: I’ve only used it a few times. Chicken wings((made three sauces to coat the chicken after it was cooked). Amazing!  Frozen seasoned tater tots.  Great but not a stretch. And buttermilk fried chicken thighs. Also, amazing!  Three observations...the basket is on the small side. I could fit four good sized chicken thighs. Had to do the other two after. The chicken stick to the bottom. Google suggested that I put parchment paper in the bottom I did not do that and I will try it next time. Last thing, I don’t really like the smell but I get over it.  Hope this is helpful

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 31, 2019
CommentsContent: Love my new air fryer!  My favorite things to make is sausage and steaks ! Tastes like it was grilled outside on the grill.  I discovered I can make boiled eggs (only not boiled)  eggs come out perfect every single time and easy to peel!  250 for 17 min !  So easy to clean !  Did I mention what yummy chicken wings it makes :)  Wish I had gotten one sooner !

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2020
CommentsContent: Just wasn't what I expected. I was looking for something to give me that fried food taste as they all claim. It wasn't even close. It did a decent job with chicken but not that fried taste. With catfish fillets, it did a perfect job, but with nuggets, it failed.  With steaks it missed the mark. My convection oven does a much better job of cooking and keeping in the moisture. Overall, I was not happy with the unit and returned it.

CommentsTitle: Wish it was bigger, good for ~3 people
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2020
CommentsContent: I have loved trying things in the Fryer - only a few things - one is you have to do things in batches to really get them done right.  Things are not as crispy as you might want if truly fried (I could be doing something wrong but follow recipes to the T). Wish there were 2 sides so you could cook chicken and a veggie at same time.Easy to cleanThe way the basket goes into the Fryer is a little iffy - it doesn't always feel secure. Like not the best made but we still get a lot of use out of it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 23, 2020
CommentsContent: WOW! No regrets. Awesome product. I cooked 12 perfect texture shrimp in 8 minutes and I can make AMAZING French Fries in 25 minutes, with NO OIL! SO EASY TO CLEAN!!! Nothing sticks, washes up beautifully with little effort. Only thing I do not like is I feel it’s a little difficult to push the button that releases the fryer from the base. I highly recommend this air fryer.

CommentsTitle: Throw out the fatty deep fryer and buy this quick!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 30, 2019
CommentsContent: We got this as a Christmas present and we are already in love. We threw the deep fryer out right away after making our first batch or fries and tots. They come out so crisp and droop is and not oily. I can’t wait to try all the other food options we can cook in this. I will post pics after the holidays when we make our first meal.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 5, 2020
CommentsContent: I live in an on campus apartment that doesn’t have an oven in the room... why I waited two years having only two stove top burners is beyond me... anyway- AMAZING!!! I love it! It’s a great size for just two people but it is also big enough to fit a whole meal in! Easy to use!

CommentsTitle: Best appliance I ever bought!  Better than a microwave-  Makes perfect chicken wings
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 25, 2020
CommentsContent: - heats everything and makes excellent dishes from the recipe book - I got the biggest one and it's pretty big - I am thinking about getting a second, or third - it makes whipping up stuff easy!! I highly recommend.  Have had zero problems with it.  VERY easy to use!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 11, 2020
CommentsContent: Looked at a lot of these, glad I picked this one.  Basket is big, super easy to clean, coating isn't chipping off like I've heard on another brand!  Still trying to figure out the best cooking times for things, but works great.  Highly recommend.

CommentsTitle: Fantastic Gadget for people without a lot of time
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 19, 2020
CommentsContent: This thing is a life saver and everything comes out pretty great. Doesn’t just air fry. My husband and I travel for work and put in a pretty long work week. It is important that our children have healthy food options and quick meal time scenarios that create optimal quality time for our family. This thing is awesome!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2020
CommentsContent: I’m so happy!! I want something to be able to fry up wings; this did an absolute amazing job. Some of the best wings I’ve ever had in my life. Quick and easy and crispy. Even made a tri tip in there and it was the best I’ve ever made.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 26, 2019
CommentsContent: After using the Cosori air fryer, almost daily for the past 4 weeks, I can say that I’m a big fan. It’s definitely a keeper. The first thing that strikes me about this air fryer is the design of it. It’s square, which means you have more usable space inside the machine. It’s also very high end looking and easy to use. This air fryer is a WIN for me and would recommend this to any single person or family. Not only is this a fantastic air fryer so is the company!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2021
CommentsContent: L absolutely love this air fryer. The presets are amazing and produce quality meals in minutes. I can also link it to my Alexa app or control it from the app on my phone. It really brings out the flavor in season of your food.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 21, 2019
CommentsContent: I just got my air fryer just a few days ago, and the only thing ive made was French fries and although I miss the grease, the fries got golden brown and were cooked nicely.  I like that it has a pre heat option and also has setting for a few food items and that you can adjust the heat up or down. It also has a feature to let you know when to turn the food for even cooking.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 7, 2020
CommentsContent: This is an amazing air fryer! It comes with several heating options for different types of cooking preferences. The preheating option is amazing as well, just set the temperature you want it and it auto-adjusts the time (400 degrees takes 5 mins, 360 takes 4 mins). Very easy to clean as well, there are only 2 parts you have to clean the basket and the part you have to take out. Put aluminum foil in the bottom to save on clean up time. I would def recommend the 5.8 Quarts size. When you're cooking a big dish the bigger size can turn 2 batches into one. If you're cooking for a group of people you can't have half of them wait 20 mins while the other half is already eating.

CommentsTitle: I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS AIR FRYER
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 1, 2020
CommentsContent: Returned the unit twice. First one did not heat from out of the box. Plus there seemed to be a problem with removing the frying basket. It would get stuck. Second one cooked things fine, however same problem with removing the basket. Finally, it would not come out at all. No way to fully clean the basket. Obviously, a defect in the basket release mechanism. Needless to say I was not going back for a third try. Getting a refund and have since purchased a different type (no similar basket) of larger air fryer for less money.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 8, 2020
CommentsContent: The overall design of the product is nice, however, when I plugged the airfryer in and tried to press the power button on the LCD screen nothing happened. Tried plugging back in and unplugging several times, even pressing and holding the button to see if anything happened. Thankfully Cosari customer support is sending a replacement.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 29, 2021
CommentsContent: We LOVE this air fryer!  We have “fried” chicken many times and it turns out great!I love not having a greasy mess on the stove when we used to fry chicken the traditional way.Clean up is easy and quick.This is the only appliance that lives on our counter!Highly recommend this unit to anyone wanting an air fryer.

CommentsTitle: This air fryer is junkie and extremely dangerous
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 26, 2020
CommentsContent: I can say unequivocally that you should not buy this air fryer. three months after we bought the air fryer the screws for the handle started to fall out. One month after that the compartment slid open when it was at 400° and fell onto the floor, scorching the floor

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 18, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased this machine in June 2020. It worked great until yesterday when it stopped during cooking corn on the cob. It shutdown and we waited until the next day to plug in and it's still not working.

CommentsTitle: Square cooking area, preheat function to seal in moisture/juices.  Great all around.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 6, 2020
CommentsContent: We have never used oil.  The squareness of the cooking space gives lots of extra area to cook in.  Those corners are great.  It also has a preheat function which allows for rapidly sealing in the moisture while cooking.  We just love it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 25, 2019
CommentsContent: Gave as a gift to mom for Mother’s Day. She LOVED it and it worked great....UNTIL 6 months later. Now it barely works. It keeps shutting off in the middle of cooking, and it will not restart for 10-15 minutes, leaving your food sitting there uncooked. I wish this would have lasted for more than 6 months.UPDATE - It died before it's 7 month anniversary.

CommentsTitle: Sometimes it's malfunctions. I bought this on Dec 24, 2019.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2020
CommentsContent: During the Air Fryer working, sometimes the inner and outer baskets will auto come out by themselves. It's kind of scare.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 1, 2020
CommentsContent: We hit the JACKPOT with this sucker!  I read the reviews but I am not familiar with the Cosori brand so I was still skeptical.  Then we had our maiden voyage and BOOM!!!  We were wowed at first fry!  Note to other buyers:  when the directions tell you not to push the button on the basket a million times over, LISTEN!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 28, 2020
CommentsContent: Absolutely love my Corsori! My favorite kitchen appliance.I haven’t had the problem, but I’ve read many comments on the Corsori Facebook Group sites about the basket popping out during cooking and screws on the handle loosening often. Makes me super cautious when I use it.

CommentsTitle: Had to return it, the basket would not stay shut.
CommentsAuthor: Paul Hilsenrath (the patron saint of good coffee)
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 10, 2020
CommentsContent: Cooks great, easy to use.  The basket on the third use would not keep closed.I am returning the unit and ordered a replacement.  Should my experience improve so will my rating.October 24,2020 Sadly, I have to report that the non-stick coating on the bottom basket is peeling off.,I have to downgrade the unit one more star.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 21, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2020

CommentsTitle: Very very very disappointed - All soggy food.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2021
CommentsContent: We have made two dozen different meals and only two of them came out close to what I’d consider crispy or “air fried.” Not sure if the heating doesn’t work right or the fan but this was an epic fail. Returned this and will look into a different brand / model entirely. Disappointed because there were so many great reviews.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 19, 2021
CommentsContent: I bought this product late in 2019, today is early 2021 and it broke. Although I owned it for a bit over a year, I didn't use it frequently  so I am surprised that it's broken already.It seems to be some thermal issue, the fryer can turn on for about 5 minutes but once it heats, it shut off. It wouldn't turn back on until hours have past. The product concept is OK, I think the foods you can cook with it are fantastic, but I am very disappointed at the hardware reliability that I barely got to use it and it broke.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 31, 2020
CommentsContent: Let me preframe.  I have burnt our backsplash, the knobs off the stove and almost started a fire with in the microwave. Now I am getting more adventurous with recipes and Sunday meal prepping for the week.  I made fried chicken, for the first time ever!  Completely enjoyable and recommend it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 12, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2020

It’s very time sensitive in the sense that I feel you need to move to the next option before the device locks in the displayed choice. I find myself “clicking a lot,” the app is the way to go. I also ran into my basket and drip drawer chipping rather quickly. Cosori’s customer support was excellent and quickly took care of the problem! Big shout out from a consumer who works in customer service!

CommentsTitle: Fantastic air fryer! Fantastic customer service!
