CommentsTitle: It’s healthier than deep fryer and cooks in 1/3 of the time!!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2021
CommentsContent: Let me just say that this machine is freaking AMAZING!!!!!!!!! I’d give it 10 stars if I could!!! It is so quick and so simple!!!! A caveman could do it!!! Lol it is the ideal machine for every kitchen and any person who is always on the go and PERFECT FOR A BACHELOR LIKE ME!!! Highly recommend and I will never go without one again!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 25, 2020
CommentsContent: Has significantly reduced my cooking time. I can make burgers, chicken tenders, veggies, a lot. And cleanup is easy. Also, my touchpad WORKS, idk what happened to other people, mine works fine. I might buy one as a gift for family.

CommentsTitle: Good Product with Excellent Customer Service
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 11, 2021
CommentsContent: Have had a great experience with this air fryer.  Easy to use and cooks great fries and other food.  Had an issue with a bolt coming loose from the tray handle.  Contacted their customer service department and they responded the same day and resolved the issue with a new tray in a couple of days.  Superb customer service.

CommentsTitle: Temp and time adjustment button glitchy. Ugh!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 19, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   My whole family loved this fryer! Easy to use and The food we made with it was so delicious! However the temp and time button was super glitchy and very difficult to set. I tried to ignore it for a week using it every day made this quirk untenable. So frustrating because I really wanted to love this product! Processing a return.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 10, 2019
CommentsContent: I use this mostly for French fries and tater-tots. It works great! I have also used it for pizza-bites. Makes food crispy! I bought an oil spritzer to use for spraying a little oil on the potatoes. I like the timer that lets you know when to shake it halfway through the cooking time. The control panel is easy to use and convenient. I recommend this product!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 16, 2020
CommentsContent: Third air fryer I have used and this one is it.  Large basket, great presets, easy to clean and use.  The recipe book is full of tasty meals.  Spot on with the timing of chicken,  steak,  potatoes.  I hardly use anything else to cook with now.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 6, 2020
CommentsContent: The reason why I gave only 3 stars for the use is that the dropping basket is a bit dangerous with my kids around.  Accidents are always bound to happen.  I dropped it twice because I was in a hurry, like many moms.  I just don't want to take a chance.  What I don't like is that I have to pay for shipping it back.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 18, 2020
CommentsContent: Can't say enough about how much we love this fryer. Very easy to use and clean! You can almost say its somewhere in between a microwave and an oven as far as how long it takes to cook food. Much crispier results than a microwave and much less time than an oven! You can make anything from toast to grilled cheese to making fries from raw potatoes to cooking frozen pre-made items that you'd normally stick in a microwave or toaster oven. I've even roasted green coffee beans in it!

CommentsTitle: Good but i'm afraid my current one is damaged.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2021
CommentsContent: Ordered this recently, about a week ago and could only use it this weekend, it comes on, and works, and the user interface and recipe book and look are all fantastic, the food is good, the only problem is I'm getting a really loud rattling sound when it's running sometimes, I think something has come loose inside it, and have e-mailed support, hopefully they can get back soon.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 16, 2021
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   Was able to finally use it this weekend. have only used it for vagables to far, but its great and they taste amazing. looking up how to do meats on this. friends have one and the meat they make with it always comes out tender and with a lot of flavor. hoping mine comes the same way. it also should be healthier since we are using a lot of the oils to cook the food.Ive used it multiple times now and it’s amazing. Just on the time it saves you on pre heating and cleaning it’s worth every penny

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 19, 2019
CommentsContent: Fabulous appliance!! Really thought it would be a waste of my money!! Favorite appliance I've owned! Literally use it everyday!!! Best money spent!! This, my cast iron pan, an my crockpot is all i need to survive!! Really researched these airfryer,  found this to be best buy for size, options , an price!! You will not be disappointed!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 31, 2019
CommentsContent: Absolutely love this air fryer! Wanted one for the past year. I have already made hamburgers, French fries & panko chicken in it. The food comes out great & not dried out at all. I also got the accessory kit and love the little racks in the kit....they come in handy when I made the hamburgers and when I made the chicken as I made a lot and was able to put the extra chicken or the burgers on a rack above the what was cooking on the bottom of the basket.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 19, 2021
CommentsContent: I love this thing! I first learned about it on the Frugal Fit Mom YouTube channel, and decided to try it. I have made vegetables, meats and breads in it. I save time and money by not using my oven all the time.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 9, 2019
CommentsContent: I had an obscene amount of calamari in the fridge leftover from lunch today, and my roommate and I decided to test drive our new air fryer. Boy, let me tell you: game changer. It made the calamari crispy again without a hint of sogginess. I’m just spitballing here, but think what you could do with cookies or broccoli—but more likely cinnamon rolls. I feel like this perfect machine will take us to infinity and beyond.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2021
CommentsContent: After a week we have tried some frozen foods and reheated some pizza. Everything has come out great. My only complaint is its hard to open for my wife who has small hands. I can put my thumb on the frame and slide it open with one hand.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2021
CommentsContent: I couldn't be happier. The Cosori 5.8 is just perfect. II did a lot of research on which air fryer to buy. I am learning how to get the temp right. Some recipes need less heat and shorter cooking times. But my cooking and desire to cook has definitely improved! I have bought my last pre-cooked food. Thank you so much!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 25, 2020
CommentsContent: We were hesitant when we first recieved our air fryer, but now we have been using it for about a week and loving it.  It makes better steaks thank on the grill.  French Fries are the best and I've made Banana Bread and it was perfect.  I highly recommend purchasing especially if you are looking for a healthy way of cooking.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 5, 2019
CommentsContent: I love this air fryer! It has lots of space for larger quantity, and I find it’s more than powerful enough to cook large portions. I find it’s best to reduce the temperature and increase the timer as the presets are too hot in my situations. It’s faster than a conventional or toaster oven and gets the food crispier.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 17, 2020
CommentsContent: Just received this air fryer. Used it to cook several things. It works great for bacon. Does frozen fries pretty darn good. It is extremely easy to use and clean. Doesn't take much counter space. Perfect size for me and my wife. I would recommend.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 31, 2019
CommentsContent: This is my first air fryer, and I am so happy with it. It makes perfect roasted vegetables, and it is so easy to use. The instructions are simple to understand. The flavor of the broccoli, cauliflower, carrots, and mushrooms that I have roasted is fabulous. I can't say enough about this machine. Just buy it!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 7, 2020
CommentsContent: Easy to use and clean.  Cooks relatively quickly.  It is a bit bulky and the cooking element (top of the unit) is larger than the food bin (bottom part).  I have e only used it a few time so only time will tell if it will last.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 2, 2020
CommentsContent: At this day and age, who doesn't need an air dryer? We got this for our mother and she raves about it. The best part is the easy clean up and no oily mess compared to using a dryer. We might even get ourselves one now!

CommentsTitle: NOT DELIVERED AS ADVERTISED. WILL BE RETURNED.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 26, 2020
CommentsContent: Instead of electronic controls as advertised, the one I received operates with the use of two (2) dials. It looks like an earlier generation of that which is advertised. RIP-OFF!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 13, 2021
CommentsContent: I research multitudes of air fryers and deliberated between getting well-known brands vs. this brand that was unknown to me.  This one is perfect.  Does a great job!  I rarely even use my built-in oven any longer.  It is a decent size compared to the traditional smaller round air fryers you see, so you may want to take that into consideration.

CommentsTitle: Liking this so far! Too soon to give it 5 stars so 4 for now
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 15, 2019
CommentsContent: This is my 3rd air fryer. So far I am pleased with this one right from the start! Used only 3-4 times and it worked really well. Once I take the time to read the cookbook included I will for sure have a better feel for my ling term experience.  So far so go! Bought off the Treasure Truck hopefully it was a great deal?!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 4, 2020
CommentsContent: Packaging was amazing. It comes with recipe book, A thank you card plus information on how to register your warranty. It's bigger than I expected so that's great. My vegetables came out so good. The timer said 10min but I did 20min because I love them a bit softer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 15, 2020
CommentsContent: Very difficult to open bin or to release fryer basket. Cheap plastic button to do so, may break had to call my son to come over twice in one day. Once to press plastic button to open and the to press cheap plastic button to disengage tray. May need to return

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 13, 2019
CommentsContent: I bought it to try to fix fried squash a little healthier. So far I can’t get that just right. But it makes great roasted potatoes and is much better then heating my house with the oven. Overall this product was just as described.  I am enjoying discovering new ways to fix things

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 8, 2020
CommentsContent: Lo mejor de lo mejor , el sabor de las comidas es delicioso , es moderna , y sostificada

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 20, 2020
CommentsContent: We can not say enough about this air fryer.  It’s the right size and easy to use. It’s now a staple for our kitchen.Well worth the price!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 10, 2021
CommentsContent: Husband said we didn't need an air dryer, but great deals for Christmas season, I bought one.  Husband uses it at least 3 times a week!! Vegetables have never tasted so good!! (Yes, I meant vegetables!)

CommentsTitle: Best Buy I have ever made
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 30, 2021
CommentsContent: Crazy easy to use I don’t know which is best the cookbook with a lot of good recipes, the preset cook buttons, or the ability to control the time and temp. It’s a very good product . The best thing about it I have not used half the stuff in my kitchen that includes my George Foreman’s grill

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 27, 2020
CommentsContent: My kids use this daily.  Recently they reheated pizza.  There are so many foods that now have airfry instructions.  This model has presets that makes it super easy to use.  My 14 yo is able to use this and clean up.  Definitely a good purchase as the kids are now even more creative in the kitchen.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 19, 2021
CommentsContent: I don't like that I was unable to connect the unit to my cell phone. Not even sure what the app is for. I don't like that it shows the temperature in celsius not fahrenheit and no instructions to change it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 28, 2020
CommentsContent: I don't have room for this.  It sits on the floor and I dread having to clean it.  A dishwasher would help.  One thing I don't like is opening and closing the door is like opening and closing a 1955 Chevy door.  No , an unkempt 1955 pick-up door.  Other than the door thing it is good build quality.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 29, 2021
CommentsContent: Family loves it.Now we can have homemade fries that's healthy. We've only done veggies on this as we dont eat animal products but it's been fantastic so far and will soon try more complicated things like stuffed peppers.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 30, 2019
CommentsContent: It's great for just about everything. I've been using it constantly since it arrived.  My only gripe is with how loud the beeping is.  It's just too loud.  Obnoxious even.  If they could silence the key presses, I'd order another one.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 24, 2019
CommentsContent: The size is great if you are looking for a larger air fryer. It has so many settings to choose from for different types of food and is easy to use. I love that it came with a recipe book, too. We have already made some of the recipes! The fact that the basket separates is super convenient for cleaning purposed. I have had no issues cleaning it. You can buy a lot of accessories for this air fryer which is nice. I plan on getting some to have more options with cooking. It cooks evenly and the food tastes delicious. I highly recommend!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 29, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought it for my bf for his birthday because he had wanted to try out cooking with an air fryer for a while. He’s used it 3 times so far and says it works great and cooks the food fast making it crispy and delicious! He was intimidated at first but says it’s easy to use and the cleanup is simple too. The size is perfect for cooking for 3-5 people too.

CommentsTitle: My one of my favorite appliances....
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 26, 2020
CommentsContent: This is hands down the best appliance for me.  This machine makes meal prepping soooo much easier!  Recently my little Cosori stopped working (8mo old).  But within days Corsori customer service team processed my request and I have another one in the mail and on the way!  Thank you!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 24, 2020
CommentsContent: Used it twice, second time screen went crazy and stoped working. Followed recipe directions first time and it over cooked. Did not want refurbished replacement. Returned and had to pay shipping. Had item mess than 1 month before it stopped working.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 9, 2020
CommentsContent: Wow I don't know why I didn't buy this sooner. I doubted it would add much convenience but it's a total life changer. Air fryers particularly excel at dehydrating and roasting vegetables like brussel sprouts in my opinion. Also good for quickly reheating things. This particular one, the Cosori, is one of the best. It feels well built, the square design makes sense, and the touch panels and presets are perfect.

CommentsTitle: Great fryer with a minor design flaw.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2021
CommentsContent: We love the air fryer. Food just tastes great. However I noticed one of the screws I the cooking basket came out. When I replaced it I checked and all the others were loose. This seems to be a design flaw.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 27, 2020
CommentsContent: Amazing! Best small kitchen appliance I’ve ever bought. It is a little big sitting on the countertop but it doesn’t bother me. I use it so often that I can’t put it away as I would be getting it out all the time. I use it for everything- quick appetizers when my kids are “starving” before dinner is ready, frozen foods, and even a small whole chicken. Frees up my oven for other things as well. Cleans up in minutes!

CommentsTitle: I have nothing to compare it against but I like it!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 6, 2019
CommentsContent: Everything I’ve made has been very easy and very good. I would recommend buying it with a small bread pan or something. The basket is good but you can really do a lot more with it when properly accessorized. Also, before buying make sure you have space for it. It doesn’t fit in any of my cabinets so it’s going to have to stay permanently on my counter

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2021
CommentsContent: It’s fabulous! I’ve made garlic park chicken wings for the Super Bowl, which came out crispy and juicy and golden brown! Also, breaded boneless chicken breasts & “grilled” chicken thighs.  Brussels Sprouts- which aren’t high on my list- were cooked according to the recipe in the booklet that came with it abd they were delicious!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 7, 2020
CommentsContent: Great product and easy to use and clean. From fresh roasted green beans to chicken this air fryer works wonders. The buttons are easy to use and have pictures for suggested time of certain foods. The size is good.

CommentsTitle: Fantastic and fast! If you're busy, you've got to get one of these
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 16, 2019
CommentsContent: Received this today and used it for dinner and IT'S SO GREAT! Even more than my instant pot, this allows me to literally throw a meal together in no time at all. Interface is easy to use, cooks quickly - used 1 tbsp of avocado oil and everything was beautifully crisp in 10 minutes! Love the presets too!Will edit as I use it more, but for now, completely in love!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 30, 2020
CommentsContent: i am upset that i went by the reviews for this airfryer because its not great. my food is left dry and hard and i realized that this was a return (barf) and im assuming they returned it for the same reason. maybe i got a bad apple. id pass

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2021
CommentsContent: Best investment ever. Buy this and you won’t regret it. Makes anything from salmon to grilled cheese sandwich. Love it. Easy to use and to clean. Connects to wifi as well and comes with a cool app! Lots of good recipes!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2021
CommentsContent: Will not shut properly. I thought it was the basket so I ordered another basket but that was a waste of money because it either won’t shut or it pops open even with a new basket.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2021
CommentsContent: Finally got an air fryer. I love it for cooking burger patties. Or fries, When I do it on the stove it makes a huge mess and I’m not really into grilling. If you’re thinking to get one just do it. It does take a lot of space on the counter tho....

CommentsTitle: Easy setup, user friendly, great results
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 18, 2021
CommentsContent: So simple to use, my 11 year old can do it. The presets have extra features that remind u to shake the contents of the basket, if needed. I love the app on the phone, the recipe book really opened my eyes, I didnt know you could cook all that in an air frier! Everything is cooked to crisp perfection and we absolutely love it!!

CommentsTitle: Touch display stopped working after a few months.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 16, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought the COSORI Smart WIFI 5.8QT in December, it's now May and the touch display has stopped working. The temperature keeps shifting between Celcius and Farenheit without me even changing it and the pre-set cooking buttons do not work anymore. Very dissatisfied.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 4, 2020
CommentsContent: My wife and I are still getting used to our Cosori Air Fryer but so far we love it. We have cooked french fries which turned out great, steaks that were pretty good and vegetables that were pretty good but needed more seasoning. I believe the more we use the better we will like it!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 4, 2019
CommentsContent: Am SO glad I bought this bigger one.  It is perfect for all kinds of things.  Chicken wings and shrimp are my two favorite things I fry up the most.....plus French fries and onion rings, of course.  I feel so much better using the air fryer and not having my food soak up in oil.  So easy to use and clean.  Very glad I bought it and I think you will be too.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 24, 2021
CommentsContent: Oh my gourd! I can’t begin to explain how skeptical I was of this at first, but I was wrong. This bad boy can make meal prep easy and quick. The basket is a bit odd, but the food is what blows any negative point away entirely. This is amazing and I highly suggest this to anyone looking to buy an air fryer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 24, 2019
CommentsContent: 75 years old and trying a new method was worth it.  Preparing meals for two working males daily is a delight now.  The food is healthy for all and no mess or fuss.  Fish, steaks and sausage are perfect.  Potatoes and cauliflower  are great. I like using the parchment paper as a base, and foil under the meat.  It is so easy to use and follow all the directions,.

CommentsTitle: Love! But screws keep getting undone
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 16, 2021
CommentsContent: Love it! I want to give ut 5 star...... But after a month of use.  The screws keep getting undone....EVERYTIME NOW. Last night I had to stick my hands down the disposal to pick up the screw. When I wash it,  I have a screw driver near by....

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 21, 2021
CommentsContent: It took me a while to decide which air fryer to get, but decided on the Cosori after thorough research. I was not disappointed! The Cosori air fryer is amazing, I've been using it almost every day since I've gotten it. There's a ton of presets, but you can also put your own settings (manual). It's super easy to clean both the basket and the tray. I usually put aluminum foil under the holed tray to catch any additional drippings or seasonings for easy clean up. Overall, would definitely recommend this brand!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2021
CommentsContent: What a great addition to my kitchen appliances. I have used almost daily since my purchase, and so far, have a blast trying out new, tasty, healthy recipes that are also easy to cook and even easier to clean up. So glad I took the plunge!

CommentsTitle: Cool Alexa functionality, but still has strange smell while cooking.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2021
CommentsContent: This is a good air fryer that performs well with a nice large square basket.  Alexa works very well with it too.  The only issue is that mine has that strange "metal smell" even after a month+ use.  I don't think it will go away, but has not been a total deal breaker.  Not sure it's worth returning under warranty.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 30, 2020
CommentsContent: Love the bigger size and the shape.  It holds more food than the round air fryers.  It also cooks faster and i think this is because of the wattage.  I've noticed i use a lower temperature and less time to cook the same food.  I absolutely an air fryer and I'm really enjoying this air fryer.

CommentsTitle: Great until it wasn't - used 10 times and now smoke billows out the back
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 26, 2019
CommentsContent: HI, I bought this a month ago and it has been great but suddenly everything I cooked started smoking so bad I could not use it.  Of course, my 30-day window ended 5 days ago but basically this is not usable due to the horrible smoke coming out the back.

CommentsTitle: I'd be better off using the convection setting on my oven
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 15, 2019
CommentsContent: I wasn't impressed. food cooked in the device had a funky flavor that wasn't really pleasant, and yes, i did clean it before using it. the basket that holds the food is tiny, too small unless you're cooking for one person. it's very noisy and the controls aren't exactly intuitive.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 28, 2019
CommentsContent: Bought this for my wife and I'll be damned if I don't use it more than she does! Plus, I have to admit that we like Cosori products. They are reasonably priced,  perform just as well ad the higher priced competitors, they look good and customer service is top notch. We had a small issue with the pressure cooker we bought and they took care of it, no questions asked. That goes a long way with me too build brand loyalty. Would buy again!

CommentsTitle: We like it for the most part
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 2, 2020
CommentsContent: We find this thing air fries really well.  We also really like how it reheats things like pizza and fries.  The buttons are a little annoying because you have to press (pause) for it to register but we are getting use to it.  Also, we've been cleaning it by hand because I'm still leery about putting the baskets plastic handle in the dish washer.  Overall it's a good unit.

CommentsTitle: Really like the fryer.  So easy to use
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 8, 2020
CommentsContent: Works as advertised and looks great.  Very easy to use although the preset timing is not perfect.  I had to reduce the suggested time or else my food would burn.  Trials and errors.  Wish it's shorter and wider so that the basket will be bigger for more food.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 9, 2020
CommentsContent: The product worked great for first few months then the screws kept coming out and would not hold when screwed back in and the drawer started to not shut properly. I imagine that it will no longer function in the very near future. Great taste and easy to use but should last longer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 24, 2021
CommentsContent: Best purchase I’ve ever made!! This air fryer is the best one I’ve ever seen. It’s SO easy to use. It is very easy to clean, and is nonstick. Love love love. I’ve even bought this for my friends and family!! Highly recommend.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 3, 2019
CommentsContent: I wanted this for a while before I justified the purchase.  I'm so happy I got it, I'm sure I will use it often.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 27, 2020
CommentsContent: Received our cosori air fryer today and the fan DOES NOT work, and it isn’t warming up to the 380 degrees temp it is set to. Along with that the touch screen doesn’t seem like it’s going to last long. You have to press the buttons a couple times each usually to get it to do anything.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 20, 2020
CommentsContent: It's great and so much easier than deep frying.  It is especially great for wings and fried chicken (carnivore style with pork rinds).  Recipes are great that came with it, too.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 25, 2020
CommentsContent: Bought it because I have heard from a bunch of people how awesome air fryers are and this one was rated one of the best. It is amazing! I use it all the time, super easy to use and really easy to clean. Fries or anything you can fry come out crispy, and even cooked steak in it because the grill broke and it was pretty good! Can cook anything in it, comes with a good recipe book with a lot of good stuff in it.

CommentsTitle: Great product, even when I had a problem
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 24, 2019
CommentsContent: I use this thing a lot...like a lot. But I cook almost everything at 400 degrees. And the original one didn't hold up. The handle mount basically melted off. Worked great each time, and probably would have continued to even after the malfunction.But I contacted the seller and let them know what happened with some pictures. A few days later, I had a full replacement on my doorstep. Great product, so easy to clean, and great customer service.

CommentsTitle: Modern design, easy to use, healthy meals done in half the time!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 28, 2019
CommentsContent: Best. Purchase. Ever. Fell for the millennial hype and got myself this air fryer on prime day for a deal I simply could not pass up! I use this about 3 times a week to make dinner for my boyfriend and I and now I am getting requests by him to make the same dinners I’ve cooked in this... that’s a good sign! All credits to the air fryer (lol). I am just extremely happy I can recreate my favorite recipes with less guilt! Love the sleek design, especially the touch screen. Very easy to clean as well, no issues with grease caking onto the rack so far. Main reason why I wanted to get one was because I was tired of our apartment getting way too hot when I would use the oven so using this definitely helps with that.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 11, 2021
CommentsContent: This air fryer is great. It is a decent size. It holds a good amount of food. We haven't had any issues with it. Run it once or twice for the new smell to go away. Cleans easily. Not too heavy.

CommentsTitle: A nice upgrade from my old air fryer
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 4, 2020
CommentsContent: I got this because I replaced my old smaller air fryer. So far so good. This model has the “shake” reminder and fir me, that’s a plus since I no longer have to set my kitchen timer separately. I like the square basket.

CommentsTitle: Why Did I Get It Just Now? 😀
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 15, 2021
CommentsContent: I love love love it 😍 It’s big enough to feed a family of 6 😀 I love the design and the way it cooks! All my friends own an air fryer and heard only good stuff about it, highly recommended

CommentsTitle: Works great - love the food - but I have to use app to set it because the touch buttons fail to work
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2020
CommentsContent: I have never had one before and I looked for months before settling on this one.  I dont know if this is defective or what -but I have to use the app every time to set it up.  I cannot use the touch buttons.  As soon as it detects I am touching it I keep trying to adjust but it does not register and then times out.  So I have to keep trying to start over and repeating.  I finally gave up and just use the app.  This sucks - because now I have to set it up for anyone esle to use or install the app just so they can cook. I thought maybe it was just my touch not working but girfriend has same problem.  If it was not for this problem I would have given 5 stars - I wish it would work better.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2020
CommentsContent: Finally got around to using this and really like it!  Works better for some foods better than  other, but I do recommend it (great for frozen fries and egg rolls and things of that nature).  Also made chicken fingers from fresh chicken and they came out almost as good as deep fried.

CommentsTitle: I absolutely love this air fryer!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 22, 2020
CommentsContent: I don't know how I got by before owning the Cosori Air Fryer!  It's easy to use, cleans up quickly, and there are so many things you can make with it.  I've made everything from fried or bbq chicken, to steaks, to fish, to veggies in it, and haven't had a bad meal yet.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 17, 2020
CommentsContent: The Cosori Air Fryer met and exceeded my expectations. I use it several times each day..  cooking time is greatly reduced and clean up is easy.  It is easy to get distracted, so the shake feature is greatly appreciated.  Great size for a family.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 8, 2020
CommentsContent: Works well.  Basket and liner coating coming off after 6 months of use and only hand washing with normal dishsoap and sponge.  I recommend paying for a better quality unit if you plan on airfrying often as it seems this will need a new basket and liner twice per year.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2021
CommentsContent: As well as being extremely happy with my Cosori Air Fryer, I must say that their customer service is excellent.  The second time I used my new air fryer, after only a week and a half, I dropped the baskets on my kitchen floor and was unable to get them to lock together again.  I contacted Cosori and asked if they could help.  They responded to my request within a few hours and sent out the new basket I needed right away.  I really was blown away by how concerned they were and how quickly they responded.  I highly recommend Cosori!!

CommentsTitle: One of the best kitchen items ever bought
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 4, 2021
CommentsContent: Just buy it. You will not be disappointed!  look online for recipes. Facebook and Instagram have groups for air fryers. Even cosori has a group. Most used item in my house. Best purchase ever!!

CommentsTitle: I enjoy the ease of cooking with this
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 6, 2020
CommentsContent: I enjoy the ease of cooking with this air fryer. I don’t use it as much as I thought I would yet but what I do cook in it cooks quick and tastes like it should as I still use my toaster oven for some things. Jalapeño poppers are great in it as is many other things. It cleans easily. I’m happy with my purchase.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 27, 2021
CommentsContent: I love this. I’ve grilled salmon, made fried mushrooms and baked a little pizza in it so far. Lots of buttons confuse me lol yet this is so easy to use with the touch screen and very easy to clean

CommentsTitle: Cooks fast and not too loud
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 24, 2019
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   Great appliance. The non stick layer of my previous air fryer was peeling and I decided to get this instead. So far works great, cooks fast and even and not too loud. Display is clear and easy to operate. I clean it by just soaking it then wiping with a soft sponge. No abrasive cleaners.

CommentsTitle: Great cooking and great cooking time
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 17, 2019
CommentsContent: I was a little skeptical to purchase this product because I was a longtime user of the pizza pizzazz. Loved the pizzazz and thought the air fryer couldn’t be the replacement, but I am glad I gave it a shot. It cooks food quick and thoroughly. I am very happy with the time and complete cook it does to nuggets, corn dogs, French fries, bacon etc. I highly recommend giving this air fryer a chance, you will be happy you did!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 22, 2019
CommentsContent: I really enjoy using this air fryer.  I love the smart features that sends alert to my phone on what I need to do next to the air fryer.  I have used this air fryer plenty of times and I have not had a single issue.  I definitely recommend this unit

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 5, 2020
CommentsContent: In the summer I use my grill every night. As temperatures dropped for  winter I purchased this air fryer.  It’s been perfect for everything I usually grill or roast.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 29, 2020
CommentsContent: Inner basket and outer basket loosing coating in one month.  Easy to use, great flavor, big enough. The customer is going to replaced with a new one.  Coming soon the update.They replaced the air fryer, unfortunately is already loosing the black coating. It is a shame because, I love the air fryer.

CommentsTitle: Easy to use and understand. Breeze to clean.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 22, 2021
CommentsContent: Got this Air Fryer for Christmas and I’ve used it just about every day since. Love it. Simple to use. Perfect size for my needs. Fits on the counter. Easy to clean. The preset buttons are a real plus. So many out there to choose from but I’m glad I got this one.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 13, 2021
CommentsContent: I couldn't stand the chemical smell and wondered what that would  do to the food.  Even if it was going to go away I didn't trust the non stick coating.  Bought a stainless steel one with no smell.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 12, 2020
CommentsContent: I received this as a Christmas gift. Even though I've only used it 4-5 times, I really like it. It is easy to use and cleans up quickly. So far, the food has been good. I received the 5.8 qt size and glad I did. Can easily cook for 2 - 4 people. At first I was surprised how loud it was, but we got used to that and it doesn't seem so bad now. I know I'm going to be using it often.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 24, 2019
CommentsContent: I bought this item on an impulse when it was available on the Amazon Treasure Truck Two weeks ago. I’ve been obsessed ever since and have ONLY cooked things in my air fryer. I can’t compare it to other air fryers, but I love the tastes, how easy it is and I WIPE IT CLEAN. It's the most amazing non stick Teflon.

CommentsTitle: Great tasting food and easy to clean!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 14, 2019
CommentsContent: Where was life before this gizmo?! Actually cooks so many healthy options quickly for family of two. Steaks, veggies, bacon, pizza- we have tried many things cooking (healthy and non healthy) Love the recipe and instructions booklet, easy to follow. Air fryer has cut down time in the kitchen and everything tastes great!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 10, 2020
CommentsContent: Love love love it! So easy to use! And it cleans very well!! I found out that some of my friends have the same exact one! There’s different options to use but you can also adjust the temperature and time to your liking! I would def purchase again! Let’s just see how long it lasts ;)

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 6, 2020
CommentsContent: Im sure more expensive air fryers are better but for the price this is unbeatable. If you are on the fence about this purchase trust me do it. If you work long hours and still like having quality meals this will be your savior. Take about 15 minutes total to preheat-cook-clean meals

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 17, 2020
CommentsContent: I have been looking at these air fryers and finally bought this one.  I could not ask for more,  it is great.  We have used it every day since.  The French fries are much better than McDonalds, And not greasy or mushy!!  Everything we have made is awesome.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 16, 2020
CommentsContent: LOVE this airfryer. I highly recommend it. I use it a lot and love trying new recipes. It's a good size too.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 7, 2021
CommentsContent: This thing is amazing !!!I just got it yesterday and decided to test it with some simple raw drumsticks with a dash of lemon pepper!! 25 mins later Crispy skin!! Juicy flavorful chicken!!! This is crazy  how good this chicken is.Then I threw in a bag of frozen wing sections coated... 20 mins later crispy juicy tasty golden wings!! This thing just changed our cooking lives I’m using this daily. No pots to clean now and all.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 20, 2019
CommentsContent: I cant explain to you how much I did not understand air fryers, but with much pressure from friends, and hearing good stories, I bought one. So far I've made some of the best chicken tenders and fries ever... with NO OILS. This is HUGE, so many different things to cook that come out crispy and crunchy

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 11, 2019
CommentsContent: I’ve had this air fryer for about 4 months now and it works great, my only complaint is yesterday when I went to “shake” it during my fry setting a screw came off and was at the bottom of the pan. I guess it’s poorly constructed or mine was defective.I reached out to costumer service and they didn’t hesitate one bit to send me the part (outer basket) that was defective. They did it promptly and easily. Without a doubt one of my best costumer service experience had. This is why I’ve upgraded it to 5 stars.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 15, 2019
CommentsContent: I would give this five stars but the drawer is difficult to open.  I need to push on the top panel and pull on the drawer.  Otherwise food is great.  It does fantastic pork chops.  I do suggest buying boneless meat cuts if possible.  Haven't done bone-in foods.  Large size would do four pieces of meat.

CommentsTitle: The BEST thing for chicken wings.... because I haven’t made much else. 😂
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 10, 2019
CommentsContent: Wow!! I am in LOVE with my Cosori Air Fryer. I have made meatballs, chicken wings, peppered thick cut bacon, bacon roses and I’ve only had it for 2 days. I didn’t want to get another appliance, BUT, I did because I LOVE crispy spicy chicken wings. So after dusting chicken wings in a little baking powder and “frying” them I am thrilled with the results. They tasted like they were fried in oil, crispy perfection. Seeing over 1400 reviews made my choice an easy one. I can’t wait to use the inserts I bought for it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 25, 2020
CommentsContent: Read a lot of reviews because deciding to buy the Cosori brand. Not disappointed a all. Very great quality product. The design is beautiful. After few weeks of usage I am very happy with everything. Easy to clean.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2019
CommentsContent: Love it! I was worried it was too large at first, but knowing it can cook so much food at once really helps. I’ve done a few things like burgers, chicken, frozen mozzarella sticks, reheated holiday left overs Quickly.. it’s perfect. I always line with foil or paper and there is never any serious clean up. Would totally buy again

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 7, 2020
CommentsContent: Our family loves this air fryer! We've cooked everything from non-fried seasoned raw chicken, to reheated tempura shrimp, to cooking frozen garlic bread. It allows you to preheat, change cooking temperature, cooking time, and pause cooking too which makes it even more helpful. We have used it several times a week since we bought it. It is very easy to clean. Highly recommended!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 27, 2020
CommentsContent: I was a bit disappointed that I received a damaged air fryer the first time, It worked great the first time, however the second time it started making a weird noise that it seemed like it was going to explode. I was OVERALL disappointed in amazon that they couldn't seem to send me the correct air fryer after I requested an exchange.. However, the WiFi capability air fryer works great because you can manage it from your phone and the taste of the food is great, I am giving it 4 starts because we think that the issue was just on amazon delivery.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 29, 2019
CommentsContent: I would not recommend cooking a roast in any air fryer, it burns up the pork roast on the outside and red in the middle and dried it completely out.  I would say these air fryers are only good for food like french fries, cheese sticks, etc.  Some people like them, but to me, it's a counter hog if you can only cook comfort food in them.

CommentsTitle: Product is more oven then air fryer
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 28, 2020
CommentsContent: Air fryers are great for reproducing deep fryer results without all the oil.  This wasn't the case for me with the Cosori air fryer.  Pre-packaged foods came out dehydrated instead of "fried".  Fresh potato fries came out limp with burnt edges.  In addition, both varieties were left with a slight chemical taste from the Teflon material used in the air fryer.  My previous air fryer did not have these issues.  I'm not sure if the flavor of other foods would be affected because I'm not willing to try at this point.  I didn't buy an air fryer to cook steak.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 25, 2019
CommentsContent: This air fryer is great for cooking whatever you can get in the basket . but the handle on my basket keeps loosing up and the plastic finally cracked ...... no problem ... got in touch with the seller/ support people... 6 days from now I will be cooking with hot air..... until then will be cooking with gas on the Maytag stove....

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 11, 2020
CommentsContent: I would not have lasted quarantine without my air fryer! I never thought I would like the ability to use my phone to control, but I do! Cannot rave enough about this product! Air frying will change your life - especially with kids!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 25, 2020
CommentsContent: be careful of timing and also use an olive oil spray inside the unit  I find it cumbersome to clean in the sink I put it in my dishwasher on a lite cycle, comes out great and no oily smell at all, I am glad I got it, recommended by my daughter

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 5, 2019
CommentsContent: Thanks to all of you that wrote reviews!  That is what convinced me that the Cosori was the AF I need.  It’s terrific and no problems.  Of course the first thing I tried was frozen shoe string potatoes 😂. Divine!  I just tried wings for Buffalo wings....another success!  Next in the menu is a boneless ribeye.  Also, love the Cosori community on Facebook.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 3, 2020
CommentsContent: So many foods taste better air fried. The presets help eliminate a lot of guesswork. Get that fried taste without all the grease. Sometimes I've head to soak the basket to clean. Dishwasher safe was very useful after making the Thanksgiving Turkey in it

CommentsTitle: It has Faults, not a good product-read below
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 17, 2020
CommentsContent: First of all the screws fell out of the basket. Luckily, I was able to replace them.Two Icons on the front panel don't work 1) Pre-heat 2) Temp/Time. You can still use the frier, but have to use a separate timer to set correct cooking times for recipes, etc.Also, on Facebook the "Cosori Group", many complain about other malfunctions.Only had it for 6 months, and used a few times. With Cosori can leave a message or email, they want pictures, copies of ordering it etc. Over all, Great Customer Service with Cosori Worked for me! Thank you Cosori for replacing my AF.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 5, 2020
CommentsContent: I was surprised with how often I use this product as I had originally bought it for primarily frozen foods. It has not left my counter since I received it and I have used it on a daily basis! It does take some time to get a sense of how long it takes to cook certain items. Some of the built-in buttons cook food for way too long in my opinion, but once you get a feel for it and get the timing and temp down it does a fantastic job! I would absolutely recommend this product, especially compared to some other air fryers that cost over $200!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 14, 2020
CommentsContent: Touch pad doesn’t work. I just have to see what button I can get to work and then keep checking the food.

CommentsTitle: Touch screen is shady..........but Customer Service is amazing!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 19, 2020
CommentsContent: Excited to receive this air fryer —- same day I got it, I tried to cook fried shrimp; however, the touch screen button for shrimp doesn’t work — as I pressed the other buttons, I discover that the rest of the buttons in the row does not work either — I sent customer service an email... awaiting a response/solution. Disappointed as I wanted to love this.update: Customer Service was amazing and understood and will replace it!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 19, 2020
CommentsContent: I absolutely love this. It works great for cooking food and is super easy to clean. I use this all the time as it does not heat up my kitchen as much as the oven and cooks much quicker. Overall I would recommend this air fryer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 10, 2021
CommentsContent: I love this thing!!!! I use it for everything and it comes out perfect. My only issue is the timing for the steak... it takes more  than 8 mins (subjected time) to cook but I can easily adjust it

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 9, 2020
CommentsContent: I have to say this is probably one of the better kitchen appliance purchases I have made. It easy to setup, cook, and clean. Makes frozen foods a bit more crispier than placing it in the oven.Will leave a 1 year update later.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 2, 2021
CommentsContent: I'm loving this thing! About double the time of a microwave and ten times the quality! I have not mastered the "reheat" thing so I will not be getting rid of the microwave just yet.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 29, 2020
CommentsContent: AMAZING!!!! I wish I would have gotten this first. I have a small air fryer don’t get me wrong it did the job but this 1 is great!! I haven’t used the app yet but I’ll get to that and write another review.

CommentsTitle: Cosori Air Fryer 5.8 quart, easy to use.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2020
CommentsContent: I haven't used it a lot yet but has been very easy to use when I have.  Looking forward to a lot more. It is very roomy. Can't complain would definitely purchase it again. Got the red, love it!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2021
CommentsContent: From my cold dead fingers!!  This Air Fryer is nothing short of amazing.  I was very please with this - I will take photos next time I use it..............which will be today or tomorrow!!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 9, 2020
CommentsContent: I got this as a present for my wife. I have issues using the touchpad on the device. It is not responsive about 90% of the time. I have to use the app. To use the air fryer. If I don’t have WiFi / internet this device is useless.

CommentsTitle: This Air Fryer is a life changer!!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 13, 2019
CommentsContent: I have had this for a month and a half now and absolutely love using it. We use it for burgers, brats, wings, french fries, taquitos, reheating leftovers. That last one is especially nice. No more using the microwave to unevenly reheat food, the Cosori does it so much better. I originally purchased it just for wings, to save on eating wings at a restaurant. I have come to enjoy its versatility so much. Its easy to use and easy to clean. Don't hold out, get this bad boy now!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 30, 2020
CommentsContent: Love this product! Makes some very yummy fried chicken tenders as well as other things. It is very easy to use, and easy clean! Is not to big and fits on the counter so nicely. I could not be more happier with this product!

CommentsTitle: Very happy with Cosori air fryer
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2021
CommentsContent: Everything we cook comes out great - french fries (we’ve only used frozen at this point), steak bacon, broccoli- all delicious.  Cleanup is a breeze.  We have the 5.8qt.  Didn’t even realize that when I bought it.  Would not want to go smaller.  This size is great. My only complete would be that it is kind of loud.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 25, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this air fryer after a coworker raved about his.  I have not found that it duplicates a true "deep-fried" experience, but I use this almost daily as a very handy convection oven.  It is easy to use and easy to clean, reduces the amount of time to pre-heat and cook.  I've cooked salmon, chicken wings, potatoes, boneless skinless chicken breasts, shrimp and veggies in it.  I even baked some cookies and reheated a slice of pizza with no issues. Very handy to have and saves time and money over heating up the large oven.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2020
CommentsContent: Amazing air fryer, first time trying one and I'm in love. Cooks just about everything - and quick. Make flavorful healthy & delicious food. I make it a mission to soak in water immediately after use for ease of cleaning.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 26, 2019
CommentsContent: Love this it’s now my favorite kitchen appliance. So when I first started using this I was a little skeptical bc every thing had a weird taste to it. Then after a little research I found that you have to clean a ton of times to get rid of the taste and then run empty a few times. Once I did that every thing came out amazing. I have 3 kids and this is the perfect size to cook all of us fries at once or chicken. Getting the hang out of making things and finding new recipes to try is fun.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 19, 2020
CommentsContent: Persistent chemical taste too the food. Tastes like burnt plastic. This is despite multiple things cooked in this fryer. It doesn’t go away.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 17, 2019
CommentsContent: Arrived two weeks ago and has been in use continuously since. Whole family enjoys. Beware!! Recipe books Banana Nut Bread, came out pudding even with an extra 10 minutes. So times do vary & there is a learning curve.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 6, 2020
CommentsContent: Easy to use, cooks my food as desired with a little tweaking.  Make sure you practice with the settings for your favorite foods as the settings are more of a recommendation, but work well for most foods.  I love the Alexa Integration and the included app.  Works like a charm...

CommentsTitle: The Modern Most Useful Home Appliance!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 2, 2019
CommentsContent: Perfect for on-the-go moms when fixing up meals for the family. I use this every single day to whip up the kids healthy snacks and meal preps for my husband and I. Thanks to the timer it cooks for so much time and beeps while I multi-task other errands without burning our food. And it’s sleek modern finish matches our urban kitchen theme. I love the air fryer and it’s the best and most used appliance in our home!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 3, 2020
CommentsContent: We had an issue with the operation of this unit working with out the Wi fi App I contacted the company . They send a brand new one . Never asked for me to return the defective one. The replacement one works flawlessly !

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 7, 2021
CommentsContent: I am really pleased with this air fryer all around.  I have a smaller one that I have had for a couple years but decided to go for a bit bigger and square.  Love it!  Much easier to clean.

CommentsTitle: Amazons pictures don’t give this justice
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 19, 2020
CommentsContent: Amazons pictures don’t give this justice. When I thought of red I thought of fire engine red. That is not the case this is the most beautiful color red. Almost a brick kind of color with less orange. I gave a good reviews although we haven’t used it yet. It’s my husband’s toy.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 2, 2021
CommentsContent: I love this air fryer. I’ve bought three different kinds and returned them. I thought I would put it away somewhere when I’m not using it. But I use it everyday and cleaning it is so easy.

CommentsTitle: Good size! Fun to cook some Indian food too
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 20, 2019
CommentsContent: This is probably the first appliance that my husband has appreciated having on the kitchen counter top and regularly uses it for quick heating/ toasting pizzas, sandwiches, etc.I am still experimenting with indian foods in this, but anything that needs shallow fried can pretty much be air-fryed in this! Love the size too - perfect for a family of 3.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2021
CommentsContent: Love love this air fryer. I cook EVERYTHING in this sucker. Makes my life so much easier, cooks fast and evenly, my favorite thing to make in there is steak. The recipe book also has some neat recipes that are amazing to try. If your looking into getting an air fryer, BUY THIS ONE

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 18, 2021
CommentsContent: We did our research on the best air fryers and this one was in the top 5.  We are not disappointed with its performance.  It is easy to use and clean.  Food cooks super fast and tastes great!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 4, 2020
CommentsContent: I have no complaints about this air fryer. It was my best friend until it just stopped working after only 1 year & a few months. I’m not sure what I did but I will be buying another one 🥴🤷🏽‍♀️

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 11, 2020
CommentsContent: Love it, love it, love it! Very clear directions for use. So far, I’ve fried wings, potato wedges, and fish. Great flavor with every food. It syncs to my iPhone so I can preheat it and monitor the time while doing other stuff! I can’t believe I took this long to buy one

CommentsTitle: La nueva Reina de mi cocina 👑👑👑
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2019
CommentsContent: Waaaaaooooo me llegó súper rápido creo que en dos días y me encantó, llegó en tres cajas muy bien empacado ningún riesgo de romperse,en cuanto llegó hice unas pechugas de pollo y me encantó el resultado y amé el libro de cocina súper buenísimos platos y bien saludables  estoy muy emocionada ya quiero hacer de todo , es la nueva reina de mi cocina, está bien grande eso me agrada porque somos familia de 4 ,la recomiendo 1000% jajajaj

CommentsTitle: This is wonderful.  It works very well.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 30, 2020
CommentsContent: We like it.  No more oil.  Makes great fried chicken.  Easy to clean.  Max temp is only 400 degrees so keep that in mind.  Put it outside or near an exhaust vent because it will make your kitchen very smokey.  Get this if you like to eat good food.  Cheers!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 1, 2019
CommentsContent: I was a skeptic. But- I love this accessory so much. I’m looking forward to learning more and using it even more. So far, the roasted veggies, bacon, and pork chops have been outstanding!

CommentsTitle: The Best Air Fryer Out There
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 6, 2020
CommentsContent: I wanted to give this a 4 at first. Reason be, the first one I ordered didn’t even work. I decided not to quit on it cause there’s always faulty equipment. They sent me a new one 2 days later. I was hesitate at first, but this one actually worked. Can’t really be mad, the thing is awesome. Cooks fish/fries/veggies anything. This thing is a beast!

CommentsTitle: Try it you may just really like it
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 29, 2019
CommentsContent: Of all the things I’ve bought on line this Cosori Air Fryer is amount the top three.  I try to use it for just about everything I cook.  Being single it makes things so simple I wonder why I never thought about one years ago.  I have found that everything in the cook book may not work exactly to your taste so it’s a try n adjust for next time.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 26, 2020
CommentsContent: Nice size to cook food within it. No oil needed maybe some pan spray to get the same color as you would fry in oil. But made some pork chops in there took just about an hour and some change to make 12 and let me tell you worth the wait. The pork chops had the crunch as it was fried but the nice juicy textures as if you were to bake and I fell in love with this air fryer. Take my word for it, it can be kind of tricky at first honestly but it is worth the buy.

CommentsTitle: Smells and tastes like melting plastic
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 12, 2020
CommentsContent: Thoroughly cleaned and made sure to remove all packing material when it arrived. Even after four uses, it stinks up my kitchen with the smell of melting plastic. Food cooked in the air fryer take on the taste of melting plastic.The touch interface is also not very responsive and a pain to use.

CommentsTitle: Versatile and large capacity air fryer
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 11, 2019
CommentsContent: This is my second air fryer. I use it daily cooking everything from chicken to steaks to finish to vegetables. So far the outcome has been great. I had a smaller one and I had to adjust the time and temperature to get similar results. I attribute the difference to the larger volume. I highly recommend the product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 10, 2019
CommentsContent: Kinda bummed out that it doesn't sear your steaks to the level that a pan skillet would. But it's very convenient,  has plenty of options. I'm happy with my purchase. You can easily put a pound rib eye in there and it will cook it nicely in about 10 min

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 30, 2020
CommentsContent: It’s a good thing this unit works with an app. The touchscreen is mostly unresponsive. Even trying to turn on the unit is hit or miss. I will not purchase another item by this manufacturer. Other than that HUGE screw up, it works pretty good through the app

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2021
CommentsContent: This is my second air fryer from this company, Cosori. When I started the air fryer I noticed a smoking and burning, and there was a piece of plastic stuck behind the top coil which had melted. I tried my best to clean the coil but the machine is still smoking. When I reached out to Cosori for a replacement, the only advice they had was to try to clean it more. Horrible customer service.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 16, 2020
CommentsContent: I love this product. For one it helps me eat healthy, and secondly, its so easy to use! Considering buying a third for my parents so they can eat healthy as well. SO MANY recipes! Really adds some variety to my meals and makes me feel better about cooking.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 25, 2020
CommentsContent: It’s everything I thought it would be and more...I love it, should have bought it long time ago..It’s a big machine, almost 6qt, but worth it.Cosori is rated in the 10 best.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 12, 2020
CommentsContent: Absolutely in love with this air fryer. I use it often, at least 3 times a week. My chicken wings have never tasted better. Clean up is easy. If you’re on the fence, go for it! You won’t regret it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 10, 2021
CommentsContent: This thing is so amazing.  There's literally endless opportunities. If you are a mom to young children you need this for those days where you want to pull your hair out. Trust me.

CommentsTitle: Works great and simple to use
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 2, 2021
CommentsContent: Instruction book was simple to follow. Recipe book is included with helpful hints. The fryer is very easy to operate and clean. So far we have had fried potatoes, bacon and chicken thighs. Everything has been nicely cooked.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 18, 2019
CommentsContent: I had another air product before Cosori and it worked okay but it rusted.  So far my Cosori has worked well with my food preparations and does not appear to rust. I have used frozen foods and chicken as my main ingredients.  I will try other foods as time allows.  I am quite pleased with its performamce.  Thank you so much Corsori.  The preheat feature is a great feature.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 27, 2020
CommentsContent: Made the best chicken of my life, following a Cosori recipe. Took 1 hour to roast a 5lb chicken, vs 2 hours in the oven. Moist and delicious! Will also never make salmon any other way, was so good. Love this air fryer!

CommentsTitle: Good at first then started warping
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 17, 2020
CommentsContent: Worked great, but not even a year later the actual bowl that holds the food is warping and bending. That's a huge defect.

CommentsTitle: My mind is changed about air fryers
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 4, 2020
CommentsContent: I really like this air fryer. I didn't think much of them because I used to own a cheaper one. I bought this one to replace it and it has changed my mind. I use it literally every day. It's 1700W so it has a lot of power and it's very easy to clean. It's also dishwasher safe. My old one wasn't.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 9, 2019
CommentsContent: This air fryer is really good and easy to use.  The only thing I had a hard time with is getting the basket out.  You have to push the tab forward and push down on the tab.  Once you get the hang of that it is a breeze.  The food came out really tasty.  My husband, who does not like scallops, ate some from the air fryer and now he can't get enough.  I even cooked a meat loaf in it and it turned out delicious.  I would recommend this air fryer to everyone.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 29, 2020
CommentsContent: This thing will fry a whole chicken. That’s really all you need to know. A whole effin chicken.It’s glorious.Want perfectly seared medium rare steaks? This thing will do that too.Fish. Pork chops. Fried pickles. Wings. Tater tots. I haven’t found a thing this won’t fry.And it’s superrr easy to clean. Would buy again.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 26, 2020
CommentsContent: Changed my previous review down to 2 stars. I said Originally that there’s a major design flaw with this thing because the basket/drawer falls right out, there is no stop. I like the cooking of the air fryer but this has become more and more an annoyance. I do not understand why designers made it this way. It is a hazard and a pain.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 22, 2020
CommentsContent: Where were you 20lbs ago?. I highly recommend this Air Fryer. As it promotes you don't have to add unhealthy oils, stand over a stove or keep a oven on for an hour to get the same results. Cosori, you did a great job. the Only criticism would be the electrical output, you may have to use a separate powerstrip (GFCI)

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 31, 2020
CommentsContent: Great little appliance! Uses little space, easy to use, good price. Less time and energy - doesn't heat up kitchen. Sister recommended it - thanks Sis!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 26, 2021

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 18, 2020
CommentsContent: I only used this unit about a half-dozen times over the last 6 months and it was great until it failed. Suddenly, the wifi stopped working and the touchpad also doesn't work at all. I tried re-setting, but nothing happens. 0/5.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 18, 2019

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 11, 2020

I don't currently have any issues, but it is unrealistic to have customer service refuse to help with this when all literature says to warranty it through the manufacturer. I won't ever buy this product line again even though I like the product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2019

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 9, 2020
CommentsContent: This is my 2nd air fryer.  They are amazing.  I have cooked every type of meat, vegetable and reheat everything. All is good.  I hardly ever use my oven.I would have given this 5 stars but 2 screws fell out and I had to replace them otherwise all is good.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 21, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 17, 2019

I seriously haven’t turned on my oven since we’ve bought this! So far we’ve made fried pickles, crispy tofu, french fries (frozen and fresh cut), baked potatoes, and my mom tried cooking burgers in it and said they came out absolutely perfect (crispy on the outside and juicy in the middle). This was a mother’s day gift but it has really been a gift for the whole family.

CommentsTitle: Wish I would have bought this earlier
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 3, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 5, 2019

Say yourself some time and money and buy a different brand!!

My overall satisfaction is pretty low with this unit, but I missed my return window. I am thinking about asking the manufacturer for a refund directly.

In my house,  using air fryer at the same time as the stove is ok, but with microwave, the circuit breaker needs to be reset.

CommentsTitle: The pressure washer of kitchen appliances
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 30, 2019
CommentsContent: Had my eye on this for a while now, and decided to pick it up during prime day.It's wonderful: it is easy to clean, cooks food quickly, comes with a full-color cookbook, and 12-month extension on your warranty. If you are thinking about getting an air-fryer, I would highly recommend this model.The only non-positive thing I have to say about this appliance is that you have to be mindful of where you place this in your kitchen. There is a steam vent located in the back, which can billow out quite a high volume if you are cooking food with too much oil or moisture in it. However, this will only occur if you go above the very clearly stated tolerances of this device - as was the case in my one and only experience with such.

CommentsTitle: Fast and Easy to use - Results are great.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 17, 2019

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 6, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 20, 2021

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 5, 2019

CommentsTitle: Smoke coming out during pre-heat mode
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 18, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   I used the air fryer about 5 times when all of a sudden, smoke starts coming out while in pre-heat mode. I made sure I cleaned the basket thoroughly, tried again, and still smoke comes out while trying to pre-heat. I didn't attempt to cook anything as I don't want to start potential fire. I contacted support and since the 1 year warranty is over the agent was not able to help or replace my item. I'm really disappointed as I enjoyed using the air fryer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 21, 2020
CommentsContent: It is great! I'm no cook, but the air fryer makes it so easy!  I love this thing. The only problem is... the door on my air fryer wont stay closed unless I prop it close. It's really frustrating. I should have sent it back when I got it, but other than that... no complaints about the air fryer.

CommentsTitle: Elegí pensando que era una de las mejores pero pienso que a un menor precio las hay mucho mejor
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 4, 2019
CommentsContent: No era lo que yo esperaba. Ocupa mucho espacio. El sabor no es el mismo

CommentsTitle: Worth the money and healthier fried foods

Yeah it takes 25 minutes with the preheat but worth the wait especially since you dont have to feel as guilty as fried wings in a traditional fryer

CommentsTitle: Great for reheating as well as cooking

CommentsContent: Here are some tips:1. Use oil spray in the basket.2.  Experiment with temperature and time to your taste.3.  Be careful with the sliding button guard used to secure basket.  It is plastic and fragile.4.  Enjoy  and share your food 😊

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 2, 2020

I think that the only thing I can complain about is that I wish the max temperature would be just a little bit higher.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 19, 2019

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 19, 2021

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 29, 2021

CommentsTitle: Super easy to use and clean!

That being said, this machine is a little bulky and required countertop rearrangement. However, the best kitchen purchase made in quite some time. CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 20, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 20, 2020
CommentsContent: This makes the perfect bacon. I haven’t tried anything else, as I just got this last night, but so far- so good. I highly recommend this product.

CommentsTitle: I will never know.  Could not get touch pad to work 🙁
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 17, 2020
CommentsContent: Couldn’t get touch pad to respond.  Waited on hold for a representative for quite a while then decided to give up and just return unit.I was so excited to try the air fryer- now I am just disappointed

CommentsTitle: Fast shipping, great little air fryer!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 20, 2019
CommentsContent: This is a wonderful little air fryer. Easy to use. Stainless steel constructing keeps it from getting extremely hot on outside. Once I got it down on how much & how long to cook. The recipe is what makes the flavor. Enjoy!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 5, 2020
CommentsContent: This came and definitely did not seem new.  I don’t think it was used to cook anything, but it had sticky spots on it. The box had clearly been opened and retaped.  And the user manual had been opened.  This is disappointing when you expect a new item—especially when it is a gift.

CommentsTitle: Cosori now is one of the best manufacturers In the game!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 25, 2020
CommentsContent: This is my second Cosori product and they haven’t  disappointed. It is hard to get chicken wrong. Size is plenty to cook enough chicken for 4. It took me a bit to master the fries but are fantastic once I did. Still need to try other things but so happy with it so far.

CommentsTitle: A great product from a company with great customer service
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 18, 2019
CommentsContent: My family has been using the air fryer routinely since we bought it with no regrets.  My teenagers use it for snacks and it works great for veggies and potatoes for sides.  Recently we had an accident and broke the fryer handle.  Within 6 hours we had a response from customer service indicating they were mailing us a replacement free of charge.  A GREAT COMPANY that stands behind their products.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 3, 2020
CommentsContent: I received this one damaged.. I tried making fries for the first time but it burned all the fries on top of the fryer and the fries that were in the middle didn’t cook too well. I expected this to be a lot better.. I don’t think I’d ever recommend it to anyone

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 7, 2020
CommentsContent: Love, love, love it. Never thought I would prefer air fried over deep fried but this machine works just as it should. Easy to use and easy to clean. We’ve had this for several months now and it really appears to be well made. We went to my parent’s house and they had one (big brand name) was not non-stick and the design sucked—-managed to burn my finger when I tried to disconnect the basket from the drip pan, mom was like, “oh yeah, that gets hot.” Very satisfied with this product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 8, 2021
CommentsContent: So the “buttons” never worked, but as I was able to connect to the app I was able to use the fryer. I recently got a new router and now, since the “buttons” don’t work I cannot get the fryer to connect to the internet. Useless. Piece. Of. Crap.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 19, 2019
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
   Easy to use.  I Have only cooked a few things so far.  I like that it provided recipes to try.  Garlic Parmesan Chicken wings came out really good! So far I have also cooked fries and bacon.  Chicken wings cooked on preset time.  May have to check fries and bacon cooking time.  I recommend shaking items like the directions suggest half way through. Easy to clean and pretty quiet.  I Would definitely recommend this product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 27, 2020
CommentsContent: very good to cook in.we cooked tater totts in ours the minute we got it and it took 13 mins to cook a full pan so crispy its wonderful.plans are to try fried pickles, chicken nuggets, onion rings and more.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 31, 2020
CommentsContent: We bought this due to its popularity on Amazon. After several uses, the inside fastening screws were coming loose and caused the inner chamber to break. CommentsTitle: The only appliance I couldn't do without!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 11, 2020
CommentsContent: I love this air fryer!!! We have literally used it every single day!  I hate baking add I feel as though it makes everything dry.
