It does have a non stick surface but any fried grease that still remains if cooking several batches at once can need extra elbow grease to remove.  I use a toothbrush to help me clean between the grates so that helps.All in all I love this appliance!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2018

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 24, 2021

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2021
CommentsContent: I love it. The food comes out cooked and tasty. Easy to use and clean up. Tried some of the different recipes andso far have liked them all. Even the French fries came out good.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 17, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 9, 2019

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 7, 2020

CommentsTitle: Great product but wish cleaning around the heating element was simpler

Very good product, glad I purchased.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 22, 2019

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 18, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 19, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2021

Also, it would be good if there were a more thorough guide for general cooking of foods not provided in the cookbook. However, all is fine, and their customer service was great when I had questions.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 11, 2019

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 30, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 5, 2020

CommentsTitle: Great Fryer, easy to use and clean!

CommentsTitle: I wish I hadn’t waited so long to get it

Customer service through both was a complete waste of time. Save yourself the time and trouble and get a different air fryer.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 13, 2020

I just think an air fryer should last longer than 10 months, especially when I payed full price for it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 5, 2020

The basket is large enough for a family of 2, and because the cook time is cut in half of a conventional oven you could prepare a meal for 4 in 2 batches. I tried to cook the French fries recipe and it came out overcooked because I cut them thin I think the recommended size was 1/2" thick. Overall I'm enjoying the fryer and thinking of different kind of foods to try.

CommentsTitle: I'm so happy I bought this one instead of a cheaper one!

CommentsTitle: Great buy! Lots of space, great settings and easy to clean.

Since the day I got it I have been making all kinds of food; hand held fruit pies, steak, fried chicken, roasted potatoes and more.  It is extremely easy to operate and clean.  The recipe book is great and the Cosori Community helps with questions and provides more recipes.  This is an extremely versatile air fryer!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 9, 2021
CommentsContent: The Cosori air fryer is so easy to use and the food tastes wonderful.  It is easy to clean.  I give it 5 stars for everything.  I've had 2 Ninja Air fryers.  While they worked well, the first one died after 6 months, the second one after 4 months!  So I opted for the Cosori and should have purchased it in the first place!  Highly recommend.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 23, 2021
CommentsContent: I've used this almost daily since I bought it. It works really well. As some have mentioned the temperatures suggested arent always the best. If you play a littke and invest in an oil sprayer, you'll be killing it. I purchased with the intent of mainly using it for frozen fried foods. I've cooked chicken and beef as well and it works pretty well once you have experimented. Would recommend for the price.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 11, 2019
CommentsContent: This was an awesome air fryer.  I love how easy it is to use and highly recommend it.  Downside is cooking bacon; can only cook a few strips at a time.  Other than that,  it is awesome for fries and chicken wings.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 1, 2019
CommentsContent: Love how food comes out crispy when using this air fryer!  And it is room enough to feed my family of four (but not roomy enough to feed a large crowd).  The only thing I do not like about this product is that the bottom of the food basket insert is easy to clean, but not the sides!  The way that the vents are facing on all four sides of the food basket, it is difficult to get in each vent to clean off the grease and food.  Besides that, I love it and use it almost every day.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 30, 2021
CommentsContent: I received this for Xmas and I have not been disappointed. I haven’t made any from scratch items but it’s been great for heating up frozen food for my kids. I love that I don’t have to preheat it and it cooks faster. I will say between running this, my microwave, and oven it has blown my breaker a few times.

CommentsTitle: Cooks food well, smokes BAD with any food i cook
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 15, 2019
CommentsContent: This air fryer smokes really bad. It is whit smoke and will fill the room, have tried lower temps and used parchment paper to catch crumbs.Put small amount of water in bottom of pan that holds basket! Smokes no matter what i do. It cooks food well and is easy to clean, but i would not buy again because of the smoking. Have had other air fryers and did not have this problem. I clean the inside and coils every time i use and wash the basket and pan also.

CommentsTitle: A no go- plastic smell & taste- Had to return
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 11, 2020
CommentsContent: I gave this as a gift on Christmas and unfortunately had to return it not long after. My friend said they followed the directions as provided and could not eradicate the plastic taste & smell after cooking.  So a no go for me.

CommentsTitle: Best kitchen appliance I've ever had!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 23, 2019
CommentsContent: I like everything about this air fryer.  Large capacity, easy to clean, fast cooking, and terrific customer service.  I hardly use my stove/oven anymore.  Recipe book that comes with air fryer contains many good recipes.  Cosori has a FB page for users of air fryer and their pressure cooker.  Very helpful. An excellent product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2020
CommentsContent: Makes great food in a short amount of time.  Fits nicely on my counter.  Makes great steaks and stuffed mushrooms! Please put a few drops of oil on french fries to give them a crispy texture.  Same with chicken and fish!Its easy to use and saves time.  Very efficient.  Easy to clean.  Just place in dishwasher.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 13, 2020
CommentsContent: Unfortunately, we had a problem with our air fryer / contacted company support and sent it back to them with them paying for shipment and they gave us a credit at Amazon for total amount so we bought another one.  We love their product and customer services

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 25, 2020
CommentsContent: Received product today. The shipping box was fine. However, the product in the original box when taken out of the product packaging box, was damaged from factory. It has a damaged crack in the unit at the bottom right. where the door is. When taking the door out, because of the damaged area, it won't let the door go back in properly. I have to return this product before even getting to use it. I very disappointed.  Cosori needs to inspect their products before packaging them.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 11, 2021
CommentsContent: worked well first time & as i have learned how much time & correct temperature - its even better cooking !

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 14, 2020

CommentsContent: Product broke down on me in 2 months maybe with about 7 to 9 uses. Would never buy again.Update: received a new fryer and it has been working perfectly. Thank you guys so much. Love my new fryer!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 31, 2019
CommentsContent: I debated buying one these forever. Finally did and OMG this one is amazing. Perfect food every time. But more importantly- so so easy to clean. Pop both trays in the dishwasher and done. Love it. I rarely use the oven anymore.

CommentsTitle: Big, Easy to Use, and Easy to Clean

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 12, 2019

CommentsTitle: It Works just like everyone said it would.

CommentsTitle: This is a great Air Fryer

CommentsContent: Easy to use, large compartment and fast cooking. The Cosori is a beautiful compact device, quiet and cooks so so fast. Cleaning is a bit annoying but make sure to clean it inside carefully as well as the basket and its little metal windows.

CommentsContent: Absolutely love this appliance as the the recipes are limitless and the finished meals are fabulous

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 23, 2019
CommentsContent: Among recent newly developed programmable counter top cooking appliances, COSORI Air Fryer is a cooking appliance with revolutionary concept/design. The recipes are very easy to follow, especially, the instructions on which and when to push which bottoms. We tried two other new types/concept of counter top cooking appliances in the past year. We are now very happy with this Cosori Air Fryer machine.How to register for warranty?

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 22, 2019

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 26, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2020

CommentsTitle: Great air fryer for the price point

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2021

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 4, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 29, 2019

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 4, 2019
CommentsContent: We had a oil fryer it died on us and we decided to try out a air fryer and picked this up. We love this thing corn on the cob in under 15 min and some really good stuff too we are using this for a lot of stuff. and so far everytime it has been great.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 22, 2020
CommentsContent: Love this kitchen gadget.  Fries are crispy, desserts are perfection.  It has a large basket, big enough to cook at meal for 2-4 people.  Watch the times on recipes though.  It cooks a little faster then most air fryer recipes call for.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 10, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 16, 2020

I need to purchase a brand new one, definitely not going with this one. Air fryers are amazing--but this one has lots of flaws.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 13, 2020
